THE_DT STORY_NN OF_IN MANKIND_NNP

FOREWORD_NN

WHEN_WRB I_PRP was_VBD twelve_CD or_CC thirteen_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, an_DT uncle_NN of_IN mine_NN who_WP gave_VBD me_PRP
my_PRP$ love_VBP for_IN books_NNS and_CC pictures_NNS promised_VBN to_TO take_VB me_PRP upon_IN a_DT memorable_JJ
expedition_NN ._. I_PRP was_VBD to_TO go_VB with_IN him_PRP to_TO the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT tower_NN of_IN Old_JJ Saint_NNP
Lawrence_NNP in_IN Rotterdam_NNP ._.

And_CC so_RB ,_, one_CD fine_JJ day_NN ,_, a_DT sexton_NN with_IN a_DT key_NN as_RB large_JJ as_IN that_IN of_IN Saint_NNP
Peter_NNP opened_VBD a_DT mysterious_JJ door_NN ._. "_'' Ring_VBG the_DT bell_NN ,"_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, "_`` when_WRB you_PRP come_VBP
back_RB and_CC want_VBP to_TO get_VB out_RP ,"_RB and_CC with_IN a_DT great_JJ grinding_NN of_IN rusty_JJ old_JJ hinges_NNS
he_PRP separated_VBD us_PRP from_IN the_DT noise_NN of_IN the_DT busy_JJ street_NN and_CC locked_VBD us_PRP into_IN a_DT
world_NN of_IN new_JJ and_CC strange_JJ experiences_NNS ._.

For_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN in_IN my_PRP$ life_NN I_PRP was_VBD confronted_VBN by_IN the_DT phenomenon_NN of_IN
audible_JJ silence_NN ._. When_WRB we_PRP had_VBD climbed_VBN the_DT first_JJ flight_NN of_IN stairs_NNS ,_, I_PRP added_VBD
another_DT discovery_NN to_TO my_PRP$ limited_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN natural_JJ phenomena_NNS —_VBP that_IN of_IN
tangible_JJ darkness_NN ._. A_DT match_NN showed_VBD us_PRP where_WRB the_DT upward_JJ road_NN continued_VBD ._.
We_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT next_JJ floor_NN and_CC then_RB to_TO the_DT next_JJ and_CC the_DT next_JJ until_IN I_PRP had_VBD
lost_VBN count_NN and_CC then_RB there_EX came_VBD still_RB another_DT floor_NN ,_, and_CC suddenly_RB we_PRP had_VBD
plenty_NN of_IN light_NN ._. This_DT floor_NN was_VBD on_IN an_DT even_JJ height_NN with_IN the_DT roof_NN of_IN the_DT
church_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD used_VBN as_IN a_DT storeroom_NN ._. Covered_VBN with_IN many_JJ inches_NNS of_IN
dust_NN ,_, there_RB lay_VBD the_DT abandoned_JJ symbols_NNS of_IN a_DT venerable_JJ faith_NN which_WDT had_VBD
been_VBN discarded_VBN by_IN the_DT good_JJ people_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN many_JJ years_NNS ago_RB ._. That_DT which_WDT
had_VBD meant_VBN life_NN and_CC death_NN to_TO our_PRP$ ancestors_NNS was_VBD here_RB reduced_VBN to_TO junk_NN and_CC
rubbish_NN ._. The_DT industrious_JJ rat_NN had_VBD built_VBN his_PRP$ nest_NN among_IN the_DT carved_JJ images_NNS
and_CC the_DT ever_RB watchful_JJ spider_NN had_VBD opened_VBN up_RP shop_NN between_IN the_DT outspread_NN
arms_NNS of_IN a_DT kindly_JJ saint_NN ._.

The_DT next_JJ floor_NN showed_VBD us_PRP from_IN where_WRB we_PRP had_VBD derived_VBN our_PRP$ light_NN ._. Enormous_''
open_JJ windows_NNS with_IN heavy_JJ iron_NN bars_NNS made_VBD the_DT high_JJ and_CC barren_JJ room_NN the_DT
roosting_NN place_NN of_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN pigeons_NNS ._. The_DT wind_NN blew_VBD through_IN the_DT iron_NN
bars_NNS and_CC the_DT air_NN was_VBD filled_VBN with_IN a_DT weird_JJ and_CC pleasing_JJ music_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD
the_DT noise_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN below_IN us_PRP ,_, but_CC a_DT noise_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN purified_VBN and_CC
cleansed_VBN by_IN the_DT distance_NN ._. The_DT rumbling_NN of_IN heavy_JJ carts_NNS and_CC the_DT clinking_NN
of_IN horses_NNS '_POS hoofs_NNS ,_, the_DT winding_VBG of_IN cranes_NNS and_CC pulleys_NNS ,_, the_DT hissing_NN sound_NN
of_IN the_DT patient_NN steam_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN set_VBN to_TO do_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN man_NN in_IN
a_DT thousand_CD different_JJ ways_NNS —_IN they_PRP had_VBD all_DT been_VBN blended_VBN into_IN a_DT softly_RB
rustling_NN whisper_NN which_WDT provided_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ background_NN for_IN the_DT trembling_VBG
cooing_NN of_IN the_DT pigeons_NNS ._.

Here_RB the_DT stairs_NNS came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN and_CC the_DT ladders_NNS began_VBD ._. And_CC after_IN the_DT
first_JJ ladder_NN (_-LRB- a_DT slippery_JJ old_JJ thing_NN which_WDT made_VBD one_CD feel_NN his_PRP$ way_NN with_IN a_DT
cautious_JJ foot_NN )_-RRB- there_EX was_VBD a_DT new_JJ and_CC even_RB greater_JJR wonder_NN ,_, the_DT town-clock_NN ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD the_DT heart_NN of_IN time_NN ._. I_PRP could_MD hear_VB the_DT heavy_JJ pulsebeats_NNS of_IN the_DT rapid_JJ
seconds_NNS —_IN one_CD —_NN two_CD —_NNS three_CD —_NNS up_RB to_TO sixty_CD ._. Then_RB a_DT sudden_JJ quivering_VBG noise_NN
when_WRB all_DT the_DT wheels_NNS seemed_VBD to_TO stop_VB and_CC another_DT minute_NN had_VBD been_VBN chopped_VBN
off_IN eternity_NN ._. Without_IN pause_NN it_PRP began_VBD again_RB —_IN one_CD —_NN two_CD —_NNS three_CD —_NNS until_IN at_IN
last_JJ after_IN a_DT warning_NN rumble_NN and_CC the_DT scraping_NN of_IN many_JJ wheels_NNS a_DT thunderous_NN
voice_NN ,_, high_JJ above_IN us_PRP ,_, told_VBD the_DT world_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD the_DT hour_NN of_IN noon_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT next_JJ floor_NN were_VBD the_DT bells_NNS ._. The_DT nice_JJ little_JJ bells_NNS and_CC their_PRP$
terrible_JJ sisters_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT centre_NN the_DT big_JJ bell_NN ,_, which_WDT made_VBD me_PRP turn_VB stiff_JJ
with_IN fright_NN when_WRB I_PRP heard_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT night_NN telling_VBG a_DT story_NN
of_IN fire_NN or_CC flood_NN ._. In_IN solitary_JJ grandeur_NN it_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO reflect_VB upon_IN those_DT
six_CD hundred_CD years_NNS during_IN which_WDT it_PRP had_VBD shared_VBN the_DT joys_NNS and_CC the_DT sorrows_NNS of_IN
the_DT good_JJ people_NNS of_IN Rotterdam_NNP ._. Around_IN it_PRP ,_, neatly_RB arranged_VBN like_IN the_DT blue_NN
jars_NNS in_IN an_DT old-fashioned_JJ apothecary_NN shop_NN ,_, hung_VBD the_DT little_JJ fellows_NNS ,_, who_WP
twice_RB each_DT week_NN played_VBD a_DT merry_NN tune_NN for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT country-folk_NN
who_WP had_VBD come_VBN to_TO market_NN to_TO buy_VB and_CC sell_VB and_CC hear_VB what_WP the_DT big_JJ world_NN had_VBD
been_VBN doing_VBG ._. But_CC in_IN a_DT corner_NN —_IN all_DT alone_RB and_CC shunned_VBN by_IN the_DT others_NNS —_VBP a_DT big_JJ
black_JJ bell_NN ,_, silent_JJ and_CC stern_JJ ,_, the_DT bell_NN of_IN death_NN ._.

Then_RB darkness_NN once_RB more_RBR and_CC other_JJ ladders_NNS ,_, steeper_NN and_CC even_RB more_RBR
dangerous_JJ than_IN those_DT we_PRP had_VBD climbed_VBN before_RB ,_, and_CC suddenly_RB the_DT fresh_JJ air_NN
of_IN the_DT wide_JJ heavens_NNS ._. We_PRP had_VBD reached_VBN the_DT highest_JJS gallery_NN ._. Above_IN us_PRP the_DT
sky_NN ._. Below_IN us_PRP the_DT city_NN —_RP a_DT little_JJ toy-town_NN ,_, where_WRB busy_JJ ants_NNS were_VBD hastily_RB
crawling_VBG hither_NN and_CC thither_NN ,_, each_DT one_CD intent_NN upon_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ particular_JJ
business_NN ,_, and_CC beyond_IN the_DT jumble_NN of_IN stones_NNS ,_, the_DT wide_JJ greenness_NN of_IN the_DT
open_JJ country_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD my_PRP$ first_JJ glimpse_NN of_IN the_DT big_JJ world_NN ._.

Since_IN then_RB ,_, whenever_WRB I_PRP have_VBP had_VBD the_DT opportunity_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP gone_VBN to_TO the_DT top_NN
of_IN the_DT tower_NN and_CC enjoyed_VBD myself_PRP ._. It_PRP was_VBD hard_JJ work_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP repaid_VBD in_IN full_JJ
the_DT mere_JJ physical_JJ exertion_NN of_IN climbing_VBG a_DT few_JJ stairs_NNS ._.

Besides_IN ,_, I_PRP knew_VBD what_WP my_PRP$ reward_NN would_MD be_VB ._. I_PRP would_MD see_VB the_DT land_NN and_CC the_DT
sky_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP would_MD listen_VB to_TO the_DT stories_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ kind_NN friend_NN the_DT watchman_NN ,_,
who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT small_JJ shack_NN ,_, built_VBN in_IN a_DT sheltered_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT gallery_NN ._.
He_PRP looked_VBD after_IN the_DT clock_NN and_CC was_VBD a_DT father_NN to_TO the_DT bells_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP warned_VBD
of_IN fires_NNS ,_, but_CC he_PRP enjoyed_VBD many_JJ free_JJ hours_NNS and_CC then_RB he_PRP smoked_VBD a_DT pipe_NN and_CC

wide_JJ world_NN which_WDT surrounded_VBD him_PRP on_IN all_DT sides_NNS ._.

History_NN he_PRP knew_VBD well_RB ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT living_VBG thing_NN with_IN him_PRP ._. "_`` There_EX ,"_VBD he_PRP

Finally_RB the_DT silver_JJ line_NN of_IN the_DT endless_JJ sea_NN and_CC as_IN a_DT contrast_NN ,_,

THE_DT STORY_NN OF_IN MANKIND_NNP


HIGH_NNP Up_IN in_IN the_DT North_NNP in_IN the_DT land_NN called_VBD Svithjod_NNP ,_, there_RB stands_VBZ a_DT rock_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT hundred_CD miles_NNS high_JJ and_CC a_DT hundred_CD miles_NNS wide_JJ ._. Once_RB every_DT thousand_CD
years_NNS a_DT little_JJ bird_NN comes_VBZ to_TO this_DT rock_NN to_TO sharpen_VB its_PRP$ beak_NN ._.

When_WRB the_DT rock_NN has_VBZ thus_RB been_VBN worn_VBN away_RB ,_, then_RB a_DT single_JJ day_NN of_IN eternity_NN
will_MD have_VB gone_VBN by_IN ._.




THE_DT SETTING_NN OF_IN THE_DT STAGE_NN


WE_NNP live_VBP under_IN the_DT shadow_NN of_IN a_DT gigantic_JJ question_NN mark_NN ._.

Who_WP are_VBP we_PRP ?_.

Where_WRB do_VBP we_PRP come_VB from_IN ?_.

Whither_PRP are_VBP we_PRP bound_VBN ?_.

Slowly_RB ,_, but_CC with_IN persistent_JJ courage_NN ,_, we_PRP have_VBP been_VBN pushing_VBG this_DT question_NN
mark_NN further_RBR and_CC further_RBR towards_IN that_DT distant_JJ line_NN ,_, beyond_IN the_DT horizon_NN ,_,
where_WRB we_PRP hope_VBP to_TO find_VB our_PRP$ answer_NN ._.

We_PRP have_VBP not_RB gone_VBN very_RB far_RB ._.

We_PRP still_RB know_VBP very_RB little_JJ but_CC we_PRP have_VBP reached_VBN the_DT point_NN where_WRB (_-LRB- with_IN a_DT
fair_JJ degree_NN of_IN accuracy_NN )_-RRB- we_PRP can_MD guess_VB at_IN many_JJ things_NNS ._.

In_IN this_DT chapter_NN I_PRP shall_MD tell_VB you_PRP how_WRB (_-LRB- according_VBG to_TO our_PRP$ best_JJS belief_NN )_-RRB- the_DT
stage_NN was_VBD set_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ appearance_NN of_IN man_NN ._.

If_IN we_PRP represent_VBP the_DT time_NN during_IN which_WDT it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN possible_JJ for_IN animal_NN
life_NN to_TO exist_VB upon_IN our_PRP$ planet_NN by_IN a_DT line_NN of_IN this_DT length_NN ,_, then_RB the_DT tiny_JJ
line_NN just_RB below_IN indicates_VBZ the_DT age_NN during_IN which_WDT man_NN (_-LRB- or_CC a_DT creature_NN more_RBR
or_CC less_JJR resembling_JJ man_NN )_-RRB- has_VBZ lived_VBN upon_IN this_DT earth_NN ._.

Man_NN was_VBD the_DT last_JJ to_TO come_VB but_CC the_DT first_JJ to_TO use_VB his_PRP$ brain_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN
of_IN conquering_VBG the_DT forces_NNS of_IN nature_NN ._. That_DT is_VBZ the_DT reason_NN why_WRB we_PRP are_VBP going_VBG
to_TO study_VB him_PRP ,_, rather_RB than_IN cats_NNS or_CC dogs_NNS or_CC horses_NNS or_CC any_DT of_IN the_DT other_JJ
animals_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, all_DT in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ way_NN ,_, have_VBP a_DT very_RB interesting_JJ historical_JJ
development_NN behind_IN them_PRP ._.

In_IN the_DT beginning_NN ,_, the_DT planet_NN upon_IN which_WDT we_PRP live_VBP was_VBD (_-LRB- as_RB far_RB as_IN we_PRP now_RB
know_VB )_-RRB- a_DT large_JJ ball_NN of_IN flaming_VBG matter_NN ,_, a_DT tiny_JJ cloud_NN of_IN smoke_NN in_IN the_DT
endless_JJ ocean_NN of_IN space_NN ._. Gradually_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN millions_NNS of_IN years_NNS ,_,
the_DT surface_NN burned_VBN itself_PRP out_RP ,_, and_CC was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN a_DT thin_JJ layer_NN of_IN
rocks_NNS ._. Upon_IN these_DT lifeless_JJ rocks_NNS the_DT rain_NN descended_VBD in_IN endless_JJ torrents_NNS ,_,
wearing_VBG out_IN the_DT hard_JJ granite_NN and_CC carrying_VBG the_DT dust_NN to_TO the_DT valleys_NNS that_WDT
lay_VBD hidden_VBN between_IN the_DT high_JJ cliffs_NNS of_IN the_DT steaming_JJ earth_NN ._.

Finally_RB the_DT hour_NN came_VBD when_WRB the_DT sun_NN broke_VBD through_IN the_DT clouds_NNS and_CC saw_VBD how_WRB
this_DT little_JJ planet_NN was_VBD covered_VBN with_IN a_DT few_JJ small_JJ puddles_NNS which_WDT were_VBD to_TO
develop_VB into_IN the_DT mighty_JJ oceans_NNS of_IN the_DT eastern_JJ and_CC western_JJ hemispheres_NNS ._.

Then_RB one_CD day_NN the_DT great_JJ wonder_NN happened_VBD ._. What_WP had_VBD been_VBN dead_JJ ,_, gave_VBD birth_NN
to_TO life_NN ._.

The_DT first_JJ living_NN cell_NN floated_VBN upon_IN the_DT waters_NNS of_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.

For_IN millions_NNS of_IN years_NNS it_PRP drifted_VBD aimlessly_RB with_IN the_DT currents_NNS ._. But_CC during_IN
all_PDT that_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD developing_VBG certain_JJ habits_NNS that_IN it_PRP might_MD survive_VB
more_RBR easily_RB upon_IN the_DT inhospitable_JJ earth_NN ._. Some_DT of_IN these_DT cells_NNS were_VBD
happiest_JJS in_IN the_DT dark_JJ depths_NNS of_IN the_DT lakes_NNS and_CC the_DT pools_NNS ._. They_PRP took_VBD root_NN
in_IN the_DT slimy_NN sediments_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN carried_VBN down_RB from_IN the_DT tops_NNS of_IN the_DT
hills_NNS and_CC they_PRP became_VBD plants_NNS ._. Others_NNS preferred_VBD to_TO move_VB about_RB and_CC they_PRP
grew_VBD strange_JJ jointed_JJ legs_NNS ,_, like_IN scorpions_NNS and_CC began_VBD to_TO crawl_VB along_IN
the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN amidst_IN the_DT plants_NNS and_CC the_DT pale_JJ green_JJ things_NNS that_WDT
looked_VBD like_IN jelly-fishes_NNS ._. Still_RB others_NNS (_-LRB- covered_VBN with_IN scales_NNS )_-RRB- depended_VBN
upon_IN a_DT swimming_VBG motion_NN to_TO go_VB from_IN place_NN to_TO place_VB in_IN their_PRP$ search_NN for_IN
food_NN ,_, and_CC gradually_RB they_PRP populated_VBN the_DT ocean_NN with_IN myriads_NNS of_IN fishes_NNS ._.

Meanwhile_RB the_DT plants_NNS had_VBD increased_VBN in_IN number_NN and_CC they_PRP had_VBD to_TO search_VB for_IN
new_JJ dwelling_NN places_NNS ._. There_EX was_VBD no_DT more_JJR room_NN for_IN them_PRP at_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN
the_DT sea_NN ._. Reluctantly_RB they_PRP left_VBD the_DT water_NN and_CC made_VBD a_DT new_JJ home_NN in_IN the_DT
marshes_NNS and_CC on_IN the_DT mud-banks_NNS that_WDT lay_VBD at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT mountains_NNS ._.
Twice_RB a_DT day_NN the_DT tides_NNS of_IN the_DT ocean_NN covered_VBD them_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ brine_NN ._. For_IN
the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, the_DT plants_NNS made_VBD the_DT best_JJS of_IN their_PRP$ uncomfortable_JJ
situation_NN and_CC tried_VBD to_TO survive_VB in_IN the_DT thin_JJ air_NN which_WDT surrounded_VBD the_DT
surface_NN of_IN the_DT planet_NN ._. After_IN centuries_NNS of_IN training_NN ,_, they_PRP learned_VBD how_WRB
to_TO live_VB as_IN comfortably_RB in_IN the_DT air_NN as_IN they_PRP had_VBD done_VBN in_IN the_DT water_NN ._. They_PRP
increased_VBN in_IN size_NN and_CC became_VBD shrubs_NNS and_CC trees_NNS and_CC at_IN last_JJ they_PRP learned_VBD
how_WRB to_TO grow_VB lovely_JJ flowers_NNS which_WDT attracted_VBD the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT busy_JJ big_JJ
bumble-bees_NNS and_CC the_DT birds_NNS who_WP carried_VBD the_DT seeds_NNS far_RB and_CC wide_RB until_IN the_DT
whole_JJ earth_NN had_VBD become_VBN covered_VBN with_IN green_JJ pastures_NNS ,_, or_CC lay_VBD dark_JJ under_IN
the_DT shadow_NN of_IN the_DT big_JJ trees_NNS ._. But_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT fishes_NNS too_RB had_VBD begun_VBN to_TO
leave_VB the_DT sea_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP had_VBD learned_VBN how_WRB to_TO breathe_VB with_IN lungs_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN
with_IN gills_NNS ._. We_PRP call_VBP such_JJ creatures_NNS amphibious_JJ ,_, which_WDT means_VBZ that_IN they_PRP
are_VBP able_JJ to_TO live_VB with_IN equal_JJ ease_NN on_IN the_DT land_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT water_NN ._. The_DT first_JJ
frog_NN who_WP crosses_VBZ your_PRP$ path_NN can_MD tell_VB you_PRP all_DT about_IN the_DT pleasures_NNS of_IN the_DT
double_JJ existence_NN of_IN the_DT amphibian_JJ ._.

Once_RB outside_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, these_DT animals_NNS gradually_RB adapted_VBN themselves_PRP
more_RBR and_CC more_RBR to_TO life_NN on_IN land_NN ._. Some_DT became_VBD reptiles_NNS (_-LRB- creatures_NNS who_WP
crawl_NN like_IN lizards_NNS )_-RRB- and_CC they_PRP shared_VBD the_DT silence_NN of_IN the_DT forests_NNS with_IN
the_DT insects_NNS ._. That_IN they_PRP might_MD move_VB faster_RBR through_IN the_DT soft_JJ soil_NN ,_, they_PRP
improved_VBN upon_IN their_PRP$ legs_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ size_NN increased_VBN until_IN the_DT world_NN was_VBD
populated_VBN with_IN gigantic_JJ forms_NNS (_-LRB- which_WDT the_DT hand-books_NNS of_IN biology_NN list_NN
under_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN Ichthyosaurus_NNP and_CC Megalosaurus_NNP and_CC Brontosaurus_NNP )_-RRB-
who_WP grew_VBD to_TO be_VB thirty_CD to_TO forty_CD feet_NNS long_JJ and_CC who_WP could_MD have_VB played_VBN with_IN
elephants_NNS as_IN a_DT full_JJ grown_JJ cat_NN plays_NNS with_IN her_PRP$ kittens_NNS ._.

Some_DT of_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN this_DT reptilian_JJ family_NN began_VBD to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT tops_NNS
of_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD then_RB often_RB more_RBR than_IN a_DT hundred_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.
They_PRP no_RB longer_RBR needed_VBN their_PRP$ legs_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN walking_VBG ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD
necessary_JJ for_IN them_PRP to_TO move_VB quickly_RB from_IN branch_NN to_TO branch_NN ._. And_CC so_RB they_PRP
changed_VBN a_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ skin_NN into_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN parachute_NN ,_, which_WDT stretched_VBD
between_IN the_DT sides_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ bodies_NNS and_CC the_DT small_JJ toes_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ fore-feet_JJ ,_,
and_CC gradually_RB they_PRP covered_VBD this_DT skinny_JJ parachute_NN with_IN feathers_NNS and_CC
made_VBN their_PRP$ tails_NNS into_IN a_DT steering_NN gear_NN and_CC flew_VBD from_IN tree_NN to_TO tree_NN and_CC
developed_VBN into_IN true_JJ birds_NNS ._.

Then_RB a_DT strange_JJ thing_NN happened_VBD ._. All_PDT the_DT gigantic_JJ reptiles_NNS died_VBD within_IN a_DT
short_JJ time_NN ._. We_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB the_DT reason_NN ._. Perhaps_RB it_PRP was_VBD due_JJ to_TO a_DT sudden_JJ
change_NN in_IN climate_NN ._. Perhaps_RB they_PRP had_VBD grown_VBN so_RB large_JJ that_IN they_PRP could_MD
neither_DT swim_NN nor_CC walk_NN nor_CC crawl_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP starved_VBD to_TO death_NN within_IN sight_NN
but_CC not_RB within_IN reach_NN of_IN the_DT big_JJ ferns_NNS and_CC trees_NNS ._. Whatever_WDT the_DT cause_NN ,_, the_DT
million_CD year_NN old_JJ world-empire_NN of_IN the_DT big_JJ reptiles_NNS was_VBD over_RB ._.

The_DT world_NN now_RB began_VBD to_TO be_VB occupied_VBN by_IN very_RB different_JJ creatures_NNS ._. They_PRP
were_VBD the_DT descendants_NNS of_IN the_DT reptiles_NNS but_CC they_PRP were_VBD quite_RB unlike_IN these_DT
because_IN they_PRP fed_VBD their_PRP$ young_JJ from_IN the_DT "_`` mammae_JJ "_'' or_CC the_DT breasts_NNS of_IN the_DT
mother_NN ._. Wherefore_IN modern_JJ science_NN calls_VBZ these_DT animals_NNS "_'' mammals_NNS ."_VBP They_PRP
had_VBD shed_VBN the_DT scales_NNS of_IN the_DT fish_NN ._. They_PRP did_VBD not_RB adopt_VB the_DT feathers_NNS of_IN
the_DT bird_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP covered_VBD their_PRP$ bodies_NNS with_IN hair_NN ._. The_DT mammals_NNS however_RB
developed_VBN other_JJ habits_NNS which_WDT gave_VBD their_PRP$ race_NN a_DT great_JJ advantage_NN over_IN the_DT
other_JJ animals_NNS ._. The_DT female_NN of_IN the_DT species_NNS carried_VBD the_DT eggs_NNS of_IN the_DT young_JJ
inside_IN her_PRP$ body_NN until_IN they_PRP were_VBD hatched_VBN and_CC while_IN all_DT other_JJ living_VBG

OUR_NNP EARLIEST_NNP ANCESTORS_NNP

PREHISTORIC_JJ MAN_NNP

PREHISTORIC_JJ MAN_NNP BEGINS_NNS TO_TO MAKE_VB THINGS_NNS FOR_IN HIMSELF_NN ._.


EARLY_NN man_NN did_VBD not_RB know_VB what_WP time_NN meant_VBD ._. He_PRP kept_VBD no_DT records_NNS of_IN birthdays_NNS

and_CC the_DT wild_JJ ears_NNS of_IN corn_NN were_VBD ready_JJ to_TO be_VB eaten_VBN and_CC that_DT summer_NN ended_VBN

It_PRP snowed_VBD for_IN months_NNS and_CC months_NNS ._. All_PDT the_DT plants_NNS died_VBD and_CC the_DT animals_NNS

In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ that_IN man_NN clothe_VBD himself_PRP lest_IN

Next_RB came_VBD the_DT housing_NN problem_NN ._. This_DT was_VBD simple_JJ ._. Many_JJ animals_NNS were_VBD in_IN the_DT

And_CC then_RB one_CD evening_NN a_DT dead_JJ chicken_NN fell_VBD into_IN the_DT fire_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD not_RB

destroy_VB the_DT human_JJ race_NN ,_, became_VBD its_PRP$ greatest_JJS teacher_NN because_IN it_PRP forced_VBD
man_NN to_TO use_VB his_PRP$ brain_NN ._.




HIEROGLYPHICS_PRP$

THE_DT EGYPTIANS_NNS INVENT_NNP THE_DT ART_NN OF_IN WRITING_NN AND_CC THE_DT RECORD_NN OF_IN HISTORY_NN BEGINS_NNS


THESE_DT earliest_JJS ancestors_NNS of_IN ours_PRP$ who_WP lived_VBD in_IN the_DT great_JJ European_JJ
wilderness_NN were_VBD rapidly_RB learning_VBG many_JJ new_JJ things_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ safe_JJ to_TO say_VB that_IN
in_IN due_JJ course_NN of_IN time_NN they_PRP would_MD have_VB given_VBN up_RP the_DT ways_NNS of_IN savages_NNS and_CC
would_MD have_VB developed_VBN a_DT civilisation_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._. But_CC suddenly_RB there_EX
came_VBD an_DT end_NN to_TO their_PRP$ isolation_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD discovered_VBN ._.

A_DT traveller_NN from_IN an_DT unknown_JJ southland_NN who_WP had_VBD dared_VBN to_TO cross_VB the_DT sea_NN
and_CC the_DT high_JJ mountain_NN passes_NNS had_VBD found_VBN his_PRP$ way_NN to_TO the_DT wild_JJ people_NNS of_IN the_DT
European_JJ continent_NN ._. He_PRP came_VBD from_IN Africa_NNP ._. His_PRP$ home_NN was_VBD in_IN Egypt_NNP ._.

The_DT valley_NN of_IN the_DT Nile_NNP had_VBD developed_VBN a_DT high_JJ stage_NN of_IN civilisation_NN
thousands_NNS of_IN years_NNS before_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT west_NN had_VBD dreamed_VBN of_IN the_DT
possibilities_NNS of_IN a_DT fork_NN or_CC a_DT wheel_NN or_CC a_DT house_NN ._. And_CC we_PRP shall_MD therefore_RB
leave_VB our_PRP$ great-great_JJ -_: grandfathers_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ caves_NNS ,_, while_IN we_PRP visit_VBP
the_DT southern_JJ and_CC eastern_JJ shores_NNS of_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP ,_, where_WRB stood_VBD the_DT
earliest_JJS school_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ race_NN ._.

The_DT Egyptians_NNS have_VBP taught_VBN us_PRP many_JJ things_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD excellent_JJ farmers_NNS ._.
They_PRP knew_VBD all_DT about_IN irrigation_NN ._. They_PRP built_VBD temples_NNS which_WDT were_VBD afterwards_RB
copied_VBN by_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP and_CC which_WDT served_VBD as_IN the_DT earliest_JJS models_NNS for_IN the_DT
churches_NNS in_IN which_WDT we_PRP worship_NN nowadays_RB ._. They_PRP had_VBD invented_VBN a_DT calendar_NN

THE_DT NILE_NNP VALLEY_NNP

THE_DT BEGINNING_NN OF_IN CIVILISATION_NNP IN_IN THE_DT VALLEY_NN OF_IN THE_DT NILE_NN


THE_DT history_NN of_IN man_NN is_VBZ the_DT record_NN of_IN a_DT hungry_JJ creature_NN in_IN search_NN of_IN food_NN ._.
Wherever_IN food_NN was_VBD plentiful_JJ ,_, thither_JJ man_NN has_VBZ travelled_VBN to_TO make_VB his_PRP$ home_NN ._.

The_DT fame_NN of_IN the_DT Valley_NNP of_IN the_DT Nile_NNP must_MD have_VB spread_VBN at_IN an_DT early_JJ date_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN Africa_NNP and_CC from_IN the_DT desert_NN of_IN Arabia_NNP and_CC from_IN the_DT
western_JJ part_NN of_IN Asia_NNP people_NNS had_VBD flocked_VBN to_TO Egypt_NNP to_TO claim_VB their_PRP$ share_NN
of_IN the_DT rich_JJ farms_NNS ._. Together_RB these_DT invaders_NNS had_VBD formed_VBN a_DT new_JJ race_NN which_WDT
called_VBN itself_PRP "_`` Remi_NNP "_'' or_CC "_`` the_DT Men_NN "_`` just_RB as_IN we_PRP sometimes_RB call_VBP America_NNP
"_`` God_NNP '_'' s_PRP own_JJ country_NN ."_IN They_PRP had_VBD good_JJ reason_NN to_TO be_VB grateful_JJ to_TO a_DT Fate_NN which_WDT

year_NN the_DT Nile_NNP turned_VBD the_DT valley_NN into_IN a_DT shallow_JJ lake_NN and_CC when_WRB the_DT waters_NNS
receded_VBN all_PDT the_DT grainfields_NNS and_CC the_DT pastures_NNS were_VBD covered_VBN with_IN several_JJ
inches_NNS of_IN the_DT most_RBS fertile_JJ clay_NN ._.

In_IN Egypt_NNP a_DT kindly_RB river_NN did_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN a_DT million_CD men_NNS and_CC made_VBD it_PRP
possible_JJ to_TO feed_VB the_DT teeming_VBG population_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ large_JJ cities_NNS of_IN

in_IN the_DT valley_NN ._. But_CC a_DT complicated_JJ system_NN of_IN small_JJ canals_NNS and_CC well-sweeps_NNS

Hereafter_RB and_CC turned_VBD the_DT teeming_VBG valley_NN of_IN the_DT Nile_NNP into_IN a_DT land_NN devoted_VBN
to_TO the_DT Dead_NNP ._.

was_VBD dead_JJ his_PRP$ relatives_NNS took_VBD his_PRP$ corpse_NN and_CC had_VBD it_PRP embalmed_VBN ._. For_IN weeks_NNS
it_PRP was_VBD soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN natron_NN and_CC then_RB it_PRP was_VBD filled_VBN with_IN pitch_NN ._.

the_DT dreary_JJ hours_NNS of_IN waiting_VBG )_-RRB- and_CC by_IN little_JJ statues_NNS of_IN cooks_NNS and_CC bakers_NNS
and_CC barbers_NNS (_-LRB- that_IN the_DT occupant_NN of_IN this_DT dark_JJ home_NN might_MD be_VB decently_RB
provided_VBN with_IN food_NN and_CC need_NN not_RB go_VB about_IN unshaven_JJ )._.

Originally_RB these_DT graves_NNS had_VBD been_VBN dug_VBN into_IN the_DT rocks_NNS of_IN the_DT western_JJ
mountains_NNS but_CC as_IN the_DT Egyptians_NNPS moved_VBD northward_RB they_PRP were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO
build_VB their_PRP$ cemeteries_NNS in_IN the_DT desert_NN ._. The_DT desert_NN however_RB is_VBZ full_JJ of_IN
wild_JJ animals_NNS and_CC equally_RB wild_JJ robbers_NNS and_CC they_PRP broke_VBD into_IN the_DT graves_NNS and_CC
disturbed_VBN the_DT mummy_JJ or_CC stole_VBD the_DT jewelry_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN buried_VBN with_IN the_DT
body_NN ._. To_TO prevent_VB such_JJ unholy_JJ desecration_NN the_DT Egyptians_NNPS used_VBD to_TO build_VB
small_JJ mounds_NNS of_IN stones_NNS on_IN top_NN of_IN the_DT graves_NNS ._. These_DT little_JJ mounds_NNS
gradually_RB grew_VBD in_IN size_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT rich_JJ people_NNS built_VBD higher_RBR mounds_NNS than_IN
the_DT poor_JJ and_CC there_EX was_VBD a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN competition_NN to_TO see_VB who_WP could_MD make_VB

high_JJ was_VBD pir-em_NN -_: us_PRP )_-RRB- was_VBD over_IN five_CD hundred_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ._.

THE_DT STORY_NN OF_IN EGYPT_JJ

THE_DT SUMERIANS_NNS

old_JJ melting-pot_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ Semitic_JJ races_NNS ,_, into_IN a_DT Greek_NNP province_NN ._. Next_RB
came_VBD the_DT Romans_NNPS and_CC after_IN the_DT Romans_NNS ,_, the_DT Turks_NNPS ,_, and_CC Mesopotamia_NNP ,_, the_DT
second_JJ centre_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN '_'' s_PRP civilisation_NN ,_, became_VBD a_DT vast_JJ wilderness_NN
where_WRB huge_JJ mounds_NNS of_IN earth_NN told_VBD a_DT story_NN of_IN ancient_JJ glory_NN ._.




MOSES_NNS

THE_DT STORY_NN OF_IN MOSES_NNP ,_, THE_DT LEADER_NN OF_IN THE_DT JEWISH_NNS PEOPLE_NN


SOME_JJ time_NN during_IN the_DT twentieth_JJ century_NN before_RB our_PRP$ era_NN ,_, a_DT small_JJ and_CC
unimportant_JJ tribe_NN of_IN Semitic_NNP shepherds_NNS had_VBD left_VBN its_PRP$ old_JJ home_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD

to_TO find_VB new_JJ pastures_NNS within_IN the_DT domain_NN of_IN the_DT Kings_NNP of_IN Babylonia_NNP ._. They_PRP
had_VBD been_VBN driven_VBN away_RB by_IN the_DT royal_JJ soldiers_NNS and_CC they_PRP had_VBD moved_VBN westward_RB
looking_VBG for_IN a_DT little_JJ piece_NN of_IN unoccupied_JJ territory_NN where_WRB they_PRP might_MD set_VB

This_DT tribe_NN of_IN shepherds_NNS was_VBD known_VBN as_IN the_DT Hebrews_NNP or_CC ,_, as_IN we_PRP call_VBP them_PRP ,_,

Moses_NNP decided_VBD to_TO bring_VB his_PRP$ people_NNS back_RB to_TO a_DT love_NN of_IN the_DT ways_NNS of_IN the_DT

THE_DT PHOENICIANS_NNS

THE_DT PHOENICIANS_NNS WHO_WP GAVE_VBP US_PRP OUR_NNP ALPHABET_NNP


THE_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ,_, who_WP were_VBD the_DT neighbours_NNS of_IN the_DT Jews_NNPS ,_, were_VBD a_DT Semitic_NN

and_CC Sidon_NNP ,_, and_CC within_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN they_PRP had_VBD gained_VBN a_DT monopoly_NN of_IN the_DT
trade_NN of_IN the_DT western_JJ seas_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ ships_NNS went_VBD regularly_RB to_TO Greece_NNP and_CC

colonies_NNS ._. Many_JJ of_IN these_DT were_VBD the_DT origin_NN of_IN modern_JJ cities_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Cadiz_NNP
and_CC Marseilles_NNP ._.

They_PRP were_VBD not_RB troubled_VBN by_IN a_DT conscience_NN ._. If_IN we_PRP are_VBP to_TO believe_VB all_DT their_PRP$
neighbours_NNS they_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB what_WP the_DT words_NNS honesty_NN or_CC integrity_NN meant_VBD ._.

single_JJ friend_NN ._. Nevertheless_RB they_PRP have_VBP rendered_VBN all_DT coming_VBG generations_NNS
one_CD service_NN of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS possible_JJ value_NN ._. They_PRP gave_VBD us_PRP our_PRP$ alphabet_NN ._.

The_DT Phoenicians_NNPS had_VBD been_VBN familiar_JJ with_IN the_DT art_NN of_IN writing_VBG ,_, invented_VBN by_IN
the_DT Sumerians_NNPS ._. But_CC they_PRP regarded_VBD these_DT pothooks_NNS as_IN a_DT clumsy_JJ waste_NN
of_IN time_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD practical_JJ business_NN men_NNS and_CC could_MD not_RB spend_VB hours_NNS
engraving_JJ two_CD or_CC three_CD letters_NNS ._. They_PRP set_VBD to_TO work_VB and_CC invented_VBD a_DT new_JJ
system_NN of_IN writing_NN which_WDT was_VBD greatly_RB superior_JJ to_TO the_DT old_JJ one_CD ._. They_PRP
borrowed_VBN a_DT few_JJ pictures_NNS from_IN the_DT Egyptians_NNS and_CC they_PRP simplified_VBD a_DT number_NN
of_IN the_DT wedge-shaped_JJ figures_NNS of_IN the_DT Sumerians_NNPS ._. They_PRP sacrificed_VBD the_DT pretty_JJ
looks_NNS of_IN the_DT older_JJR system_NN for_IN the_DT advantage_NN of_IN speed_NN and_CC they_PRP reduced_VBD
the_DT thousands_NNS of_IN different_JJ images_NNS to_TO a_DT short_JJ and_CC handy_JJ alphabet_NN of_IN
twenty-two_CD letters_NNS ._.

entered_VBD Greece_NNP ._. The_DT Greeks_NNP added_VBD a_DT few_JJ letters_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ and_CC carried_VBN
the_DT improved_JJ system_NN to_TO Italy_NNP ._. The_DT Romans_NNPS modified_VBN the_DT figures_NNS somewhat_RB
and_CC in_IN turn_NN taught_VBD them_PRP to_TO the_DT wild_JJ barbarians_NNS of_IN western_JJ Europe_NNP ._. Those_DT
wild_JJ barbarians_NNS were_VBD our_PRP$ own_JJ ancestors_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT is_VBZ the_DT reason_NN why_WRB this_DT
book_NN is_VBZ written_VBN in_IN characters_NNS that_WDT are_VBP of_IN Phoenician_JJ origin_NN and_CC not_RB

THE_DT INDO-EUROPEANS_NNS

THE_DT INDO-EUROPEAN_NNP PERSIANS_NNPS CONQUER_NNP THE_NNP SEMITIC_NNP AND_CC THE_DT EGYPTIAN_NNP WORLD_NN

These_DT difficulties_NNS led_VBD to_TO the_DT three_CD famous_JJ wars_NNS between_IN Greece_NNP and_CC

tried_VBD very_RB hard_JJ to_TO get_VB a_DT foothold_NN upon_IN the_DT European_JJ continent_NN ._.

But_CC in_IN this_DT they_PRP did_VBD not_RB succeed_VB ._. The_DT navy_NN of_IN Athens_NNP proved_VBD
unconquerable_JJ ._. By_IN cutting_VBG off_RP the_DT lines_NNS of_IN supplies_NNS of_IN the_DT Persian_JJ
armies_NNS ,_, the_DT Greek_NNP sailors_NNS invariably_RB forced_VBD the_DT Asiatic_JJ rulers_NNS to_TO return_VB
to_TO their_PRP$ base_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ encounter_NN between_IN Asia_NNP ,_, the_DT ancient_JJ teacher_NN ,_, and_CC
Europe_NNP ,_, the_DT young_JJ and_CC eager_JJ pupil_NN ._. A_DT great_JJ many_JJ of_IN the_DT other_JJ chapters_NNS
of_IN this_DT book_NN will_MD tell_VB you_PRP how_WRB the_DT struggle_NN between_IN east_JJ and_CC west_JJ has_VBZ
continued_VBN until_IN this_DT very_JJ day_NN ._.




THE_DT AEGEAN_NNP SEA_NN

THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT AEGEAN_NNP SEA_NNP CARRIED_NNP THE_DT CIVILISATION_NN OF_IN OLD_NNP ASIA_NNP INTO_NNP
THE_DT WILDERNESS_NNP OF_IN EUROPE_NNS


WHEN_WRB Heinrich_NNP Schliemann_NNP was_VBD a_DT little_JJ boy_NN his_PRP$ father_NN told_VBD him_PRP the_DT story_NN
of_IN Troy_NNP ._. He_PRP liked_VBD that_DT story_NN better_RB than_IN anything_NN else_RB he_PRP had_VBD ever_RB heard_VBN
and_CC he_PRP made_VBD up_RP his_PRP$ mind_NN ,_, that_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP was_VBD big_JJ enough_RB to_TO leave_VB
home_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD travel_VB to_TO Greece_NNP and_CC "_`` find_VB Troy_NNP ."_NN That_IN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT son_NN of_IN
a_DT poor_JJ country_NN parson_NN in_IN a_DT Mecklenburg_NNP village_NN did_VBD not_RB bother_VB him_PRP ._. He_PRP
knew_VBD that_IN he_PRP would_MD need_VB money_NN but_CC he_PRP decided_VBD to_TO gather_VB a_DT fortune_NN first_RB
and_CC do_VBP the_DT digging_NN afterwards_RB ._. As_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_, he_PRP managed_VBD to_TO get_VB
a_DT large_JJ fortune_NN within_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP had_VBD enough_RB
money_NN to_TO equip_VB an_DT expedition_NN ,_, he_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT northwest_JJ corner_NN of_IN Asia_NNP
Minor_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP supposed_VBD that_IN Troy_NNP had_VBD been_VBN situated_VBN ._.

In_IN that_DT particular_JJ nook_NN of_IN old_JJ Asia_NNP Minor_NNP ,_, stood_VBD a_DT high_JJ mound_NN covered_VBN
with_IN grainfields_NNS ._. According_VBG to_TO tradition_NN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT home_NN of_IN Priamus_NNP
the_DT king_NN of_IN Troy_NNP ._. Schliemann_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ enthusiasm_NN was_VBD somewhat_RB greater_JJR than_IN
his_PRP$ knowledge_NN ,_, wasted_VBD no_DT time_NN in_IN preliminary_JJ explorations_NNS ._. At_IN once_RB he_PRP
began_VBD to_TO dig_VB ._. And_CC he_PRP dug_VBD with_IN such_JJ zeal_NN and_CC such_JJ speed_NN that_IN his_PRP$ trench_NN
went_VBD straight_RB through_IN the_DT heart_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN for_IN which_WDT he_PRP was_VBD looking_VBG
and_CC carried_VBD him_PRP to_TO the_DT ruins_NNS of_IN another_DT buried_JJ town_NN which_WDT was_VBD at_IN least_JJS
a_DT thousand_CD years_NNS older_JJR than_IN the_DT Troy_NNP of_IN which_WDT Homer_NNP had_VBD written_VBN ._. Then_RB
something_NN very_RB interesting_JJ occurred_VBD ._. If_IN Schliemann_NNP had_VBD found_VBN a_DT few_JJ
polished_JJ stone_NN hammers_NNS and_CC perhaps_RB a_DT few_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN crude_NN pottery_NN ,_, no_DT one_CD
would_MD have_VB been_VBN surprised_VBN ._. Instead_RB of_IN discovering_VBG such_JJ objects_NNS ,_, which_WDT
people_NNS had_VBD generally_RB associated_VBN with_IN the_DT prehistoric_JJ men_NNS who_WP had_VBD lived_VBN
in_IN these_DT regions_NNS before_IN the_DT coming_VBG of_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP ,_, Schliemann_NNP found_VBD

THE_DT GREEKS_NNP

MEANWHILE_NNP THE_DT INDO-EUROPEAN_NNP TRIBE_NN OF_IN THE_DT HELLENES_NNS WAS_VBD TAKING_NNP POSSESSION_NNP
OF_IN GREECE_NNP


THE_DT Pyramids_NNS were_VBD a_DT thousand_CD years_NNS old_JJ and_CC were_VBD beginning_VBG to_TO show_VB the_DT

in_IN search_NN of_IN fresh_JJ pastures_NNS ._. They_PRP called_VBD themselves_PRP Hellenes_NNP ,_, after_IN
Hellen_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN Deucalion_NNP and_CC Pyrrha_NNP ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT old_JJ myths_NNS

who_WP lived_VBD on_IN Mount_NNP Olympus_NNP ._.

Of_IN these_DT early_JJ Hellenes_NNS we_PRP know_VBP nothing_NN ._. Thucydides_'' ,_, the_DT historian_NN of_IN

"_`` did_VBD not_RB amount_NN to_TO very_RB much_JJ ,"_NN and_CC this_DT was_VBD probably_RB true_JJ ._. They_PRP were_VBD
very_RB ill-mannered_JJ ._. They_PRP lived_VBD like_IN pigs_NNS and_CC threw_VBD the_DT bodies_NNS of_IN their_PRP$

Greek_NNP peninsula_NN (_-LRB- who_WP were_VBD called_VBN the_DT Pelasgians_NNS )_-RRB- and_CC stole_VBD their_PRP$ farms_NNS

and_CC the_DT Peloponnesus_NNP ._.

not_RB hope_VB to_TO defeat_VB them_PRP with_IN their_PRP$ clumsy_JJ stone_NN axes_NNS ._.

For_IN many_JJ centuries_NNS they_PRP continued_VBD to_TO wander_VB from_IN valley_NN to_TO valley_NN and_CC
from_IN mountain_NN side_NN to_TO mountain_NN side_NN Then_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN had_VBD been_VBN
occupied_VBN and_CC the_DT migration_NN had_VBD come_VBN to_TO an_DT end_NN ._.

That_DT moment_NN was_VBD the_DT beginning_NN of_IN Greek_NNP civilisation_NN ._. The_DT Greek_NNP farmer_NN ,_,

THE_DT GREEK_NNP CITIES_NNPS

THE_DT GREEK_NNP CITIES_NNPS THAT_NNP WERE_NNP REALLY_NNP STATES_NNPS


WE_NNP modern_JJ people_NNS love_VBP the_DT sound_NN of_IN the_DT word_NN "_`` big_JJ ."_JJ We_PRP pride_NN ourselves_PRP
upon_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN we_PRP belong_VBP to_TO the_DT "_`` biggest_JJS "_'' country_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC

are_VBP dead_JJ we_PRP are_VBP buried_VBN in_IN the_DT "_`` biggest_JJS cemetery_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ state_NN ."_.

A_DT citizen_NN of_IN ancient_JJ Greece_NNP ,_, could_MD he_PRP have_VB heard_VBN us_PRP talk_VB ,_, would_MD not_RB have_VB
known_VBN what_WP we_PRP meant_VBD ._. "_'' Moderation_NNP in_IN all_DT things_NNS "_'' was_VBD the_DT ideal_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ life_NN and_CC mere_JJ bulk_NN did_VBD not_RB impress_VB him_PRP at_IN all_DT ._. And_CC this_DT love_NN of_IN

which_WDT the_DT men_NNS wore_VBD and_CC in_IN the_DT rings_NNS and_CC the_DT bracelets_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ wives_NNS ._. It_PRP
followed_VBD the_DT crowds_NNS that_WDT went_VBD to_TO the_DT theatre_NN and_CC made_VBD them_PRP hoot_VB down_RP any_DT
playwright_NN who_WP dared_VBD to_TO sin_VB against_IN the_DT iron_NN law_NN of_IN good_JJ taste_NN or_CC good_JJ

The_DT Greeks_NNP even_RB insisted_VBD upon_IN this_DT quality_NN in_IN their_PRP$ politicians_NNS and_CC in_IN
their_PRP$ most_RBS popular_JJ athletes_NNS ._. When_WRB a_DT powerful_JJ runner_NN came_VBD to_TO Sparta_NNP and_CC

"_`` That_DT is_VBZ all_DT very_RB well_RB ,"_IN you_PRP will_MD say_VB ,_, "_'' and_CC no_DT doubt_NN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ

lived_VBD ._.

The_DT people_NNS of_IN Egypt_NNP or_CC Mesopotamia_NNP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT "_`` subjects_NNS "_'' of_IN a_DT

"_`` cities_NNS "_'' the_DT largest_JJS of_IN which_WDT counted_VBD fewer_JJR inhabitants_NNS than_IN a_DT large_JJ
modern_JJ village_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT peasant_NN who_WP lived_VBD in_IN Ur_NNP said_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT

of_IN western_JJ Asia_NNP ._. But_CC when_WRB a_DT Greek_NNP said_VBD proudly_RB that_IN he_PRP was_VBD an_DT Athenian_JJ
or_CC a_DT Theban_NNP he_PRP spoke_VBD of_IN a_DT small_JJ town_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD both_DT his_PRP$ home_NN and_CC his_PRP$
country_NN and_CC which_WDT recognised_VBD no_DT master_NN but_CC the_DT will_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN the_DT
market-place_NN ._.

To_TO the_DT Greek_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ fatherland_NN was_VBD the_DT place_NN where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD born_VBN ;_: where_WRB he_PRP
had_VBD spent_VBD his_PRP$ earliest_JJS years_NNS playing_VBG hide_NN and_CC seek_VB amidst_IN the_DT forbidden_VBN

other_JJ boys_NNS and_CC girls_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ nicknames_NNS were_VBD as_RB familiar_JJ to_TO him_PRP as_IN those_DT

father_NN and_CC mother_NN lay_VBD buried_VBN ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT small_JJ house_NN within_IN the_DT high_JJ

complete_JJ world_NN which_WDT covered_VBD no_DT more_JJR than_IN four_CD or_CC five_CD acres_NNS of_IN rocky_JJ
land_NN ._. Don_NNP '_POS t_NN you_PRP see_VBP how_WRB these_DT surroundings_NNS must_MD have_VB influenced_VBN a_DT man_NN
in_IN everything_NN he_PRP did_VBD and_CC said_VBD and_CC thought_VBD ?_. The_DT people_NNS of_IN Babylon_NNP and_CC

his_PRP$ immediate_JJ surroundings_NNS ._. He_PRP never_RB ceased_VBD to_TO be_VB part_NN of_IN a_DT little_JJ

neighbours_NNS were_VBD watching_VBG him_PRP ._. Whatever_WDT he_PRP did_VBD ,_, whether_IN he_PRP wrote_VBD plays_NNS
or_CC made_VBD statues_NNS out_IN of_IN marble_NN or_CC composed_VBN songs_NNS ,_, he_PRP remembered_VBD that_IN his_PRP$

home-town_NN who_WP knew_VBD about_IN such_JJ things_NNS ._. This_DT knowledge_NN forced_VBD him_PRP to_TO
strive_NN after_IN perfection_NN ,_, and_CC perfection_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN taught_VBN from_IN

In_IN this_DT hard_JJ school_NN ,_, the_DT Greeks_NNP learned_VBD to_TO excel_VB in_IN many_JJ things_NNS ._. They_PRP
created_VBN new_JJ forms_NNS of_IN government_NN and_CC new_JJ forms_NNS of_IN literature_NN and_CC new_JJ
ideals_NNS in_IN art_NN which_WDT we_PRP have_VBP never_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO surpass_VB ._. They_PRP performed_VBN
these_DT miracles_NNS in_IN little_JJ villages_NNS that_WDT covered_VBD less_JJR ground_NN than_IN four_CD or_CC
five_CD modern_JJ city_NN blocks_NNS ._.

And_CC look_VB ,_, what_WP finally_RB happened_VBD !_.

In_IN the_DT fourth_JJ century_NN before_RB our_PRP$ era_NN ,_, Alexander_NNP of_IN Macedonia_NNP conquered_CC
the_DT world_NN ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN with_IN fighting_NN ,_, Alexander_NNP decided_VBD that_IN
he_PRP must_MD bestow_VB the_DT benefits_NNS of_IN the_DT true_JJ Greek_NNP genius_NN upon_IN all_DT mankind_NN ._.
He_PRP took_VBD it_PRP away_RB from_IN the_DT little_JJ cities_NNS and_CC the_DT little_JJ villages_NNS and_CC tried_VBN
to_TO make_VB it_PRP blossom_NN and_CC bear_VB fruit_NN amidst_IN the_DT vast_JJ royal_JJ residences_NNS of_IN
his_PRP$ newly_RB acquired_VBN Empire_NNP ._. But_CC the_DT Greeks_NNP ,_, removed_VBN from_IN the_DT familiar_JJ
sight_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ temples_NNS ,_, removed_VBN from_IN the_DT well-known_JJ sounds_NNS and_CC
smells_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ crooked_JJ streets_NNS ,_, at_IN once_RB lost_VBN the_DT cheerful_JJ joy_NN and_CC
the_DT marvellous_JJ sense_NN of_IN moderation_NN which_WDT had_VBD inspired_VBN the_DT work_NN of_IN
their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC brains_NNS while_IN they_PRP laboured_VBD for_IN the_DT glory_NN of_IN their_PRP$ old_JJ
city-states_NNS ._. They_PRP became_VBD cheap_JJ artisans_NNS ,_, content_NN with_IN second-rate_JJ work_NN ._.
The_DT day_NN the_DT little_JJ city-states_NNS of_IN old_JJ Hellas_NNP lost_VBD their_PRP$ independence_NN and_CC
were_VBD forced_VBN to_TO become_VB part_NN of_IN a_DT big_JJ nation_NN ,_, the_DT old_JJ Greek_NNP spirit_NN died_VBD ._.
And_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN dead_JJ ever_RB since_IN ._.




GREEK_NNP SELF-GOVERNMENT_NNP

THE_DT GREEKS_NNP WERE_NNP THE_DT FIRST_NNP PEOPLE_NNP TO_TO TRY_NNP THE_DT DIFFICULT_NNP EXPERIMENT_NNPS OF_IN
SELF-GOVERNMENT_NNP


IN_IN the_DT beginning_NN ,_, all_DT the_DT Greeks_NNP had_VBD been_VBN equally_RB rich_JJ and_CC equally_RB poor_JJ ._.
Every_DT man_NN had_VBD owned_VBN a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN cows_NNS and_CC sheep_NN ._. His_PRP$ mud-hut_NN had_VBD
been_VBN his_PRP$ castle_NN ._. He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN free_JJ to_TO come_VB and_CC go_VB as_IN he_PRP wished_VBD ._. Whenever_WRB
it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO discuss_VB matters_NNS of_IN public_JJ importance_NN ,_, all_PDT the_DT
citizens_NNS had_VBD gathered_VBN in_IN the_DT market-place_NN ._. One_CD of_IN the_DT older_JJR men_NNS of_IN the_DT
village_NN was_VBD elected_VBN chairman_NN and_CC it_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO see_VB that_IN everybody_NN
had_VBD a_DT chance_NN to_TO express_VB his_PRP$ views_NNS ._. In_IN case_NN of_IN war_NN ,_, a_DT particularly_RB
energetic_JJ and_CC self-confident_JJ villager_NN was_VBD chosen_VBN commander-in_NN -_: chief_NN ,_, but_CC
the_DT same_JJ people_NNS who_WP had_VBD voluntarily_RB given_VBN this_DT man_NN the_DT right_NN to_TO be_VB
their_PRP$ leader_NN ,_, claimed_VBD an_DT equal_JJ right_NN to_TO deprive_VB him_PRP of_IN his_PRP$ job_NN ,_, once_RB the_DT
danger_NN had_VBD been_VBN averted_VBN ._.

But_CC gradually_RB the_DT village_NN had_VBD grown_VBN into_IN a_DT city_NN ._. Some_DT people_NNS had_VBD worked_VBN
hard_JJ and_CC others_NNS had_VBD been_VBN lazy_JJ ._. A_DT few_JJ had_VBD been_VBN unlucky_JJ and_CC still_RB others_NNS
had_VBD been_VBN just_RB plain_JJ dishonest_NN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS and_CC had_VBD
gathered_VBN wealth_NN ._. As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, the_DT city_NN no_RB longer_RB consisted_VBD of_IN a_DT number_NN
of_IN men_NNS who_WP were_VBD equally_RB well-off_JJ ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN it_PRP was_VBD inhabited_VBN by_IN a_DT
small_JJ class_NN of_IN very_RB rich_JJ people_NNS and_CC a_DT large_JJ class_NN of_IN very_RB poor_JJ ones_NNS ._.

There_EX had_VBD been_VBN another_DT change_NN ._. The_DT old_JJ commander-in_NN -_: chief_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN
willingly_RB recognised_VBD as_IN "_`` headman_NN "_'' or_CC "_`` King_NNP "_'' because_IN he_PRP knew_VBD how_WRB to_TO lead_VB
his_PRP$ men_NNS to_TO victory_NN ,_, had_VBD disappeared_VBN from_IN the_DT scene_NN ._. His_PRP$ place_NN had_VBD been_VBN
taken_VBN by_IN the_DT nobles_NNS —_IN a_DT class_NN of_IN rich_JJ people_NNS who_WP during_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN
time_NN had_VBD got_VBN hold_NN of_IN an_DT undue_JJ share_NN of_IN the_DT farms_NNS and_CC estates_NNS ._.

These_DT nobles_NNS enjoyed_VBD many_JJ advantages_NNS over_IN the_DT common_JJ crowd_NN of_IN freemen_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD able_JJ to_TO buy_VB the_DT best_JJS weapons_NNS which_WDT were_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN on_IN the_DT
market_NN of_IN the_DT eastern_JJ Mediterranean_NNP ._. They_PRP had_VBD much_RB spare_JJ time_NN in_IN which_WDT
they_PRP could_MD practise_VB the_DT art_NN of_IN fighting_VBG ._. They_PRP lived_VBD in_IN strongly_RB
built_VBN houses_NNS and_CC they_PRP could_MD hire_VB soldiers_NNS to_TO fight_VB for_IN them_PRP ._. They_PRP were_VBD
constantly_RB quarrelling_VBG among_IN each_DT other_JJ to_TO decide_VB who_WP should_MD rule_VB the_DT
city_NN ._. The_DT victorious_JJ nobleman_NN then_RB assumed_VBD a_DT sort_NN of_IN Kingship_NNP over_IN all_PDT
his_PRP$ neighbours_NNS and_CC governed_VBD the_DT town_NN until_IN he_PRP in_IN turn_NN was_VBD killed_VBN or_CC
driven_VBN away_RB by_IN still_RB another_DT ambitious_JJ nobleman_NN ._.

Such_JJ a_DT King_NNP ,_, by_IN the_DT grace_NN of_IN his_PRP$ soldiers_NNS ,_, was_VBD called_VBN a_DT "_`` Tyrant_JJ "_'' and_CC
during_IN the_DT seventh_JJ and_CC sixth_JJ centuries_NNS before_RB our_PRP$ era_NN every_DT Greek_NNP city_NN
was_VBD for_IN a_DT time_NN ruled_VBN by_IN such_JJ Tyrants_NNS ,_, many_DT of_IN whom_WP ,_, by_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, happened_VBN
to_TO be_VB exceedingly_RB capa-ble_JJ men_NNS ._. But_CC in_IN the_DT long_JJ run_NN ,_, this_DT state_NN of_IN
affairs_NNS became_VBD unbearable_JJ ._. Then_RB attempts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO bring_VB about_RB
reforms_NNS and_CC out_IN of_IN these_DT reforms_NNS grew_VBD the_DT first_JJ democratic_JJ government_NN of_IN
which_WDT the_DT world_NN has_VBZ a_DT record_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD early_RB in_IN the_DT seventh_JJ century_NN that_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Athens_NNP decided_VBD to_TO
do_VB some_DT housecleaning_NN and_CC give_VB the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN freemen_NNS once_RB more_RBR a_DT
voice_NN in_IN the_DT government_NN as_IN they_PRP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB had_VBN in_IN the_DT days_NNS
of_IN their_PRP$ Achaean_NNP ancestors_NNS ._. They_PRP asked_VBD a_DT man_NN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Draco_NNP to_TO
provide_VB them_PRP with_IN a_DT set_NN of_IN laws_NNS that_WDT would_MD protect_VB the_DT poor_JJ against_IN
the_DT aggressions_NNS of_IN the_DT rich_JJ ._. Draco_NNP set_VBD to_TO work_VB ._. Unfortunately_RB he_PRP was_VBD a_DT
professional_JJ lawyer_NN and_CC very_RB much_JJ out_IN of_IN touch_NN with_IN ordinary_JJ life_NN ._. In_IN
his_PRP$ eyes_NNS a_DT crime_NN was_VBD a_DT crime_NN and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD finished_VBN his_PRP$ code_NN ,_, the_DT
people_NNS of_IN Athens_NNP discovered_VBD that_IN these_DT Draconian_JJ laws_NNS were_VBD so_RB severe_JJ
that_IN they_PRP could_MD not_RB possibly_RB be_VB put_VBN into_IN effect_NN ._. There_EX would_MD not_RB have_VB
been_VBN rope_NN enough_RB to_TO hang_VB all_PDT the_DT criminals_NNS under_IN their_PRP$ new_JJ system_NN of_IN
jurisprudence_NN which_WDT made_VBD the_DT stealing_NN of_IN an_DT apple_NN a_DT capital_NN offence_NN ._.

The_DT Athenians_NNS looked_VBD about_RB for_IN a_DT more_JJR humane_JJ reformer_NN ._. At_IN last_JJ they_PRP
found_VBD some_DT one_NN who_WP could_MD do_VB that_DT sort_NN of_IN thing_NN better_RBR than_IN anybody_NN else_RB ._.
His_PRP$ name_NN was_VBD Solon_NNP ._. He_PRP belonged_VBD to_TO a_DT noble_JJ family_NN and_CC he_PRP had_VBD travelled_VBN
all_DT over_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC had_VBD studied_VBN the_DT forms_NNS of_IN government_NN of_IN many_JJ other_JJ
countries_NNS ._. After_IN a_DT careful_JJ study_NN of_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, Solon_NNP gave_VBD Athens_NNP a_DT set_NN
of_IN laws_NNS which_WDT bore_VBD testimony_NN to_TO that_DT wonderful_JJ principle_NN of_IN moderation_NN
which_WDT was_VBD part_NN of_IN the_DT Greek_NNP character_NN ._. He_PRP tried_VBD to_TO improve_VB the_DT condition_NN
of_IN the_DT peasant_NN without_IN however_RB destroying_VBG the_DT prosperity_NN of_IN the_DT nobles_NNS
who_WP were_VBD (_-LRB- or_CC rather_RB who_WP could_MD be_VB )_-RRB- of_IN such_JJ great_JJ service_NN to_TO the_DT state_NN as_IN
soldiers_NNS ._. To_TO protect_VB the_DT poorer_JJR classes_NNS against_IN abuse_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN
the_DT judges_NNS (_-LRB- who_WP were_VBD always_RB elected_VBN from_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN the_DT nobles_NNS because_IN
they_PRP received_VBD no_DT salary_NN )_-RRB- Solon_NNP made_VBD a_DT provision_NN whereby_WRB a_DT citizen_NN with_IN a_DT
grievance_NN had_VBD the_DT right_NN to_TO state_VB his_PRP$ case_NN before_IN a_DT jury_NN of_IN thirty_CD of_IN his_PRP$
fellow_NN Athenians_NNS ._.

Most_RBS important_JJ of_IN all_DT ,_, Solon_NNP forced_VBD the_DT average_JJ freeman_NN to_TO take_VB a_DT direct_JJ
and_CC personal_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. No_DT longer_RBR could_MD he_PRP
stay_VB at_IN home_NN and_CC say_VB "_`` oh_UH ,_, I_PRP am_VBP too_RB busy_JJ today_NN "_'' or_CC "_`` it_PRP is_VBZ raining_VBG and_CC I_PRP
had_VBD better_JJR stay_VB indoors_NNS ."_IN He_PRP was_VBD expected_VBN to_TO do_VB his_PRP$ share_NN ;_: to_TO be_VB at_IN the_DT
meeting_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN council_NN ;_: and_CC carry_VBP part_NN of_IN the_DT responsibility_NN for_IN
the_DT safety_NN and_CC the_DT prosperity_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN ._.

This_DT government_NN by_IN the_DT "_`` demos_NNS ,"_VBP the_DT people_NNS ,_, was_VBD often_RB far_RB from_IN
successful_JJ ._. There_EX was_VBD too_RB much_JJ idle_JJ talk_NN ._. There_EX were_VBD too_RB many_JJ hateful_JJ
and_CC spiteful_JJ scenes_NNS between_IN rivals_NNS for_IN official_JJ honor_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP taught_VBD
the_DT Greek_NNP people_NNS to_TO be_VB independent_JJ and_CC to_TO rely_VB upon_IN themselves_PRP for_IN their_PRP$
salvation_NN and_CC that_DT was_VBD a_DT very_RB good_JJ thing_NN ._.




GREEK_NNP LIFE_NNP

HOW_NNP THE_DT GREEKS_NNP LIVED_NNP


BUT_JJ how_WRB ,_, you_PRP will_MD ask_VB ,_, did_VBD the_DT ancient_JJ Greeks_NNS have_VBP time_NN to_TO look_VB after_IN
their_PRP$ families_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ business_NN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD forever_RB running_VBG to_TO the_DT
market-place_NN to_TO discuss_VB affairs_NNS of_IN state_NN ?_. In_IN this_DT chapter_NN I_PRP shall_MD tell_VB
you_PRP ._.

In_IN all_DT matters_NNS of_IN government_NN ,_, the_DT Greek_JJ democracy_NN recognised_VBN only_RB one_CD
class_NN of_IN citizens_NNS —_IN the_DT freemen_NNS ._. Every_DT Greek_NNP city_NN was_VBD composed_VBN of_IN a_DT small_JJ
number_NN of_IN free_JJ born_VBN citizens_NNS ,_, a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN slaves_NNS and_CC a_DT sprinkling_NN
of_IN foreigners_NNS ._.

At_IN rare_JJ intervals_NNS (_-LRB- usually_RB during_IN a_DT war_NN ,_, when_WRB men_NNS were_VBD needed_VBN for_IN the_DT
army_NN )_-RRB- the_DT Greeks_NNS showed_VBD themselves_PRP willing_JJ to_TO confer_VB the_DT rights_NNS of_IN
citizenship_NN upon_IN the_DT "_`` barbarians_NNS "_'' as_IN they_PRP called_VBD the_DT foreigners_NNS ._. But_CC
this_DT was_VBD an_DT exception_NN ._. Citizenship_NN was_VBD a_DT matter_NN of_IN birth_NN ._. You_PRP were_VBD an_DT
Athenian_JJ because_IN your_PRP$ father_NN and_CC your_PRP$ grandfather_NN had_VBD been_VBN Athenians_NNS
before_IN you_PRP ._. But_CC however_RB great_JJ your_PRP$ merits_NNS as_IN a_DT trader_NN or_CC a_DT soldier_NN ,_, if_IN
you_PRP were_VBD born_VBN of_IN non-Athenian_JJ parents_NNS ,_, you_PRP remained_VBD a_DT "_`` foreigner_NN "_'' until_IN
the_DT end_NN of_IN time_NN ._.

The_DT Greek_NNP city_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, whenever_WRB it_PRP was_VBD not_RB ruled_VBN by_IN a_DT king_NN or_CC a_DT
tyrant_NN ,_, was_VBD run_VBN by_IN and_CC for_IN the_DT freemen_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT would_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN
possible_JJ without_IN a_DT large_JJ army_NN of_IN slaves_NNS who_WP outnumbered_VBD the_DT free_JJ
citizens_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN six_CD or_CC five_CD to_TO one_CD and_CC who_WP performed_VBD those_DT tasks_NNS
to_TO which_WDT we_PRP modern_JJ people_NNS must_MD devote_VB most_JJS of_IN our_PRP$ time_NN and_CC energy_NN if_IN we_PRP
wish_NN to_TO provide_VB for_IN our_PRP$ families_NNS and_CC pay_VB the_DT rent_NN of_IN our_PRP$ apartments_NNS ._.
The_DT slaves_NNS did_VBD all_PDT the_DT cooking_NN and_CC baking_NN and_CC candlestick_NN making_NN of_IN the_DT
entire_JJ city_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD the_DT tailors_NNS and_CC the_DT carpenters_NNS and_CC the_DT jewelers_NNS
and_CC the_DT school-teachers_NNS and_CC the_DT bookkeepers_NNS and_CC they_PRP tended_VBD the_DT store_NN
and_CC looked_VBD after_IN the_DT factory_NN while_IN the_DT master_NN went_VBD to_TO the_DT public_JJ meeting_NN
to_TO discuss_VB questions_NNS of_IN war_NN and_CC peace_NN or_CC visited_VBD the_DT theatre_NN to_TO see_VB the_DT
latest_JJS play_NN of_IN AEschylus_NNP or_CC hear_VB a_DT discussion_NN of_IN the_DT revolutionary_NN
ideas_NNS of_IN Euripides_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD dared_VBN to_TO express_VB certain_JJ doubts_NNS upon_IN the_DT
omnipotence_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ god_NN Zeus_NNP ._.

Indeed_RB ,_, ancient_JJ Athens_NNP resembled_VBD a_DT modern_JJ club_NN ._. All_PDT the_DT freeborn_JJ citizens_NNS
were_VBD hereditary_JJ members_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT slaves_NNS were_VBD hereditary_RB servants_NNS ,_, and_CC
waited_VBD upon_IN the_DT needs_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ masters_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD very_RB pleasant_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT
member_NN of_IN the_DT organisation_NN ._.

But_CC when_WRB we_PRP talk_VBP about_IN slaves_NNS ,_, we_PRP do_VBP not_RB mean_VB the_DT sort_NN of_IN people_NNS about_IN
whom_WP you_PRP have_VBP read_VBN in_IN the_DT pages_NNS of_IN "_`` Uncle_NNP Tom_NNP '_'' s_VBZ Cabin_NNP ."_CC It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN
the_DT position_NN of_IN those_DT slaves_NNS who_WP tilled_VBD the_DT fields_NNS was_VBD a_DT very_RB unpleasant_JJ
one_CD ,_, but_CC the_DT average_JJ freeman_NN who_WP had_VBD come_VBN down_RB in_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC who_WP had_VBD
been_VBN obliged_VBN to_TO hire_VB himself_PRP out_RP as_IN a_DT farm_NN hand_NN led_VBD just_RB as_IN miserable_JJ
a_DT life_NN ._. In_IN the_DT cities_NNS ,_, furthermore_RB ,_, many_JJ of_IN the_DT slaves_NNS were_VBD more_RBR
prosperous_JJ than_IN the_DT poorer_JJR classes_NNS of_IN the_DT freemen_NNS ._. For_IN the_DT Greeks_NNP ,_, who_WP
loved_VBD moderation_NN in_IN all_DT things_NNS ,_, did_VBD not_RB like_IN to_TO treat_VB their_PRP$ slaves_NNS after_IN
the_DT fashion_NN which_WDT afterward_RB was_VBD so_RB common_JJ in_IN Rome_NNP ,_, where_WRB a_DT slave_NN had_VBD as_IN
few_JJ rights_NNS as_IN an_DT engine_NN in_IN a_DT modern_JJ factory_NN and_CC could_MD be_VB thrown_VBN to_TO the_DT
wild_JJ animals_NNS upon_IN the_DT smallest_JJS pretext_JJ ._.

The_DT Greeks_NNP accepted_VBD slavery_NN as_IN a_DT necessary_JJ institution_NN ,_, without_IN which_WDT no_UH
city_NN could_MD possibly_RB become_VB the_DT home_NN of_IN a_DT truly_RB civilised_JJ people_NNS ._.

The_DT slaves_NNS also_RB took_VBD care_NN of_IN those_DT tasks_NNS which_WDT nowadays_RB are_VBP performed_VBN by_IN
the_DT business_NN men_NNS and_CC the_DT professional_JJ men_NNS ._. As_IN for_IN those_DT household_NN duties_NNS
which_WDT take_VBP up_RP so_RB much_RB of_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN your_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC which_WDT worry_VBP your_PRP$
father_NN when_WRB he_PRP comes_VBZ home_NN from_IN his_PRP$ office_NN ,_, the_DT Greeks_NNP ,_, who_WP understood_VBD
the_DT value_NN of_IN leisure_NN ,_, had_VBD reduced_VBN such_JJ duties_NNS to_TO the_DT smallest_JJS possible_JJ
minimum_NN by_IN living_VBG amidst_IN surroundings_NNS of_IN extreme_JJ simplicity_NN ._.

To_TO begin_VB with_IN ,_, their_PRP$ homes_NNS were_VBD very_RB plain_JJ ._. Even_RB the_DT rich_JJ nobles_NNS spent_VBN
their_PRP$ lives_NNS in_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN adobe_NN barn_NN ,_, which_WDT lacked_VBD all_DT the_DT comforts_NNS which_WDT
a_DT modern_JJ workman_NN expects_VBZ as_IN his_PRP$ natural_JJ right_NN ._. A_DT Greek_NNP home_NN consisted_VBN
of_IN four_CD walls_NNS and_CC a_DT roof_NN ._. There_EX was_VBD a_DT door_NN which_WDT led_VBD into_IN the_DT street_NN but_CC
there_EX were_VBD no_DT windows_NNS ._. The_DT kitchen_NN ,_, the_DT living_NN rooms_NNS and_CC the_DT sleeping_VBG
quarters_NNS were_VBD built_VBN around_IN an_DT open_JJ courtyard_NN in_IN which_WDT there_EX was_VBD a_DT small_JJ
fountain_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT statue_NN and_CC a_DT few_JJ plants_NNS to_TO make_VB it_PRP look_VB bright_JJ ._. Within_IN
this_DT courtyard_NN the_DT family_NN lived_VBD when_WRB it_PRP did_VBD not_RB rain_NN or_CC when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD not_RB
too_RB cold_JJ ._. In_IN one_CD corner_NN of_IN the_DT yard_NN the_DT cook_NN (_-LRB- who_WP was_VBD a_DT slave_NN )_-RRB- prepared_VBN
the_DT meal_NN and_CC in_IN another_DT corner_NN ,_, the_DT teacher_NN (_-LRB- who_WP was_VBD also_RB a_DT
slave_NN )_-RRB- taught_VBD the_DT children_NNS the_DT alpha_NN beta_NN gamma_NN and_CC the_DT tables_NNS of_IN
multiplication_NN and_CC in_IN still_RB another_DT corner_NN the_DT lady_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, who_WP
rarely_RB left_VBD her_PRP$ domain_NN (_-LRB- since_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB considered_VBN good_JJ form_NN for_IN a_DT
married_VBN woman_NN to_TO be_VB seen_VBN on_IN the_DT street_NN too_RB often_RB )_-RRB- was_VBD repairing_VBG her_PRP$
husband_NN '_POS s_VBZ coat_NN with_IN her_PRP$ seamstresses_NNS (_-LRB- who_WP were_VBD slaves_NNS ,)_, and_CC in_IN the_DT
little_JJ office_NN ,_, right_RB off_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, the_DT master_NN was_VBD inspecting_VBG the_DT
accounts_NNS which_WDT the_DT overseer_NN of_IN his_PRP$ farm_NN (_-LRB- who_WP was_VBD a_DT slave_NN )_-RRB- had_VBD just_RB
brought_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.

When_WRB dinner_NN was_VBD ready_JJ the_DT family_NN came_VBD together_RB but_CC the_DT meal_NN was_VBD a_DT very_RB
simple_JJ one_CD and_CC did_VBD not_RB take_VB much_JJ time_NN ._. The_DT Greeks_NNP seem_VBP to_TO have_VB regarded_VBN
eating_VBG as_IN an_DT unavoidable_JJ evil_NN and_CC not_RB a_DT pastime_NN ,_, which_WDT kills_VBZ many_JJ dreary_NN
hours_NNS and_CC eventually_RB kills_VBZ many_JJ dreary_JJ people_NNS ._. They_PRP lived_VBD on_IN bread_NN and_CC
on_IN wine_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT little_JJ meat_NN and_CC some_DT green_JJ vegetables_NNS ._. They_PRP drank_VBD water_NN
only_RB when_WRB nothing_NN else_RB was_VBD available_JJ because_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB think_VB it_PRP very_RB
healthy_JJ ._. They_PRP loved_VBD to_TO call_VB on_IN each_DT other_JJ for_IN dinner_NN ,_, but_CC our_PRP$ idea_NN of_IN a_DT
festive_JJ meal_NN ,_, where_WRB everybody_NN is_VBZ supposed_VBN to_TO eat_VB much_RB more_JJR than_IN is_VBZ good_JJ
for_IN him_PRP ,_, would_MD have_VB disgusted_VBN them_PRP ._. They_PRP came_VBD together_RB at_IN the_DT table_NN for_IN
the_DT purpose_NN of_IN a_DT good_JJ talk_NN and_CC a_DT good_JJ glass_NN of_IN wine_NN and_CC water_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN
they_PRP were_VBD moderate_JJ people_NNS they_PRP despised_VBD those_DT who_WP drank_VBD too_RB much_RB ._.

The_DT same_JJ simplicity_NN which_WDT prevailed_VBD in_IN the_DT dining_NN room_NN also_RB dominated_VBN
their_PRP$ choice_NN of_IN clothes_NNS ._. They_PRP liked_VBD to_TO be_VB clean_JJ and_CC well_RB groomed_VBN ,_, to_TO
have_VBP their_PRP$ hair_NN and_CC beards_NNS neatly_RB cut_VBN ,_, to_TO feel_VB their_PRP$ bodies_NNS strong_JJ with_IN
the_DT exercise_NN and_CC the_DT swimming_NN of_IN the_DT gymnasium_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP never_RB followed_VBD
the_DT Asiatic_JJ fashion_NN which_WDT prescribed_VBD loud_JJ colours_NNS and_CC strange_JJ patterns_NNS ._.
They_PRP wore_VBD a_DT long_JJ white_JJ coat_NN and_CC they_PRP managed_VBD to_TO look_VB as_RB smart_JJ as_IN a_DT
modern_JJ Italian_JJ officer_NN in_IN his_PRP$ long_JJ blue_JJ cape_NN ._.

They_PRP loved_VBD to_TO see_VB their_PRP$ wives_NNS wear_VBP ornaments_NNS but_CC they_PRP thought_VBD it_PRP very_RB
vulgar_NN to_TO display_VB their_PRP$ wealth_NN (_-LRB- or_CC their_PRP$ wives_NNS )_-RRB- in_IN public_NN and_CC whenever_WRB
the_DT women_NNS left_VBD their_PRP$ home_NN they_PRP were_VBD as_RB inconspicuous_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.

In_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT story_NN of_IN Greek_NNP life_NN is_VBZ a_DT story_NN not_RB only_RB of_IN moderation_NN but_CC
also_RB of_IN simplicity_NN ._. "_'' Things_NNS ,"_JJ chairs_NNS and_CC tables_NNS and_CC books_NNS and_CC houses_NNS and_CC
carriages_NNS ,_, are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO take_VB up_RP a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN their_PRP$ owner_NN '_'' s_VBZ time_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
end_NN they_PRP invariably_RB make_VBP him_PRP their_PRP$ slave_NN and_CC his_PRP$ hours_NNS are_VBP spent_VBN looking_VBG
after_IN their_PRP$ wants_NNS ,_, keeping_VBG them_PRP polished_VBN and_CC brushed_VBN and_CC painted_VBN ._. The_DT
Greeks_NNP ,_, before_IN everything_NN else_RB ,_, wanted_VBD to_TO be_VB "_`` free_JJ ,"_, both_DT in_IN mind_NN and_CC
in_IN body_NN ._. That_IN they_PRP might_MD maintain_VB their_PRP$ liberty_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB truly_RB free_JJ in_IN
spirit_NN ,_, they_PRP reduced_VBD their_PRP$ daily_JJ needs_NNS to_TO the_DT lowest_JJS possible_JJ point_NN ._.




THE_DT GREEK_NNP THEATRE_NNP

THE_DT ORIGINS_NNS OF_IN THE_DT THEATRE_NN ,_, THE_DT FIRST_NNP FORM_NN OF_IN PUBLIC_NNP AMUSEMENT_NNP


AT_WDT a_DT very_RB early_JJ stage_NN of_IN their_PRP$ history_NN the_DT Greeks_NNP had_VBD begun_VBN to_TO collect_VB
the_DT poems_NNS ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN written_VBN in_IN honor_NN of_IN their_PRP$ brave_JJ ancestors_NNS who_WP
had_VBD driven_VBN the_DT Pelasgians_NNS out_IN of_IN Hellas_NNP and_CC had_VBD destroyed_VBN the_DT power_NN of_IN
Troy_NNP ._. These_DT poems_NNS were_VBD recited_VBN in_IN public_JJ and_CC everybody_NN came_VBD to_TO listen_VB to_TO
them_PRP ._. But_CC the_DT theatre_NN ,_, the_DT form_NN of_IN entertainment_NN which_WDT has_VBZ become_VBN almost_RB
a_DT necessary_JJ part_NN of_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ lives_NNS ,_, did_VBD not_RB grow_VB out_IN of_IN these_DT recited_VBN
heroic_JJ tales_NNS ._. It_PRP had_VBD such_JJ a_DT curious_JJ origin_NN that_IN I_PRP must_MD tell_VB you_PRP
something_NN about_IN it_PRP in_IN a_DT separate_JJ chapter_NN

The_DT Greeks_NNP had_VBD always_RB been_VBN fond_JJ of_IN parades_NNS ._. Every_DT year_NN they_PRP held_VBD solemn_JJ
processions_NNS in_IN honor_NN of_IN Dionysos_NNP the_DT God_NNP of_IN the_DT wine_NN ._. As_IN everybody_NN in_IN
Greece_NNP drank_VBD wine_NN (_-LRB- the_DT Greeks_NNPS thought_VBD water_NN only_RB useful_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN
of_IN swimming_NN and_CC sailing_NN )_-RRB- this_DT particular_JJ Divinity_NNP was_VBD as_RB popular_JJ as_IN a_DT
God_NNP of_IN the_DT Soda-Fountain_NNP would_MD be_VB in_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ land_NN ._.

And_CC because_IN the_DT Wine-God_NNP was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO live_VB in_IN the_DT vineyards_NNS ,_, amidst_IN a_DT
merry_JJ mob_NN of_IN Satyrs_NNP (_-LRB- strange_JJ creatures_NNS who_WP were_VBD half_DT man_NN and_CC half_NN goat_NN ),_.
the_DT crowd_NN that_IN joined_VBD the_DT procession_NN used_VBD to_TO wear_VB goat-skins_NNS and_CC to_TO

the_DT Greek_NNP word_NN for_IN singer_NN is_VBZ "_`` oidos_NNS ."_. The_DT singer_NN who_WP meh-mehed_VBD like_IN a_DT
goat_NN therefore_RB was_VBD called_VBN a_DT "_`` tragos-oidos_JJ "_'' or_CC goat_NN singer_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ
this_DT strange_JJ name_NN which_WDT developed_VBD into_IN the_DT modern_JJ word_NN "_`` Tragedy_NNP ,"_. which_WDT
means_NNS in_IN the_DT theatrical_JJ sense_NN a_DT piece_NN with_IN an_DT unhappy_JJ ending_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN
Comedy_NN (_-LRB- which_WDT really_RB means_VBZ the_DT singing_NN of_IN something_NN "_`` comos_JJ "_'' or_CC gay_JJ )_-RRB- is_VBZ
the_DT name_NN given_VBN to_TO a_DT play_NN which_WDT ends_VBZ happily_RB ._.

But_CC how_WRB ,_, you_PRP will_MD ask_VB ,_, did_VBD this_DT noisy_JJ chorus_NN of_IN masqueraders_NNS ,_, stamping_VBG
around_RB like_IN wild_JJ goats_NNS ,_, ever_RB develop_VB into_IN the_DT noble_JJ tragedies_NNS which_WDT have_VBP
filled_VBN the_DT theatres_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN for_IN almost_RB two_CD thousand_CD years_NNS ?_.

The_DT connecting_JJ link_NN between_IN the_DT goat-singer_NN and_CC Hamlet_NNP is_VBZ really_RB very_RB
simple_JJ as_IN I_PRP shall_MD show_VB you_PRP in_IN a_DT moment_NN ._.

The_DT singing_VBG chorus_NN was_VBD very_RB amusing_JJ in_IN the_DT beginning_NN and_CC attracted_VBD large_JJ
crowds_NNS of_IN spectators_NNS who_WP stood_VBD along_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT road_NN and_CC laughed_VBD ._.
But_CC soon_RB this_DT business_NN of_IN tree-hawing_NN grew_VBD tiresome_JJ and_CC the_DT Greeks_NNS
thought_VBD dullness_RBR an_DT evil_NN only_RB comparable_JJ to_TO ugliness_NN or_CC sickness_NN ._. They_PRP
asked_VBN for_IN something_NN more_RBR entertaining_JJ ._. Then_RB an_DT inventive_JJ young_JJ poet_NN
from_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Icaria_NNP in_IN Attica_NNP hit_VBD upon_IN a_DT new_JJ idea_NN which_WDT proved_VBD a_DT
tremendous_JJ success_NN ._. He_PRP made_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT goat-chorus_JJ step_NN

This_DT individual_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO step_VB out_IN of_IN line_NN ._. He_PRP waved_VBD his_PRP$ arms_NNS and_CC
gesticulated_VBN while_IN he_PRP spoke_VBD (_-LRB- that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB he_PRP "_`` acted_VBD "_`` while_IN the_DT others_NNS
merely_RB stood_VBD by_IN and_CC sang_VBD )_-RRB- and_CC he_PRP asked_VBD a_DT lot_NN of_IN questions_NNS ,_, which_WDT the_DT
bandmaster_NN answered_VBD according_VBG to_TO the_DT roll_NN of_IN papyrus_NN upon_IN which_WDT the_DT poet_NN
had_VBD written_VBN down_IN these_DT answers_NNS before_IN the_DT show_NN began_VBD ._.

This_DT rough_JJ and_CC ready_JJ conversation_NN —_VBD the_DT dialogue_NN —_NN which_WDT told_VBD the_DT story_NN
of_IN Dionysos_NNP or_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT other_JJ Gods_NNP ,_, became_VBD at_IN once_RB popular_JJ with_IN the_DT

very_RB soon_RB the_DT "_`` acting_VBG "_'' was_VBD considered_VBN more_RBR important_JJ than_IN the_DT procession_NN

AEschylus_NNP ,_, the_DT most_RBS successful_JJ of_IN all_DT "_'' tragedians_NNS "_`` who_WP wrote_VBD no_DT less_RBR

Euripides_NNS began_VBD to_TO write_VB his_PRP$ terrible_JJ tragedies_NNS in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT
fifth_JJ century_NN ,_, B_NNP ._. C_NNP .,_, he_PRP was_VBD allowed_VBN as_RB many_JJ actors_NNS as_IN he_PRP liked_VBD and_CC

while_IN the_DT hero_NN in_IN the_DT foreground_NN committed_VBN a_DT crime_NN against_IN the_DT will_NN of_IN

This_DT new_JJ form_NN of_IN dramatic_JJ entertainment_NN demanded_VBD a_DT proper_JJ setting_NN ,_, and_CC

reason_NN why_WRB we_PRP talk_NN of_IN the_DT "_`` scenery_NN "_'' of_IN the_DT stage_NN ._.

THE_DT PERSIAN_NNP WARS_NNPS

HOW_NNP THE_DT GREEKS_NNP DEFENDED_NNP EUROPE_NNP AGAINST_NNP ASIATIC_NNP INVASION_NNP AND_CC DROVE_NNP THE_NNP
PERSIANS_NNS BACK_NNP ACROSS_NNP THE_DT AEGEAN_NNP SEA_NN


THE_DT Greeks_NNP had_VBD learned_VBN the_DT art_NN of_IN trading_NN from_IN the_DT AEgeans_NNP who_WP had_VBD
been_VBN the_DT pupils_NNS of_IN the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ._. They_PRP had_VBD founded_VBN colonies_NNS after_IN the_DT
Phoenician_JJ pattern_NN ._. They_PRP had_VBD even_RB improved_VBN upon_IN the_DT Phoenician_JJ methods_NNS
by_IN a_DT more_RBR general_JJ use_NN of_IN money_NN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN foreign_JJ customers_NNS ._. In_IN
the_DT sixth_JJ century_NN before_RB our_PRP$ era_NN they_PRP had_VBD established_VBN themselves_PRP firmly_RB
along_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP and_CC they_PRP were_VBD taking_VBG away_RB trade_NN from_IN the_DT
Phoenicians_NNS at_IN a_DT fast_JJ rate_NN ._. This_DT the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS of_IN course_NN did_VBD not_RB
like_IN but_CC they_PRP were_VBD not_RB strong_JJ enough_RB to_TO risk_VB a_DT war_NN with_IN their_PRP$ Greek_NNP
competitors_NNS ._. They_PRP sat_VBD and_CC waited_VBD nor_CC did_VBD they_PRP wait_VB in_IN vain_JJ ._.

In_IN a_DT former_JJ chapter_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP told_VBN you_PRP how_WRB a_DT humble_JJ tribe_NN of_IN Persian_JJ
shepherds_NNS had_VBD suddenly_RB gone_VBN upon_IN the_DT warpath_NN and_CC had_VBD conquered_VBN the_DT
greater_JJR part_NN of_IN western_JJ Asia_NNP ._. The_DT Persians_NNPS were_VBD too_RB civilised_JJ to_TO plunder_VB
their_PRP$ new_JJ subjects_NNS ._. They_PRP contented_VBD themselves_PRP with_IN a_DT yearly_JJ tribute_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP reached_VBD the_DT coast_NN of_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP they_PRP insisted_VBD that_IN the_DT Greek_NNP
colonies_NNS of_IN Lydia_NNP recognize_VBP the_DT Persian_JJ Kings_NNP as_IN their_PRP$ over-Lords_NNS and_CC
pay_VB them_PRP a_DT stipulated_JJ tax_NN ._. The_DT Greek_NNP colonies_NNS objected_VBN ._. The_DT Persians_NNPS
insisted_VBD ._. Then_RB the_DT Greek_NNP colonies_NNS appealed_VBD to_TO the_DT home-country_NN and_CC the_DT
stage_NN was_VBD set_VBN for_IN a_DT quarrel_NN ._.

For_IN if_IN the_DT truth_NN be_VB told_VBN ,_, the_DT Persian_JJ Kings_NNP regarded_VBD the_DT Greek_NNP
city-states_NNS as_IN very_RB dangerous_JJ political_JJ institutions_NNS and_CC bad_JJ examples_NNS
for_IN all_DT other_JJ people_NNS who_WP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT patient_JJ slaves_NNS of_IN the_DT
mighty_JJ Persian_JJ Kings_NNP ._.

Of_IN course_NN ,_, the_DT Greeks_NNP enjoyed_VBD a_DT certain_JJ degree_NN of_IN safety_NN because_IN their_PRP$
country_NN lay_VBD hidden_VBN beyond_IN the_DT deep_JJ waters_NNS of_IN the_DT AEgean_NNP ._. But_CC here_RB their_PRP$
old_JJ enemies_NNS ,_, the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ,_, stepped_VBD forward_RB with_IN offers_NNS of_IN help_NN and_CC
advice_NN to_TO the_DT Persians_NNPS ._. If_IN the_DT Persian_JJ King_NNP would_MD provide_VB the_DT soldiers_NNS ,_,
the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS would_MD guarantee_VB to_TO deliver_VB the_DT necessary_JJ ships_NNS to_TO carry_VB
them_PRP to_TO Europe_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT year_NN 492_CD before_IN the_DT birth_NN of_IN Christ_NNP ,_, and_CC Asia_NNP
made_VBD ready_JJ to_TO destroy_VB the_DT rising_VBG power_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ._.

As_IN a_DT final_JJ warning_NN the_DT King_NNP of_IN Persia_NNP sent_VBD messengers_NNS to_TO the_DT Greeks_NNS
asking_VBG for_IN "_`` earth_NN and_CC water_NN "_'' as_IN a_DT token_NN of_IN their_PRP$ submission_NN ._. The_DT Greeks_NNPS
promptly_RB threw_VBD the_DT messengers_NNS into_IN the_DT nearest_JJS well_RB where_WRB they_PRP would_MD
find_VB both_DT "_`` earth_NN and_CC water_NN "_'' in_IN large_JJ abundance_NN and_CC thereafter_RB of_IN course_NN
peace_NN was_VBD impossible_JJ ._.

But_CC the_DT Gods_NNP of_IN High_NNP Olympus_NNP watched_VBD over_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS and_CC when_WRB the_DT
Phoenician_DT fleet_NN carrying_VBG the_DT Persian_JJ troops_NNS was_VBD near_IN Mount_NNP Athos_NNP ,_, the_DT
Storm-God_NNP blew_VBD his_PRP$ cheeks_NNS until_IN he_PRP almost_RB burst_VBD the_DT veins_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ brow_NN ,_,
and_CC the_DT fleet_NN was_VBD destroyed_VBN by_IN a_DT terrible_JJ hurricane_NN and_CC the_DT Persians_NNPS
were_VBD all_DT drowned_VBN ._.

Two_CD years_NNS later_RB they_PRP returned_VBD ._. This_DT time_NN they_PRP sailed_VBD straight_RB across_IN
the_DT AEgean_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC landed_VBD near_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Marathon_NNP ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT
Athenians_NNS heard_VBD this_DT they_PRP sent_VBD their_PRP$ army_NN of_IN ten_CD thousand_CD men_NNS to_TO guard_VB
the_DT hills_NNS that_WDT surrounded_VBD the_DT Marathonian_NNP plain_NN ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN they_PRP
despatched_CC a_DT fast_JJ runner_NN to_TO Sparta_NNP to_TO ask_VB for_IN help_NN ._. But_CC Sparta_NNP was_VBD
envious_JJ of_IN the_DT fame_NN of_IN Athens_NNP and_CC refused_VBD to_TO come_VB to_TO her_PRP$ assistance_NN ._.
The_DT other_JJ Greek_JJ cities_NNS followed_VBN her_PRP$ example_NN with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN tiny_JJ

against_IN the_DT hordes_NNS of_IN the_DT Persians_NNPS ._. The_DT Greeks_NNP broke_VBD through_IN the_DT Persian_JJ
barrage_NN of_IN arrows_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ spears_NNS caused_VBD terrible_JJ havoc_NN among_IN the_DT
disorganised_VBN Asiatic_JJ troops_NNS who_WP had_VBD never_RB been_VBN called_VBN upon_IN to_TO resist_VB
such_PDT an_DT enemy_NN ._.

That_DT night_NN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Athens_NNP watched_VBD the_DT sky_NN grow_VB red_JJ with_IN the_DT flames_NNS
of_IN burning_VBG ships_NNS ._. Anxiously_NN they_PRP waited_VBD for_IN news_NN ._. At_IN last_JJ a_DT little_JJ
cloud_NN of_IN dust_NN appeared_VBD upon_IN the_DT road_NN that_WDT led_VBD to_TO the_DT North_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD
Pheidippides_NNS ,_, the_DT runner_NN ._. He_PRP stumbled_VBD and_CC gasped_VBD for_IN his_PRP$ end_NN was_VBD near_JJ ._.
Only_RB a_DT few_JJ days_NNS before_RB had_VBD he_PRP returned_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ errand_NN to_TO Sparta_NNP ._. He_PRP had_VBD
hastened_VBN to_TO join_VB Miltiades_NNP ._. That_DT morning_NN he_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN part_NN in_IN the_DT attack_NN
and_CC later_RB he_PRP had_VBD volunteered_VBN to_TO carry_VB the_DT news_NN of_IN victory_NN to_TO his_PRP$ beloved_NN
city_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS saw_VBD him_PRP fall_VB and_CC they_PRP rushed_VBD forward_RB to_TO support_VB him_PRP ._.
"_`` We_PRP have_VBP won_VBN ,"_, he_PRP whispered_VBD and_CC then_RB he_PRP died_VBD ,_, a_DT glorious_JJ death_NN which_WDT
made_VBD him_PRP envied_VBN of_IN all_DT men_NNS ._.

As_IN for_IN the_DT Persians_NNPS ,_, they_PRP tried_VBD ,_, after_IN this_DT defeat_NN ,_, to_TO land_VB near_IN Athens_NNP
but_CC they_PRP found_VBD the_DT coast_NN guarded_VBN and_CC disappeared_VBN ,_, and_CC once_RB more_RBR the_DT land_NN
of_IN Hellas_NNP was_VBD at_IN peace_NN ._.

Eight_CD years_NNS they_PRP waited_VBD and_CC during_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT Greeks_NNP were_VBD not_RB idle_JJ ._.
They_PRP knew_VBD that_IN a_DT final_JJ attack_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB expected_VBN but_CC they_PRP did_VBD not_RB agree_VB
upon_IN the_DT best_JJS way_NN to_TO avert_VB the_DT danger_NN ._. Some_DT people_NNS wanted_VBD to_TO increase_VB
the_DT army_NN ._. Others_NNS said_VBD that_IN a_DT strong_JJ fleet_NN was_VBD necessary_JJ for_IN success_NN ._. The_DT
two_CD parties_NNS led_VBN by_IN Aristides_NNS (_-LRB- for_IN the_DT army_NN )_-RRB- and_CC Themistocles_DT (_-LRB- the_DT leader_NN
of_IN the_DT bigger-navy_JJ men_NNS )_-RRB- fought_VBN each_DT other_JJ bitterly_RB and_CC nothing_NN was_VBD done_VBN
until_IN Aristides_NNP was_VBD exiled_VBN ._. Then_RB Themistocles_DT had_VBD his_PRP$ chance_NN and_CC he_PRP
built_VBN all_PDT the_DT ships_NNS he_PRP could_MD and_CC turned_VBD the_DT Piraeus_NNP into_IN a_DT strong_JJ naval_JJ
base_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 481_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. a_DT tremendous_JJ Persian_JJ army_NN appeared_VBD in_IN Thessaly_NNP ,_, a_DT
province_NN of_IN northern_JJ Greece_NNP ._. In_IN this_DT hour_NN of_IN danger_NN ,_, Sparta_NNP ,_, the_DT
great_JJ military_JJ city_NN of_IN Greece_NNP ,_, was_VBD elected_VBN commander-in_NN -_: chief_NN ._. But_CC the_DT
Spartans_NNP cared_VBD little_RB what_WP happened_VBD to_TO northern_JJ Greece_NNP provided_VBD their_PRP$
own_JJ country_NN was_VBD not_RB invaded_VBN ,_, They_PRP neglected_VBD to_TO fortify_VB the_DT passes_NNS that_WDT
led_VBN into_IN Greece_NNP ._.

A_DT small_JJ detachment_NN of_IN Spartans_NNP under_IN Leonidas_NNP had_VBD been_VBN told_VBN to_TO guard_VB
the_DT narrow_JJ road_NN between_IN the_DT high_JJ mountains_NNS and_CC the_DT sea_NN which_WDT connected_VBN
Thessaly_NNP with_IN the_DT southern_JJ provinces_NNS ._. Leonidas_NNP obeyed_VBD his_PRP$ orders_NNS ._. He_PRP
fought_VBD and_CC held_VBD the_DT pass_NN with_IN unequalled_JJ bravery_NN ._. But_CC a_DT traitor_NN by_IN the_DT
name_NN of_IN Ephialtes_NNP who_WP knew_VBD the_DT little_JJ byways_NNS of_IN Malis_NNP guided_VBD a_DT regiment_NN
of_IN Persians_NNPS through_IN the_DT hills_NNS and_CC made_VBD it_PRP possible_JJ for_IN them_PRP to_TO attack_VB
Leonidas_NNP in_IN the_DT rear_NN ._. Near_IN the_DT Warm_NNP Wells_NNP —_, the_DT Thermopylae_NNP —_VBD a_DT terrible_JJ
battle_NN was_VBD fought_VBN ._.

When_WRB night_NN came_VBD Leonidas_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ faithful_JJ soldiers_NNS lay_VBD dead_JJ under_IN the_DT
corpses_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ enemies_NNS ._.

But_CC the_DT pass_NN had_VBD been_VBN lost_VBN and_CC the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN Greece_NNP fell_VBD into_IN the_DT
hands_NNS of_IN the_DT Persians_NNPS ._. They_PRP marched_VBD upon_IN Athens_NNP ,_, threw_VBD the_DT garrison_NN from_IN
the_DT rocks_NNS of_IN the_DT Acropolis_NNP and_CC burned_VBD the_DT city_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS fled_VBD to_TO the_DT
Island_NNP of_IN Salamis_FW ._. All_DT seemed_VBD lost_VBN ._. But_CC on_IN the_DT 20_CD th_NN of_IN September_NNP of_IN the_DT
year_NN 480_CD Themistocles_NNS forced_VBD the_DT Persian_JJ fleet_NN to_TO give_VB battle_NN within_IN the_DT
narrow_JJ straits_NNS which_WDT separated_VBD the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Salamis_NNP from_IN the_DT mainland_NN
and_CC within_IN a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS he_PRP destroyed_VBD three_CD quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT Persian_JJ ships_NNS ._.

In_IN this_DT way_NN the_DT victory_NN of_IN Thermopylae_NNP came_VBD to_TO naught_NN ._. Xerxes_NNP was_VBD forced_VBN
to_TO retire_VB ._. The_DT next_JJ year_NN ,_, so_IN he_PRP decreed_VBD ,_, would_MD bring_VB a_DT final_JJ decision_NN ._.

ATHENS_NNP vs_NN ._. SPARTA_''

HOW_NNP ATHENS_NNPS AND_CC SPARTA_NNP FOUGHT_NNP A_DT LONG_NNP AND_CC DISASTROUS_NNP WAR_NNP FOR_IN THE_DT
LEADERSHIP_NN OF_IN GREECE_NNP


ATHENS_NNS and_CC Sparta_NNP were_VBD both_DT Greek_JJ cities_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ people_NNS spoke_VBD a_DT common_JJ
language_NN ._. In_IN every_DT other_JJ respect_NN they_PRP were_VBD different_JJ ._. Athens_NNP rose_VBD high_JJ
from_IN the_DT plain_JJ ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT city_NN exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT fresh_JJ breezes_NNS from_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_,
willing_JJ to_TO look_VB at_IN the_DT world_NN with_IN the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN a_DT happy_JJ child_NN ._. Sparta_NNP ,_, on_IN

surrounding_VBG mountains_NNS as_IN a_DT barrier_NN against_IN foreign_JJ thought_NN ._. Athens_NNP was_VBD a_DT
city_NN of_IN busy_JJ trade_NN ._. Sparta_NNP was_VBD an_DT armed_JJ camp_NN where_WRB people_NNS were_VBD soldiers_NNS
for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN being_VBG soldiers_NNS ._. The_DT people_NNS of_IN Athens_NNP loved_VBD to_TO sit_VB in_IN the_DT
sun_NN and_CC discuss_VB poetry_NN or_CC listen_VB to_TO the_DT wise_JJ words_NNS of_IN a_DT philosopher_NN ._.
The_DT Spartans_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, never_RB wrote_VBD a_DT single_JJ line_NN that_WDT was_VBD
considered_VBN literature_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP knew_VBD how_WRB to_TO fight_VB ,_, they_PRP liked_VBD to_TO fight_VB ,_,
and_CC they_PRP sacrificed_VBD all_DT human_JJ emotions_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ ideal_NN of_IN military_JJ
preparedness_NN ._.

malicious_JJ hate_NN ._. The_DT energy_NN which_WDT the_DT defence_NN of_IN the_DT common_JJ home_NN had_VBN

home_NN ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN he_PRP kept_VBD a_DT watchful_JJ eye_NN on_IN Sparta_NNP and_CC built_VBD high_JJ

An_DT insignificant_JJ quarrel_NN between_IN two_CD little_JJ Greek_JJ cities_NNS led_VBN to_TO the_DT
final_JJ conflict_NN ._. For_IN thirty_CD years_NNS the_DT war_NN between_IN Athens_NNP and_CC Sparta_NNP
continued_VBN ._. It_PRP ended_VBD in_IN a_DT terrible_JJ disaster_NN for_IN Athens_NNP ._.

ALEXANDER_NNP THE_DT GREAT_NN

A_DT SUMMARY_NN

described_VBN a_DT semi-circle_NN ._. It_PRP begins_VBZ in_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN way_NN of_IN Mesopotamia_NNP

This_DT ,_, as_IN you_PRP shall_MD see_VB in_IN a_DT moment_NN ,_, leads_VBZ to_TO a_DT terrible_JJ conflict_NN between_IN
the_DT two_CD rival_JJ races_NNS ,_, and_CC out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ struggle_NN arises_VBZ the_DT victorious_JJ

civilisation_NN to_TO the_DT furthermost_JJ corners_NNS of_IN the_DT European_JJ continent_NN ,_, where_WRB
it_PRP serves_VBZ as_IN the_DT foundation_NN upon_IN which_WDT our_PRP$ modern_JJ society_NN is_VBZ based_VBN ._.

I_PRP know_VBP all_PDT this_DT sounds_VBZ very_RB complicated_VBN ,_, but_CC if_IN you_PRP get_VBP hold_VB of_IN these_DT
