this_DT short_JJ intermission_NN ,_, we_PRP go_VBP back_RB to_TO our_PRP$ story_NN and_CC give_VB you_PRP an_DT account_NN
of_IN the_DT famous_JJ war_NN between_IN Carthage_NNP and_CC Rome_NNP ._.




ROME_NNP AND_CC CARTHAGE_NN

THE_DT SEMITIC_NNP COLONY_NN OF_IN CARTHAGE_NNP ON_IN THE_DT NORTHERN_NNP COAST_NN OF_IN AFRICA_NNP AND_CC THE_DT
INDO-EUROPEAN_NNP CITY_NN OF_IN ROME_NNP ON_IN THE_DT WEST_NNP COAST_NN OF_IN ITALY_NNP FOUGHT_NN EACH_WDT
OTHER_NNP FOR_IN THE_DT POSSESSION_NN OF_IN THE_DT WESTERN_JJ MEDITERRANEAN_NNP AND_CC CARTHAGE_NNP WAS_NNPS
DESTROYED_IN


THE_DT little_JJ Phoenician_JJ trading_NN post_NN of_IN Kart-hadshat_JJ stood_VBD on_IN a_DT low_JJ hill_NN
which_WDT overlooked_VBD the_DT African_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, a_DT stretch_NN of_IN water_NN ninety_CD miles_NNS
wide_JJ which_WDT separates_VBZ Africa_NNP from_IN Europe_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD an_DT ideal_JJ spot_NN for_IN a_DT
commercial_JJ centre_NN ._. Almost_RB too_RB ideal_JJ ._. It_PRP grew_VBD too_RB fast_RB and_CC became_VBD too_RB
rich_JJ ._. When_WRB in_IN the_DT sixth_JJ century_NN before_RB our_PRP$ era_NN ,_, Nebuchadnezzar_NN of_IN
Babylon_NNP destroyed_VBD Tyre_NNP ,_, Carthage_NNP broke_VBD off_RP all_DT further_JJ relations_NNS with_IN
the_DT Mother_NNP Country_NNP and_CC became_VBD an_DT independent_JJ state_NN —_IN the_DT great_JJ western_JJ
advance-post_NN of_IN the_DT Semitic_NN races_NNS ._.

Unfortunately_RB the_DT city_NN had_VBD inherited_VBN many_JJ of_IN the_DT traits_NNS which_WDT for_IN a_DT
thousand_CD years_NNS had_VBD been_VBN characteristic_JJ of_IN the_DT Phoenicians_NNPS ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT vast_JJ
business-house_NN ,_, protected_VBN by_IN a_DT strong_JJ navy_NN ,_, indifferent_JJ to_TO most_JJS of_IN the_DT
finer_JJ aspects_NNS of_IN life_NN ._. The_DT city_NN and_CC the_DT surrounding_VBG country_NN and_CC the_DT

group_NN of_IN rich_JJ men_NNS ,_, The_DT Greek_NNP word_NN for_IN rich_JJ is_VBZ "_`` ploutos_NNS "_'' and_CC the_DT Greeks_NNS
called_VBN such_JJ a_DT government_NN by_IN "_`` rich_JJ men_NNS "_`` a_DT "_`` Plutocracy_NNP ."_NNP Carthage_NNP was_VBD a_DT
plutocracy_NN and_CC the_DT real_JJ power_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN lay_VBD in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN a_DT dozen_NN

wide_JJ awake_JJ and_CC full_JJ of_IN energy_NN and_CC worked_VBD very_RB hard_RB ._.

As_IN the_DT years_NNS went_VBD by_IN the_DT influence_NN of_IN Carthage_NNP upon_IN her_PRP neighbours_.
increased_VBN until_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT African_JJ coast_NN ,_, Spain_NNP and_CC certain_JJ

Of_IN course_NN ,_, such_JJ a_DT "_`` plutocracy_NN "_'' was_VBD forever_RB at_IN the_DT mercy_NN of_IN the_DT crowd_NN ._.

the_DT citizens_NNS were_VBD quite_RB contented_VBN ,_, allowed_VBN their_PRP$ "_`` betters_NNS "_'' to_TO rule_VB them_PRP

common_JJ "_`` res_NNS publica_NN "_'' —_NNS or_CC common-wealth_NN ._.

"_`` You_PRP want_VBP to_TO join_VB us_PRP ,"_, they_PRP said_VBD ._. "_`` Very_RB well_RB ,_, go_VB ahead_RB and_CC join_VB ._. We_PRP
shall_MD treat_VB you_PRP as_IN if_IN you_PRP were_VBD full-fledged_JJ citizens_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP ._. In_IN return_NN
for_IN this_DT privilege_NN we_PRP expect_VBP you_PRP to_TO fight_VB for_IN our_PRP$ city_NN ,_, the_DT mother_NN of_IN us_PRP
all_DT ,_, whenever_WRB it_PRP shall_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ."_.

The_DT "_`` outsider_NN "_'' appreciated_VBD this_DT generosity_NN and_CC he_PRP showed_VBD his_PRP$ gratitude_NN
by_IN his_PRP$ unswerving_JJ loyalty_NN ._.

Whenever_WRB a_DT Greek_NNP city_NN had_VBD been_VBN attacked_VBN ,_, the_DT foreign_JJ residents_NNS had_VBD moved_VBN
out_RB as_RB quickly_RB as_IN they_PRP could_MD ._. Why_WRB defend_VBP something_NN which_WDT meant_VBD nothing_NN
to_TO them_PRP but_CC a_DT temporary_JJ boarding_NN house_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD tolerated_VBN as_IN
long_RB as_IN they_PRP paid_VBD their_PRP$ bills_NNS ?_. But_CC when_WRB the_DT enemy_NN was_VBD before_IN the_DT gates_NNS
of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, all_DT the_DT Latins_NNP rushed_VBD to_TO her_PRP$ defence_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD their_PRP$ Mother_NN who_WP
was_VBD in_IN danger_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD their_PRP$ true_JJ "_`` home_NN "_'' even_RB if_IN they_PRP lived_VBD a_DT hundred_CD
miles_NNS away_RB and_CC had_VBD never_RB seen_VBN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT sacred_JJ Hills_NNP ._.

No_DT defeat_NN and_CC no_DT disaster_NN could_MD change_VB this_DT sentiment_NN ._. In_IN the_DT beginning_NN
of_IN the_DT fourth_JJ century_NN B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. the_DT wild_JJ Gauls_NNP forced_VBD their_PRP$ way_NN into_IN Italy_NNP ._.

This_DT short_JJ account_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ history_NN of_IN Rome_NNP shows_VBZ you_PRP the_DT enormous_JJ

You_PRP will_MD now_RB understand_VB why_WRB Carthage_NNP was_VBD bound_VBN to_TO fear_VB such_JJ a_DT clever_JJ and_CC

But_CC the_DT Carthaginians_NNPS ,_, being_VBG good_JJ business_NN men_NNS ,_, knew_VBD that_IN it_PRP never_RB

The_DT Romans_NNPS with_IN their_PRP$ boarding-bridges_NNS ,_, were_VBD the_DT masters_NNS of_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.

territory_NN of_IN the_DT east_JJ and_CC annex_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT AEgean_JJ world_NN ._.

Driven_VBN from_IN one_CD city_NN to_TO another_DT ,_, a_DT fugitive_NN without_IN a_DT home_NN ,_, Hannibal_NNP at_IN
last_JJ knew_VBD that_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ ambitious_JJ dream_NN had_VBD come_VBN ._. His_PRP$ beloved_JJ city_NN

a_DT better_JJR future_NN ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN 190_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. Hannibal_NNP took_VBD poison_NN and_CC killed_VBN
himself_PRP ._.

Forty_CD years_NNS later_RB ,_, the_DT Romans_NNPS forced_VBD their_PRP$ last_JJ war_NN upon_IN Carthage_NNP ._. Three_CD

was_VBD set_VBN on_IN fire_NN ._. For_IN two_CD whole_JJ weeks_NNS the_DT store-houses_NNS and_CC the_DT pal-aces_NNS

the_DT blackened_VBN ruins_NNS and_CC the_DT Roman_NNP legions_NNS returned_VBD to_TO Italy_NNP to_TO enjoy_VB
their_PRP$ victory_NN ._.

For_IN the_DT next_JJ thousand_CD years_NNS ,_, the_DT Mediterranean_NNP remained_VBD a_DT European_JJ sea_NN ._.

attempt_NN to_TO dominate_VB this_DT great_JJ inland_NN sea_NN ,_, as_IN you_PRP will_MD learn_VB when_WRB I_PRP tell_VBP
you_PRP about_IN Mohammed_NNP ._.




THE_DT RISE_NN OF_IN ROME_NNP

HOW_NNP ROME_NNP HAPPENED_NNP


THE_DT Roman_NNP Empire_NNP was_VBD an_DT accident_NN ._. No_DT one_NN planned_VBD it_PRP ._. It_PRP "_'' happened_VBN ."_. No_UH
famous_JJ general_JJ or_CC statesman_NN or_CC cut-throat_NN ever_RB got_VBD up_RB and_CC said_VBD "_`` Friends_NNP ,_,
Romans_NNS ,_, Citizens_NNPS ,_, we_PRP must_MD found_VBD an_DT Empire_NN ._. Follow_VB me_PRP and_CC together_RB we_PRP
shall_MD conquer_VB all_PDT the_DT land_NN from_IN the_DT Gates_NNP of_IN Hercules_NNP to_TO Mount_NNP Taurus_NNP ."_.

Rome_NNP produced_VBD famous_JJ generals_NNS and_CC equally_RB distinguished_JJ statesmen_NNS and_CC
cut-throats_NNS ,_, and_CC Roman_NNP armies_NNS fought_VBD all_DT over_IN the_DT world_NN ._. But_CC the_DT Roman_NNP
empire-making_NN was_VBD done_VBN without_IN a_DT preconceived_JJ plan_NN ._. The_DT average_NN
Roman_NNP was_VBD a_DT very_RB matter-of_JJ -_: fact_NN citizen_NN ._. He_PRP disliked_VBD theories_NNS about_IN
government_NN ._. When_WRB someone_NN began_VBD to_TO recite_VB "_`` eastward_RB the_DT course_NN of_IN Roman_NNP
Empire_NN ,_, etc_FW .,_. etc_FW .,"_. he_PRP hastily_RB left_VBD the_DT forum_NN ._. He_PRP just_RB continued_VBD to_TO
take_VB more_JJR and_CC more_JJR land_NN because_IN circumstances_NNS forced_VBD him_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ._. He_PRP
was_VBD not_RB driven_VBN by_IN ambition_NN or_CC by_IN greed_NN ._. Both_DT by_IN nature_NN and_CC inclination_NN
he_PRP was_VBD a_DT farmer_NN and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO stay_VB at_IN home_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD attacked_VBN he_PRP
was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO defend_VB himself_PRP and_CC when_WRB the_DT enemy_NN happened_VBN to_TO cross_VB the_DT
sea_NN to_TO ask_VB for_IN aid_NN in_IN a_DT distant_JJ country_NN then_RB the_DT patient_NN Roman_NNP marched_VBD
many_JJ dreary_JJ miles_NNS to_TO defeat_VB this_DT dangerous_JJ foe_NN and_CC when_WRB this_DT had_VBD been_VBN
accomplished_VBN ,_, he_PRP stayed_VBD behind_IN to_TO adminster_VB {_NNS sic_JJ }_IN his_PRP$ newly_RB conquered_VBN
provinces_NNS lest_IN they_PRP fall_VBP into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN wandering_VBG Barbarians_NNS and_CC
become_VBN themselves_PRP a_DT menace_NN to_TO Roman_NNP safety_NN ._. It_PRP sounds_VBZ rather_RB complicated_JJ
and_CC yet_RB to_TO the_DT contemporaries_NNS it_PRP was_VBD so_RB very_RB simple_JJ ,_, as_IN you_PRP shall_MD see_VB in_IN
a_DT moment_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 203_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. Scipio_NNP had_VBD crossed_VBN the_DT African_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC had_VBD carried_VBN
the_DT war_NN into_IN Africa_NNP ._. Carthage_NNP had_VBD called_VBN Hannibal_NNP back_RB ._. Badly_RB supported_VBN
by_IN his_PRP$ mercenaries_NNS ,_, Hannibal_NNP had_VBD been_VBN defeated_VBN near_IN Zama_NNP ._. The_DT Romans_NNPS had_VBD

of_IN Macedonia_NNP and_CC Syria_NNP ,_, as_IN I_PRP told_VBD you_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ chapter_NN ._.

The_DT rulers_NNS of_IN these_DT two_CD countries_NNS (_-LRB- remnants_NNS of_IN the_DT Empire_NNP of_IN Alexander_NNP
the_DT Great_NNP )_-RRB- just_RB then_RB were_VBD contemplating_VBG an_DT expedition_NN against_IN Egypt_NNP ._.

central_JJ Thessaly_NNP ._.

The_DT Romans_NNPS then_RB marched_VBD southward_JJ to_TO Attica_NNP and_CC informed_VBD the_DT Greeks_NNP that_WDT

Greeks_NNP ,_, having_VBG learned_VBN nothing_NN in_IN their_PRP$ years_NNS of_IN semi-slavery_NN ,_, used_VBN
their_PRP$ new_JJ freedom_NN in_IN a_DT most_RBS unfortunate_JJ way_NN ._. All_PDT the_DT little_JJ city-states_NNS
once_RB more_RBR began_VBD to_TO quarrel_VB with_IN each_DT other_JJ as_IN they_PRP had_VBD done_VBN in_IN the_DT good_JJ
old_JJ days_NNS ._. The_DT Romans_NNPS ,_, who_WP had_VBD little_JJ understanding_NN and_CC less_JJR love_NN for_IN
these_DT silly_JJ bickerings_NNS of_IN a_DT race_NN which_WDT they_PRP rather_RB despised_JJ ,_, showed_VBN

patience_NN ,_, invaded_VBD Greece_NNP ,_, burned_VBN down_IN Corinth_NNP (_-LRB- to_TO "_`` encourage_VB the_DT other_JJ
Greeks_NNP ")_NNP and_CC sent_VBD a_DT Roman_NNP governor_NN to_TO Athens_NNP to_TO rule_VB this_DT turbulent_NN
province_NN ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN ,_, Macedonia_NNP and_CC Greece_NNP became_VBD buffer_NN states_NNS which_WDT
protected_VBN Rome_NNP '_POS s_PRP eastern_JJ frontier_NN ._.

Meanwhile_RB right_RB across_IN the_DT Hellespont_NNP lay_VBD the_DT Kingdom_NNP of_IN Syria_NNP ,_, and_CC

would_MD be_VB to_TO invade_VB Italy_NNP and_CC sack_NN the_DT city_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ._.

Lucius_NNP Scipio_NNP ,_, a_DT brother_NN of_IN Scipio_NNP the_DT African_JJ fighter_NN who_WP had_VBD defeated_VBN

was_VBD mistress_NN of_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT lands_NNS which_WDT bordered_VBD upon_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP ._.




THE_DT ROMAN_NNP EMPIRE_NN

HOW_NNP THE_DT REPUBLIC_NN OF_IN ROME_NNP AFTER_NNP CENTURIES_NNPS OF_IN UNREST_NNP AND_CC REVOLUTION_NN BECAME_NN
AN_DT EMPIRE_NN


WHEN_WRB the_DT Roman_NNP armies_NNS returned_VBD from_IN these_DT many_JJ victorious_JJ campaigns_NNS ,_,
they_PRP were_VBD received_VBN with_IN great_JJ jubilation_NN ._. Alas_NNP and_CC alack_NN !_. this_DT sudden_JJ
glory_NN did_VBD not_RB make_VB the_DT country_NN any_DT happier_JJR ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ._. The_DT endless_JJ
campaigns_NNS had_VBD ruined_VBN the_DT farmers_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN obliged_VBN to_TO do_VB the_DT hard_JJ
work_NN of_IN Empire_NNP making_NN ._. It_PRP had_VBD placed_VBN too_RB much_JJ power_NN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT
successful_JJ generals_NNS (_-LRB- and_CC their_PRP$ private_JJ friends_NNS )_-RRB- who_WP had_VBD used_VBN the_DT war_NN as_IN
an_DT excuse_NN for_IN wholesale_JJ robbery_NN ._.

The_DT old_JJ Roman_NNP Republic_NNP had_VBD been_VBN proud_JJ of_IN the_DT simplicity_NN which_WDT had_VBD
characterised_VBN the_DT lives_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ famous_JJ men_NNS ._. The_DT new_JJ Republic_NNP felt_VBD ashamed_JJ
of_IN the_DT shabby_JJ coats_NNS and_CC the_DT high_JJ principles_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN fashionable_JJ
in_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN its_PRP$ grandfathers_NNS ._. It_PRP became_VBD a_DT land_NN of_IN rich_JJ people_NNS ruled_VBN
by_IN rich_JJ people_NNS for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN rich_JJ people_NNS ._. As_IN such_JJ it_PRP was_VBD doomed_VBN to_TO
disastrous_JJ failure_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP shall_MD now_RB tell_VB you_PRP ._.

Within_IN less_JJR than_IN a_DT century_NN and_CC a_DT half_NN ._. Rome_NNP had_VBD become_VBN the_DT mistress_NN of_IN
practically_RB all_DT the_DT land_NN around_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP ._. In_IN those_DT early_JJ days_NNS
of_IN history_NN a_DT prisoner_NN of_IN war_NN lost_VBD his_PRP$ freedom_NN and_CC became_VBD a_DT slave_NN ._. The_DT
Roman_NNP regarded_VBD war_NN as_IN a_DT very_RB serious_JJ business_NN and_CC he_PRP showed_VBD no_DT mercy_NN to_TO
a_DT conquered_JJ foe_NN ._. After_IN the_DT fall_NN of_IN Carthage_NNP ,_, the_DT Carthaginian_NNP women_NNS and_CC
children_NNS were_VBD sold_VBN into_IN bondage_NN together_RB with_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ slaves_NNS ._. And_CC a_DT
like_IN fate_NN awaited_VBD the_DT obstinate_JJ inhabitants_NNS of_IN Greece_NNP and_CC Macedonia_NNP and_CC
Spain_NNP and_CC Syria_NNP when_WRB they_PRP dared_VBD to_TO revolt_NN against_IN the_DT Roman_JJ power_NN ._.

Two_CD thousand_CD years_NNS ago_IN a_DT slave_NN was_VBD merely_RB a_DT piece_NN of_IN machinery_NN ._. Nowadays_''
a_DT rich_JJ man_NN invests_VBZ his_PRP$ money_NN in_IN factories_NNS ._. The_DT rich_JJ people_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP
(_-LRB- senators_NNS ,_, generals_NNS and_CC war-profiteers_NNS )_-RRB- invested_VBD theirs_PRP in_IN land_NN and_CC in_IN
slaves_NNS ._. The_DT land_NN they_PRP bought_VBD or_CC took_VBD in_IN the_DT newly-acquired_JJ provinces_NNS ._.
The_DT slaves_NNS they_PRP bought_VBD in_IN open_JJ market_NN wherever_WRB they_PRP happened_VBD to_TO be_VB
cheapest_JJS ._. During_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT third_JJ and_CC second_JJ centuries_NNS before_IN Christ_NNP
there_EX was_VBD a_DT plentiful_JJ supply_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN the_DT landowners_NNS worked_VBN
their_PRP$ slaves_NNS until_IN they_PRP dropped_VBD dead_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ tracks_NNS ,_, when_WRB they_PRP bought_VBD
new_JJ ones_NNS at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS bargain-counter_NN of_IN Corinthian_NNP or_CC Carthaginian_NNP
captives_NNS ._.

And_CC now_RB behold_IN the_DT fate_NN of_IN the_DT freeborn_JJ farmer_NN !_.

He_PRP had_VBD done_VBN his_PRP$ duty_NN toward_IN Rome_NNP and_CC he_PRP had_VBD fought_VBN her_PRP$ battles_NNS without_IN
complaint_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD home_NN after_IN ten_CD ,_, fifteen_CD or_CC twenty_CD years_NNS ,_, his_PRP$
lands_NNS were_VBD covered_VBN with_IN weeds_NNS and_CC his_PRP$ family_NN had_VBD been_VBN ruined_VBN ._. But_CC he_PRP was_VBD
a_DT strong_JJ man_NN and_CC willing_JJ to_TO begin_VB life_NN anew_NNS ._. He_PRP sowed_VBD and_CC planted_VBD and_CC
waited_VBD for_IN the_DT harvest_NN ._. He_PRP carried_VBD his_PRP$ grain_NN to_TO the_DT market_NN together_RB with_IN
his_PRP$ cattle_NNS and_CC his_PRP$ poultry_NN ,_, to_TO find_VB that_IN the_DT large_JJ landowners_NNS who_WP worked_VBD
their_PRP$ estates_NNS with_IN slaves_NNS could_MD underbid_VB him_PRP all_DT along_IN the_DT line_NN ._. For_IN a_DT
couple_NN of_IN years_NNS he_PRP tried_VBD to_TO hold_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. Then_RB he_PRP gave_VBD up_RP in_IN despair_NN ._. He_PRP
left_VBN the_DT country_NN and_CC he_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS city_NN ._. In_IN the_DT city_NN he_PRP was_VBD as_IN
hungry_JJ as_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN before_IN on_IN the_DT land_NN ._. But_CC he_PRP shared_VBD his_PRP$ misery_NN with_IN
thousands_NNS of_IN other_JJ disinherited_JJ beings_NNS ._. They_PRP crouched_VBD together_RB in_IN filthy_JJ
hovels_NNS in_IN the_DT suburbs_NNS of_IN the_DT large_JJ cities_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD apt_JJ to_TO get_VB sick_JJ and_CC
die_VB from_IN terrible_JJ epidemics_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD all_DT profoundly_RB discontented_VBN ._. They_PRP
had_VBD fought_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ country_NN and_CC this_DT was_VBD their_PRP$ reward_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD always_RB
willing_JJ to_TO listen_VB to_TO those_DT plausible_JJ spell-binders_NNS who_WP gather_VBP around_IN a_DT
public_JJ grievance_NN like_IN so_RB many_JJ hungry_JJ vultures_NNS ,_, and_CC soon_RB they_PRP became_VBD a_DT
grave_JJ menace_NN to_TO the_DT safety_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN ._.

But_CC the_DT class_NN of_IN the_DT newly-rich_JJ shrugged_VBD its_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ._. "_`` We_PRP have_VBP our_PRP$
army_NN and_CC our_PRP$ policemen_NNS ,"_, they_PRP argued_VBD ,_, "_`` they_PRP will_MD keep_VB the_DT mob_NN in_IN order_NN ."_.
And_CC they_PRP hid_VBD themselves_PRP behind_IN the_DT high_JJ walls_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ pleasant_JJ villas_NNS
and_CC cultivated_VBD their_PRP$ gardens_NNS and_CC read_VBD the_DT poems_NNS of_IN a_DT certain_JJ Homer_NN which_WDT
a_DT Greek_NNP slave_NN had_VBD just_RB translated_VBN into_IN very_RB pleasing_JJ Latin_NNP hexameters_NNS ._.

In_IN a_DT few_JJ families_NNS however_RB the_DT old_JJ tradition_NN of_IN unselfish_JJ service_NN to_TO the_DT
Commonwealth_NNP continued_VBD ._. Cornelia_NNP ,_, the_DT daughter_NN of_IN Scipio_NNP Africanus_NNP ,_,
had_VBD been_VBN married_VBN to_TO a_DT Roman_NNP by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Gracchus_NNP ._. She_PRP had_VBD two_CD sons_NNS ,_,
Tiberius_NNP and_CC Gaius_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT boys_NNS grew_VBD up_RB they_PRP entered_VBD politics_NNS and_CC
tried_VBD to_TO bring_VB about_RB certain_JJ much-needed_JJ reforms_NNS ._. A_DT census_NN had_VBD shown_VBN
that_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT land_NN of_IN the_DT Italian_JJ peninsula_NN was_VBD owned_VBN by_IN two_CD thousand_CD
noble_JJ families_NNS ._. Tiberius_NNP Gracchus_NNP ,_, having_VBG been_VBN elected_VBN a_DT Tribune_NNP ,_, tried_VBD
to_TO help_VB the_DT freemen_NNS ._. He_PRP revived_VBD two_CD ancient_JJ laws_NNS which_WDT restricted_VBN the_DT
number_NN of_IN acres_NNS which_WDT a_DT single_JJ owner_NN might_MD possess_VB ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN he_PRP hoped_VBD
to_TO revive_VB the_DT valuable_JJ old_JJ class_NN of_IN small_JJ and_CC independent_JJ freeholders_NNS ._.
The_DT newly-rich_JJ called_VBD him_PRP a_DT robber_NN and_CC an_DT enemy_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN ._. There_EX were_VBD
street_NN riots_NNS ._. A_DT party_NN of_IN thugs_NNS was_VBD hired_VBN to_TO kill_VB the_DT popular_JJ Tribune_NNP ._.
Tiberius_NNP Gracchus_NNP was_VBD attacked_VBN when_WRB he_PRP entered_VBD the_DT assembly_NN and_CC was_VBD
beaten_VBN to_TO death_NN ._. Ten_CD years_NNS later_RB his_PRP$ brother_NN Gaius_NNP tried_VBD the_DT experiment_NN
of_IN reforming_VBG a_DT nation_NN against_IN the_DT expressed_VBN wishes_NNS of_IN a_DT strong_JJ
privileged_JJ class_NN ._. He_PRP passed_VBD a_DT "_`` poor_JJ law_NN "_'' which_WDT was_VBD meant_VBN to_TO help_VB the_DT
destitute_NN farmers_NNS ._. Eventually_RB it_PRP made_VBD the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP
citizens_NNS into_IN professional_JJ beggars_NNS ._.

He_PRP established_VBD colonies_NNS of_IN destitute_JJ people_NNS in_IN distant_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT
empire_NN ,_, but_CC these_DT settlements_NNS failed_VBD to_TO attract_VB the_DT right_JJ sort_NN of_IN
people_NNS ._. Before_IN Gaius_NNP Gracchus_NNP could_MD do_VB more_JJR harm_NN he_PRP too_RB was_VBD murdered_VBN and_CC
his_PRP$ followers_NNS were_VBD either_RB killed_VBN or_CC exiled_VBN ._. The_DT first_JJ two_CD reformers_NNS had_VBD
been_VBN gentlemen_NNS ._. The_DT two_CD who_WP came_VBD after_IN were_VBD of_IN a_DT very_RB different_JJ stamp_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD professional_JJ soldiers_NNS ._. One_NN was_VBD called_VBN Marius_NNP ._. The_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT
other_JJ was_VBD Sulla_NNP ._. Both_DT enjoyed_VBD a_DT large_JJ personal_JJ following_NN ._.

Sulla_NNP was_VBD the_DT leader_NN of_IN the_DT landowners_NNS ._. Marius_NNP ,_, the_DT victor_NN in_IN a_DT great_JJ
battle_NN at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT Alps_NNP when_WRB the_DT Teutons_NNS and_CC the_DT Cimbri_NNP had_VBD been_VBN
annihilated_VBN ,_, was_VBD the_DT popular_JJ hero_NN of_IN the_DT disinherited_JJ freemen_NNS ._.

Now_RB it_PRP happened_VBD in_IN the_DT year_NN 88_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. that_IN the_DT Senate_NNP of_IN Rome_NNP was_VBD greatly_RB
disturbed_VBN by_IN rumours_NNS that_WDT came_VBD from_IN Asia_NNP ._. Mithridates_NNP ,_, king_NN of_IN a_DT country_NN
along_IN the_DT shores_NNS of_IN the_DT Black_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT Greek_NNP on_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN '_POS s_PRP side_NN ,_,
had_VBD seen_VBN the_DT possibility_NN of_IN establishing_VBG a_DT second_JJ Alexandrian_NNP Empire_NNP ._.
He_PRP began_VBD his_PRP$ campaign_NN for_IN world-domination_NN with_IN the_DT murder_NN of_IN all_DT Roman_NNP
citizens_NNS who_WP happened_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP ,_, men_NNS ,_, women_NNS and_CC children_NNS ._.
Such_JJ an_DT act_NN ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, meant_VBD war_NN ._. The_DT Senate_NNP equipped_VBD an_DT army_NN to_TO march_VB
against_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN Pontus_NNP and_CC punish_VB him_PRP for_IN his_PRP$ crime_NN ._. But_CC who_WP was_VBD to_TO
be_VB commander-in_JJ -_: chief_NN ?_. "_'' Sulla_NNP ,"_, said_VBD the_DT Senate_NNP ,_, "_'' because_IN he_PRP is_VBZ Consul_NNP ."_.
"_`` Marius_NNP ,"_NNP said_VBD the_DT mob_NN ,_, "_'' because_IN he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN Consul_NNP five_CD times_NNS and_CC
because_IN he_PRP is_VBZ the_DT champion_NN of_IN our_PRP$ rights_NNS ."_.

Possession_NNP is_VBZ nine_CD points_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN ._. Sulla_NNP happened_VBD to_TO be_VB in_IN actual_JJ
command_NN of_IN the_DT army_NN ._. He_PRP went_VBD west_RB to_TO defeat_VB Mithridates_NNS and_CC Marius_NNP fled_VBD
to_TO Africa_NNP ._. There_EX he_PRP waited_VBD until_IN he_PRP heard_VBD that_IN Sulla_NNP had_VBD crossed_VBN into_IN
Asia_NN ._. He_PRP then_RB returned_VBD to_TO Italy_NNP ,_, gathered_VBD a_DT motley_NN crew_NN of_IN malcontents_NNS ,_,
marched_VBD on_IN Rome_NNP and_CC entered_VBD the_DT city_NN with_IN his_PRP$ professional_JJ highwaymen_NNS ,_,
spent_VBN five_CD days_NNS and_CC five_CD nights_NNS ,_, slaughtering_VBG the_DT enemies_NNS of_IN the_DT
Senatorial_NNP party_NN ,_, got_VBD himself_PRP elected_VBN Consul_JJ and_CC promptly_RB died_VBD from_IN the_DT
excitement_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ fortnight_NN ._.

There_EX followed_VBD four_CD years_NNS of_IN disorder_NN ._. Then_RB Sulla_NNP ,_, having_VBG defeated_VBN
Mithridates_NNP ,_, announced_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD ready_JJ to_TO return_VB to_TO Rome_NNP and_CC settle_VB
a_DT few_JJ old_JJ scores_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ._. He_PRP was_VBD as_RB good_JJ as_IN his_PRP$ word_NN ._. For_IN weeks_NNS his_PRP$
soldiers_NNS were_VBD busy_JJ executing_VBG those_DT of_IN their_PRP$ fellow_JJ citizens_NNS who_WP were_VBD
suspected_VBN of_IN democratic_JJ sympathies_NNS ._. One_CD day_NN they_PRP got_VBD hold_NN of_IN a_DT young_JJ
fellow_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN often_RB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT company_NN of_IN Marius_NNP ._. They_PRP were_VBD going_VBG
to_TO hang_VB him_PRP when_WRB some_DT one_CD interfered_JJ ._. "_'' The_DT boy_NN is_VBZ too_RB young_JJ ,"_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_,
and_CC they_PRP let_VB him_PRP go_VB ._. His_PRP$ name_NN was_VBD Julius_NNP Caesar_NNP ._. You_PRP shall_MD meet_VB him_PRP
again_RB on_IN the_DT next_JJ page_NN ._.

As_IN for_IN Sulla_NNP ,_, he_PRP became_VBD "_`` Dictator_NNP ,"_, which_WDT meant_VBD sole_JJ and_CC supreme_JJ ruler_NN
of_IN all_DT the_DT Roman_NNP possessions_NNS ._. He_PRP ruled_VBD Rome_NNP for_IN four_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP died_VBD
quietly_RB in_IN his_PRP$ bed_NN ,_, having_VBG spent_VBN the_DT last_JJ year_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN tenderly_RB
raising_VBG his_PRP$ cabbages_NNS ,_, as_RB was_VBD the_DT custom_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ Romans_NNS who_WP had_VBD spent_VBN
a_DT lifetime_NN killing_VBG their_PRP$ fellow-men_NNS ._.

But_CC conditions_NNS did_VBD not_RB grow_VB better_RBR ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ,_, they_PRP grew_VBD worse_RBR ._.
Another_DT general_JJ ,_, Gnaeus_NNP Pompeius_NNP ,_, or_CC Pompey_NNP ,_, a_DT close_JJ friend_NN of_IN Sulla_NNP ,_,
went_VBD east_RB to_TO renew_VB the_DT war_NN against_IN the_DT ever_RB troublesome_JJ Mithridates_NNS ._. He_PRP
drove_VBD that_DT energetic_JJ potentate_NN into_IN the_DT mountains_NNS where_WRB Mithridates_NNP took_VBD
poison_NN and_CC killed_VBD himself_PRP ,_, well_RB knowing_VBG what_WDT fate_NN awaited_VBD him_PRP as_IN a_DT
Roman_NNP captive_NN ._. Next_IN he_PRP re-established_VBD the_DT authority_NN of_IN Rome_NNP over_IN Syria_NNP ,_,
destroyed_VBN Jerusalem_NNP ,_, roamed_VBD through_IN western_JJ Asia_NNP ,_, trying_VBG to_TO revive_VB the_DT
myth_NN of_IN Alexander_NNP the_DT Great_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ (_-LRB- in_IN the_DT year_NN 62)_VBD returned_VBN to_TO
Rome_NNP with_IN a_DT dozen_NN ship-loads_NNS of_IN defeated_VBN Kings_NNP and_CC Princes_NNP and_CC Generals_NNP ,_,
all_DT of_IN whom_WP were_VBD forced_JJ to_TO march_VB in_IN the_DT triumphal_JJ procession_NN of_IN this_DT
enormously_RB popular_JJ Roman_NNP who_WP presented_VBD his_PRP$ city_NN with_IN the_DT sum_NN of_IN forty_CD
million_CD dollars_NNS in_IN plunder_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT government_NN of_IN Rome_NNP be_VB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN
a_DT strong_JJ man_NN ._. Only_RB a_DT few_JJ months_NNS before_RB ,_, the_DT town_NN had_VBD almost_RB fallen_VBN

Pompey_NNP organised_VBD a_DT triumvirate_NN which_WDT was_VBD to_TO take_VB charge_NN of_IN affairs_NNS ._. He_PRP
became_VBD the_DT leader_NN of_IN this_DT Vigilante_NNP Committee_NNP ._. Gaius_NNP Julius_NNP Caesar_NNP ,_, who_WP
had_VBD made_VBN a_DT reputation_NN for_IN himself_PRP as_IN governor_NN of_IN Spain_NNP ,_, was_VBD the_DT second_JJ

As_IN for_IN Caesar_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD by_IN far_RB the_DT ablest_JJS of_IN the_DT three_CD ,_, he_PRP decided_VBD that_IN

(_-LRB- the_DT fifteenth_JJ of_IN March_NNP according_VBG to_TO that_DT new_JJ calendar_NN which_WDT Caesar_NNP had_VBD

A_DT war_NN broke_VBD out_RP between_IN the_DT two_CD ._. In_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN Actium_NNP ,_, Octavian_NNP

In_IN 14_CD A_DT ._. D_NNP ._. his_PRP$ position_NN as_IN the_DT Absolute_JJ Ruler_NNP of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP people_NNS had_VBD

empire_NN the_DT world_NN had_VBD ever_RB seen_VBN ._.

If_IN the_DT truth_NN be_VB told_VBN ,_, the_DT average_JJ citizen_NN was_VBD sick_JJ and_CC tired_JJ of_IN anarchy_NN
and_CC disorder_NN ._. He_PRP did_VBD not_RB care_VB who_WP ruled_VBD him_PRP provided_VBD the_DT new_JJ master_NN gave_VBD

had_VBD contem-plated_VBN an_DT invasion_NN of_IN the_DT northwestern_JJ wilderness_NN which_WDT was_VBD

They_PRP concentrated_VBD their_PRP$ efforts_NNS upon_IN the_DT gigantic_JJ problem_NN of_IN internal_JJ
reform_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP was_VBD too_RB late_JJ to_TO do_VB much_RB good_JJ ._. Two_CD centuries_NNS of_IN revolution_NN
and_CC foreign_JJ war_NN had_VBD repeatedly_RB killed_VBN the_DT best_JJS men_NNS among_IN the_DT younger_JJR
generations_NNS ._. It_PRP had_VBD ruined_VBN the_DT class_NN of_IN the_DT free_JJ farmers_NNS ._. It_PRP had_VBD
introduced_VBN slave_NN labor_NN ,_, against_IN which_WDT no_DT freeman_NN could_MD hope_VB to_TO compete_VB ._.
It_PRP had_VBD turned_VBN the_DT cities_NNS into_IN beehives_NNS inhabited_VBN by_IN pauperized_JJ
and_CC unhealthy_JJ mobs_NNS of_IN runaway_JJ peasants_NNS ._. It_PRP had_VBD created_VBN a_DT large_JJ

take_VB graft_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO buy_VB bread_NN and_CC clothing_NN for_IN their_PRP$ families_NNS ._.
Worst_JJS of_IN all_DT ,_, it_PRP had_VBD accustomed_VBN people_NNS to_TO violence_NN ,_, to_TO blood-shed_JJ ,_, to_TO a_DT
barbarous_JJ pleasure_NN in_IN the_DT pain_NN and_CC suffering_NN of_IN others_NNS ._.

Outwardly_RB ,_, the_DT Roman_NNP state_NN during_IN the_DT first_JJ century_NN of_IN our_PRP$ era_NN was_VBD a_DT
magnificent_JJ political_JJ structure_NN ,_, so_RB large_JJ that_IN Alexander_NNP '_POS s_PRP empire_NN became_VBD
one_CD of_IN its_PRP$ minor_JJ provinces_NNS ._. Underneath_NN this_DT glory_NN there_RB lived_VBD millions_NNS

built_VBN a_DT nest_NN underneath_IN a_DT heavy_JJ stone_NN ._. They_PRP worked_VBD for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN
some_DT one_CD else_RB ._. They_PRP shared_VBD their_PRP$ food_NN with_IN the_DT animals_NNS of_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._.
They_PRP lived_VBD in_IN stables_NNS ._. They_PRP died_VBD without_IN hope_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD the_DT seven_CD hundred_CD and_CC fifty-third_JJ year_NN since_IN the_DT founding_NN of_IN
Rome_NNP ._. Gaius_NNP Julius_NNP Caesar_NNP Octavianus_NNP Augustus_NNP was_VBD living_VBG in_IN the_DT palace_NN
of_IN the_DT Palatine_NNP Hill_NNP ,_, busily_RB engaged_VBN upon_IN the_DT task_NN of_IN ruling_VBG his_PRP$ empire_NN ._.

In_IN a_DT little_JJ village_NN of_IN distant_JJ Syria_NNP ,_, Mary_NNP ,_, the_DT wife_NN of_IN Joseph_NNP the_DT
Carpenter_NNP ,_, was_VBD tending_VBG her_PRP$ little_JJ boy_NN ,_, born_VBN in_IN a_DT stable_NN of_IN Bethlehem_NNP ._.

This_DT is_VBZ a_DT strange_JJ world_NN ._.

Before_IN long_RB ,_, the_DT palace_NN and_CC the_DT stable_JJ were_VBD to_TO meet_VB in_IN open_JJ combat_NN ._.

And_CC the_DT stable_NN was_VBD to_TO emerge_VB victorious_JJ ._.




JOSHUA_NN OF_IN NAZARETH_NNP

THE_DT STORY_NN OF_IN JOSHUA_NN OF_IN NAZARETH_NNP ,_, WHOM_NNP THE_NNP GREEKS_NNP CALLED_NNP JESUS_.


IN_IN the_DT autumn_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN 783_CD (_-LRB- which_WDT would_MD be_VB 62_CD A_DT ._. D_NNP .,_. in_IN
our_PRP$ way_NN of_IN counting_NN time_NN )_-RRB- AEsculapius_NNP Cultellus_NNP ,_, a_DT Roman_NNP physician_NN ,_,
wrote_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ nephew_NN who_WP was_VBD with_IN the_DT army_NN in_IN Syria_NNP as_IN follows_VBZ :_:


My_PRP$ dear_JJ Nephew_NNP ,_,

A_DT few_JJ days_NNS ago_IN I_PRP was_VBD called_VBN in_IN to_TO prescribe_VB for_IN a_DT sick_JJ man_NN named_VBD Paul_NNP ._.
He_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT Roman_JJ citizen_NN of_IN Jewish_JJ parentage_NN ,_, well_RB educated_VBN
and_CC of_IN agreeable_JJ manners_NNS ._. I_PRP had_VBD been_VBN told_VBN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD here_RB in_IN connection_NN
with_IN a_DT law-suit_NN ,_, an_DT appeal_NN from_IN one_CD of_IN our_PRP$ provincial_JJ courts_NNS ,_, Caesarea_CC
or_CC some_DT such_JJ place_NN in_IN the_DT eastern_JJ Mediterranean_JJ ._. He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN described_VBN
to_TO me_PRP as_IN a_DT "_`` wild_JJ and_CC violent_JJ "_`` fellow_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN making_VBG speeches_NNS
against_IN the_DT People_NNS and_CC against_IN the_DT Law_NN ._. I_PRP found_VBD him_PRP very_RB intelligent_JJ and_CC
of_IN great_JJ honesty_NN ._.

A_DT friend_NN of_IN mine_NN who_WP used_VBD to_TO be_VB with_IN the_DT army_NN in_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP tells_VBZ me_PRP
that_IN he_PRP heard_VBD something_NN about_IN him_PRP in_IN Ephesus_NNP where_WRB he_PRP was_VBD preaching_VBG
sermons_NNS about_IN a_DT strange_JJ new_JJ God_NNP ._. I_PRP asked_VBD my_PRP$ patient_NN if_IN this_DT were_VBD true_JJ
and_CC whether_IN he_PRP had_VBD told_VBN the_DT people_NNS to_TO rebel_VB against_IN the_DT will_NN of_IN our_PRP$
beloved_JJ Emperor_NNP ._. Paul_NNP answered_VBD me_PRP that_IN the_DT Kingdom_NNP of_IN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD
spoken_VBN was_VBD not_RB of_IN this_DT world_NN and_CC he_PRP added_VBD many_JJ strange_JJ utterances_NNS which_WDT
I_PRP did_VBD not_RB understand_VB ,_, but_CC which_WDT were_VBD probably_RB due_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ fever_NN ._.

His_PRP$ personality_NN made_VBD a_DT great_JJ impression_NN upon_IN me_PRP and_CC I_PRP was_VBD sorry_JJ to_TO hear_VB
that_IN he_PRP was_VBD killed_VBN on_IN the_DT Ostian_NNP Road_NNP a_DT few_JJ days_NNS ago_RB ._. Therefore_CC I_PRP am_VBP
writing_VBG this_DT letter_NN to_TO you_PRP ._. When_WRB next_IN you_PRP visit_VBP Jerusalem_NNP ,_, I_PRP want_VBP you_PRP to_TO
find_VB out_RP something_NN about_IN my_PRP$ friend_NN Paul_NNP and_CC the_DT strange_JJ Jewish_JJ prophet_NN ,_,
who_WP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN his_PRP$ teacher_NN ._. Our_PRP$ slaves_NNS are_VBP getting_VBG much_RB excited_VBN
about_IN this_DT so-called_JJ Messiah_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ of_IN them_PRP ,_, who_WP openly_RB talked_VBD of_IN
the_DT new_JJ kingdom_NN (_-LRB- whatever_WDT that_DT means_VBZ )_-RRB- have_VBP been_VBN crucified_VBN ._. I_PRP would_MD like_VB
to_TO know_VB the_DT truth_NN about_IN all_PDT these_DT rumours_NNS and_CC I_PRP am_VBP

Your_PRP$ devoted_VBN Uncle_NN ,_,
AESCULAPIUS_NNP CULTELLUS_NNP ._.


Six_CD weeks_NNS later_RB ,_, Gladius_NNP Ensa_NNP ,_, the_DT nephew_NN ,_, a_DT captain_NN of_IN the_DT VII_NNP Gallic_NNP
Infantry_NNP ,_, answered_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_:


My_PRP$ dear_JJ Uncle_NN ,_,

I_PRP received_VBD your_PRP$ letter_NN and_CC I_PRP have_VBP obeyed_VBN your_PRP$ instructions_NNS ._.

Two_CD weeks_NNS ago_IN our_PRP$ brigade_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Jerusalem_NNP ._. There_EX have_VBP been_VBN several_JJ
revolutions_NNS during_IN the_DT last_JJ century_NN and_CC there_EX is_VBZ not_RB much_JJ left_NN of_IN the_DT
old_JJ city_NN ._. We_PRP have_VBP been_VBN here_RB now_RB for_IN a_DT month_NN and_CC to-morrow_NN we_PRP shall_MD
continue_VB our_PRP$ march_NN to_TO Petra_NNP ,_, where_WRB there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN trouble_NN with_IN some_DT of_IN
the_DT Arab_JJ tribes_NNS ._. I_PRP shall_MD use_VB this_DT evening_NN to_TO answer_VB your_PRP$ questions_NNS ,_, but_CC
pray_NN do_VBP not_RB expect_VB a_DT detailed_JJ report_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP talked_VBN with_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT older_JJR men_NNS in_IN this_DT city_NN but_CC few_JJ have_VBP been_VBN
able_JJ to_TO give_VB me_PRP any_DT definite_JJ information_NN ._. A_DT few_JJ days_NNS ago_IN a_DT pedler_NN came_VBD
to_TO the_DT camp_NN ._. I_PRP bought_VBD some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ olives_NNS and_CC I_PRP asked_VBD him_PRP whether_IN he_PRP had_VBD
ever_RB heard_VBN of_IN the_DT famous_JJ Messiah_NNP who_WP was_VBD killed_VBN when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD young_JJ ._. He_PRP
said_VBD that_IN he_PRP remembered_VBD it_PRP very_RB clearly_RB ,_, because_IN his_PRP$ father_NN had_VBD taken_VBN
him_PRP to_TO Golgotha_NNP (_-LRB- a_DT hill_NN just_RB outside_IN the_DT city_NN )_-RRB- to_TO see_VB the_DT execution_NN ,_,
and_CC to_TO show_VB him_PRP what_WP became_VBD of_IN the_DT enemies_NNS of_IN the_DT laws_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN
Judaea_NNP ._. He_PRP gave_VBD me_PRP the_DT address_NN of_IN one_CD Joseph_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT personal_JJ
friend_NN of_IN the_DT Messiah_NNP and_CC told_VBD me_PRP that_IN I_PRP had_VBD better_RB go_VB and_CC see_VB him_PRP if_IN I_PRP
wanted_VBD to_TO know_VB more_RBR ._.

This_DT morning_NN I_PRP went_VBD to_TO call_VB on_IN Joseph_NNP ._. He_PRP was_VBD quite_RB an_DT old_JJ man_NN ._. He_PRP had_VBD
been_VBN a_DT fisherman_NN on_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT fresh-water_JJ lakes_NNS ._. His_PRP$ memory_NN was_VBD
clear_JJ ,_, and_CC from_IN him_PRP at_IN last_JJ I_PRP got_VBD a_DT fairly_RB definite_JJ account_NN of_IN what_WP had_VBD
happened_VBN during_IN the_DT troublesome_JJ days_NNS before_IN I_PRP was_VBD born_VBN ._.

Tiberius_NNP ,_, our_PRP$ great_JJ and_CC glorious_JJ emperor_NN ,_, was_VBD on_IN the_DT throne_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT
officer_NN of_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Pontius_NNP Pilatus_NNP was_VBD governor_NN of_IN Judaea_NNP and_CC
Samaria_NNP ._. Joseph_NNP knew_VBD little_JJ about_IN this_DT Pilatus_NN ._. He_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN
an_DT honest_JJ enough_JJ official_NN who_WP left_VBD a_DT decent_JJ reputation_NN as_IN procurator_NN of_IN
the_DT province_NN ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN 755_CD or_CC 756_CD (_-LRB- Joseph_NNP had_VBD forgotten_VBN when_WRB )_-RRB- Pilatus_NNP
was_VBD called_VBN to_TO Jerusalem_NNP on_IN account_NN of_IN a_DT riot_NN ._. A_DT certain_JJ young_JJ man_NN (_-LRB- the_DT
son_NN of_IN a_DT carpenter_NN of_IN Nazareth_NNP )_-RRB- was_VBD said_VBN to_TO be_VB planning_VBG a_DT revolution_NN
against_IN the_DT Roman_JJ government_NN ._. Strangely_RB enough_RB our_PRP$ own_JJ intelligence_NN

the_DT carpenter_NN was_VBD an_DT excellent_JJ citizen_NN and_CC that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT reason_NN to_TO
proceed_VB against_IN him_PRP ._. But_CC the_DT old-fashioned_JJ leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT Jewish_JJ
faith_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO Joseph_NNP ,_, were_VBD much_RB upset_VBN ._. They_PRP greatly_RB disliked_VBD his_PRP$
popularity_NN with_IN the_DT masses_NNS of_IN the_DT poorer_JJR Hebrews_NNP ._. The_DT "_`` Nazarene_JJ "_'' (_-LRB- so_RB
they_PRP told_VBD Pilatus_NNP )_-RRB- had_VBD publicly_RB claimed_VBN that_IN a_DT Greek_NNP or_CC a_DT Roman_JJ or_CC even_RB
a_DT Philistine_NNP ,_, who_WP tried_VBD to_TO live_VB a_DT decent_JJ and_CC honourable_JJ life_NN ,_, was_VBD quite_RB
as_RB good_JJ as_IN a_DT Jew_NNP who_WP spent_VBD his_PRP$ days_NNS studying_VBG the_DT ancient_JJ laws_NNS of_IN Moses_NNP ._.
Pilatus_NNP does_VBZ not_RB seem_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN impressed_VBN by_IN this_DT argument_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB

his_PRP$ followers_NNS ,_, he_PRP decided_VBD to_TO take_VB the_DT carpenter_NN into_IN custody_NN to_TO save_VB his_PRP$

He_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO have_VB understood_VBN the_DT real_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT quarrel_NN ._.

Nazarene_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT Greeks_NNP who_WP live_VBP in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN always_RB refer_VBP

Pilatus_NNP ,_, who_WP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN well_RB versed_VBN in_IN the_DT doctrines_NNS of_IN the_DT

with_IN great_JJ dignity_NN and_CC who_WP forgave_VBP all_PDT those_DT who_WP hated_VBD him_PRP ._. He_PRP was_VBD
crucified_VBN amidst_IN the_DT howls_NNS and_CC the_DT laughter_NN of_IN the_DT Jerusalem_NNP mob_NN ._.

That_DT is_VBZ what_WP Joseph_NNP told_VBD me_PRP ,_, with_IN tears_NNS running_VBG down_IN his_PRP$ old_JJ cheeks_NNS ._. I_NN
gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT gold_NN piece_NN when_WRB I_PRP left_VBD him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP refused_VBD it_PRP and_CC asked_VBD me_PRP
to_TO hand_VB it_PRP to_TO one_CD poorer_JJR than_IN himself_PRP ._. I_PRP also_RB asked_VBD him_PRP a_DT few_JJ questions_NNS
about_IN your_PRP$ friend_NN Paul_NNP ._. He_PRP had_VBD known_VBN him_PRP slightly_RB ._. He_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN

to_TO live_VB honest_JJ lives_NNS and_CC have_VBP done_VBN good_JJ to_TO those_DT who_WP were_VBD suffering_VBG and_CC

I_PRP hope_VBP that_IN I_PRP have_VBP answered_VBN your_PRP$ questions_NNS to_TO your_PRP$ satisfaction_NN ._. The_DT
whole_JJ story_NN seems_VBZ very_RB harmless_JJ to_TO me_PRP as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT safety_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN
is_VBZ concerned_VBN ._. But_CC then_RB ,_, we_PRP Romans_NNPS never_RB have_VBP been_VBN able_JJ to_TO understand_VB the_DT
people_NNS of_IN this_DT province_NN ._. I_PRP am_VBP sorry_JJ that_IN they_PRP have_VBP killed_VBN your_PRP$ friend_NN
Paul_NNP ._. I_PRP wish_VBP that_IN I_PRP were_VBD at_IN home_NN again_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP ,_, as_IN ever_RB ,_,

Your_PRP$ dutiful_JJ nephew_NN ,_,
GLADIUS_NNP ENSA_NNP ._.




THE_DT FALL_NNP OF_IN ROME_NNP

THE_DT TWILIGHT_NN OF_IN ROME_NNP


THE_DT text-books_NNS of_IN ancient_JJ History_NN give_VB the_DT date_NN 476_VBD as_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN which_WDT
Rome_NNP fell_VBD ,_, because_IN in_IN that_DT year_NN the_DT last_JJ emperor_NN was_VBD driven_VBN off_RP his_PRP$
throne_NN ._. But_CC Rome_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD not_RB built_VBN in_IN a_DT day_NN ,_, took_VBD a_DT long_JJ time_NN
falling_VBG ._. The_DT process_NN was_VBD so_RB slow_JJ and_CC so_RB gradual_JJ that_IN most_JJS Romans_NNS did_VBD not_RB
realise_NN how_WRB their_PRP$ old_JJ world_NN was_VBD coming_VBG to_TO an_DT end_NN ._. They_PRP complained_VBD about_IN
the_DT unrest_NN of_IN the_DT times_NNS —_IN they_PRP grumbled_VBD about_IN the_DT high_JJ prices_NNS of_IN food_NN and_CC
about_IN the_DT low_JJ wages_NNS of_IN the_DT workmen_NNS —_IN they_PRP cursed_VBD the_DT profiteers_NNS who_WP had_VBD a_DT
monopoly_NN of_IN the_DT grain_NN and_CC the_DT wool_NN and_CC the_DT gold_JJ coin_NN ._. Occasionally_RB they_PRP
rebelled_VBN against_IN an_DT unusually_RB rapacious_JJ governor_NN ._. But_CC the_DT majority_NN of_IN
the_DT people_NNS during_IN the_DT first_JJ four_CD centuries_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ era_NN ate_VBD and_CC drank_VBD
(_-LRB- whatever_WDT their_PRP$ purse_NN allowed_VBD them_PRP to_TO buy_VB )_-RRB- and_CC hated_VBD or_CC loved_VBD (_-LRB- according_VBG
to_TO their_PRP$ nature_NN )_-RRB- and_CC went_VBD to_TO the_DT theatre_NN (_-LRB- whenever_WRB there_EX was_VBD a_DT free_JJ
show_NN of_IN fighting_NN gladiators_NNS )_-RRB- or_CC starved_VBN in_IN the_DT slums_NNS of_IN the_DT big_JJ
cities_NNS ,_, utterly_RB ignorant_JJ of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN their_PRP$ empire_NN had_VBD outlived_VBN its_PRP$
usefulness_NN and_CC was_VBD doomed_VBN to_TO perish_NN ._.

How_WRB could_MD they_PRP realise_VB the_DT threatened_JJ danger_NN ?_. Rome_NNP made_VBD a_DT fine_JJ showing_NN
of_IN outward_JJ glory_NN ._. Well-paved_'' roads_NNS connected_VBN the_DT different_JJ provinces_NNS ,_,
the_DT imperial_JJ police_NN were_VBD active_JJ and_CC showed_VBD little_JJ tenderness_NN for_IN
highwaymen_NNS ._. The_DT frontier_NN was_VBD closely_RB guarded_VBN against_IN the_DT savage_JJ tribes_NNS
who_WP seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB occupying_VBG the_DT waste_NN lands_NNS of_IN northern_JJ Europe_NNP ._. The_DT whole_NN
world_NN was_VBD paying_VBG tribute_NN to_TO the_DT mighty_JJ city_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT score_NN of_IN
able_JJ men_NNS were_VBD working_VBG day_NN and_CC night_NN to_TO undo_VB the_DT mistakes_NNS of_IN the_DT past_NN and_CC
bring_VB about_RB a_DT return_NN to_TO the_DT happier_JJR conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT early_JJ Republic_NNP ._.

But_CC the_DT underlying_JJ causes_NNS of_IN the_DT decay_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, of_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP
told_VBD you_PRP in_IN a_DT former_JJ chapter_NN ,_, had_VBD not_RB been_VBN removed_VBN and_CC reform_NN therefore_RB
was_VBD impossible_JJ ._.

Rome_NNP was_VBD ,_, first_JJ and_CC last_JJ and_CC all_PDT the_DT time_NN ,_, a_DT city-state_NN as_IN Athens_NNP and_CC
Corinth_NNP had_VBD been_VBN city-states_NNS in_IN ancient_JJ Hellas_NNP ._. It_PRP had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO
dominate_VB the_DT Italian_JJ peninsula_NN ._. But_CC Rome_NNP as_IN the_DT ruler_NN of_IN the_DT entire_NN
civilised_JJ world_NN was_VBD a_DT political_JJ impossibility_NN and_CC could_MD not_RB endure_VB ._. Her_PRP$
young_JJ men_NNS were_VBD killed_VBN in_IN her_PRP$ endless_JJ wars_NNS ._. Her_PRP$ farmers_NNS were_VBD ruined_VBN by_IN
long_JJ military_JJ service_NN and_CC by_IN taxation_NN ._. They_PRP either_CC became_VBD professional_JJ
beggars_NNS or_CC hired_VBN themselves_PRP out_IN to_TO rich_JJ landowners_NNS who_WP gave_VBD them_PRP board_NN
and_CC lodging_VBG in_IN exchange_NN for_IN their_PRP$ services_NNS and_CC made_VBD them_PRP "_`` serfs_NNS ,"_VBP those_DT
unfortunate_JJ human_JJ beings_NNS who_WP are_VBP neither_DT slaves_NNS nor_CC freemen_NNS ,_, but_CC who_WP
have_VBP become_VBN part_NN of_IN the_DT soil_NN upon_IN which_WDT they_PRP work_VBP ,_, like_IN so_RB many_JJ cows_NNS ,_,
and_CC the_DT trees_NNS ._.

The_DT Empire_NNP ,_, the_DT State_NNP ,_, had_VBD become_VBN everything_NN ._. The_DT common_JJ citizen_NN had_VBD
dwindled_VBD down_RP to_TO less_JJR than_IN nothing_NN ._. As_IN for_IN the_DT slaves_NNS ,_, they_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN
the_DT words_NNS that_WDT were_VBD spoken_VBN by_IN Paul_NNP ._. They_PRP had_VBD accepted_VBN the_DT message_NN of_IN the_DT
humble_JJ carpenter_NN of_IN Nazareth_NNP ._. They_PRP did_VBD not_RB rebel_VB against_IN their_PRP$ masters_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ,_, they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN taught_VBN to_TO be_VB meek_RB and_CC they_PRP obeyed_VBD their_PRP$
superiors_NNS ._. But_CC they_PRP had_VBD lost_VBN all_DT interest_NN in_IN the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN this_DT world_NN
which_WDT had_VBD proved_VBN such_JJ a_DT miserable_JJ place_NN of_IN abode_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO
fight_VB the_DT good_JJ fight_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD enter_VB into_IN the_DT Kingdom_NNP of_IN Heaven_NNP ._.
But_CC they_PRP were_VBD not_RB willing_JJ to_TO engage_VB in_IN warfare_NN for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN an_DT
ambitious_JJ emperor_NN who_WP aspired_VBD to_TO glory_NN by_IN way_NN of_IN a_DT foreign_JJ campaign_NN in_IN
the_DT land_NN of_IN the_DT Parthians_NNPS or_CC the_DT Numidians_NNPS or_CC the_DT Scots_NNS ._.

And_CC so_RB conditions_NNS grew_VBD worse_JJR as_IN the_DT centuries_NNS went_VBD by_IN ._. The_DT first_JJ
Emperors_NNS had_VBD continued_VBN the_DT tradition_NN of_IN "_`` leadership_NN "_'' which_WDT had_VBD given_VBN the_DT
old_JJ tribal_JJ chieftains_NNS such_JJ a_DT hold_NN upon_IN their_PRP$ subjects_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT Emperors_NNS
of_IN the_DT second_JJ and_CC third_JJ centuries_NNS were_VBD Barrack-Emperors_NNP ,_, professional_JJ
soldiers_NNS ,_, who_WP existed_VBD by_IN the_DT grace_NN of_IN their_PRP$ body-guards_NNS ,_, the_DT so-called_JJ
Praetorians_NNS ._. They_PRP succeeded_VBD each_DT other_JJ with_IN terrifying_VBG rapidity_NN ,_,
murdering_VBG their_PRP$ way_NN into_IN the_DT palace_NN and_CC being_VBG murdered_VBN out_IN of_IN it_PRP as_RB soon_RB
as_IN their_PRP$ successors_NNS had_VBD become_VBN rich_JJ enough_RB to_TO bribe_VB the_DT guards_NNS into_IN a_DT
new_JJ rebellion_NN ._.

Meanwhile_RB the_DT barbarians_NNS were_VBD hammering_VBG at_IN the_DT gates_NNS of_IN the_DT northern_JJ
frontier_NN ._. As_IN there_EX were_VBD no_RB longer_RB any_DT native_JJ Roman_NNP armies_NNS to_TO stop_VB their_PRP$
progress_NN ,_, foreign_JJ mercenaries_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB hired_VBN to_TO fight_VB the_DT invader_NN ._. As_IN
the_DT foreign_JJ soldier_NN happened_VBD to_TO be_VB of_IN the_DT same_JJ blood_NN as_IN his_PRP$ supposed_VBN
enemy_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD apt_JJ to_TO be_VB quite_RB lenient_JJ when_WRB he_PRP engaged_VBD in_IN battle_NN ._.
Finally_RB ,_, by_IN way_NN of_IN experiment_NN ,_, a_DT few_JJ tribes_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO settle_VB
within_IN the_DT confines_NNS of_IN the_DT Empire_NNP ._. Others_NNS followed_VBD ._. Soon_RB these_DT tribes_NNS
complained_VBD bitterly_RB of_IN the_DT greedy_JJ Roman_NNP tax-gatherers_NNS ,_, who_WP took_VBD away_RB
their_PRP$ last_JJ penny_NN ._. When_WRB they_PRP got_VBD no_DT redress_NN they_PRP marched_VBD to_TO Rome_NNP and_CC
loudly_RB demanded_VBD that_IN they_PRP be_VB heard_VBN ._.

This_DT made_VBN Rome_NNP very_RB uncomfortable_JJ as_IN an_DT Imperial_NNP residence_NN ._. Constantine_''
(_-LRB- who_WP ruled_VBD from_IN 323_CD to_TO 337)_CD looked_VBD for_IN a_DT new_JJ capital_NN ._. He_PRP chose_VBD
Byzantium_NNP ,_, the_DT gate-way_NN for_IN the_DT commerce_NN between_IN Europe_NNP and_CC Asia_NNP ._. The_DT
city_NN was_VBD renamed_VBN Constantinople_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT court_NN moved_VBD eastward_RB ._. When_WRB
Constantine_NNP died_VBD ,_, his_PRP$ two_CD sons_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN a_DT more_RBR efficient_JJ
administration_NN ,_, divided_VBN the_DT Empire_NN between_IN them_PRP ._. The_DT elder_JJR lived_VBD in_IN
Rome_NNP and_CC ruled_VBD in_IN the_DT west_NN ._. The_DT younger_JJR stayed_VBD in_IN Constantinople_NNP and_CC was_VBD
master_NN of_IN the_DT east_JJ ._.

Then_RB came_VBD the_DT fourth_JJ century_NN and_CC the_DT terrible_JJ visitation_NN of_IN the_DT Huns_NNP ,_,
those_DT mysterious_JJ Asiatic_JJ horsemen_NNS who_WP for_IN more_JJR than_IN two_CD centuries_NNS
maintained_VBN themselves_PRP in_IN Northern_NNP Europe_NNP and_CC continued_VBD their_PRP$ career_NN of_IN
bloodshed_VBN until_IN they_PRP were_VBD defeated_VBN near_IN Chalons-sur_NNP -_: Marne_NNP in_IN France_NNP in_IN
the_DT year_NN 451._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT Huns_NNP had_VBD reached_VBN the_DT Danube_NNP they_PRP had_VBD begun_VBN
to_TO press_VB hard_RB upon_IN the_DT Goths_NNPS ._. The_DT Goths_NNPS ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO save_VB themselves_PRP ,_,
were_VBD thereupon_RB obliged_VBN to_TO invade_VB Rome_NNP ._. The_DT Emperor_NNP Valens_NNP tried_VBD to_TO stop_VB
them_PRP ,_, but_CC was_VBD killed_VBN near_IN Adrianople_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 378._. Twenty-two_CD years_NNS
later_RB ,_, under_IN their_PRP$ king_NN ,_, Alaric_NNP ,_, these_DT same_JJ West_NNP Goths_NNPS marched_VBD westward_RB
and_CC attacked_VBN Rome_NNP ._. They_PRP did_VBD not_RB plunder_NN ,_, and_CC destroyed_VBD only_RB a_DT few_JJ
palaces_NNS ._. Next_NNP came_VBD the_DT Vandals_NNP ,_, and_CC showed_VBD less_JJR respect_NN for_IN the_DT
venerable_JJ traditions_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. Then_RB the_DT Burgundians_NNPS ._. Then_RB the_DT East_NNP
Goths_NNS ._. Then_RB the_DT Alemanni_NNP ._. Then_RB the_DT Franks_NNS ._. There_EX was_VBD no_DT end_NN to_TO the_DT
invasions_NNS ._. Rome_NNP at_IN last_JJ was_VBD at_IN the_DT mercy_NN of_IN every_DT ambitious_JJ highway_NN
robber_NN who_WP could_MD gather_VB a_DT few_JJ followers_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 402_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP fled_VBD to_TO Ravenna_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD a_DT sea-port_NN and_CC
strongly_RB fortified_JJ ,_, and_CC there_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT year_NN 475,_IN Odoacer_NNP ,_, commander_NN of_IN a_DT
regiment_NN of_IN the_DT German_JJ mercenaries_NNS ,_, who_WP wanted_VBD the_DT farms_NNS of_IN Italy_NNP to_TO
be_VB divided_VBN among_IN themselves_PRP ,_, gently_RB but_CC effectively_RB pushed_VBD Romulus_NNP
Augustulus_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT emperors_NNS who_WP ruled_VBD the_DT western_JJ division_NN ,_,
from_IN his_PRP$ throne_NN ,_, and_CC proclaimed_VBD himself_PRP Patriarch_NNP or_CC ruler_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ._. The_DT
eastern_JJ Emperor_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD very_RB busy_JJ with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ affairs_NNS ,_, recognised_VBD him_PRP ,_,
and_CC for_IN ten_CD years_NNS Odoacer_RB ruled_VBD what_WP was_VBD left_VBN of_IN the_DT western_JJ provinces_NNS ._.

A_DT few_JJ years_NNS later_RB ,_, Theodoric_NNP ,_, King_NNP of_IN the_DT East_NNP Goths_NNPS ,_, invaded_VBD the_DT newly_RB
formed_VBN Patriciat_NNP ,_, took_VBD Ravenna_NNP ,_, murdered_VBN Odoacer_NNP at_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ dinner_NN

sixth_JJ century_NN a_DT motley_NN crowd_NN of_IN Longobards_NNP and_CC Saxons_NNP and_CC Slavs_NNP and_CC

Then_RB at_IN last_JJ the_DT imperial_JJ city_NN sank_VBD into_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN utter_JJ neglect_NN and_CC
despair_NN ._. The_DT ancient_JJ palaces_NNS had_VBD been_VBN plundered_VBN time_NN and_CC again_RB ._. The_DT

ancestors_NNS ,_, threatened_VBD to_TO perish_VB from_IN the_DT western_JJ continent_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN in_IN the_DT far_JJ east_JJ ,_, Constantinople_JJ continued_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT
centre_NN of_IN an_DT Empire_NNP for_IN another_DT thousand_CD years_NNS ._. But_CC it_PRP hardly_RB counted_VBD

began_VBD to_TO forget_VB its_PRP$ western_JJ origin_NN ._. Gradually_RB the_DT Roman_NNP language_NN was_VBD

Byzantium_NNP into_IN the_DT vast_JJ wilderness_NN of_IN Russia_NNP ._.

As_IN for_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD left_VBN to_TO the_DT mercies_NNS of_IN the_DT Barbarians_NNPS ._. For_IN

destruction_NN ,_, from_IN a_DT return_NN to_TO the_DT days_NNS of_IN cave-men_NNS and_CC the_DT hyena_NN ._.

This_DT was_VBD the_DT church_NN —_IN the_DT flock_NN of_IN humble_JJ men_NNS and_CC women_NNS who_WP for_IN many_JJ
centuries_NNS had_VBD confessed_VBN themselves_PRP the_DT followers_NNS of_IN Jesus_NNP ,_, the_DT carpenter_NN

saved_VBN the_DT trouble_NN of_IN a_DT street-riot_NN in_IN a_DT little_JJ city_NN somewhere_RB along_IN the_DT
Syrian_JJ frontier_NN ._.




RISE_VB OF_IN THE_DT CHURCH_NNS

HOW_NNP ROME_NNP BECAME_NNP THE_DT CENTRE_NN OF_IN THE_DT CHRISTIAN_JJ WORLD_NN


THE_DT average_NN intelligent_JJ Roman_NNP who_WP lived_VBD under_IN the_DT Empire_NNP had_VBD taken_VBN very_RB
little_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT gods_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ fathers_NNS ._. A_DT few_JJ times_NNS a_DT year_NN he_PRP went_VBD
to_TO the_DT temple_NN ,_, but_CC merely_RB as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN custom_NN ._. He_PRP looked_VBD on_IN
patiently_RB when_WRB the_DT people_NNS celebrated_VBD a_DT religious_JJ festival_NN with_IN a_DT solemn_JJ
procession_NN ._. But_CC he_PRP regarded_VBD the_DT worship_NN of_IN Jupiter_NNP and_CC Minerva_NNP and_CC
Neptune_NNP as_IN something_NN rather_RB childish_JJ ,_, a_DT survival_NN from_IN the_DT crude_NN days_NNS
of_IN the_DT early_JJ republic_NN and_CC not_RB a_DT fit_NN subject_NN of_IN study_NN for_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD
mastered_VBN the_DT works_NNS of_IN the_DT Stoics_NNP and_CC the_DT Epicureans_NNPS and_CC the_DT other_JJ great_JJ
philosophers_NNS of_IN Athens_NNP ._.

This_DT attitude_NN made_VBD the_DT Roman_NNP a_DT very_RB tolerant_JJ man_NN ._. The_DT government_NN
insisted_VBD that_IN all_DT people_NNS ,_, Romans_NNS ,_, foreigners_NNS ,_, Greeks_NNP ,_, Babylonians_NNS ,_, Jews_NNS ,_,
should_MD pay_VB a_DT certain_JJ outward_JJ respect_NN to_TO the_DT image_NN of_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP
which_WDT was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO stand_VB in_IN every_DT temple_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN a_DT picture_NN of_IN
the_DT President_NNP of_IN the_DT United_NNP States_NNPS is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO hang_VB in_IN an_DT American_NNP Post_NNP
Office_NNP ._. But_CC this_DT was_VBD a_DT formality_NN without_IN any_DT deeper_JJR meaning_NN ._. Generally_RB
speaking_VBG everybody_NN could_MD honour_VB ,_, revere_NN and_CC adore_VB whatever_WDT gods_NNS he_PRP
pleased_JJ ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, Rome_NNP was_VBD filled_VBN with_IN all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN queer_JJ little_JJ
temples_NNS and_CC synagogues_NNS ,_, dedicated_VBN to_TO the_DT worship_NN of_IN Egyptian_NNP and_CC African_NNP
and_CC Asiatic_JJ divinities_NNS ._.

When_WRB the_DT first_JJ disciples_NNS of_IN Jesus_NNP reached_VBD Rome_NNP and_CC began_VBD to_TO preach_VB their_PRP$
new_JJ doctrine_NN of_IN a_DT universal_JJ brotherhood_NN of_IN man_NN ,_, nobody_NN objected_VBD ._. The_DT man_NN

had_VBD always_RB been_VBN full_JJ of_IN wandering_VBG preachers_NNS ,_, each_DT proclaiming_VBG his_PRP$
own_JJ "_`` mystery_NN ."_JJ Most_JJS of_IN the_DT self-appointed_JJ priests_NNS appealed_VBD to_TO the_DT
senses_NNS —_RB promised_VBD golden_JJ rewards_NNS and_CC endless_JJ pleasure_NN to_TO the_DT followers_NNS of_IN
their_PRP$ own_JJ particular_JJ god_NN ._. Soon_RB the_DT crowd_NN in_IN the_DT street_NN noticed_VBD that_IN the_DT
so-called_JJ Christians_NNS (_-LRB- the_DT followers_NNS of_IN the_DT Christ_NNP or_CC "_`` anointed_DT ")_JJ spoke_NN
a_DT very_RB different_JJ language_NN ._. They_PRP did_VBD not_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB impressed_VBN by_IN great_JJ
riches_NNS or_CC a_DT noble_JJ position_NN ._. They_PRP extolled_VBD the_DT beauties_NNS of_IN poverty_NN and_CC
humility_NN and_CC meekness_NN ._. These_DT were_VBD not_RB exactly_RB the_DT virtues_NNS which_WDT had_VBD made_VBN
Rome_NNP the_DT mistress_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD rather_RB interesting_JJ to_TO listen_VB to_TO
a_DT "_`` mystery_NN "_'' which_WDT told_VBD people_NNS in_IN the_DT hey-day_NN of_IN their_PRP$ glory_NN that_IN their_PRP$
worldly_RB success_NN could_MD not_RB possibly_RB bring_VB them_PRP lasting_JJ happiness_NN ._.

Besides_IN ,_, the_DT preachers_NNS of_IN the_DT Christian_NNP mystery_NN told_VBD dreadful_JJ stories_NNS
of_IN the_DT fate_NN that_WDT awaited_VBD those_DT who_WP refused_VBD to_TO listen_VB to_TO the_DT words_NNS of_IN
the_DT true_JJ God_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD never_RB wise_JJ to_TO take_VB chances_NNS ._. Of_IN course_NN the_DT old_JJ Roman_NNP
gods_NNS still_RB existed_VBD ,_, but_CC were_VBD they_PRP strong_JJ enough_RB to_TO protect_VB their_PRP$ friends_NNS

distant_JJ Asia_NNP ?_. People_NNS began_VBD to_TO have_VB doubts_NNS ._. They_PRP returned_VBD to_TO listen_VB to_TO
further_JJ explanations_NNS of_IN the_DT new_JJ creed_NN ._. After_IN a_DT while_NN they_PRP began_VBD to_TO meet_VB
the_DT men_NNS and_CC women_NNS who_WP preached_VBD the_DT words_NNS of_IN Jesus_NNP ._. They_PRP found_VBD them_PRP very_RB

riches_NNS ,_, but_CC gave_VBD away_RB whatever_WDT they_PRP had_VBD ._. The_DT example_NN of_IN their_PRP$ unselfish_JJ
lives_NNS forced_VBD many_JJ Romans_NNS to_TO forsake_VB the_DT old_JJ religion_NN ._. They_PRP joined_VBD the_DT

This_DT went_VBD on_IN year_NN after_IN year_NN and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN Christians_NNS continued_VBD to_TO
increase_NN ._. Presbyters_NNPS or_CC priests_NNS (_-LRB- the_DT original_JJ Greek_NNP meant_VBD "_`` elder_JJR ")_NN were_VBD

The_DT church_NN became_VBD a_DT powerful_JJ institution_NN within_IN the_DT Empire_NNP ._. The_DT

also_RB attracted_VBD many_JJ strong_JJ men_NNS who_WP found_VBD it_PRP impossible_JJ to_TO make_VB a_DT career_NN

the_DT state_NN was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO take_VB notice_NN ._. The_DT Roman_NNP Empire_NNP (_-LRB- I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD this_DT
before_IN )_-RRB- was_VBD tolerant_JJ through_IN indifference_NN ._. It_PRP allowed_VBD everybody_NN to_TO
seek_VB salvation_NN after_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ own_JJ fashion_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP insisted_VBD that_IN the_DT
different_JJ sects_NNS keep_VBP the_DT peace_NN among_IN themselves_PRP and_CC obey_VB the_DT wise_JJ rule_NN
of_IN "_`` live_VB and_CC let_VB live_VB ."_CD

The_DT Christian_NNP communities_NNS however_RB ,_, refused_VBD to_TO practice_VB any_DT sort_NN of_IN
tolerance_NN ._. They_PRP publicly_RB declared_VBD that_IN their_PRP$ God_NNP ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ God_NNP alone_RB ,_,
was_VBD the_DT true_JJ ruler_NN of_IN Heaven_NNP and_CC Earth_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN all_DT other_JJ gods_NNS
were_VBD imposters_NNS ._. This_DT seemed_VBD unfair_JJ to_TO the_DT other_JJ sects_NNS and_CC the_DT police_NN
discouraged_VBN such_JJ utterances_NNS ._. The_DT Christians_NNPS persisted_VBD ._.

Soon_RB there_EX were_VBD further_JJ difficulties_NNS ._. The_DT Christians_NNPS refused_VBD to_TO go_VB
through_IN the_DT formalities_NNS of_IN paying_VBG homage_NN to_TO the_DT emperor_NN ._. They_PRP refused_VBD
to_TO appear_VB when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD called_VBN upon_IN to_TO join_VB the_DT army_NN ._. The_DT Roman_NNP
magistrates_NNS threatened_VBD to_TO punish_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT Christians_NNPS answered_VBD that_IN this_DT
miserable_JJ world_NN was_VBD only_RB the_DT ante-room_NN to_TO a_DT very_RB pleasant_JJ Heaven_NN and_CC
that_IN they_PRP were_VBD more_RBR than_IN willing_JJ to_TO suffer_VB death_NN for_IN their_PRP$ principles_NNS ._.
The_DT Romans_NNPS ,_, puzzled_VBN by_IN such_JJ conduct_NN ,_, sometimes_RB killed_VBN the_DT offenders_NNS ,_, but_CC
more_RBR often_RB they_PRP did_VBD not_RB ._. There_EX was_VBD a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN lynching_NN during_IN

of_IN the_DT mob_NN which_WDT accused_VBD their_PRP$ meek_NN Christian_NNP neighbours_NNS of_IN every_DT
conceivable_JJ crime_NN ,_, (_-LRB- such_JJ as_IN slaughtering_VBG and_CC eating_VBG babies_NNS ,_, bringing_VBG
about_IN sickness_NN and_CC pestilence_NN ,_, betraying_VBG the_DT country_NN in_IN times_NNS of_IN danger_NN )_-RRB-
because_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT harmless_JJ sport_NN and_CC devoid_JJ of_IN danger_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT Christians_NNPS
refused_VBD to_TO fight_VB back_RB ._.

Meanwhile_RB ,_, Rome_NNP continued_VBD to_TO be_VB invaded_VBN by_IN the_DT Barbarians_NNPS and_CC when_WRB her_PRP$
armies_NNS failed_VBD ,_, Christian_NNP missionaries_NNS went_VBD forth_RB to_TO preach_VB their_PRP$ gospel_NN
of_IN peace_NN to_TO the_DT wild_JJ Teutons_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD strong_JJ men_NNS without_IN fear_NN of_IN

unrepentant_JJ sinners_NNS ._. The_DT Teutons_NNPS were_VBD deeply_RB impressed_VBN ._. They_PRP still_RB had_VBD a_DT
deep_JJ respect_NN for_IN the_DT wisdom_NN of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ city_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ._. Those_DT men_NNS were_VBD
Romans_NNS ._. They_PRP probably_RB spoke_VBD the_DT truth_NN ._. Soon_RB the_DT Christian_NNP missionary_NN
became_VBD a_DT power_NN in_IN the_DT savage_JJ regions_NNS of_IN the_DT Teutons_NNS and_CC the_DT Franks_NNS ._. Half_NN
a_DT dozen_NN missionaries_NNS were_VBD as_RB valuable_JJ as_IN a_DT whole_JJ regiment_NN of_IN soldiers_NNS ._.
The_DT Emperors_NNP began_VBD to_TO understand_VB that_IN the_DT Christian_NNP might_MD be_VB of_IN great_JJ

those_DT who_WP remained_VBD faithful_JJ to_TO the_DT old_JJ gods_NNS ._. The_DT great_JJ change_NN however_RB
came_VBD during_IN the_DT last_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT fourth_JJ century_NN ._.

Constantine_NNP ,_, sometimes_RB (_-LRB- Heaven_UH knows_VBZ why_WRB )_-RRB- called_VBD Constantine_NNP the_DT Great_NNP ,_,
was_VBD emperor_JJ ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT terrible_JJ ruffian_NN ,_, but_CC people_NNS of_IN tender_NN qualities_NNS
could_MD hardly_RB hope_VB to_TO survive_VB in_IN that_DT hard-fighting_JJ age_NN ._. During_IN a_DT long_RB
and_CC checkered_VBD career_NN ,_, Constantine_NNP had_VBD experienced_VBN many_JJ ups_NNS and_CC downs_NNS ._.
Once_RB ,_, when_WRB almost_RB defeated_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ,_, he_PRP thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP would_MD try_VB
the_DT power_NN of_IN this_DT new_JJ Asiatic_JJ deity_NN of_IN whom_WP everybody_NN was_VBD talking_VBG ._. He_PRP
promised_VBN that_IN he_PRP too_RB would_MD become_VB a_DT Christian_NNP if_IN he_PRP were_VBD successful_JJ in_IN

the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT Christian_NNP God_NNP and_CC allowed_VBD himself_PRP to_TO be_VB baptised_VBN ._.

From_IN that_DT moment_NN on_IN ,_, the_DT Christian_NNP church_NN was_VBD officially_RB recognised_VBN and_CC

(_-LRB- not_RB more_RBR than_IN five_CD or_CC six_CD percent_NN ,)_, and_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO win_VB ,_, they_PRP were_VBD

church_NN in_IN all_DT its_PRP$ glory_NN ._. One_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ the_DT doors_NNS of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ
temples_NNS were_VBD then_RB closed_VBN ._. Then_RB came_VBD the_DT emperor_NN Justinian_NNP (_-LRB- who_WP built_VBD the_DT

of_IN philosophy_NN at_IN Athens_NNP which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN founded_VBN by_IN Plato_NNP ._.

That_DT was_VBD the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Greek_JJ world_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT man_NN had_VBD been_VBN allowed_VBN
to_TO think_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ thoughts_NNS and_CC dream_VB his_PRP$ own_JJ dreams_NNS according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$

proved_VBD a_DT poor_JJ compass_NN by_IN which_WDT to_TO steer_VB the_DT ship_NN of_IN life_NN after_IN a_DT deluge_NN
of_IN savagery_NN and_CC ignorance_NN had_VBD swept_VBN away_RB the_DT established_VBN order_NN of_IN
things_NNS ._. There_EX was_VBD need_NN of_IN something_NN more_RBR positive_JJ and_CC more_RBR definite_JJ ._.
This_DT the_DT Church_NNP provided_VBD ._.

During_IN an_DT age_NN when_WRB nothing_NN was_VBD certain_JJ ,_, the_DT church_NN stood_VBD like_IN a_DT rock_NN and_CC
never_RB receded_VBD from_IN those_DT principles_NNS which_WDT it_PRP held_VBD to_TO be_VB true_JJ and_CC sacred_JJ ._.
This_DT steadfast_NN courage_NN gained_VBD the_DT admiration_NN of_IN the_DT multitudes_NNS and_CC
carried_VBD the_DT church_NN of_IN Rome_NNP safely_RB through_IN the_DT difficulties_NNS which_WDT
destroyed_VBN the_DT Roman_NNP state_NN ._.

There_EX was_VBD however_RB ,_, a_DT certain_JJ element_NN of_IN luck_NN in_IN the_DT final_JJ success_NN of_IN
the_DT Christian_NNP faith_NN ._. After_IN the_DT disappearance_NN of_IN Theodoric_NNP '_POS s_PRP Roman-Gothic_JJ
kingdom_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT fifth_JJ century_NN ,_, Italy_NNP was_VBD comparatively_RB free_JJ from_IN foreign_JJ
invasion_NN ._. The_DT Lombards_NNP and_CC Saxons_NNP and_CC Slavs_NNP who_WP succeeded_VBD the_DT Goths_NNS were_VBD
weak_JJ and_CC backward_JJ tribes_NNS ._. Under_IN those_DT circumstances_NNS it_PRP was_VBD possible_JJ for_IN
the_DT bishops_NNS of_IN Rome_NNP to_TO maintain_VB the_DT independence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ city_NN ._. Soon_RB the_DT
remnants_NNS of_IN the_DT empire_NN ,_, scattered_VBN throughout_IN the_DT peninsula_NN ,_, recognised_VBN
the_DT Dukes_NNP of_IN Rome_NNP (_-LRB- or_CC bishops_NNS )_-RRB- as_IN their_PRP$ political_JJ and_CC spiritual_JJ rulers_NNS ._.

The_DT stage_NN was_VBD set_VBN for_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN a_DT strong_JJ man_NN ._. He_PRP came_VBD in_IN the_DT
year_NN 590_CD and_CC his_PRP$ name_NN was_VBD Gregory_NNP ._. He_PRP belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT ruling_NN classes_NNS of_IN
ancient_JJ Rome_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN "_`` prefect_JJ "_'' or_CC mayor_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN ._. Then_RB he_PRP
had_VBD become_VBN a_DT monk_NN and_CC a_DT bishop_NN and_CC finally_RB ,_, and_CC much_RB against_IN his_PRP$ will_NN ,_,
(_-LRB- for_IN he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT missionary_JJ and_CC preach_VB Christianity_NNP to_TO the_DT heathen_NN
of_IN England_NNP ,)_, he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN dragged_VBN to_TO the_DT Church_NNP of_IN Saint_NNP Peter_NNP to_TO be_VB made_VBN

A_DT few_JJ years_NNS before_RB ,_, Zoe_NNP ,_, the_DT daughter_NN of_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN Thomas_NNP ,_, had_VBD married_VBN

MOHAMMED_.

AHMED_NNP ,_, THE_DT CAMEL-DRIVER_NNP ,_, WHO_WP BECAME_NNP THE_DT PROPHET_NN OF_IN THE_DT ARABIAN_NN DESERT_IN
AND_CC WHOSE_JJ FOLLOWERS_NNS ALMOST_NNP CONQUERED_NNP THE_DT ENTIRE_NNP KNOWN_NNP WORLD_NNP FOR_IN THE_DT
GREATER_NNP GLORY_NN OF_IN ALLAH_NNP ,_, THE_DT ONLY_JJ TRUE_JJ GOD_NN


SINCE_RB the_DT days_NNS of_IN Carthage_NNP and_CC Hannibal_NNP we_PRP have_VBP said_VBD nothing_NN of_IN the_DT
Semitic_NN people_NNS ._. You_PRP will_MD remember_VB how_WRB they_PRP filled_VBD all_PDT the_DT chapters_NNS
devoted_VBN to_TO the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT Ancient_NNP World_NNP ._. The_DT Babylonians_NNPS ,_, the_DT

The_DT story_NN of_IN Ahmed_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN Abdallah_NNP and_CC Aminah_NNP (_-LRB- usually_RB known_VBN as_IN

From_IN that_DT time_NN on_IN until_IN the_DT year_NN of_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, Mohammed_NNP was_VBD fortunate_JJ in_IN

There_EX are_VBP two_CD reasons_NNS for_IN the_DT success_NN of_IN Islam_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_,

The_DT second_JJ reason_NN which_WDT explains_VBZ the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT Moslems_NNPS in_IN their_PRP$

but_CC a_DT quarrel_NN broke_VBD out_RP upon_IN a_DT point_NN of_IN Moslem_NNP doctrine_NN and_CC Ali_NNP was_VBD

themselves_PRP in_IN Spain_NNP where_WRB Abd-ar_JJ -_: Rahman_NN founded_VBD the_DT Caliphate_NNP of_IN
Cordova_NNP ,_, which_WDT became_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS centre_NN of_IN science_NN and_CC art_NN of_IN
mediaeval_JJ Europe_NNP ._.

This_DT Moorish_JJ kingdom_NN ,_, so-called_JJ because_IN the_DT people_NNS came_VBD from_IN Mauretania_NNP
in_IN Morocco_NNP ,_, lasted_VBD seven_CD centuries_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD only_RB after_IN the_DT capture_NN of_IN
Granada_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ Moslem_NNP stronghold_VBD ,_, in_IN the_DT year_NN 1492,_VBZ that_IN Columbus_NNP
received_VBD the_DT royal_JJ grant_NN which_WDT allowed_VBD him_PRP to_TO go_VB upon_IN a_DT voyage_NN of_IN
discovery_NN ._. The_DT Mohammedans_NNP soon_RB regained_VBD their_PRP$ strength_NN in_IN the_DT new_JJ
conquests_NNS which_WDT they_PRP made_VBD in_IN Asia_NNP and_CC Africa_NNP and_CC to-day_JJ there_RB are_VBP as_IN
many_JJ followers_NNS of_IN Mohammed_NNP as_IN there_RB are_VBP of_IN Christ_NNP ._.




CHARLEMAGNE_NNP

HOW_NNP CHARLEMAGNE_NNP ,_, THE_DT KING_NN OF_IN THE_DT FRANKS_NNS ,_, CAME_NNP TO_TO BEAR_NNP THE_DT TITLE_NN OF_IN
EMPEROR_NN AND_CC TRIED_NN TO_TO REVIVE_CD THE_DT OLD_NNP IDEAL_NNP OF_IN WORLD-EMPIRE_NN


THE_DT battle_NN of_IN Poitiers_NNP had_VBD saved_VBN Europe_NNP from_IN the_DT Mohammedans_NNP ._. But_CC the_DT
enemy_NN within_IN —_NN the_DT hopeless_JJ disorder_NN which_WDT had_VBD followed_VBN the_DT disappearance_NN
of_IN the_DT Roman_JJ police_NN officer_NN —_IN that_DT enemy_NN remained_VBD ._. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN the_DT

their_PRP$ Prime_NNP minister_NN ,_, the_DT "_`` Major_NNP Domus_NNP "_'' or_CC Master_NNP of_IN the_DT Palace_NNP ._.

Pepin_NNP the_DT Short_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN the_DT famous_JJ Charles_NNP Martel_NNP ,_, who_WP succeeded_VBD his_PRP$

that_IN a_DT purely_RB Germanic_JJ land_NN like_IN France_NNP should_MD speak_VB a_DT Latin_NNP tongue_NN ._.

sent_VBN north_NN for_IN help_NN ._. He_PRP did_VBD not_RB appeal_VB to_TO the_DT ruler_NN of_IN the_DT west-Frankish_JJ

Otto_NNP ,_, who_WP shared_VBD his_PRP$ people_NNS '_POS s_PRP affection_NN for_IN the_DT blue_JJ skies_NNS and_CC the_DT gay_JJ

In_IN return_NN for_IN his_PRP$ services_NNS ,_, the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, Leo_NNP VIII_NNP ,_, made_VBN Otto_NNP "_`` Emperor_NNP ,"_.
and_CC the_DT eastern_JJ half_NN of_IN Charles_NNP '_POS old_JJ kingdom_NN was_VBD henceforth_RB known_VBN as_IN the_DT

This_DT strange_JJ political_JJ creation_NN managed_VBD to_TO live_VB to_TO the_DT ripe_JJ old_JJ age_NN
of_IN eight_CD hundred_CD and_CC thirty-nine_CD years_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN 1801,_IN (_-LRB- during_IN the_DT

is_VBZ like_IN life_NN ._. The_DT more_JJR things_NNS change_VBP ,_, the_DT more_RBR they_PRP remain_VBP the_DT same_JJ ._.




THE_DT NORSEMEN_NNS

WHY_NNP THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT TENTH_NNS CENTURY_NN PRAYED_NNP THE_NNP LORD_NNP TO_TO PROTECT_NNP THEM_NNP FROM_NNP
THE_DT FURY_NN OF_IN THE_DT NORSEMEN_NNS


IN_IN the_DT third_JJ and_CC fourth_JJ centuries_NNS ,_, the_DT Germanic_JJ tribes_NNS of_IN central_JJ Europe_NNP
had_VBD broken_VBN through_IN the_DT defences_NNS of_IN the_DT Empire_NNP that_IN they_PRP might_MD plunder_VB
Rome_NNP and_CC live_VB on_IN the_DT fat_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN ._. In_IN the_DT eighth_JJ century_NN it_PRP became_VBD
the_DT turn_NN of_IN the_DT Germans_NNPS to_TO be_VB the_DT "_`` plundered-ones_NNS ."_. They_PRP did_VBD not_RB
like_IN this_DT at_IN all_DT ,_, even_RB if_IN their_PRP$ enemies_NNS were_VBD their_PRP$ first_JJ cousins_NNS ,_, the_DT
Norsemen_NNP ,_, who_WP lived_VBD in_IN Denmark_NNP and_CC Sweden_NNP and_CC Norway_NNP ._.

What_WP forced_VBD these_DT hardy_JJ sailors_NNS to_TO turn_VB pirate_NN we_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB ,_, but_CC
once_RB they_PRP had_VBD discovered_VBN the_DT advantages_NNS and_CC pleasures_NNS of_IN a_DT buccaneering_VBG
career_NN there_EX was_VBD no_DT one_NN who_WP could_MD stop_VB them_PRP ._. They_PRP would_MD suddenly_RB descend_VB
upon_IN a_DT peaceful_JJ Frankish_NNP or_CC Frisian_NNP village_NN ,_, situated_VBN on_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN
a_DT river_NN ._. They_PRP would_MD kill_VB all_PDT the_DT men_NNS and_CC steal_VBP all_PDT the_DT women_NNS ._. Then_RB they_PRP
would_MD sail_VB away_RB in_IN their_PRP$ fast-sailing_JJ ships_NNS and_CC when_WRB the_DT soldiers_NNS of_IN
the_DT king_NN or_CC emperor_NN arrived_VBD upon_IN the_DT scene_NN ,_, the_DT robbers_NNS were_VBD gone_VBN and_CC
nothing_NN remained_VBD but_CC a_DT few_JJ smouldering_JJ ruins_NNS ._.

During_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN disorder_NN which_WDT followed_VBD the_DT death_NN of_IN Charlemagne_NNP ,_, the_DT
Northmen_NNP developed_VBD great_JJ activity_NN ._. Their_PRP$ fleets_NNS made_VBD raids_NNS upon_IN every_DT
country_NN and_CC their_PRP$ sailors_NNS established_VBD small_JJ independent_JJ kingdoms_NNS along_IN
the_DT coast_NN of_IN Holland_NNP and_CC France_NNP and_CC England_NNP and_CC Germany_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP even_RB
found_VBD their_PRP$ way_NN into_IN Italy_NNP ._. The_DT Northmen_NNPS were_VBD very_RB intelligent_JJ They_PRP
soon_RB learned_VBD to_TO speak_VB the_DT language_NN of_IN their_PRP$ subjects_NNS and_CC gave_VBD up_RP the_DT
uncivilised_JJ ways_NNS of_IN the_DT early_JJ Vikings_NNS (_-LRB- or_CC Sea-Kings_NNS )_-RRB- who_WP had_VBD been_VBN very_RB
picturesque_JJ but_CC also_RB very_RB unwashed_JJ and_CC terribly_RB cruel_JJ ._.

Early_RB in_IN the_DT tenth_JJ century_NN a_DT Viking_NN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Rollo_NNP had_VBD repeatedly_RB
attacked_VBN the_DT coast_NN of_IN France_NNP ._. The_DT king_NN of_IN France_NNP ,_, too_RB weak_JJ to_TO resist_VB
these_DT northern_JJ robbers_NNS ,_, tried_VBD to_TO bribe_VB them_PRP into_IN "_`` being_VBG good_JJ ."_. He_PRP
offered_VBN them_PRP the_DT province_NN of_IN Normandy_NNP ,_, if_IN they_PRP would_MD promise_VB to_TO stop_VB
bothering_VBG the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ domains_NNS ._. Rollo_NNP accepted_VBD this_DT bargain_NN and_CC
became_VBD "_`` Duke_NNP of_IN Normandy_NNP ."_.

But_CC the_DT passion_NN of_IN conquest_NN was_VBD strong_JJ in_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN his_PRP$ children_NNS ._.
Across_IN the_DT channel_NN ,_, only_RB a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS away_RB from_IN the_DT European_JJ mainland_NN ,_,
they_PRP could_MD see_VB the_DT white_JJ cliffs_NNS and_CC the_DT green_JJ fields_NNS of_IN England_NNP ._. Poor_NNP
England_NNP had_VBD passed_VBN through_IN difficult_JJ days_NNS ._. For_IN two_CD hundred_CD years_NNS it_PRP had_VBD
been_VBN a_DT Roman_JJ colony_NN ._. After_IN the_DT Romans_NNPS left_VBD ,_, it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN conquered_VBN by_IN the_DT
Angles_NNP and_CC the_DT Saxons_NNS ,_, two_CD German_JJ tribes_NNS from_IN Schleswig_NNP ._. Next_NNP the_DT
Danes_NNP had_VBD taken_VBN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN and_CC had_VBD established_VBN the_DT
kingdom_NN of_IN Cnut_NNP ._. The_DT Danes_NNPS had_VBD been_VBN driven_VBN away_RB and_CC now_RB (_-LRB- it_PRP was_VBD early_RB in_IN
the_DT eleventh_JJ century_NN )_-RRB- another_DT Saxon_NNP king_NN ,_, Edward_NNP the_DT Confessor_NNP ,_, was_VBD
on_IN the_DT throne_NN ._. But_CC Edward_NNP was_VBD not_RB expected_VBN to_TO live_VB long_RB and_CC he_PRP had_VBD no_RB
children_NNS ._. The_DT circumstances_NNS favoured_VBD the_DT ambitious_JJ dukes_NNS of_IN Normandy_NNP ._.

In_IN 1066_CD Edward_NNP died_VBD ._. Immediately_NNP William_NNP of_IN Normandy_NNP crossed_VBD the_DT
channel_NN ,_, defeated_VBN and_CC killed_VBN Harold_NNP of_IN Wessex_NNP (_-LRB- who_WP had_VBD taken_VBN the_DT crown_NN )_-RRB-
at_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN Hastings_NNP ,_, and_CC proclaimed_VBD himself_PRP king_NN of_IN England_NNP ._.

CHIVALRY_JJ

POPE_NNP vs_NN ._. EMPEROR_NN

THE_DT STRANGE_NNP DOUBLE_NNP LOYALTY_NNP OF_IN THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT MIDDLE_JJ AGES_NNPS AND_CC HOW_NNP IT_NNP

IT_PRP is_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO understand_VB the_DT people_NNS of_IN by-gone_JJ ages_NNS ._. Your_PRP$ own_JJ
grandfather_NN ,_, whom_WP you_PRP see_VBP every_DT day_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT mysterious_JJ being_NN who_WP lives_VBZ in_IN

without_IN re-reading_NN this_DT chapter_NN a_DT number_NN of_IN times_NNS ._.

The_DT average_JJ man_NN of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS lived_VBD a_DT very_RB simple_JJ and_CC uneventful_JJ
life_NN ._. Even_RB if_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT free_JJ citizen_NN ,_, able_JJ to_TO come_VB and_CC go_VB at_IN will_NN ,_, he_PRP
rarely_RB left_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ neighbourhood_NN ._. There_EX were_VBD no_DT printed_JJ books_NNS and_CC only_RB
a_DT few_JJ manuscripts_NNS ._. Here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, a_DT small_JJ band_NN of_IN industrious_JJ monks_NNS
taught_VBD reading_NN and_CC writing_NN and_CC some_DT arithmetic_JJ ._. But_CC science_NN and_CC history_NN
and_CC geography_NN lay_VBD buried_VBN beneath_IN the_DT ruins_NNS of_IN Greece_NNP and_CC Rome_NNP ._.

Whatever_WDT people_NNS knew_VBD about_IN the_DT past_NN they_PRP had_VBD learned_VBN by_IN listening_VBG to_TO
stories_NNS and_CC legends_NNS ._. Such_JJ information_NN ,_, which_WDT goes_VBZ from_IN father_NN to_TO son_NN ,_, is_VBZ
often_RB slightly_RB incorrect_JJ in_IN details_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP will_MD preserve_VB the_DT main_JJ
facts_NNS of_IN history_NN with_IN astonishing_JJ accuracy_NN ._. After_IN more_JJR than_IN two_CD thousand_CD
years_NNS ,_, the_DT mothers_NNS of_IN India_NNP still_RB frighten_VB their_PRP$ naughty_JJ children_NNS by_IN
telling_VBG them_PRP that_IN "_`` Iskander_NNP will_MD get_VB them_PRP ,"_, and_CC Iskander_NNP is_VBZ none_NN other_JJ
than_IN Alexander_NNP the_DT Great_NNP ,_, who_WP visited_VBD India_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 330_CD before_IN the_DT
birth_NN of_IN Christ_NNP ,_, but_CC whose_WP$ story_NN has_VBZ lived_VBN through_IN all_DT these_DT ages_NNS ._.

The_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT early_JJ Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS never_RB saw_VBD a_DT textbook_NN of_IN Roman_NNP
history_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD ignorant_JJ of_IN many_JJ things_NNS which_WDT every_DT school-boy_NN to-day_NN
knows_VBZ before_IN he_PRP has_VBZ entered_VBN the_DT third_JJ grade_NN ._. But_CC the_DT Roman_NNP Empire_NNP ,_, which_WDT
is_VBZ merely_RB a_DT name_NN to_TO you_PRP ,_, was_VBD to_TO them_PRP something_NN very_RB much_RB alive_JJ ._. They_PRP
felt_VBD it_PRP ._. They_PRP willingly_MD recognised_VBD the_DT Pope_NNP as_IN their_PRP$ spiritual_JJ

super-power_NN ._. And_CC they_PRP were_VBD profoundly_RB grateful_JJ when_WRB Charlemagne_NN ,_, and_CC

created_VBN the_DT Holy_NNP Roman_NNP Empire_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT world_NN might_MD again_RB be_VB as_IN it_PRP
always_RB had_VBD been_VBN ._.

But_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX were_VBD two_CD different_JJ heirs_NNS to_TO the_DT Roman_JJ tradition_NN
placed_VBD the_DT faithful_NN burghers_NNS of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS in_IN a_DT difficult_JJ position_NN ._.
The_DT theory_NN behind_IN the_DT mediaeval_JJ political_JJ system_NN was_VBD both_DT sound_NN and_CC
simple_JJ ._. While_IN the_DT worldly_JJ master_NN (_-LRB- the_DT emperor_NN )_-RRB- looked_VBD after_IN the_DT physical_NN
well-being_NN of_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS ,_, the_DT spiritual_JJ master_NN (_-LRB- the_DT Pope_NNP )_-RRB- guarded_VBN
their_PRP$ souls_NNS ._.

In_IN practice_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT system_NN worked_VBD very_RB badly_RB ._. The_DT Emperor_NNP
invariably_RB tried_VBD to_TO interfere_VB with_IN the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT church_NN and_CC the_DT
Pope_NNP retaliated_VBD and_CC told_VBD the_DT Emperor_NNP how_WRB he_PRP should_MD rule_VB his_PRP$ domains_NNS ._.
Then_RB they_PRP told_VBD each_DT other_JJ to_TO mind_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ business_NN in_IN very_RB
unceremonious_JJ language_NN and_CC the_DT inevitable_JJ end_NN was_VBD war_NN ._.

Under_IN those_DT circumstances_NNS ,_, what_WP were_VBD the_DT people_NNS to_TO do_VB ,_, A_DT good_JJ Christian_NNP

Christian_NNP take_VB ?_.

It_PRP was_VBD never_RB easy_JJ to_TO give_VB the_DT correct_JJ answer_NN ._. When_WRB the_DT Emperor_NNP happened_VBD
to_TO be_VB a_DT man_NN of_IN energy_NN and_CC was_VBD sufficiently_RB well_RB provided_VBN with_IN money_NN to_TO
organise_NN an_DT army_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD very_RB apt_JJ to_TO cross_VB the_DT Alps_NNP and_CC march_VB on_IN Rome_NNP ,_,

obey_VB the_DT imperial_JJ instructions_NNS or_CC suffer_VB the_DT consequences_NNS ._.

But_CC more_RBR frequently_RB the_DT Pope_NNP was_VBD the_DT stronger_JJR ._. Then_RB the_DT Emperor_NNP or_CC the_DT
King_NNP together_RB with_IN all_DT his_PRP$ subjects_NNS was_VBD excommunicated_VBN ._. This_DT meant_VBD that_IN
all_DT churches_NNS were_VBD closed_VBN ,_, that_IN no_DT one_NN could_MD be_VB baptised_VBN ,_, that_IN no_DT dying_VBG
man_NN could_MD be_VB given_VBN absolution_IN —_NNS in_IN short_JJ ,_, that_IN half_NN of_IN the_DT functions_NNS of_IN
mediaeval_JJ government_NN came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN ._.

More_JJR than_IN that_DT ,_, the_DT people_NNS were_VBD absolved_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ oath_NN of_IN loyalty_NN to_TO

Indeed_RB ,_, the_DT poor_JJ fellows_NNS were_VBD in_IN a_DT difficult_JJ position_NN and_CC none_NN fared_VBN
worse_JJR than_IN those_DT who_WP lived_VBD during_IN the_DT latter_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT eleventh_NN
century_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT Emperor_NNP Henry_NNP IV_NNP of_IN Germany_NNP and_CC Pope_NNP Gregory_NNP VII_NNP

Europe_NNP for_IN almost_RB fifty_CD years_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT eleventh_JJ century_NN there_EX had_VBD been_VBN a_DT strong_JJ movement_NN
for_IN reform_NN in_IN the_DT church_NN ._. The_DT election_NN of_IN the_DT Popes_NNP ,_, thus_RB far_RB ,_, had_VBN

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1059_IN this_DT had_VBD been_VBN changed_VBN ._. By_IN a_DT decree_NN of_IN Pope_NNP Nicholas_NNP

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1073_IN the_DT College_NNP of_IN Cardinals_NNP elected_VBD a_DT priest_NN by_IN the_DT name_NN

Gregory_NNP sent_VBD ambassadors_NNS to_TO all_DT the_DT European_JJ courts_NNS to_TO inform_VB the_DT

The_DT Pope_NNP answered_VBD with_IN excommunication_NN and_CC a_DT demand_NN that_IN the_DT German_JJ
