Gregory_NNP left_VBD Rome_NNP and_CC travelled_VBD northward_RB ._. Henry_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD no_DT fool_NN ,_,
appreciated_VBD the_DT danger_NN of_IN his_PRP$ position_NN ._. At_IN all_DT costs_NNS he_PRP must_MD make_VB peace_NN
with_IN the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP must_MD do_VB it_PRP at_IN once_RB ._. In_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN winter_NN he_PRP

his_PRP$ sins_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT repentance_NN did_VBD not_RB last_JJ long_JJ ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN Henry_NNP

was_VBD continued_VBN ._.

The_DT Hohenstaufen_NNP family_NN which_WDT got_VBD hold_NN of_IN the_DT Imperial_JJ German_NNP Throne_.
shortly_RB afterwards_RB ,_, were_VBD even_RB more_RBR independent_JJ than_IN their_PRP$ predecessors_NNS ._.
Gregory_NNP had_VBD claimed_VBN that_IN the_DT Popes_NNP were_VBD superior_JJ to_TO all_DT kings_NNS because_IN
they_PRP (_-LRB- the_DT Popes_NNP )_-RRB- at_IN the_DT Day_NNP of_IN Judgement_NNP would_MD be_VB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT
behaviour_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT sheep_NN of_IN their_PRP$ flock_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN God_NNP ,_, a_DT

Frederick_NNP of_IN Hohenstaufen_NNP ,_, commonly_RB known_VBN as_IN Barbarossa_NNP or_CC Red_NNP Beard_NNP ,_,

he_PRP began_VBD a_DT campaign_NN which_WDT was_VBD to_TO add_VB these_DT "_`` lost_JJ provinces_NNS "_'' to_TO the_DT

heresy_PRP ._. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN Frederick_NNP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB felt_VBN a_DT deep_JJ and_CC serious_JJ
contempt_NN for_IN the_DT rough_JJ Christian_JJ world_NN of_IN the_DT North_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT boorish_NN

the_DT Popes_NNP ._. They_PRP deposed_VBD Frederick_NNP and_CC gave_VBD his_PRP$ Italian_JJ possessions_NNS to_TO
Charles_NNP of_IN Anjou_NNP ,_, the_DT brother_NN of_IN that_DT King_NNP Louis_NNP of_IN France_NNP who_WP became_VBD
famous_JJ as_IN Saint_NNP Louis_NNP ._. This_DT led_VBD to_TO more_JJR warfare_NN ._. Conrad_NNP V_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN
of_IN Conrad_NNP IV_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT Hohenstaufens_NNP ,_, tried_VBD to_TO regain_VB the_DT
kingdom_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD defeated_VBN and_CC decapitated_VBN at_IN Naples_NNP ._. But_CC twenty_CD years_NNS
later_RB ,_, the_DT French_NNP who_WP had_VBD made_VBN themselves_PRP thoroughly_RB unpopular_JJ in_IN Sicily_VBG
were_VBD all_DT murdered_VBN during_IN the_DT so-called_JJ Sicilian_JJ Vespers_NNP ,_, and_CC so_RB it_PRP went_VBD ._.

The_DT quarrel_NN between_IN the_DT Popes_NNP and_CC the_DT Emperors_NNP was_VBD never_RB settled_VBN ,_, but_CC
after_IN a_DT while_NN the_DT two_CD enemies_NNS learned_VBD to_TO leave_VB each_DT other_JJ alone_RB ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1278,_IN Rudolph_NNP of_IN Hapsburg_NNP was_VBD elected_VBN Emperor_JJ ._. He_PRP did_VBD not_RB
take_VB the_DT trouble_NN to_TO go_VB to_TO Rome_NNP to_TO be_VB crowned_VBN ._. The_DT Popes_NNP did_VBD not_RB object_VB
and_CC in_IN turn_NN they_PRP kept_VBD away_RB from_IN Germany_NNP ._. This_DT meant_VBD peace_NN but_CC two_CD
entire_JJ centuries_NNS which_WDT might_MD have_VB been_VBN used_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN internal_JJ
organisation_NN had_VBD been_VBN wasted_VBN in_IN useless_JJ warfare_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ an_DT ill_JJ wind_NN however_RB that_IN bloweth_IN no_DT good_JJ to_TO some_DT one_NN ._. The_DT little_JJ
cities_NNS of_IN Italy_NNP ,_, by_IN a_DT process_NN of_IN careful_JJ balancing_NN ,_, had_VBD managed_VBN to_TO
increase_VB their_PRP$ power_NN and_CC their_PRP$ independence_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN both_CC
Emperors_NNS and_CC Popes_NNP ._. When_WRB the_DT rush_NN for_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Land_NNP began_VBD ,_, they_PRP were_VBD
able_JJ to_TO handle_VB the_DT transportation_NN problem_NN of_IN the_DT thousands_NNS of_IN eager_JJ
pilgrims_NNS who_WP were_VBD clamoring_VBG for_IN passage_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT Crusades_NNPS
they_PRP had_VBD built_VBN themselves_PRP such_JJ strong_JJ defences_NNS of_IN brick_NN and_CC of_IN gold_NN that_WDT
they_PRP could_MD defy_VB Pope_NNP and_CC Emperor_NNP with_IN equal_JJ indifference_NN ._.

Church_NNP and_CC State_NNP fought_VBD each_DT other_JJ and_CC a_DT third_JJ party_NN —_IN the_DT mediaeval_NN
city_NN —_NN ran_VBD away_RB with_IN the_DT spoils_NNS ._.




THE_DT CRUSADES_NNS

BUT_NNP ALL_NNP THESE_NNP DIFFERENT_NNP QUARRELS_NNP WERE_NNP FORGOTTEN_NNS WHEN_WRB THE_DT TURKS_NNP TOOK_NNP THE_NNP
HOLY_NNP LAND_NNP ,_, DESECRATED_NNP THE_NNP HOLY_NNP PLACES_NNPS AND_CC INTERFERED_NNP SERIOUSLY_NNP WITH_IN THE_DT
TRADE_NNP FROM_NNP EAST_NNP TO_TO WEST_NNP ._. EUROPE_NNP WENT_NNP CRUSADING_NN


DURING_VBG three_CD centuries_NNS there_EX had_VBD been_VBN peace_NN between_IN Christians_NNP and_CC
Moslems_NNPS except_IN in_IN Spain_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT eastern_JJ Roman_NNP Empire_NNP ,_, the_DT two_CD states_NNS
defending_VBG the_DT gateways_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._. The_DT Mohammedans_NNPS having_VBG conquered_VBN Syria_NNP
in_IN the_DT seventh_JJ century_NN were_VBD in_IN possession_NN of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Land_NNP ._. But_CC
they_PRP regarded_VBD Jesus_NNP as_IN a_DT great_JJ prophet_NN (_-LRB- though_IN not_RB quite_RB as_RB great_JJ as_IN
Mohammed_NNP ),_, and_CC they_PRP did_VBD not_RB interfere_VB with_IN the_DT pilgrims_NNS who_WP wished_VBD
to_TO pray_VB in_IN the_DT church_NN which_WDT Saint_NNP Helena_NNP ,_, the_DT mother_NN of_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP
Constantine_NNP ,_, had_VBD built_VBN on_IN the_DT spot_NN of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Grave_NNP ._. But_CC early_JJ in_IN the_DT
eleventh_JJ century_NN ,_, a_DT Tartar_NNP tribe_NN from_IN the_DT wilds_NNS of_IN Asia_NNP ,_, called_VBD the_DT
Seljuks_NNP or_CC Turks_NNPS ,_, became_VBD masters_NNS of_IN the_DT Mohammedan_NNP state_NN in_IN western_JJ Asia_NNP
and_CC then_RB the_DT period_NN of_IN tolerance_NN came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN ._. The_DT Turks_NNPS took_VBD all_DT of_IN
Asia_NNP Minor_NNP away_RB from_IN the_DT eastern_JJ Roman_NNP Emperors_NNP and_CC they_PRP made_VBD an_DT end_NN to_TO
the_DT trade_NN between_IN east_JJ and_CC west_JJ ._.

Alexis_NNP ,_, the_DT Emperor_NNP ,_, who_WP rarely_RB saw_VBD anything_NN of_IN his_PRP$ Christian_NNP neighbours_NNS
of_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, appealed_VBD for_IN help_NN and_CC pointed_VBD to_TO the_DT danger_NN which_WDT
threatened_VBN Europe_NNP should_MD the_DT Turks_NNPS take_VBP Constantinople_NNP ._.

The_DT Italian_JJ cities_NNS which_WDT had_VBD established_VBN colonies_NNS along_IN the_DT coast_NN
of_IN Asia_NNP Minor_NNP and_CC Palestine_NNP ,_, in_IN fear_NN for_IN their_PRP$ possessions_NNS ,_, reported_VBN
terrible_JJ stories_NNS of_IN Turkish_JJ atrocities_NNS and_CC Christian_NNP suffering_NN ._. All_PDT
Europe_NNP got_VBD excited_VBN ._.

Pope_NNP Urban_NNP II_NNP ,_, a_DT Frenchman_NNP from_IN Reims_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN educated_VBN at_IN the_DT same_JJ
famous_JJ cloister_NN of_IN Cluny_NNP which_WDT had_VBD trained_VBN Gregory_NNP VII_NNP ,_, thought_VBD that_IN
the_DT time_NN had_VBD come_VBN for_IN action_NN ._. The_DT general_JJ state_NN of_IN Europe_NNP was_VBD far_RB from_IN
satisfactory_JJ ._. The_DT primitive_JJ agricultural_JJ methods_NNS of_IN that_DT day_NN (_-LRB- unchanged_JJ
since_IN Roman_JJ times_NNS )_-RRB- caused_VBD a_DT constant_JJ scarcity_NN of_IN food_NN ._. There_EX was_VBD
unemployment_NN and_CC hunger_NN and_CC these_DT are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO lead_VB to_TO discontent_NN and_CC
riots_NNS ._. Western_NNP Asia_NNP in_IN older_JJR days_NNS had_VBD fed_VBN millions_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD an_DT excellent_JJ
field_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN immigration_NN ._.

Therefore_RB at_IN the_DT council_NN of_IN Clermont_NNP in_IN France_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1095_IN the_DT Pope_NNP
arose_VBD ,_, described_VBD the_DT terrible_JJ horrors_NNS which_WDT the_DT infidels_NNS had_VBD inflicted_VBN
upon_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Land_NNP ,_, gave_VBD a_DT glowing_JJ description_NN of_IN this_DT country_NN which_WDT
ever_RB since_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN Moses_NNP had_VBD been_VBN overflowing_VBG with_IN milk_NN and_CC honey_NN ,_,
and_CC exhorted_VBD the_DT knights_NNS of_IN France_NNP and_CC the_DT people_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP in_IN general_JJ
to_TO leave_VB wife_NN and_CC child_NN and_CC deliver_VB Palestine_NNP from_IN the_DT Turks_NNPS ._.

A_DT wave_NN of_IN religious_JJ hysteria_NN swept_VBN across_IN the_DT continent_NN ._. All_DT reason_NN

THE_DT MEDIAEVAL_NNP CITY_NN

WHY_NNP THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT MIDDLE_JJ AGES_NNP SAID_NNP THAT_NNP "_'' CITY_NNP AIR_NNP IS_VBZ FREE_NNP AIR_NNP "_''

other_JJ '_POS s_PRP throats_VBZ with_IN equal_JJ energy_NN ._. Few_JJ of_IN them_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO live_VB in_IN cities_NNS ._.

pulled_VBD up_RP stakes_NNS and_CC went_VBD away_RB in_IN search_NN of_IN fresh_JJ adventures_NNS ._.

make_VB this_DT chapter_NN a_DT little_JJ longer_JJR than_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT others_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ

The_DT ancient_JJ world_NN of_IN Egypt_NNP and_CC Babylonia_NNP and_CC Assyria_NNP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT world_NN
of_IN cities_NNS ._. Greece_NNP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT country_NN of_IN City-States_NNP ._. The_DT history_NN of_IN
Phoenicia_NNP was_VBD the_DT history_NN of_IN two_CD cities_NNS called_VBD Sidon_NNP and_CC Tyre_NNP ._. The_DT Roman_NNP
Empire_NNP was_VBD the_DT "_`` hinterland_CC "_'' of_IN a_DT single_JJ town_NN ._. Writing_VBG ,_, art_NN ,_, science_NN ,_,
astronomy_NN ,_, architecture_NN ,_, literature_NN ,_, the_DT theatre_NN —_IN the_DT list_NN is_VBZ
endless_JJ —_NNS have_VBP all_DT been_VBN products_NNS of_IN the_DT city_NN ._.

For_IN almost_RB four_CD thousand_CD years_NNS the_DT wooden_JJ bee-hive_NN which_WDT we_PRP call_VBP a_DT town_NN

This_DT ,_, in_IN a_DT very_RB general_JJ way_NN ,_, is_VBZ what_WP happened_VBD during_IN the_DT centuries_NNS which_WDT
followed_VBD the_DT Crusades_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT slow_JJ process_NN ,_, this_DT gradual_JJ shifting_VBG

But_CC such_JJ occurrences_NNS were_VBD not_RB common_JJ ._. Almost_RB imperceptibly_RB the_DT towns_NNS
grew_VBD richer_JJR and_CC the_DT feudal_JJ lords_NNS grew_VBD poorer_JJR ._. To_TO maintain_VB themselves_PRP
they_PRP were_VBD for_IN ever_RB forced_VBN to_TO exchange_VB charters_NNS of_IN civic_JJ liberty_NN in_IN

saw_VBD all_PDT this_DT up-start_JJ splendour_NN and_CC regretted_VBD the_DT day_NN when_WRB first_JJ he_PRP had_VBD
signed_VBN away_RB a_DT single_JJ one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ sovereign_JJ rights_NNS and_CC prerogatives_NNS ._. But_CC
he_PRP was_VBD helpless_JJ ._. The_DT townspeople_NN with_IN their_PRP$ well-filled_JJ strong-boxes_NNS
snapped_VBD their_PRP$ fingers_NNS at_IN him_PRP ._. They_PRP were_VBD free_JJ men_NNS ,_, fully_RB prepared_VBN to_TO hold_VB
what_WP they_PRP had_VBD gained_VBN by_IN the_DT sweat_NN of_IN their_PRP$ brow_NN and_CC after_IN a_DT struggle_NN
which_WDT had_VBD lasted_VBN for_IN more_JJR than_IN ten_CD generations_NNS ._.




MEDIAEVAL_NNP SELF-GOVERNMENT_NNP

HOW_NNP THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT CITIES_NNS ASSERTED_VBN THEIR_IN RIGHT_NNP TO_TO BE_VB HEARD_NNP IN_IN THE_DT
ROYAL_NNP COUNCILS_NNP OF_IN THEIR_NNP COUNTRY_NN


As_RB long_RB as_IN people_NNS were_VBD "_`` nomads_NNS ,"_VBP wandering_VBG tribes_NNS of_IN shepherds_NNS ,_, all_DT men_NNS
had_VBD been_VBN equal_JJ and_CC had_VBD been_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT welfare_NN and_CC safety_NN of_IN
the_DT entire_JJ community_NN ._.

But_CC after_IN they_PRP had_VBD settled_VBN down_RB and_CC some_DT had_VBD become_VBN rich_JJ and_CC others_NNS had_VBD
grown_VBN poor_JJ ,_, the_DT government_NN was_VBD apt_JJ to_TO fall_VB into_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN those_DT
who_WP were_VBD not_RB obliged_VBN to_TO work_VB for_IN their_PRP$ living_NN and_CC who_WP could_MD devote_VB
themselves_PRP to_TO politics_NNS ._.

I_PRP have_VBP told_VBN you_PRP how_WRB this_DT had_VBD happened_VBN in_IN Egypt_NNP and_CC in_IN Mesopotamia_NNP and_CC in_IN
Greece_NNP and_CC in_IN Rome_NNP ._. It_PRP occurred_VBD among_IN the_DT Germanic_JJ population_NN of_IN western_JJ

every-day_JJ government_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN thousands_NNS of_IN feudal_JJ princelets_NNS ._.
Their_PRP$ subjects_NNS were_VBD peasants_NNS or_CC serfs_NNS ._. There_EX were_VBD few_JJ cities_NNS ._. There_EX was_VBD
hardly_RB any_DT middle_JJ class_NN ._. But_CC during_IN the_DT thirteenth_JJ century_NN (_-LRB- after_IN an_DT

would_MD have_VB as_IN lief_NN consulted_VBD their_PRP$ cows_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ pigs_NNS as_IN the_DT good_JJ

swallowed_VBD the_DT bitter_JJ pill_NN because_IN it_PRP was_VBD gilded_VBN ,_, but_CC not_RB without_IN a_DT

THE_DT MEDIAEVAL_NNP WORLD_NN

WHAT_WDT THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT MIDDLE_JJ AGES_NNP THOUGHT_NN OF_IN THE_DT WORLD_NN IN_IN WHICH_NNP THEY_NNP
HAPPENED_NNP TO_TO LIVE_CD


DATES_NNS are_VBP a_DT very_RB useful_JJ invention_NN ._. We_PRP could_MD not_RB do_VB without_IN them_PRP but_CC
unless_IN we_PRP are_VBP very_RB careful_JJ ,_, they_PRP will_MD play_VB tricks_NNS with_IN us_PRP ._. They_PRP are_VBP
apt_JJ to_TO make_VB history_NN too_RB precise_JJ ._. For_IN example_NN ,_, when_WRB I_PRP talk_VBP of_IN the_DT
point-of_JJ -_: view_NN of_IN mediaeval_JJ man_NN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB mean_VB that_IN on_IN the_DT 31_CD st_NN of_IN
December_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 476,_VBD suddenly_RB all_PDT the_DT people_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP said_VBD ,_, "_`` Ah_UH ,_,
now_RB the_DT Roman_NNP Empire_NNP has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO an_DT end_NN and_CC we_PRP are_VBP living_VBG in_IN the_DT Middle_NN
Ages_NNP ._. How_WRB interesting_JJ !"_NNS

You_PRP could_MD have_VB found_VBN men_NNS at_IN the_DT Frankish_JJ court_NN of_IN Charlemagne_NNP who_WP were_VBD
Romans_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ habits_NNS ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ manners_NNS ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ out-look_NN upon_IN life_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, when_WRB you_PRP grow_VBP up_IN you_PRP will_MD discover_VB that_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT
people_NNS in_IN this_DT world_NN have_VBP never_RB passed_VBN beyond_IN the_DT stage_NN of_IN the_DT cave-man_NN ._.
All_DT times_NNS and_CC all_DT ages_NNS overlap_VBP ,_, and_CC the_DT ideas_NNS of_IN succeeding_VBG generations_NNS
play_NN tag_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ ._. But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ to_TO study_VB the_DT minds_NNS of_IN a_DT
good_JJ many_JJ true_JJ representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS and_CC then_RB give_VB you_PRP an_DT
idea_NN of_IN the_DT average_JJ man_NN '_'' s_PRP attitude_NN toward_IN life_NN and_CC the_DT many_JJ difficult_JJ
problems_NNS of_IN living_NN ._.

First_RB of_IN all_DT ,_, remember_VB that_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS never_RB thought_VBN
of_IN themselves_PRP as_IN free-born_JJ citizens_NNS ,_, who_WP could_MD come_VB and_CC go_VB at_IN will_NN and_CC
shape_VB their_PRP$ fate_NN according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ ability_NN or_CC energy_NN or_CC luck_NN ._. On_IN the_DT
contrary_NN ,_, they_PRP all_DT considered_VBN themselves_PRP part_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ scheme_NN of_IN
things_NNS ,_, which_WDT included_VBD emperors_NNS and_CC serfs_NNS ,_, popes_NNS and_CC heretics_NNS ,_, heroes_NNS
and_CC swashbucklers_NNS ,_, rich_JJ men_NNS ,_, poor_JJ men_NNS ,_, beggar_NN men_NNS and_CC thieves_NNS ._. They_PRP
accepted_VBN this_DT divine_JJ ordinance_NN and_CC asked_VBD no_DT questions_NNS ._. In_IN this_DT ,_, of_IN
course_NN ,_, they_PRP differed_VBD radically_RB from_IN modern_JJ people_NNS who_WP accept_VBP nothing_NN
and_CC who_WP are_VBP forever_RB trying_VBG to_TO improve_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ financial_JJ and_CC political_JJ
situation_NN ._.

To_TO the_DT man_NN and_CC woman_NN of_IN the_DT thirteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, the_DT world_NN
hereafter_RB —_VBZ a_DT Heaven_NN of_IN wonderful_JJ delights_NNS and_CC a_DT Hell_NN of_IN brimstone_NN and_CC
suffering_VBG —_NNS meant_VBD something_NN more_JJR than_IN empty_JJ words_NNS or_CC vague_JJ theological_JJ
phrases_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD an_DT actual_JJ fact_NN and_CC the_DT mediaeval_JJ burghers_NNS and_CC knights_NNS
spent_VBD the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ time_NN preparing_VBG for_IN it_PRP ._. We_PRP modern_JJ people_NNS
regard_NN a_DT noble_JJ death_NN after_IN a_DT well-spent_JJ life_NN with_IN the_DT quiet_JJ calm_NN of_IN the_DT
ancient_JJ Greeks_NNS and_CC Romans_NNS ._. After_IN three_CD score_NN years_NNS of_IN work_NN and_CC effort_NN ,_,
we_PRP go_VBP to_TO sleep_VB with_IN the_DT feeling_NN that_IN all_DT will_MD be_VB well_RB ._.

But_CC during_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ,_, the_DT King_NNP of_IN Terrors_NNP with_IN his_PRP$ grinning_VBG skull_NN
and_CC his_PRP$ rattling_VBG bones_NNS was_VBD man_NN '_'' s_VBZ steady_JJ companion_NN ._. He_PRP woke_VBD his_PRP$ victims_NNS
up_RB with_IN terrible_JJ tunes_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ scratchy_JJ fiddle_NN he_PRP sat_VBD down_RB with_IN them_PRP at_IN
dinner_NN —_IN he_PRP smiled_VBD at_IN them_PRP from_IN behind_IN trees_NNS and_CC shrubs_NNS when_WRB they_PRP took_VBD
a_DT girl_NN out_IN for_IN a_DT walk_NN ._. If_IN you_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN nothing_NN but_CC hair-raising_JJ yarns_NNS
about_IN cemeteries_NNS and_CC coffins_NNS and_CC fearful_JJ diseases_NNS when_WRB you_PRP were_VBD very_RB
young_JJ ,_, instead_RB of_IN listening_VBG to_TO the_DT fairy_JJ stories_NNS of_IN Anderson_NNP and_CC Grimm_NNP ,_,
you_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, would_MD have_VB lived_VBN all_DT your_PRP$ days_NNS in_IN a_DT dread_NN of_IN the_DT final_JJ hour_NN
and_CC the_DT gruesome_JJ day_NN of_IN Judgment_NNP ._. That_DT is_VBZ exactly_RB what_WP happened_VBD to_TO the_DT
children_NNS of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ._. They_PRP moved_VBD in_IN a_DT world_NN of_IN devils_NNS and_CC spooks_NNS
and_CC only_RB a_DT few_JJ occasional_JJ angels_NNS ._. Sometimes_RB ,_, their_PRP$ fear_NN of_IN the_DT future_NN
filled_VBN their_PRP$ souls_NNS with_IN humility_NN and_CC piety_NN ,_, but_CC often_RB it_PRP influenced_VBD them_PRP
the_DT other_JJ way_NN and_CC made_VBD them_PRP cruel_JJ and_CC sentimental_JJ ._. They_PRP would_MD first_RB of_IN
all_DT murder_NN all_PDT the_DT women_NNS and_CC children_NNS of_IN a_DT captured_VBN city_NN and_CC then_RB they_PRP
would_MD devoutly_RB march_VB to_TO a_DT holy_JJ spot_NN and_CC with_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS gory_NN with_IN
the_DT blood_NN of_IN innocent_JJ victims_NNS ,_, they_PRP would_MD pray_VB that_IN a_DT merciful_JJ heaven_NN
forgive_VB them_PRP their_PRP$ sins_NNS ._. Yea_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD do_VB more_JJR than_IN pray_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD
weep_NN bitter_JJ tears_NNS and_CC would_MD confess_VB themselves_PRP the_DT most_RBS wicked_JJ of_IN
sinners_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT next_JJ day_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD once_RB more_JJR butcher_NN a_DT camp_NN of_IN
Saracen_NNP enemies_NNS without_IN a_DT spark_NN of_IN mercy_NN in_IN their_PRP$ hearts_NNS ._.

In_IN judging_VBG these_DT good_JJ people_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ wise_JJ to_TO remember_VB the_DT

This_DT feeling_NN of_IN "_`` stability_NN "_'' and_CC of_IN "_`` safety_NN "_'' was_VBD found_VBN in_IN all_DT classes_NNS of_IN

were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO sell_VB their_PRP$ goods_NNS ._.

The_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS disliked_VBD competition_NN ._. Why_WRB compete_VBP and_CC fill_VBP the_DT world_NN
with_IN hurry_NN and_CC rivalry_NN and_CC a_DT multitude_NN of_IN pushing_VBG men_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT Day_NN of_IN

In_IN short_JJ ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS were_VBD asked_VBN to_TO surrender_VB part_NN
of_IN their_PRP$ liberty_NN of_IN thought_NN and_CC action_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP might_MD enjoy_VB greater_RBR

And_CC with_IN a_DT very_RB few_JJ exceptions_NNS ,_, they_PRP did_VBD not_RB object_VB ._. They_PRP firmly_RB
believed_VBN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD mere_JJ visitors_NNS upon_IN this_DT planet_NN —_, that_IN they_PRP were_VBD
here_RB to_TO be_VB prepared_VBN for_IN a_DT greater_JJR and_CC more_RBR important_JJ life_NN ._. Deliberately_RB

The_DT Greeks_NNP and_CC the_DT Romans_NNPS had_VBD never_RB bothered_VBN about_IN the_DT future_JJ but_CC had_VBN

to_TO swing_VB back_RB in_IN the_DT other_JJ direction_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP shall_MD tell_VB you_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ next_JJ
chapter_NN ._.




MEDIAEVAL_NNP TRADE_NN

HOW_NNP THE_DT CRUSADES_NNP ONCE_RB MORE_JJR MADE_NNP THE_DT MEDITERRANEAN_NNP A_DT BUSY_JJ CENTRE_NN OF_IN
TRADE_NN AND_CC HOW_NNP THE_DT CITIES_NNS OF_IN THE_DT ITALIAN_NNP PENINSULA_NNP BECAME_NNP THE_DT GREAT_NN
DISTRIBUTING_NN CENTRE_NNP FOR_IN THE_DT COMMERCE_NNP WITH_NNP ASIA_NNP AND_CC AFRICA_NNS


THERE_NNP were_VBD three_CD good_JJ reasons_NNS why_WRB the_DT Italian_JJ cities_NNS should_MD have_VB been_VBN
the_DT first_JJ to_TO regain_VB a_DT position_NN of_IN great_JJ importance_NN during_IN the_DT late_JJ
Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ._. The_DT Italian_NNP peninsula_NN had_VBD been_VBN settled_VBN by_IN Rome_NNP at_IN a_DT very_RB
early_JJ date_NN ._. There_EX had_VBD been_VBN more_RBR roads_NNS and_CC more_JJR towns_NNS and_CC more_JJR schools_NNS
than_IN anywhere_RB else_RB in_IN Europe_NNP ._.

The_DT barbarians_NNS had_VBD burned_VBN as_IN lustily_NN in_IN Italy_NNP as_IN elsewhere_RB ,_, but_CC there_EX
had_VBD been_VBN so_RB much_JJ to_TO destroy_VB that_DT more_JJR had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO survive_VB ._. In_IN
the_DT second_JJ place_NN ,_, the_DT Pope_NNP lived_VBD in_IN Italy_NNP and_CC as_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT vast_JJ
political_JJ machine_NN ,_, which_WDT owned_VBD land_NN and_CC serfs_NNS and_CC buildings_NNS and_CC forests_NNS
and_CC rivers_NNS and_CC conducted_VBN courts_NNS of_IN law_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD in_IN constant_JJ receipt_NN of_IN
a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN money_NN ._. The_DT Papal_NNP authorities_NNS had_VBD to_TO be_VB paid_VBN in_IN gold_NN and_CC
silver_NN as_RB did_VBD the_DT merchants_NNS and_CC ship-owners_NNS of_IN Venice_NNP and_CC Genoa_NNP ._. The_DT
cows_NNS and_CC the_DT eggs_NNS and_CC the_DT horses_NNS and_CC all_PDT the_DT other_JJ agricultural_JJ products_NNS
of_IN the_DT north_NN and_CC the_DT west_NN must_MD be_VB changed_VBN into_IN actual_JJ cash_NN before_IN the_DT
debt_NN could_MD be_VB paid_VBN in_IN the_DT distant_JJ city_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ._.

This_DT made_VBD Italy_NNP the_DT one_CD country_NN where_WRB there_EX was_VBD a_DT comparative_JJ abundance_NN
of_IN gold_NN and_CC silver_NN ._. Finally_RB ,_, during_IN the_DT Crusades_NNP ,_, the_DT Italian_JJ cities_NNS had_VBD
become_VB the_DT point_NN of_IN embarkation_NN for_IN the_DT Crusaders_NNPS and_CC had_VBD profiteered_VBN to_TO
an_DT almost_RB unbelievable_JJ extent_NN ._.

And_CC after_IN the_DT Crusades_NNPS had_VBD come_VBN to_TO an_DT end_NN ,_, these_DT same_JJ Italian_JJ cities_NNS
remained_VBD the_DT distributing_VBG centres_NNS for_IN those_DT Oriental_JJ goods_NNS upon_IN which_WDT
the_DT people_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP had_VBD come_VBN to_TO depend_VB during_IN the_DT time_NN they_PRP had_VBD spent_VBN
in_IN the_DT near_JJ east_NN ._.

Of_IN these_DT towns_NNS ,_, few_JJ were_VBD as_RB famous_JJ as_IN Venice_NNP ._. Venice_NNP was_VBD a_DT republic_NN

had_VBD been_VBN very_RB scarce_JJ during_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT price_NN had_VBD been_VBN
high_JJ ._. For_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN years_NNS Venice_NNP had_VBD enjoyed_VBN a_DT monopoly_NN of_IN this_DT
indispensable_JJ table_NN commodity_NN (_-LRB- I_PRP say_VBP indispensable_JJ ,_, because_IN people_NNS ,_, like_IN
sheep_NN ,_, fall_NN ill_RB unless_IN they_PRP get_VBP a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN salt_NN in_IN their_PRP$ food_NN )._.
The_DT people_NNS had_VBD used_VBN this_DT monopoly_NN to_TO increase_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN their_PRP$ city_NN ._.
At_IN times_NNS they_PRP had_VBD even_RB dared_VBN to_TO defy_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT Popes_NNP ._. The_DT town_NN
had_VBD grown_VBN rich_JJ and_CC had_VBD begun_VBN to_TO build_VB ships_NNS ,_, which_WDT engaged_VBD in_IN trade_NN
with_IN the_DT Orient_NNP ._. During_IN the_DT Crusades_NNS ,_, these_DT ships_NNS were_VBD used_VBN to_TO carry_VB

That_IN they_PRP might_MD protect_VB themselves_PRP against_IN pirates_NNS and_CC excessive_JJ

I_PRP wish_VBP that_IN I_PRP had_VBD more_RBR space_NN to_TO tell_VB you_PRP some_DT of_IN the_DT wonderful_JJ stories_NNS

The_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP tried_VBN to_TO show_VB you_PRP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN a_DT period_NN of_IN very_RB

was_VBD a_DT very_RB undesirable_JJ invention_NN of_IN the_DT Evil_NNP One_CD and_CC ought_MD to_TO be_VB

In_IN the_DT twelfth_JJ and_CC thirteenth_JJ centuries_NNS the_DT flood_NN of_IN international_JJ

to_TO these_DT brave_JJ pioneers_NNS who_WP dared_VBD to_TO leave_VB the_DT very_RB narrow_JJ domain_NN of_IN the_DT
established_VBN order_NN of_IN things_NNS ._.

They_PRP set_VBD to_TO work_VB ._. They_PRP opened_VBD the_DT windows_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ cloistered_JJ and_CC

They_PRP began_VBD to_TO clean_VB house_NN ._. Next_IN they_PRP cleaned_VBD their_PRP$ gardens_NNS ._.

Then_RB they_PRP went_VBD out_RB into_IN the_DT open_JJ fields_NNS ,_, outside_IN the_DT crumbling_VBG town_NN
walls_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, "_`` This_DT is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ world_NN ._. We_PRP are_VBP glad_JJ that_IN we_PRP live_VBP in_IN it_PRP ."_.

At_IN that_DT moment_NN ,_, the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN and_CC a_DT new_JJ world_NN began_VBD ._.




THE_DT RENAISSANCE_NN

PEOPLE_NN ONCE_RB MORE_JJR DARED_NNP TO_TO BE_VB HAPPY_NNP JUST_NNP BECAUSE_NNP THEY_NNP WERE_NNP ALIVE_NNP ._. THEY_NNP
TRIED_NNP TO_TO SAVE_NNP THE_DT REMAINS_NNS OF_IN THE_DT OLDER_NN AND_CC MORE_JJR AGREEABLE_NN CIVILISATION_NN
OF_IN ROME_NNP AND_CC GREECE_NNP AND_CC THEY_NNP WERE_NNP SO_NNP PROUD_NN OF_IN THEIR_DT ACHIEVEMENTS_NNS THAT_WDT
THEY_PRP SPOKE_VB OF_IN A_DT RENAISSANCE_NN OR_JJ RE-BIRTH_NN OF_IN CIVILISATION_NN


THE_DT Renaissance_NNP was_VBD not_RB a_DT political_JJ or_CC religious_JJ movement_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT
state_NN of_IN mind_NN ._.

The_DT men_NNS of_IN the_DT Renaissance_NNP continued_VBD to_TO be_VB the_DT obedient_JJ sons_NNS of_IN the_DT
mother_NN church_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD subjects_NNS of_IN kings_NNS and_CC emperors_NNS and_CC dukes_NNS and_CC
murmured_VBD not_RB ._.

But_CC their_PRP$ outlook_NN upon_IN life_NN was_VBD changed_VBN ._. They_PRP began_VBD to_TO wear_VB different_JJ
clothes_NNS —_VBP to_TO speak_VB a_DT different_JJ language_NN —_NN to_TO live_VB different_JJ lives_NNS in_IN
different_JJ houses_NNS ._.

They_PRP no_DT longer_RB concentrated_VBN all_DT their_PRP$ thoughts_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ efforts_NNS
upon_IN the_DT blessed_JJ existence_NN that_WDT awaited_VBD them_PRP in_IN Heaven_NN ._. They_PRP tried_VBD to_TO
establish_VB their_PRP$ Paradise_NNP upon_IN this_DT planet_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, truth_NN to_TO tell_VB ,_, they_PRP
succeeded_VBN in_IN a_DT remarkable_JJ degree_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP quite_RB often_RB warned_VBD you_PRP against_IN the_DT danger_NN that_WDT lies_VBZ in_IN historical_JJ
dates_NNS ._. People_NNS take_VBP them_PRP too_RB literally_RB ._. They_PRP think_VBP of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS as_IN
a_DT period_NN of_IN darkness_NN and_CC ignorance_NN ._. "_'' Click_NNP ,"_, says_VBZ the_DT clock_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT
Renaissance_NNP begins_VBZ and_CC cities_NNS and_CC palaces_NNS are_VBP flooded_VBN with_IN the_DT bright_JJ
sunlight_NN of_IN an_DT eager_JJ intellectual_JJ curiosity_NN ._.

As_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN fact_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO draw_VB such_JJ sharp_JJ lines_NNS ._.
The_DT thirteenth_JJ century_NN belonged_VBD most_JJS decidedly_RB to_TO the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ._. All_PDT
historians_NNS agree_VBP upon_IN that_DT ._. But_CC was_VBD it_PRP a_DT time_NN of_IN darkness_NN and_CC stagnation_NN
merely_RB ?_. By_IN no_DT means_NNS ._. People_NNS were_VBD tremendously_RB alive_JJ ._. Great_JJ states_NNS were_VBD
being_VBG founded_VBN ._. Large_JJ centres_NNS of_IN commerce_NN were_VBD being_VBG developed_VBN ._. High_NNP
above_IN the_DT turretted_JJ towers_NNS of_IN the_DT castle_NN and_CC the_DT peaked_JJ roof_NN of_IN the_DT
town-hall_NN ,_, rose_VBD the_DT slender_JJ spire_NN of_IN the_DT newly_RB built_VBN Gothic_JJ cathedral_NN ._.
Everywhere_RB the_DT world_NN was_VBD in_IN motion_NN ._. The_DT high_JJ and_CC mighty_JJ gentlemen_NNS of_IN the_DT
city-hall_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD just_RB become_VBN conscious_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ strength_NN (_-LRB- by_IN way_NN
of_IN their_PRP$ recently_RB acquired_VBN riches_NNS )_-RRB- were_VBD struggling_VBG for_IN more_JJR power_NN with_IN
their_PRP$ feudal_JJ masters_NNS ._. The_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT guilds_NNS who_WP had_VBD just_RB become_VBN
aware_JJ of_IN the_DT important_JJ fact_NN that_IN "_`` numbers_NNS count_VBP "_`` were_VBD fighting_VBG the_DT high_JJ
and_CC mighty_JJ gentlemen_NNS of_IN the_DT city-hall_NN ._. The_DT king_NN and_CC his_PRP$ shrewd_JJ advisers_NNS
went_VBD fishing_NN in_IN these_DT troubled_JJ waters_NNS and_CC caught_VBD many_JJ a_DT shining_VBG bass_NN
of_IN profit_NN which_WDT they_PRP proceeded_VBD to_TO cook_VB and_CC eat_VB before_IN the_DT noses_NNS of_IN the_DT
surprised_JJ and_CC disappointed_JJ councillors_NNS and_CC guild_JJ brethren_NNS ._.

To_TO enliven_VB the_DT scenery_NN during_IN the_DT long_JJ hours_NNS of_IN evening_NN when_WRB the_DT badly_RB
lighted_JJ streets_NNS did_VBD not_RB invite_VB further_JJ political_JJ and_CC economic_JJ dispute_NN ,_,
the_DT Troubadours_NNS and_CC Minnesingers_NNS told_VBD their_PRP$ stories_NNS and_CC sang_VBD their_PRP$ songs_NNS

wanted_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT scholar_NN and_CC a_DT poet_NN —_NN and_CC because_IN he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO be_VB a_DT scholar_NN
and_CC a_DT poet_NN beyond_IN everything_NN else_RB ,_, he_PRP became_VBD one_CD ,_, as_IN people_NNS of_IN a_DT

and_CC finally_RB in_IN Rome_NNP ._. Then_RB he_PRP went_VBD to_TO live_VB in_IN a_DT lonely_JJ valley_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ

THE_DT AGE_NN OF_IN EXPRESSION_NN

THE_DT PEOPLE_NNP BEGAN_NNP TO_TO FEEL_NNP THE_DT NEED_NN OF_IN GIVING_VBG EXPRESSION_NN TO_TO THEIR_NNP NEWLY_NNP
DISCOVERED_JJ JOY_NN OF_IN LIVING_NNP ._. THEY_NNP EXPRESSED_NNP THEIR_NNP HAPPINESS_NNP IN_IN POETRY_NNP AND_CC
IN_IN SCULPTURE_NNP AND_CC IN_IN ARCHITECTURE_NNP AND_CC IN_IN PAINTING_NNP AND_CC IN_IN THE_DT BOOKS_NNP THEY_NNP
PRINTED_VBN


IN_IN the_DT year_NN 1471_CD there_EX died_VBD a_DT pious_JJ old_JJ man_NN who_WP had_VBD spent_VBN seventy-two_CD
of_IN his_PRP$ ninety-one_CD years_NNS behind_IN the_DT sheltering_VBG walls_NNS of_IN the_DT cloister_NN of_IN
Mount_NNP St_NNP ._. Agnes_NNPS near_IN the_DT good_JJ town_NN of_IN Zwolle_NNP ,_, the_DT old_JJ Dutch_NNP Hanseatic_NNP
city_NN on_IN the_DT river_NN Ysel_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD known_VBN as_IN Brother_NNP Thomas_NNP and_CC because_IN he_PRP
had_VBD been_VBN born_VBN in_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Kempen_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD called_VBN Thomas_NNP a_DT Kempis_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN twelve_CD he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN sent_VBN to_TO Deventer_NNP ,_, where_WRB Gerhard_NNP Groot_NNP ,_,
a_DT brilliant_JJ graduate_NN of_IN the_DT universities_NNS of_IN Paris_NNP ,_, Cologne_NNP and_CC Prague_NNP ,_,
and_CC famous_JJ as_IN a_DT wandering_VBG preacher_NN ,_, had_VBD founded_VBN the_DT Society_NNP of_IN the_DT
Brothers_NNP of_IN the_DT Common_NNP Life_NNP ._. The_DT good_JJ brothers_NNS were_VBD humble_JJ laymen_NNS who_WP
tried_VBD to_TO live_VB the_DT simple_JJ life_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ Apostles_NNP of_IN Christ_NNP while_IN
working_VBG at_IN their_PRP$ regular_JJ jobs_NNS as_IN carpenters_NNS and_CC house-painters_NNS and_CC stone_NN
masons_NNS ._. They_PRP maintained_VBD an_DT excellent_JJ school_NN ,_, that_IN deserving_VBG boys_NNS of_IN poor_JJ
parents_NNS might_MD be_VB taught_VBN the_DT wisdom_NN of_IN the_DT Fathers_NNS of_IN the_DT church_NN ._. At_IN this_DT
school_NN ,_, little_JJ Thomas_NNP had_VBD learned_VBN how_WRB to_TO conjugate_VB Latin_NNP verbs_NNS and_CC how_WRB
to_TO copy_VB manuscripts_NNS ._. Then_RB he_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN his_PRP$ vows_NNS ,_, had_VBD put_VBN his_PRP$ little_JJ
bundle_NN of_IN books_NNS upon_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, had_VBD wandered_VBD to_TO Zwolle_NNP and_CC with_IN a_DT sigh_NN
of_IN relief_NN he_PRP had_VBD closed_VBN the_DT door_NN upon_IN a_DT turbulent_JJ world_NN which_WDT did_VBD not_RB
attract_VB him_PRP ._.

Thomas_NNP lived_VBD in_IN an_DT age_NN of_IN turmoil_NN ,_, pestilence_NN and_CC sudden_JJ death_NN ._. In_IN
central_JJ Europe_NNP ,_, in_IN Bohemia_NNP ,_, the_DT devoted_JJ disciples_NNS of_IN Johannus_NNP Huss_NNP ,_,
the_DT friend_NN and_CC follower_NN of_IN John_NNP Wycliffe_NNP ,_, the_DT English_NNP reformer_NN ,_, were_VBD

had_VBD been_VBN burned_VBN at_IN the_DT stake_NN by_IN order_NN of_IN that_DT same_JJ Council_NNP of_IN Constance_NNP ,_,
which_WDT had_VBD promised_VBN him_PRP a_DT safe-conduct_NN if_IN he_PRP would_MD come_VB to_TO Switzerland_NNP
and_CC explain_VB his_PRP$ doctrines_NNS to_TO the_DT Pope_NNP ,_, the_DT Emperor_NNP ,_, twenty-three_CD
cardinals_NNS ,_, thirty-three_CD archbishops_NNS and_CC bishops_NNS ,_, one_CD hundred_CD and_CC fifty_CD
abbots_NNS and_CC more_JJR than_IN a_DT hundred_CD princes_NNS and_CC dukes_NNS who_WP had_VBD gathered_VBN
together_RB to_TO reform_VB their_PRP$ church_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, France_NNP had_VBD been_VBN fighting_VBG for_IN a_DT hundred_CD years_NNS that_IN she_PRP might_MD
drive_VB the_DT English_NNP from_IN her_PRP$ territories_NNS and_CC just_RB then_RB was_VBD saved_VBN from_IN
utter_JJ defeat_NN by_IN the_DT fortunate_JJ appearance_NN of_IN Joan_NNP of_IN Arc_NNP ._. And_CC no_RB sooner_RBR
had_VBD this_DT struggle_NN come_VB to_TO an_DT end_NN than_IN France_NNP and_CC Burgundy_NNP were_VBD at_IN each_DT
other_JJ '_POS s_PRP throats_VBZ ,_, engaged_VBN upon_IN a_DT struggle_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC death_NN for_IN the_DT
supremacy_NN of_IN western_JJ Europe_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, a_DT Pope_NNP at_IN Rome_NNP was_VBD calling_VBG the_DT curses_NNS of_IN Heaven_NN down_IN
upon_IN a_DT second_JJ Pope_NNP who_WP resided_VBD at_IN Avignon_NNP ,_, in_IN southern_JJ France_NNP ,_, and_CC who_WP
retaliated_VBN in_IN kind_NN ._. In_IN the_DT far_RB east_RB the_DT Turks_NNPS were_VBD destroying_VBG the_DT last_JJ
remnants_NNS of_IN the_DT Roman_NNP Empire_NNP and_CC the_DT Russians_NNPS had_VBD started_VBN upon_IN a_DT final_JJ
crusade_NN to_TO crush_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN their_PRP$ Tartar_NNP masters_NNS ._.

THE_DT GREAT_NNP DISCOVERIES_NNPS

BUT_NNP NOW_NNP THAT_NNP PEOPLE_NNP HAD_NNP BROKEN_NNP THROUGH_IN THE_DT BONDS_NNS OF_IN THEIR_NNP NARROW_.
MEDIAEVAL_NNP LIMITATIONS_NNP ,_, THEY_NNP HAD_NNP TO_TO HAVE_NNP MORE_NNP ROOM_NNP FOR_IN THEIR_DT WANDERINGS_NNS ._.
THE_DT EUROPEAN_NNP WORLD_NN HAD_NNP GROWN_NNP TOO_NNP SMALL_NNP FOR_IN THEIR_DT AMBITIONS_NNP ._. IT_PRP WAS_VBD THE_DT
TIME_NN OF_IN THE_DT GREAT_JJ VOYAGES_NNS OF_IN DISCOVERY_NN


THE_DT Crusades_NNP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT lesson_NN in_IN the_DT liberal_JJ art_NN of_IN travelling_VBG ._. But_CC
very_RB few_JJ people_NNS had_VBD ever_RB ventured_VBN beyond_IN the_DT well-known_JJ beaten_JJ track_NN

their_PRP$ way_NN to_TO the_DT court_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ Khan_NNP of_IN Cathay_NNP ,_, the_DT mighty_JJ emperor_NN
of_IN China_NNP ._. The_DT son_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Polos_NNP ,_, by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Marco_NNP ,_, had_VBD written_VBN

too_RB dangerous_JJ and_CC so_RB they_PRP stayed_VBD at_IN home_NN ._.

Of_IN course_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD always_RB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN making_VBG the_DT voyage_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT sea_NN was_VBD very_RB unpopular_JJ in_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS and_CC for_IN many_JJ very_RB good_JJ
reasons_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, ships_NNS were_VBD very_RB small_JJ ._. The_DT vessels_NNS on_IN which_WDT

to_TO stand_VB up_RP straight_RB )_-RRB- and_CC the_DT sailors_NNS were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO eat_VB poorly_RB cooked_VBN
food_NN as_IN the_DT kitchen_NN arrangements_NNS were_VBD very_RB bad_JJ and_CC no_DT fire_NN could_MD be_VB made_VBN

goods_NNS and_CC fresh_JJ vegetables_NNS were_VBD never_RB seen_VBN on_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN fare_NN as_RB soon_RB
as_IN the_DT coast_NN had_VBD been_VBN left_VBN behind_RB ._. Water_NNP was_VBD carried_VBN in_IN small_JJ barrels_NNS ._.
It_PRP soon_RB became_VBD stale_JJ and_CC then_RB tasted_VBD of_IN rotten_JJ wood_NN and_CC iron_NN rust_NN and_CC
was_VBD full_JJ of_IN slimy_RB growing_VBG things_NNS ._. As_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS knew_VBD
nothing_NN about_IN microbes_NNS (_-LRB- Roger_NNP Bacon_NNP ,_, the_DT learned_JJ monk_NN of_IN the_DT thirteenth_NN
century_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB suspected_VBN their_PRP$ existence_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP wisely_RB kept_VBD his_PRP$

and_CC which_WDT affects_VBZ the_DT gums_NNS and_CC poisons_NNS the_DT blood_NN until_IN the_DT patient_NN dies_NNS

course_NN by_IN God_NNP and_CC by_IN guess_NN ._. If_IN luck_NN was_VBD with_IN them_PRP they_PRP returned_VBD after_IN

gambled_VBN with_IN luck_NN ._. Life_NN to_TO them_PRP was_VBD a_DT glorious_JJ adventure_NN ._. And_CC all_PDT the_DT

Again_RB I_PRP wish_VBP that_IN I_PRP could_MD make_VB this_DT book_NN a_DT thousand_CD pages_NNS long_RB ._. The_DT

introduction_NN of_IN cold_JJ storage_NN ,_, when_WRB meat_NN and_CC fish_NN spoiled_VBD very_RB quickly_RB
and_CC could_MD only_RB be_VB eaten_VBN after_IN a_DT liberal_JJ sprinkling_NN of_IN pepper_NN or_CC nutmeg_NN ._.

The_DT Venetians_NNPS and_CC the_DT Genoese_NNP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT great_JJ navigators_NNS of_IN the_DT

energy_NN which_WDT their_PRP$ age-old_JJ struggle_NN against_IN the_DT Moorish_NNP invaders_NNS had_VBD
developed_VBN ._. Such_JJ energy_NN ,_, once_RB it_PRP exists_VBZ ,_, can_MD easily_RB be_VB forced_VBN into_IN new_JJ
channels_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT thirteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, King_NNP Alphonso_NNP III_NNP had_VBD conquered_VBN the_DT
kingdom_NN of_IN Algarve_NNP in_IN the_DT southwestern_JJ corner_NN of_IN the_DT Spanish_NNP peninsula_NN
and_CC had_VBD added_VBN it_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ dominions_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT next_JJ century_NN ,_, the_DT Portuguese_NNP
had_VBD turned_VBD the_DT tables_NNS on_IN the_DT Mohammedans_NNP ,_, had_VBD crossed_VBN the_DT straits_NNS of_IN
Gibraltar_NNP and_CC had_VBD taken_VBN possession_NN of_IN Ceuta_NNP ,_, opposite_IN the_DT Arabic_NNP city_NN
of_IN Ta_NNP '_POS Rifa_NNP (_-LRB- a_DT word_NN which_WDT in_RP Arabic_NNP means_VBZ "_`` inventory_NN "_'' and_CC which_WDT by_IN way_NN
of_IN the_DT Spanish_NNP language_NN has_VBZ come_VBN down_RP to_TO us_PRP as_IN "_`` tariff_NN ,")_NN and_CC Tangiers_NNS ,_,
which_WDT became_VBD the_DT capital_NN of_IN an_DT African_JJ addition_NN to_TO Algarve_NNP ._.

They_PRP were_VBD ready_JJ to_TO begin_VB their_PRP$ career_NN as_IN explorers_NNS ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1415,_IN Prince_NNP Henry_NNP ,_, known_VBN as_IN Henry_NNP the_DT Navigator_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN
of_IN John_NNP I_PRP of_IN Portugal_NNP and_CC Philippa_NNP ,_, the_DT daughter_NN of_IN John_NNP of_IN Gaunt_NNP (_-LRB- about_IN
whom_WP you_PRP can_MD read_VB in_IN Richard_NNP II_NNP ,_, a_DT play_NN by_IN William_NNP Shakespeare_NNP )_-RRB- began_VBD to_TO
make_VB preparations_NNS for_IN the_DT systematic_JJ exploration_NN of_IN northwestern_NN
Africa_NNP ._. Before_IN this_DT ,_, that_IN hot_JJ and_CC sandy_JJ coast_NN had_VBD been_VBN visited_VBN by_IN the_DT

and_CC sent_VBD two_CD of_IN his_PRP$ men_NNS on_IN shore_NN where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD left_VBN to_TO repent_VB of_IN their_PRP$
sins_NNS at_IN leisure_NN ._. At_IN last_JJ the_DT storms_NNS quieted_VBD down_RB ,_, the_DT channel_NN broadened_VBD ,_,
and_CC Magellan_NNP entered_VBD a_DT new_JJ ocean_NN ._. Its_PRP$ waves_NNS were_VBD quiet_JJ and_CC placid_JJ ._. He_PRP
called_VBN it_PRP the_DT Peaceful_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, the_DT Mare_NNP Pacifico_NNP ._. Then_RB he_PRP continued_VBD in_IN a_DT
western_JJ direction_NN ._. He_PRP sailed_VBD for_IN ninety-eight_JJ days_NNS without_IN seeing_VBG land_NN ._.
His_PRP$ people_NNS almost_RB perished_VBD from_IN hunger_NN and_CC thirst_JJ and_CC ate_VBD the_DT rats_NNS that_WDT
infested_VBD the_DT ships_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB these_DT were_VBD all_DT gone_VBN they_PRP chewed_VBD pieces_NNS of_IN
sail_NN to_TO still_RB their_PRP$ gnawing_NN hunger_NN ._.

In_IN March_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1521_IN they_PRP saw_VBD land_NN ._. Magellan_NNP called_VBD it_PRP the_DT land_NN of_IN
the_DT Ladrones_NNP (_-LRB- which_WDT means_VBZ robbers_NNS )_-RRB- because_IN the_DT natives_NNS stole_VBD everything_NN
they_PRP could_MD lay_VB hands_NNS on_IN ._. Then_RB further_JJR westward_NN to_TO the_DT Spice_NNP Islands_NNP !_.

Again_RB land_NN was_VBD sighted_VBN ._. A_DT group_NN of_IN lonely_JJ islands_NNS ._. Magellan_NNP called_VBD them_PRP
the_DT Philippines_NNPS ,_, after_IN Philip_NNP ,_, the_DT son_NN of_IN his_PRP$ master_NN Charles_NNP V_NNP ,_, the_DT

Ocean_NNP ,_, missed_VBD seeing_VBG the_DT northern_JJ coast_NN of_IN Australia_NNP (_-LRB- which_WDT was_VBD not_RB

This_DT was_VBD the_DT most_RBS notable_JJ of_IN all_DT voyages_NNS ._. It_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN three_CD years_NNS ._. It_PRP

fifty_CD centuries_NNS before_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT Valley_NNP of_IN the_DT Nile_NN

find_VB a_DT new_JJ home_NN in_IN the_DT Pacific_NNP ._. But_CC I_PRP doubt_VBP this_DT ._.

The_DT westward_NN trip_NN was_VBD accompanied_VBN by_IN a_DT steady_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT size_NN
of_IN ships_NNS and_CC a_DT broadening_NN of_IN the_DT knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT navigators_NNS ._. The_DT

BUDDHA_NNP AND_CC CONFUCIUS_NNS

CONCERNING_NN BUDDHA_NNP AND_CC CONFUCIUS_NNS


THE_DT discoveries_NNS of_IN the_DT Portuguese_NNP and_CC the_DT Spaniards_NNP had_VBD brought_VBN the_DT
Christians_NNS of_IN western_JJ Europe_NNP into_IN close_JJ contact_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN India_NNP
and_CC of_IN China_NNP ._. They_PRP knew_VBD of_IN course_NN that_IN Christianity_NNP was_VBD not_RB the_DT only_RB
religion_NN on_IN this_DT earth_NN ._. There_EX were_VBD the_DT Mohammedans_NNP and_CC the_DT heathenish_NN
tribes_NNS of_IN northern_JJ Africa_NNP who_WP worshipped_VBD sticks_NNS and_CC stones_NNS and_CC dead_JJ
trees_NNS ._. But_CC in_IN India_NNP and_CC in_IN China_NNP the_DT Christian_NNP conquerors_NNS found_VBD new_JJ
millions_NNS who_WP had_VBD never_RB heard_VBN of_IN Christ_NNP and_CC who_WP did_VBD not_RB want_VB to_TO hear_VB of_IN
Him_PRP ,_, because_IN they_PRP thought_VBD their_PRP$ own_JJ religion_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD thousands_NNS of_IN
years_NNS old_JJ ,_, much_RB better_JJR than_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT West_NNP ._. As_IN this_DT is_VBZ a_DT story_NN of_IN
mankind_NN and_CC not_RB an_DT exclusive_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP and_CC
our_PRP$ western_JJ hemisphere_NN ,_, you_PRP ought_MD to_TO know_VB something_NN of_IN two_CD men_NNS whose_WP$
teaching_NN and_CC whose_WP$ example_NN continue_VBP to_TO influence_VB the_DT actions_NNS and_CC the_DT
thoughts_NNS of_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN our_PRP$ fellow-travellers_NNS on_IN this_DT earth_NN ._.

In_IN India_NNP ,_, Buddha_NNP was_VBD recognised_VBN as_IN the_DT great_JJ religious_JJ teacher_NN ._. His_PRP$
history_NN is_VBZ an_DT interesting_JJ one_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD born_VBN in_IN the_DT Sixth_NNP Century_NNP before_IN
the_DT birth_NN of_IN Christ_NNP ,_, within_IN sight_NN of_IN the_DT mighty_JJ Himalaya_NNP Mountains_NNPS ,_,
where_WRB four_CD hundred_CD years_NNS before_IN Zarathustra_NNP (_-LRB- or_CC Zoroaster_NNP ),_, the_DT first_JJ of_IN
the_DT great_JJ leaders_NNS of_IN the_DT Aryan_JJ race_NN (_-LRB- the_DT name_NN which_WDT the_DT Eastern_NNP branch_NN
of_IN the_DT Indo-European_JJ race_NN had_VBD given_VBN to_TO itself_PRP ),_, had_VBD taught_VBN his_PRP$ people_NNS

among_IN the_DT tribe_NN of_IN the_DT Sakiyas_NNP ._. His_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, Maha_NNP Maya_NNP ,_, was_VBD the_DT daughter_NN
of_IN a_DT neighbouring_NN king_NN ._. She_PRP had_VBD been_VBN married_VBN when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD a_DT very_RB young_JJ
girl_NN ._. But_CC many_JJ moons_NNS had_VBD passed_VBN beyond_IN the_DT distant_JJ ridge_NN of_IN hills_NNS and_CC
still_RB her_PRP$ husband_NN was_VBD without_IN an_DT heir_NN who_WP should_MD rule_VB his_PRP$ lands_NNS after_IN
him_PRP ._. At_IN last_JJ ,_, when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD fifty_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, her_PRP$ day_NN came_VBD and_CC she_PRP went_VBD
forth_RB that_IN she_PRP might_MD be_VB among_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ people_NNS when_WRB her_PRP$ baby_NN should_MD come_VB
into_IN this_DT world_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD a_DT long_JJ trip_NN to_TO the_DT land_NN of_IN the_DT Koliyans_NNP ,_, where_WRB Maha_NNP Maya_NNP had_VBD
spent_VBD her_PRP$ earliest_JJS years_NNS ._. One_CD night_NN she_PRP was_VBD resting_VBG among_IN the_DT cool_JJ trees_NNS
of_IN the_DT garden_NN of_IN Lumbini_NNP ._. There_EX her_PRP$ son_NN was_VBD born_VBN ._. He_PRP was_VBD given_VBN the_DT name_NN
of_IN Siddhartha_NNP ,_, but_CC we_PRP know_VBP him_PRP as_IN Buddha_NNP ,_, which_WDT means_VBZ the_DT Enlightened_VBN
One_CD ._.

In_IN due_JJ time_NN ,_, Siddhartha_NNP grew_VBD up_RP to_TO be_VB a_DT handsome_JJ young_JJ prince_NN and_CC when_WRB
he_PRP was_VBD nineteen_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, he_PRP was_VBD married_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ cousin_NN Yasodhara_NNP ._.
During_IN the_DT next_JJ ten_CD years_NNS he_PRP lived_VBD far_RB away_RB from_IN all_DT pain_NN and_CC all_PDT
suffering_NN ,_, behind_IN the_DT protecting_VBG walls_NNS of_IN the_DT royal_JJ palace_NN ,_, awaiting_VBG the_DT
day_NN when_WRB he_PRP should_MD succeed_VB his_PRP$ father_NN as_IN King_NNP of_IN the_DT Sakiyas_NNP ._.

But_CC it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD thirty_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, he_PRP drove_VBD outside_RB of_IN
the_DT palace_NN gates_NNS and_CC saw_VBD a_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD old_JJ and_CC worn_JJ out_IN with_IN labour_NN
and_CC whose_WP$ weak_JJ limbs_NNS could_MD hardly_RB carry_VB the_DT burden_NN of_IN life_NN ._. Siddhartha_''
pointed_VBD him_PRP out_IN to_TO his_PRP$ coachman_NN ,_, Channa_NNP ,_, but_CC Channa_NNP answered_VBD that_IN there_EX
were_VBD lots_NNS of_IN poor_JJ people_NNS in_IN this_DT world_NN and_CC that_IN one_CD more_JJR or_CC less_JJR did_VBD not_RB
matter_NN ._. The_DT young_JJ prince_NN was_VBD very_RB sad_JJ but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB say_VB anything_NN and_CC
went_VBD back_RB to_TO live_VB with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC his_PRP$ father_NN and_CC his_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC tried_VBN
to_TO be_VB happy_JJ ._. A_DT little_JJ while_NN later_RB he_PRP left_VBD the_DT palace_NN a_DT second_JJ time_NN ._.

asked_VBD Channa_NNP what_WP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT man_NN '_POS s_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, but_CC the_DT
coachman_NN answered_VBD that_IN there_EX were_VBD many_JJ sick_JJ people_NNS in_IN this_DT world_NN and_CC
that_IN such_JJ things_NNS could_MD not_RB be_VB helped_VBN and_CC did_VBD not_RB matter_NN very_RB much_RB ._. The_DT
young_JJ prince_NN was_VBD very_RB sad_JJ when_WRB he_PRP heard_VBD this_DT but_CC again_RB he_PRP returned_VBD to_TO
his_PRP$ people_NNS ._.

A_DT few_JJ weeks_NNS passed_VBN ._. One_CD evening_NN Siddhartha_NNP ordered_VBD his_PRP$ carriage_NN in_RP order_NN
to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT river_NN and_CC bathe_VB ._. Suddenly_RB his_PRP$ horses_NNS were_VBD frightened_VBN by_IN the_DT
sight_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ man_NN whose_WP$ rotting_VBG body_NN lay_VBD sprawling_VBG in_IN the_DT ditch_NN beside_IN
the_DT road_NN ._. The_DT young_JJ prince_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD never_RB been_VBN allowed_VBN to_TO see_VB such_JJ
things_NNS ,_, was_VBD frightened_VBN ,_, but_CC Channa_NNP told_VBD him_PRP not_RB to_TO mind_VB such_JJ trifles_NNS ._.
The_DT world_NN was_VBD full_JJ of_IN dead_JJ people_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT rule_NN of_IN life_NN that_IN all_PDT
things_NNS must_MD come_VB to_TO an_DT end_NN ._. Nothing_NN was_VBD eternal_JJ ._. The_DT grave_NN awaited_VBD us_PRP
all_DT and_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT escape_NN ._.

That_DT evening_NN ,_, when_WRB Siddhartha_NNP returned_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ home_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD received_VBN with_IN
music_NN ._. While_IN he_PRP was_VBD away_RB his_PRP$ wife_NN had_VBD given_VBN birth_NN to_TO a_DT son_NN ._. The_DT people_NNS
were_VBD delighted_JJ because_IN now_RB they_PRP knew_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD an_DT heir_NN to_TO the_DT
throne_NN and_CC they_PRP celebrated_VBD the_DT event_NN by_IN the_DT beating_NN of_IN many_JJ drums_NNS ._.
Siddhartha_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD not_RB share_VB their_PRP$ joy_NN ._. The_DT curtain_NN of_IN life_NN had_VBD
been_VBN lifted_VBN and_CC he_PRP had_VBD learned_VBN the_DT horror_NN of_IN man_NN '_POS s_VBZ existence_NN ._. The_DT sight_NN
of_IN death_NN and_CC suffering_NN followed_VBD him_PRP like_IN a_DT terrible_JJ dream_NN ._.

That_DT night_NN the_DT moon_NN was_VBD shining_VBG brightly_RB ._. Siddhartha_NNP woke_VBD up_RP and_CC began_VBD
to_TO think_VB of_IN many_JJ things_NNS ._. Never_RB again_RB could_MD he_PRP be_VB happy_JJ until_IN he_PRP should_MD
have_VBP found_VBN a_DT solution_NN to_TO the_DT riddle_NN of_IN existence_NN ._. He_PRP decided_VBD to_TO find_VB
it_PRP far_RB away_RB from_IN all_DT those_DT whom_WP he_PRP loved_VBD ._. Softly_RB he_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT room_NN
where_WRB Yasodhara_NNP was_VBD sleeping_VBG with_IN her_PRP$ baby_NN ._. Then_RB he_PRP called_VBD for_IN his_PRP$
faithful_NN Channa_NNP and_CC told_VBD him_PRP to_TO follow_VB ._.

Together_RB the_DT two_CD men_NNS went_VBD into_IN the_DT darkness_NN of_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, one_CD to_TO find_VB
rest_NN for_IN his_PRP$ soul_NN ,_, the_DT other_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT faithful_JJ servant_NN unto_IN a_DT beloved_NN
master_NN ._.

The_DT people_NNS of_IN India_NNP among_IN whom_WP Siddhartha_NNP wandered_VBD for_IN many_JJ years_NNS were_VBD
just_RB then_RB in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN change_NN ._. Their_PRP$ ancestors_NNS ,_, the_DT native_JJ Indians_NNPS ,_,
had_VBD been_VBN conquered_VBN without_IN great_JJ difficulty_NN by_IN the_DT war-like_JJ Aryans_NNS
(_-LRB- our_PRP$ distant_JJ cousins_NNS )_-RRB- and_CC thereafter_RB the_DT Aryans_NNP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT rulers_NNS
and_CC masters_NNS of_IN tens_NNS of_IN millions_NNS of_IN docile_JJ little_JJ brown_JJ men_NNS ._. To_TO maintain_VB
themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT seat_NN of_IN the_DT mighty_JJ ,_, they_PRP had_VBD divided_VBN the_DT population_NN
into_IN different_JJ classes_NNS and_CC gradually_RB a_DT system_NN of_IN "_`` caste_NN "_'' of_IN the_DT most_RBS
rigid_JJ sort_NN had_VBD been_VBN enforced_VBN upon_IN the_DT natives_NNS ._. The_DT descendants_NNS of_IN the_DT
Indo-European_JJ conquerors_NNS belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT highest_JJS "_'' caste_NN ,"_VBD the_DT class_NN of_IN
warriors_NNS and_CC nobles_NNS ._. Next_NNP came_VBD the_DT caste_NN of_IN the_DT priests_NNS ._. Below_IN these_DT
followed_VBD the_DT peasants_NNS and_CC the_DT business_NN men_NNS ._. The_DT ancient_JJ natives_NNS ,_,
however_RB ,_, who_WP were_VBD called_VBN Pariahs_NNP ,_, formed_VBD a_DT class_NN of_IN despised_JJ and_CC
miserable_JJ slaves_NNS and_CC never_RB could_MD hope_VB to_TO be_VB anything_NN else_RB ._.

Even_RB the_DT religion_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS was_VBD a_DT matter_NN of_IN caste_NN ._. The_DT old_JJ
Indo-Europeans_NNP ,_, during_IN their_PRP$ thousands_NNS of_IN years_NNS of_IN wandering_VBG ,_, had_VBD met_VBN
with_IN many_JJ strange_JJ adventures_NNS ._. These_DT had_VBD been_VBN collected_VBN in_IN a_DT book_NN called_VBN
the_DT Veda_NNP ._. The_DT language_NN of_IN this_DT book_NN was_VBD called_VBN Sanskrit_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD
closely_RB related_VBN to_TO the_DT different_JJ languages_NNS of_IN the_DT European_JJ continent_NN ,_, to_TO
Greek_NNP and_CC Latin_NNP and_CC Russian_JJ and_CC German_JJ and_CC two-score_JJ others_NNS ._. The_DT three_CD
highest_JJS castes_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO read_VB these_DT holy_JJ scriptures_NNS ._. The_DT Pariah_NNP ,_,
however_RB ,_, the_DT despised_JJ member_NN of_IN the_DT lowest_JJS caste_NN ,_, was_VBD not_RB permitted_VBN to_TO
know_VB its_PRP$ contents_NNS ._. Woe_NN to_TO the_DT man_NN of_IN noble_JJ or_CC priestly_JJ caste_NN who_WP should_MD
teach_VB a_DT Pariah_NNP to_TO study_VB the_DT sacred_JJ volume_NN !_.

The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ people_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, lived_VBD in_IN misery_NN ._. Since_IN
this_DT planet_NN offered_VBD them_PRP very_RB little_JJ joy_NN ,_, salvation_NN from_IN suffering_VBG
must_MD be_VB found_VBN elsewhere_RB ._. They_PRP tried_VBD to_TO derive_VB a_DT little_JJ consolation_NN from_IN
meditation_NN upon_IN the_DT bliss_NN of_IN their_PRP$ future_JJ existence_NN ._.

Brahma_NNP ,_, the_DT all-creator_NN who_WP was_VBD regarded_VBN by_IN the_DT Indian_JJ people_NNS as_IN the_DT

"_`` revealed_VBD truth_NN ."_IN Confucius_NNP is_VBZ almost_RB the_DT only_JJ one_NN among_IN the_DT great_JJ moral_JJ

THE_DT REFORMATION_NN

THE_DT PROGRESS_NNS OF_IN THE_DT HUMAN_NNP RACE_NNP IS_VBZ BEST_NNP COMPARED_NNP TO_TO A_DT GIGANTIC_NNP PENDULUM_NN
WHICH_WDT FOREVER_NNP SWINGS_NNP FORWARD_NNP AND_CC BACKWARD_NNP ._. THE_DT RELIGIOUS_NNP INDIFFERENCE_NNP
AND_CC THE_DT ARTISTIC_NN AND_CC LITERARY_NNP ENTHUSIASM_NNP OF_IN THE_DT RENAISSANCE_NN WERE_.
FOLLOWED_VBN BY_NNP THE_DT ARTISTIC_NN AND_CC LITERARY_NNP INDIFFERENCE_NNP AND_CC THE_DT RELIGIOUS_NNS
ENTHUSIASM_NNP OF_IN THE_DT REFORMATION_NN


OF_IN course_NN you_PRP have_VBP heard_VBN of_IN the_DT Reformation_NN ._. You_PRP think_VBP of_IN a_DT small_JJ but_CC
courageous_JJ group_NN of_IN pilgrims_NNS who_WP crossed_VBD the_DT ocean_NN to_TO have_VB "_`` freedom_NN of_IN
religious_JJ worship_NN ."_WP Vaguely_RB in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN time_NN (_-LRB- and_CC more_RBR especially_RB
in_IN our_PRP$ Protestant_JJ countries_NNS )_-RRB- the_DT Reformation_NN has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO stand_VB for_IN the_DT
idea_NN of_IN "_`` liberty_NN of_IN thought_NN ."_RB Martin_NNP Luther_NNP is_VBZ represented_VBN as_IN the_DT leader_NN
of_IN the_DT vanguard_NN of_IN progress_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB history_NN is_VBZ something_NN more_JJR than_IN a_DT
series_NN of_IN flattering_JJ speeches_NNS addressed_VBD to_TO our_PRP$ own_JJ glorious_JJ ancestors_NNS ,_,
when_WRB to_TO use_VB the_DT words_NNS of_IN the_DT German_JJ historian_NN Ranke_NNP ,_, we_PRP try_VBP to_TO discover_VB
what_WP "_`` actually_RB happened_VBD ,"_RP then_RB much_RB of_IN the_DT past_NN is_VBZ seen_VBN in_IN a_DT very_RB
different_JJ light_NN ._.

Few_JJ things_NNS in_IN human_JJ life_NN are_VBP either_RB entirely_RB good_JJ or_CC entirely_RB bad_JJ ._.
Few_JJ things_NNS are_VBP either_DT black_JJ or_CC white_JJ ._. It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT honest_JJ
chronicler_NN to_TO give_VB a_DT true_JJ account_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT good_JJ and_CC bad_JJ sides_NNS of_IN every_DT
historical_JJ event_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO do_VB this_DT because_IN we_PRP all_DT have_VBP
our_PRP$ personal_JJ likes_NNS and_CC dislikes_NNS ._. But_CC we_PRP ought_MD to_TO try_VB and_CC be_VB as_RB fair_JJ as_IN
we_PRP can_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC must_MD not_RB allow_VB our_PRP$ prejudices_NNS to_TO influence_VB us_PRP too_RB much_RB ._.

Take_VB my_PRP$ own_JJ case_NN as_IN an_DT example_NN ._. I_PRP grew_VBD up_RP in_IN the_DT very_JJ Protestant_JJ centre_NN
of_IN a_DT very_JJ Protestant_JJ country_NN ._. I_PRP never_RB saw_VBD any_DT Catholics_NNPS until_IN I_PRP was_VBD
about_IN twelve_CD years_NNS old_JJ ._. Then_RB I_PRP felt_VBD very_RB uncomfortable_JJ when_WRB I_PRP met_VBD them_PRP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD a_DT little_JJ bit_NN afraid_JJ ._. I_PRP knew_VBD the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT many_JJ thousand_CD people_NNS
who_WP had_VBD been_VBN burned_VBN and_CC hanged_VBN and_CC quartered_VBN by_IN the_DT Spanish_NNP Inquisition_NNP
when_WRB the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Alba_NNP tried_VBD to_TO cure_VB the_DT Dutch_JJ people_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ Lutheran_NNP
and_CC Calvinistic_JJ heresies_NNS ._. All_PDT that_WDT was_VBD very_RB real_JJ to_TO me_PRP ._. It_PRP seemed_VBD to_TO
have_VBP happened_VBN only_RB the_DT day_NN before_IN ._. It_PRP might_MD occur_VB again_RB ._. There_EX might_MD
be_VB another_DT Saint_NNP Bartholomew_NNP '_POS s_PRP night_NN ,_, and_CC poor_JJ little_JJ me_PRP would_MD be_VB
slaughtered_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ nightie_NN and_CC my_PRP$ body_NN would_MD be_VB thrown_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT window_NN ,_,
as_RB had_VBD happened_VBN to_TO the_DT noble_JJ Admiral_NNP de_NNP Coligny_NNP ._.

Much_RB later_RB I_PRP went_VBD to_TO live_VB for_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN years_NNS in_IN a_DT Catholic_NNP country_NN ._.
I_PRP found_VBD the_DT people_NNS much_JJ pleasanter_NN and_CC much_RB more_RBR tolerant_JJ and_CC quite_RB as_IN
intelligent_JJ as_IN my_PRP$ former_JJ countrymen_NNS ._. To_TO my_PRP$ great_JJ surprise_NN ,_, I_PRP began_VBD to_TO
discover_VB that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT Catholic_NNP side_NN to_TO the_DT Reformation_NN ,_, quite_RB as_IN
much_RB as_IN a_DT Protestant_NNP ._.

Of_IN course_NN the_DT good_JJ people_NNS of_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ and_CC seventeenth_JJ centuries_NNS ,_,
who_WP actually_RB lived_VBD through_IN the_DT Reformation_NN ,_, did_VBD not_RB see_VB things_NNS that_WDT
way_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD always_RB right_JJ and_CC their_PRP$ enemy_NN was_VBD always_RB wrong_JJ ._. It_PRP was_VBD
a_DT question_NN of_IN hang_VB or_CC be_VB hanged_VBN ,_, and_CC both_DT sides_NNS preferred_VBN to_TO do_VB the_DT
hanging_VBG ._. Which_WDT was_VBD no_DT more_JJR than_IN human_JJ and_CC for_IN which_WDT they_PRP deserve_VBP no_UH
blame_NN ._.

When_WRB we_PRP look_VBP at_IN the_DT world_NN as_IN it_PRP appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT year_NN 1500,_IN an_DT easy_JJ date_NN
to_TO remember_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT year_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT Emperor_NNP Charles_NNP V_NNP was_VBD born_VBN ,_, this_DT
is_VBZ what_WP we_PRP see_VBP ._. The_DT feudal_JJ disorder_NN of_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS has_VBZ given_VBN way_NN
before_IN the_DT order_NN of_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN highly_RB centralised_VBN kingdoms_NNS ._. The_DT most_RBS

they_PRP died_VBD ,_, the_DT church_NN also_RB had_VBD the_DT right_JJ to_TO shorten_VB ,_, through_IN its_PRP$

purified_VBN in_IN the_DT shadowy_JJ realms_NNS of_IN Purgatory_NNP ._.

It_PRP was_VBD unfortunate_JJ that_IN these_DT Indulgences_NNS must_MD be_VB sold_VBN for_IN money_NN ._. But_CC
they_PRP offered_VBD an_DT easy_JJ form_NN of_IN revenue_NN and_CC besides_RB ,_, those_DT who_WP were_VBD too_RB
poor_JJ to_TO pay_VB ,_, received_VBD theirs_PRP for_IN nothing_NN ._.

Now_RB it_PRP happened_VBD in_IN the_DT year_NN 1517_IN that_IN the_DT exclusive_JJ territory_NN for_IN the_DT

of_IN Johan_NNP Tetzel_NNP ._. Brother_NNP Johan_NNP was_VBD a_DT hustling_NN salesman_NN ._. To_TO tell_VB the_DT
truth_NN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT little_RB too_RB eager_JJ ._. His_PRP$ business_NN methods_NNS outraged_VBD the_DT pious_JJ
people_NNS of_IN the_DT little_JJ duchy_NN ._. And_CC Luther_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD an_DT honest_JJ fellow_NN ,_, got_VBD so_RB
angry_JJ that_IN he_PRP did_VBD a_DT rash_JJ thing_NN ._. On_IN the_DT 31_CD st_NN of_IN October_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1517,_.
he_PRP went_VBD to_TO the_DT court_NN church_NN and_CC upon_IN the_DT doors_NNS thereof_, he_PRP posted_VBD a_DT sheet_NN
of_IN paper_NN with_IN ninety-five_CD statements_NNS (_-LRB- or_CC theses_DT ),_NN attacking_VBG the_DT sale_NN of_IN
indulgences_NNS ._. These_DT statements_NNS had_VBD been_VBN written_VBN in_IN Latin_NNP ._. Luther_NNP had_VBD no_RB
intention_NN of_IN starting_VBG a_DT riot_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD not_RB a_DT revolutionist_NN ._. He_PRP objected_VBD to_TO
the_DT institution_NN of_IN the_DT Indulgences_NNP and_CC he_PRP wanted_VBD his_PRP$ fellow_NN professors_NNS
to_TO know_VB what_WP he_PRP thought_VBD about_IN them_PRP ._. But_CC this_DT was_VBD still_RB a_DT private_JJ affair_NN
of_IN the_DT clerical_JJ and_CC professorial_JJ world_NN and_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT appeal_NN to_TO the_DT
prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN of_IN laymen_NNS ._.

Unfortunately_RB ,_, at_IN that_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT whole_JJ world_NN had_VBD begun_VBN to_TO take_VB an_DT
interest_NN in_IN the_DT religious_JJ affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT day_NN it_PRP was_VBD utterly_RB impossible_JJ
to_TO discuss_VB anything_NN ,_, without_IN at_IN once_RB creating_VBG a_DT serious_JJ mental_JJ
disturbance_NN ._. In_IN less_JJR than_IN two_CD months_NNS ,_, all_DT Europe_NNP was_VBD discussing_VBG the_DT
ninety-five_CD theses_DT of_IN the_DT Saxon_NNP monk_NN ._. Every_DT one_NN must_MD take_VB sides_NNS ._.
Every_DT obscure_JJ little_JJ theologian_NN must_MD print_NN his_PRP$ own_JJ opinion_NN ._. The_DT papal_NN
authorities_NNS began_VBD to_TO be_VB alarmed_VBN ._. They_PRP ordered_VBD the_DT Wittenberg_NNP professor_NN
to_TO proceed_VB to_TO Rome_NNP and_CC give_VB an_DT account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ action_NN ._. Luther_'' wisely_RB
remembered_VBN what_WP had_VBD happened_VBN to_TO Huss_VB ._. He_PRP stayed_VBD in_IN Germany_NNP and_CC he_PRP was_VBD
punished_VBN with_IN excommunication_NN ._. Luther_NNP burned_VBD the_DT papal_JJ bull_NN in_IN the_DT
presence_NN of_IN an_DT admiring_NN multitude_NN and_CC from_IN that_DT moment_NN ,_, peace_NN between_IN
himself_PRP and_CC the_DT Pope_NNP was_VBD no_RB longer_RB possible_JJ ._.

Without_IN any_DT desire_NN on_IN his_PRP$ part_NN ,_, Luther_NNP had_VBD become_VBN the_DT leader_NN of_IN a_DT vast_JJ
army_NN of_IN discontented_VBN Christians_NNS ._. German_NNP patriots_NNS like_IN Ulrich_NNP von_NNP Hutten_NNP ,_,
rushed_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ defence_NN ._. The_DT students_NNS of_IN Wittenberg_NNP and_CC Erfurt_NNP and_CC Leipzig_NNP
offered_VBN to_TO defend_VB him_PRP should_MD the_DT authorities_NNS try_VBP to_TO imprison_VB him_PRP ._. The_DT
Elector_NNP of_IN Saxony_NNP reassured_VBD the_DT eager_JJ young_JJ men_NNS ._. No_DT harm_NN would_MD befall_VB
Luther_NNP as_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP stayed_VBD on_IN Saxon_NNP ground_NN ._.

All_PDT this_DT happened_VBD in_IN the_DT year_NN 1520._VBD Charles_NNP V_NNP was_VBD twenty_CD years_NNS old_JJ and_CC
as_IN the_DT ruler_NN of_IN half_PDT the_DT world_NN ,_, was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO remain_VB on_IN pleasant_JJ terms_NNS
with_IN the_DT Pope_NNP ._. He_PRP sent_VBD out_RP calls_NNS for_IN a_DT Diet_NNP or_CC general_JJ assembly_NN in_IN the_DT
good_JJ city_NN of_IN Worms_NNS on_IN the_DT Rhine_NNP and_CC commanded_VBD Luther_NNP to_TO be_VB present_JJ and_CC
give_VB an_DT account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ extraordinary_JJ behaviour_NN ._. Luther_NNP ,_, who_WP now_RB was_VBD the_DT
national_JJ hero_NN of_IN the_DT Germans_NNPS ,_, went_VBD ._. He_PRP refused_VBD to_TO take_VB back_RP a_DT single_JJ
word_NN of_IN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD ever_RB written_VBN or_CC said_VBD ._. His_PRP$ conscience_NN was_VBD controlled_VBN
only_RB by_IN the_DT word_NN of_IN God_NNP ._. He_PRP would_MD live_VB and_CC die_VB for_IN his_PRP$ conscience_NN

The_DT Diet_NNP of_IN Worms_NNP ,_, after_IN due_JJ deliberation_NN ,_, declared_VBD Luther_NNP an_DT outlaw_NN
before_IN God_NNP and_CC man_NN ,_, and_CC forbade_VB all_DT Germans_NNPS to_TO give_VB him_PRP shelter_NN or_CC food_NN
or_CC drink_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO read_VB a_DT single_JJ word_NN of_IN the_DT books_NNS which_WDT the_DT dastardly_NN
heretic_PRP had_VBD written_VBN ._. But_CC the_DT great_JJ reformer_NN was_VBD in_IN no_DT danger_NN ._. By_IN the_DT
majority_NN of_IN the_DT Germans_NNPS of_IN the_DT north_NN the_DT edict_NN was_VBD denounced_VBN as_IN a_DT most_RBS
unjust_NN and_CC outrageous_JJ document_NN ._. For_IN greater_JJR safety_NN ,_, Luther_NNP was_VBD hidden_VBN in_IN
the_DT Wartburg_NNP ,_, a_DT castle_NN belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT Elector_NNP of_IN Saxony_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX
he_PRP defied_VBD all_DT papal_JJ authority_NN by_IN translating_VBG the_DT entire_JJ Bible_NNP into_IN the_DT
German_JJ language_NN ,_, that_IN all_PDT the_DT people_NNS might_MD read_VB and_CC know_VB the_DT word_NN of_IN God_NNP
for_IN themselves_PRP ._.

By_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, the_DT Reformation_NN was_VBD no_RB longer_RB a_DT spiritual_JJ and_CC religious_JJ
affair_NN ._. Those_DT who_WP hated_VBD the_DT beauty_NN of_IN the_DT modern_JJ church_NN building_NN used_VBN
this_DT period_NN of_IN unrest_NN to_TO attack_VB and_CC destroy_VB what_WP they_PRP did_VBD not_RB like_IN
because_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB understand_VB it_PRP ._. Impoverished_NNP knights_NNS tried_VBD to_TO make_VB
up_IN for_IN past_JJ losses_NNS by_IN grabbing_VBG the_DT territory_NN which_WDT belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT
monasteries_NNS ._. Discontented_NNP princes_NNS made_VBD use_NN of_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP
to_TO increase_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ power_NN ._. The_DT starving_VBG peasants_NNS ,_, following_VBG the_DT
leadership_NN of_IN half-crazy_JJ agitators_NNS ,_, made_VBD the_DT best_JJS of_IN the_DT opportunity_NN
and_CC attacked_VBD the_DT castles_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ masters_NNS and_CC plundered_VBN and_CC murdered_VBN and_CC
burned_VBN with_IN the_DT zeal_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ Crusaders_NNPS ._.

A_DT veritable_JJ reign_NN of_IN disorder_NN broke_VBD loose_RB throughout_IN the_DT Empire_NNP ._. Some_DT
princes_NNS became_VBD Protestants_NNS (_-LRB- as_IN the_DT "_`` protesting_VBG "_'' adherents_NNS of_IN Luther_NNP were_VBD
called_VBN )_-RRB- and_CC persecuted_VBD their_PRP$ Catholic_JJ subjects_NNS ._. Others_NNS remained_VBD Catholic_NNP
and_CC hanged_VBD their_PRP$ Protestant_JJ subjects_NNS ._. The_DT Diet_NNP of_IN Speyer_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN
1526_CD tried_VBD to_TO settle_VB this_DT difficult_JJ question_NN of_IN allegiance_NN by_IN ordering_VBG
that_IN "_`` the_DT subjects_NNS should_MD all_DT be_VB of_IN the_DT same_JJ religious_JJ denomination_NN as_IN
their_PRP$ princes_NNS ."_IN This_DT turned_VBN Germany_NNP into_IN a_DT checkerboard_NN of_IN a_DT thousand_CD
hostile_JJ little_JJ duchies_NNS and_CC principalities_NNS and_CC created_VBD a_DT situation_NN which_WDT
prevented_VBD the_DT normal_JJ political_JJ growth_NN for_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN years_NNS ._.

In_IN February_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1546_CD Luther_NNP died_VBD and_CC was_VBD put_VBN to_TO rest_VB in_IN the_DT
same_JJ church_NN where_WRB twenty-nine_CD years_NNS before_IN he_PRP had_VBD proclaimed_VBN his_PRP$ famous_JJ
objections_NNS to_TO the_DT sale_NN of_IN Indulgences_NNP ._. In_IN less_JJR than_IN thirty_CD years_NNS ,_, the_DT
indifferent_JJ ,_, joking_VBG and_CC laughing_VBG world_NN of_IN the_DT Renaissance_NNP had_VBD been_VBN
transformed_VBN into_IN the_DT arguing_NN ,_, quarrelling_NN ,_, back-biting_NN ,_, debating-society_NN
of_IN the_DT Reformation_NN ._. The_DT universal_JJ spiritual_JJ empire_NN of_IN the_DT Popes_NNP came_VBD
to_TO a_DT sudden_JJ end_NN and_CC the_DT whole_JJ Western_NNP Europe_NNP was_VBD turned_VBN into_IN a_DT
battle-field_NN ,_, where_WRB Protestants_NNS and_CC Catholics_NNS killed_VBN each_DT other_JJ for_IN
the_DT greater_JJR glory_NN of_IN certain_JJ theological_JJ doctrines_NNS which_WDT are_VBP
as_IN incomprehensible_JJ to_TO the_DT present_JJ generation_NN as_IN the_DT mysterious_JJ
inscriptions_NNS of_IN the_DT ancient_JJ Etruscans_NNS ._.




RELIGIOUS_NNS WARFARE_VB

THE_DT AGE_NN OF_IN THE_DT GREAT_JJ RELIGIOUS_NNS CONTROVERSIES_NNS


THE_DT sixteenth_JJ and_CC seventeenth_JJ centuries_NNS were_VBD the_DT age_NN of_IN religious_NN
controversy_NN ._.

If_IN you_PRP will_MD notice_VB you_PRP will_MD find_VB that_IN almost_RB everybody_NN around_IN you_PRP is_VBZ
forever_RB "_`` talking_VBG economics_NNS "_'' and_CC discussing_VBG wages_NNS and_CC hours_NNS of_IN labor_NN and_CC
strikes_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ relation_NN to_TO the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, for_IN that_DT is_VBZ the_DT
main_JJ topic_NN of_IN interest_NN of_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ time_NN ._.

The_DT poor_JJ little_JJ children_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN 1600_CD or_CC 1650_CD fared_VBD worse_JJR ._. They_PRP
never_RB heard_VBD anything_NN but_CC "_`` religion_NN ."_VBD Their_PRP$ heads_NNS were_VBD filled_VBN with_IN
"_`` predestination_NN ,"_. "_'' transubstantition_NN ,"_, "_`` free_JJ will_MD ,"_RB and_CC a_DT hundred_CD other_JJ
queer_JJ words_NNS ,_, expressing_VBG obscure_JJ points_NNS of_IN "_`` the_DT true_JJ faith_NN ,"_VBD whether_IN
Catholic_NNP or_CC Protestant_NNP ._. According_VBG to_TO the_DT desire_NN of_IN their_PRP$ parents_NNS they_PRP
were_VBD baptised_VBN Catholics_NNPS or_CC Lutherans_NNP or_CC Calvinists_NNS or_CC Zwinglians_NNS or_CC
Anabaptists_NNS ._. They_PRP learned_VBD their_PRP$ theology_NN from_IN the_DT Augsburg_NNP catechism_NN ,_,
composed_VBN by_IN Luther_NNP ,_, or_CC from_IN the_DT "_`` institutes_NNS of_IN Christianity_NNP ,"_VBD written_VBN
by_IN Calvin_NNP ,_, or_CC they_PRP mumbled_VBD the_DT Thirty-Nine_JJ Articles_NNS of_IN Faith_NNP which_WDT were_VBD
printed_VBN in_IN the_DT English_NNP Book_NNP of_IN Common_NNP Prayer_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD told_VBN that_IN
these_DT alone_RB represented_VBN the_DT "_`` True_JJ Faith_NNP ."_.

They_PRP heard_VBD of_IN the_DT wholesale_JJ theft_NN of_IN church_NN property_NN perpetrated_VBN by_IN King_NNP
Henry_NNP VIII_NNP ,_, the_DT much-married_JJ monarch_NN of_IN England_NNP ,_, who_WP made_VBD himself_PRP the_DT
supreme_JJ head_NN of_IN the_DT English_NNP church_NN ,_, and_CC assumed_VBD the_DT old_JJ papal_NN rights_NNS of_IN
appointing_VBG bishops_NNS and_CC priests_NNS ._. They_PRP had_VBD a_DT nightmare_NN whenever_WRB some_DT one_CD
mentioned_VBN the_DT Holy_NNP Inquisition_NNP ,_, with_IN its_PRP$ dungeons_NNS and_CC its_PRP$ many_JJ torture_NN
chambers_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD treated_VBN to_TO equally_RB horrible_JJ stories_NNS of_IN how_WRB a_DT mob_NN
of_IN outraged_JJ Dutch_JJ Protestants_NNS had_VBD got_VBN hold_NN of_IN a_DT dozen_NN defenceless_JJ old_JJ
priests_NNS and_CC hanged_VBD them_PRP for_IN the_DT sheer_JJ pleasure_NN of_IN killing_VBG those_DT who_WP
professed_VBN a_DT different_JJ faith_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD unfortunate_JJ that_IN the_DT two_CD contending_VBG
parties_NNS were_VBD so_RB equally_RB matched_VBN ._. Otherwise_RB the_DT struggle_NN would_MD have_VB come_VBN
to_TO a_DT quick_JJ solution_NN ._. Now_RB it_PRP dragged_VBD on_RP for_IN eight_CD generations_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP
grew_VBD so_RB complicated_VBN that_IN I_PRP can_MD only_RB tell_VB you_PRP the_DT most_RBS important_JJ details_NNS ,_,
and_CC must_MD ask_VB you_PRP to_TO get_VB the_DT rest_NN from_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT many_JJ histories_NNS of_IN the_DT
Reformation_NN ._.

The_DT great_JJ reform_NN movement_NN of_IN the_DT Protestants_NNS had_VBD been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN a_DT
thoroughgoing_VBG reform_NN within_IN the_DT bosom_NN of_IN the_DT Church_NNP ._. Those_DT popes_NNS who_WP
had_VBD been_VBN merely_RB amateur_JJ humanists_NNS and_CC dealers_NNS in_IN Roman_NNP and_CC Greek_NNP
antiquities_NNS ,_, disappeared_VBD from_IN the_DT scene_NN and_CC their_PRP$ place_NN was_VBD taken_VBN by_IN
serious_JJ men_NNS who_WP spent_VBD twenty_CD hours_NNS a_DT day_NN administering_VBG those_DT holy_JJ duties_NNS
which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ._.

The_DT long_JJ and_CC rather_RB disgraceful_JJ happiness_NN of_IN the_DT monasteries_NNS came_VBD to_TO an_DT
end_NN ._. Monks_'' and_CC nuns_NNS were_VBD forced_VBN to_TO be_VB up_RB at_IN sunrise_NN ,_, to_TO study_VB the_DT Church_NNP
Fathers_NNS ,_, to_TO tend_VB the_DT sick_JJ and_CC console_NN the_DT dying_VBG ._. The_DT Holy_NNP Inquisition_NNP
watched_VBN day_NN and_CC night_NN that_IN no_DT dangerous_JJ doctrines_NNS should_MD be_VB spread_VBN by_IN
way_NN of_IN the_DT printing_NN press_NN ._. Here_RB it_PRP is_VBZ customary_JJ to_TO mention_VB poor_JJ Galileo_NNP ,_,
who_WP was_VBD locked_VBN up_RP because_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT little_RB too_RB indiscreet_RB in_IN
explaining_VBG the_DT heavens_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ funny_JJ little_JJ telescope_NN and_CC had_VBD muttered_VBD
certain_JJ opinions_NNS about_IN the_DT behaviour_NN of_IN the_DT planets_NNS which_WDT were_VBD entirely_RB
opposed_VBN to_TO the_DT official_JJ views_NNS of_IN the_DT church_NN ._. But_CC in_IN all_DT fairness_NN to_TO the_DT
Pope_NNP ,_, the_DT clergy_NN and_CC the_DT Inquisition_NNP ,_, it_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB stated_VBN that_IN the_DT
Protestants_NNS were_VBD quite_RB as_RB much_RB the_DT enemies_NNS of_IN science_NN and_CC medicine_NN as_IN
the_DT Catholics_NNPS and_CC with_IN equal_JJ manifestations_NNS of_IN ignorance_NN and_CC intolerance_NN
regarded_VBN the_DT men_NNS who_WP investigated_VBD things_NNS for_IN themselves_PRP as_IN the_DT most_RBS
dangerous_JJ enemies_NNS of_IN mankind_NN ._.

And_CC Calvin_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ French_JJ reformer_NN and_CC the_DT tyrant_NN (_-LRB- both_DT political_JJ and_CC
spiritual_JJ )_-RRB- of_IN Geneva_NNP ,_, not_RB only_RB assisted_VBN the_DT French_JJ authorities_NNS when_WRB they_PRP
tried_VBD to_TO hang_VB Michael_NNP Servetus_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT Spanish_JJ theologian_JJ and_CC physician_NN
who_WP had_VBD become_VBN famous_JJ as_IN the_DT assistant_NN of_IN Vesalius_NNP ,_, the_DT first_JJ great_JJ
anatomist_NN ),_, but_CC when_WRB Servetus_NNP had_VBD managed_VBN to_TO escape_VB from_IN his_PRP$ French_JJ jail_NN
and_CC had_VBD fled_VBN to_TO Geneva_NNP ,_, Calvin_NNP threw_VBD this_DT brilliant_JJ man_NN into_IN prison_NN
and_CC after_IN a_DT prolonged_JJ trial_NN ,_, allowed_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB burned_VBN at_IN the_DT stake_NN on_IN
account_NN of_IN his_PRP$ heresies_NNS ,_, totally_RB indifferent_JJ to_TO his_PRP$ fame_NN as_IN a_DT scientist_NN ._.

And_CC so_IN it_PRP went_VBD ._. We_PRP have_VBP few_JJ reliable_JJ statistics_NNS upon_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN
the_DT whole_NN ,_, the_DT Protestants_NNS tired_VBN of_IN this_DT game_NN long_RB before_IN the_DT Catholics_NNPS ,_,
and_CC the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN honest_JJ men_NNS and_CC women_NNS who_WP were_VBD burned_VBN and_CC hanged_VBN
and_CC decapitated_VBD on_IN account_NN of_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ beliefs_NNS fell_VBD as_IN victims_NNS of_IN
the_DT very_RB energetic_JJ but_CC also_RB very_RB drastic_JJ church_NN of_IN Rome_NNP ._.

For_IN tolerance_NN (_-LRB- and_CC please_VB remember_VB this_DT when_WRB you_PRP grow_VBP older_JJR ),_NN is_VBZ of_IN very_RB
recent_JJ origin_NN and_CC even_RB the_DT people_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ so-called_JJ "_`` modern_JJ world_NN "_''
are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO be_VB tolerant_JJ only_RB upon_IN such_JJ matters_NNS as_IN do_VBP not_RB interest_VB them_PRP
very_RB much_RB ._. They_PRP are_VBP tolerant_JJ towards_IN a_DT native_NN of_IN Africa_NNP ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB care_VB
whether_IN he_PRP becomes_VBZ a_DT Buddhist_NNP or_CC a_DT Mohammedan_NNP ,_, because_IN neither_DT Buddhism_NNP
nor_CC Mohammedanism_NNP means_VBZ anything_NN to_TO them_PRP ._. But_CC when_WRB they_PRP hear_VBP that_IN their_PRP$
neighbour_NN who_WP was_VBD a_DT Republican_NNP and_CC believed_VBD in_IN a_DT high_JJ protective_JJ tariff_NN ,_,
has_VBZ joined_VBD the_DT Socialist_NNP party_NN and_CC now_RB wants_VBZ to_TO repeal_VB all_DT tariff_NN laws_NNS ,_,
their_PRP$ tolerance_NN ceases_NNS and_CC they_PRP use_VBP almost_RB the_DT same_JJ words_NNS as_IN those_DT
employed_VBN by_IN a_DT kindly_JJ Catholic_NNP (_-LRB- or_CC Protestant_NNP )_-RRB- of_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ
century_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD informed_VBN that_IN his_PRP$ best_JJS friend_NN whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD always_RB
respected_VBN and_CC loved_VBN had_VBD fallen_VBN a_DT victim_NN to_TO the_DT terrible_JJ heresies_NNS of_IN the_DT
Protestant_NNP (_-LRB- or_CC Catholic_NNP )_-RRB- church_NN ._.

"_`` Heresy_RB "_`` until_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ago_RB was_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN a_DT disease_NN ._. Nowadays_''
when_WRB we_PRP see_VBP a_DT man_NN neglecting_VBG the_DT personal_JJ cleanliness_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN and_CC
his_PRP$ home_NN and_CC exposing_VBG himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ children_NNS to_TO the_DT dangers_NNS of_IN typhoid_NN
fever_NN or_CC another_DT preventable_JJ disease_NN ,_, we_PRP send_VBP for_IN the_DT board-of_NN -_: health_NN
and_CC the_DT health_NN officer_NN calls_VBZ upon_IN the_DT police_NN to_TO aid_VB him_PRP in_IN removing_VBG this_DT
person_NN who_WP is_VBZ a_DT danger_NN to_TO the_DT safety_NN of_IN the_DT entire_JJ community_NN ._. In_IN the_DT
sixteenth_JJ and_CC seventeenth_JJ centuries_NNS ,_, a_DT heretic_JJ ,_, a_DT man_NN or_CC a_DT woman_NN who_WP
openly_RB doubted_VBD the_DT fundamental_JJ principles_NNS upon_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ Protestant_JJ
or_CC Catholic_NNP religion_NN had_VBD been_VBN founded_VBN ,_, was_VBD considered_VBN a_DT more_RBR terrible_JJ
menace_NN than_IN a_DT typhoid_JJ carrier_NN ._. Typhoid_NNP fever_NN might_MD (_-LRB- very_RB likely_JJ would_MD )_-RRB-
destroy_VB the_DT body_NN ._. But_CC heresy_RB ,_, according_VBG to_TO them_PRP ,_, would_MD positively_RB
destroy_VB the_DT immortal_JJ soul_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB the_DT duty_NN of_IN all_DT good_JJ
and_CC logical_JJ citizens_NNS to_TO warn_VB the_DT police_NN against_IN the_DT enemies_NNS of_IN the_DT
established_VBN order_NN of_IN things_NNS and_CC those_DT who_WP failed_VBD to_TO do_VB so_RB were_VBD as_IN
culpable_JJ as_IN a_DT modern_JJ man_NN who_WP does_VBZ not_RB telephone_VB to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS doctor_NN
when_WRB he_PRP discovers_VBZ that_IN his_PRP$ fellow-tenants_NNS are_VBP suffering_VBG from_IN cholera_NN or_CC
small-pox_JJ ._.

In_IN the_DT years_NNS to_TO come_VB you_PRP will_MD hear_VB a_DT great_JJ deal_NN about_IN preventive_JJ
medicine_NN ._. Preventive_JJ medicine_NN simply_RB means_VBZ that_IN our_PRP$ doctors_NNS do_VBP not_RB wait_VB
until_IN their_PRP$ patients_NNS are_VBP sick_JJ ,_, then_RB step_VB forward_RB and_CC cure_VB them_PRP ._. On_IN the_DT
contrary_NN ,_, they_PRP study_VBP the_DT patient_NN and_CC the_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT he_PRP lives_VBZ
when_WRB he_PRP (_-LRB- the_DT patient_NN )_-RRB- is_VBZ perfectly_RB well_RB and_CC they_PRP remove_VBP every_DT possible_JJ
cause_NN of_IN illness_NN by_IN cleaning_VBG up_RP rubbish_NN ,_, by_IN teaching_VBG him_PRP what_WP to_TO eat_VB and_CC
what_WP to_TO avoid_VB ,_, and_CC by_IN giving_VBG him_PRP a_DT few_JJ simple_JJ ideas_NNS of_IN personal_JJ hygiene_NN ._.
They_PRP go_VBP even_RB further_RBR than_IN that_DT ,_, and_CC these_DT good_JJ doctors_NNS enter_VBP the_DT
schools_NNS and_CC teach_VB the_DT children_NNS how_WRB to_TO use_VB tooth-brushes_NNS and_CC how_WRB to_TO avoid_VB
catching_VBG colds_NNS ._.

The_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN which_WDT regarded_VBD (_-LRB- as_IN I_PRP have_VBP tried_VBN to_TO show_VB you_PRP )_-RRB-
bodily_JJ illness_NN as_IN much_RB less_RBR important_JJ than_IN sickness_JJR which_WDT threatened_VBD the_DT
