publicly_RB pronounced_VBD in_IN a_DT court_NN of_IN law_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD opposed_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT other_JJ
seafaring_VBG people_NNS ._. To_TO counteract_VB the_DT effect_NN of_IN Grotius_NNP '_POS famous_JJ plea_NN for_IN
the_DT "_`` Mare_NNP Liberum_NNP ,"_, or_CC "_`` Open_VB Sea_NNP ,"_NNP John_NNP Selden_NNP ,_, the_DT Englishman_NNP ,_, wrote_VBD
his_PRP$ famous_JJ treatise_NN upon_IN the_DT "_`` Mare_NNP Clausum_NNP "_'' or_CC "_`` Closed_VBN Sea_NNP "_'' which_WDT
treated_VBN of_IN the_DT natural_JJ right_NN of_IN a_DT sovereign_JJ to_TO regard_VB the_DT seas_NNS which_WDT
surrounded_VBN his_PRP$ country_NN as_IN belonging_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ territory_NN ._. I_PRP mention_VBP this_DT
here_RB because_IN the_DT question_NN had_VBD not_RB yet_RB been_VBN decided_VBN and_CC during_IN the_DT last_JJ
war_NN caused_VBD all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN difficulties_NNS and_CC complications_NNS ._.

To_TO return_VB to_TO the_DT warfare_NN between_IN Spaniard_NNP and_CC Hollander_NNP and_CC Englishman_NNP ,_,
before_IN twenty_CD years_NNS were_VBD over_IN the_DT most_RBS valuable_JJ colonies_NNS of_IN the_DT Indies_NNPS
and_CC the_DT Cape_NNP of_IN Good_NNP Hope_NNP and_CC Ceylon_NNP and_CC those_DT along_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN China_NNP
and_CC even_RB Japan_NNP were_VBD in_IN Protestant_JJ hands_NNS ._. In_IN 1621_CD a_DT West_NNP Indian_NNP Company_NN
was_VBD founded_VBN which_WDT conquered_VBD Brazil_NNP and_CC in_IN North_NNP America_NNP built_VBD a_DT fortress_NN
called_VBN Nieuw_NNP Amsterdam_NNP at_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN which_WDT Henry_NNP Hudson_NNP had_VBD
discovered_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1609_CD

These_DT new_JJ colonies_NNS enriched_VBD both_DT England_NNP and_CC the_DT Dutch_NNP Republic_NNP to_TO such_JJ
an_DT extent_NN that_IN they_PRP could_MD hire_VB foreign_JJ soldiers_NNS to_TO do_VB their_PRP$ fighting_NN on_IN
land_NN while_IN they_PRP devoted_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO commerce_NN and_CC trade_NN ._. To_TO them_PRP the_DT
Protestant_JJ revolt_NN meant_VBD independence_NN and_CC prosperity_NN ._. But_CC in_IN many_JJ other_JJ
parts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP it_PRP meant_VBD a_DT succession_NN of_IN horrors_NNS compared_VBN to_TO which_WDT the_DT
last_JJ war_NN was_VBD a_DT mild_JJ excursion_NN of_IN kindly_RB Sunday-school_JJ boys_NNS ._.

The_DT Thirty_CD Years_NNS War_NNP which_WDT broke_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1618_CD and_CC which_WDT ended_VBD
with_IN the_DT famous_JJ treaty_NN of_IN Westphalia_NNP in_IN 1648_CD was_VBD the_DT perfectly_RB natural_JJ
result_NN of_IN a_DT century_NN of_IN ever_RB increasing_VBG religious_JJ hatred_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD ,_, as_IN
I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD ,_, a_DT terrible_JJ war_NN ._. Everybody_NN fought_VBD everybody_NN else_JJ and_CC the_DT
struggle_NN ended_VBD only_RB when_WRB all_DT parties_NNS had_VBD been_VBN thoroughly_RB exhausted_VBN and_CC
could_MD fight_VB no_DT longer_RB ._.

In_IN less_JJR than_IN a_DT generation_NN it_PRP turned_VBD many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN central_JJ Europe_NNP into_IN a_DT
wilderness_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT hungry_JJ peasants_NNS fought_VBD for_IN the_DT carcass_NN of_IN a_DT dead_JJ
horse_NN with_IN the_DT even_RB hungrier_JJ wolf_NN ._. Five-sixths_NNS of_IN all_DT the_DT German_JJ towns_NNS
and_CC villages_NNS were_VBD destroyed_VBN ._. The_DT Palatinate_NNP ,_, in_IN western_JJ Germany_NNP ,_, was_VBD
plundered_VBD twenty-eight_JJ times_NNS ._. And_CC a_DT population_NN of_IN eighteen_CD million_CD
people_NNS was_VBD reduced_VBN to_TO four_CD million_CD ._.

The_DT hostilities_NNS began_VBD almost_RB as_RB soon_RB as_IN Ferdinand_NNP II_NNP of_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN
Habsburg_NNP had_VBD been_VBN elected_VBN Emperor_JJ ._. He_PRP was_VBD the_DT product_NN of_IN a_DT most_RBS careful_JJ
Jesuit_NNP training_NN and_CC was_VBD a_DT most_RBS obedient_JJ and_CC devout_JJ son_NN of_IN the_DT Church_NNP ._.
The_DT vow_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD made_VBN as_IN a_DT young_JJ man_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP would_MD eradicate_VB all_PDT
sects_NNS and_CC all_DT heresies_NNS from_IN his_PRP$ domains_NNS ,_, Ferdinand_NNP kept_VBD to_TO the_DT best_JJS
of_IN his_PRP$ ability_NN ._. Two_CD days_NNS before_IN his_PRP$ election_NN ,_, his_PRP$ chief_JJ opponent_NN ,_,
Frederick_NNP ,_, the_DT Protestant_NNP Elector_NNP of_IN the_DT Palatinate_NNP and_CC a_DT son-in_NN -_: law_NN of_IN
James_NNP I_PRP of_IN England_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN King_NNP of_IN Bohemia_NNP ,_, in_IN direct_JJ violation_NN
of_IN Ferdinand_NNP '_POS s_PRP wishes_VBZ ._.

At_IN once_RB the_DT Habsburg_NNP armies_NNS marched_VBD into_IN Bohemia_NNP ._. The_DT young_JJ king_NN looked_VBN
in_IN vain_JJ for_IN assistance_NN against_IN this_DT formidable_JJ enemy_NN ._. The_DT Dutch_NNP Republic_NNP
was_VBD willing_JJ to_TO help_VB ,_, but_CC ,_, engaged_VBN in_IN a_DT desperate_JJ war_NN of_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ with_IN
the_DT Spanish_JJ branch_NN of_IN the_DT Habsburgs_NNP ,_, it_PRP could_MD do_VB little_RB ._. The_DT Stuarts_NNPS in_IN
England_NNP were_VBD more_RBR interested_JJ in_IN strengthening_VBG their_PRP$ own_JJ absolute_JJ power_NN

Then_RB the_DT Habsburg_NNP armies_NNS ,_, under_IN Tilly_NNP and_CC Wallenstein_NNP ,_, fought_VBD their_PRP$ way_NN

the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT Protestants_NNS ._. That_DT was_VBD Stralsund_NNP ._.

There_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT early_JJ summer_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 1630,_CD landed_VBD King_NNP Gustavus_NNP
Adolphus_NNP of_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN Vasa_NNP ,_, king_NN of_IN Sweden_NNP ,_, and_CC famous_JJ as_IN the_DT man_NN who_WP

troops_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT Habsburg_NNP power_NN had_VBD been_VBN broken_VBN ._.

Ferdinand_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT suspicious_JJ sort_NN of_IN person_NN ,_, at_IN once_RB began_VBD to_TO

France_NNP and_CC hated_VBD their_PRP$ Habsburg_NNP rivals_NNS ,_, heard_VBN of_IN this_DT ,_, they_PRP joined_VBD the_DT

of_IN Germany_NNP ,_, and_CC Turenne_NNP and_CC Conde_NNP added_VBD their_PRP$ fame_NN to_TO that_DT of_IN Baner_NNP
and_CC Weimar_NNP ,_, the_DT Swedish_JJ generals_NNS ,_, by_IN murdering_NN ,_, pillaging_VBG and_CC burning_VBG
Habsburg_NNP property_NN ._. This_DT brought_VBD great_JJ fame_NN and_CC riches_NNS to_TO the_DT Swedes_NNPS
and_CC caused_VBD the_DT Danes_NNPS to_TO become_VB envious_JJ ._. The_DT Protestant_NNP Danes_NNPS thereupon_.
declared_VBD war_NN upon_IN the_DT Protestant_JJ Swedes_NNS who_WP were_VBD the_DT allies_NNS of_IN the_DT
Catholic_NNP French_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ political_JJ leader_NN ,_, the_DT Cardinal_NNP de_NNP Richelieu_NNP ,_, had_VBD
just_RB deprived_VBD the_DT Huguenots_NNP (_-LRB- or_CC French_JJ Protestants_NNS )_-RRB- of_IN those_DT rights_NNS of_IN
public_JJ worship_NN which_WDT the_DT Edict_NNP of_IN Nantes_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1598_CD had_VBD guaranteed_VBN
them_PRP ._.

The_DT war_NN ,_, after_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN such_JJ encounters_NNS ,_, did_VBD not_RB decide_VB anything_NN ,_,
when_WRB it_PRP came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN with_IN the_DT treaty_NN of_IN Westphalia_NNP in_IN 1648._CD The_DT
Catholic_NNP powers_NNS remained_VBD Catholic_NNP and_CC the_DT Protestant_JJ powers_NNS stayed_VBN
faithful_NN to_TO the_DT doctrines_NNS of_IN Luther_NNP and_CC Calvin_NNP and_CC Zwingli_NNP ._. The_DT Swiss_NNPS
and_CC Dutch_JJ Protestants_NNS were_VBD recognised_VBN as_IN independent_JJ republics_NNS ._. France_NNP
kept_VBD the_DT cities_NNS of_IN Metz_NNP and_CC Toul_NNP and_CC Verdun_NNP and_CC a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Alsace_NNP ._.
The_DT Holy_NNP Roman_NNP Empire_NNP continued_VBD to_TO exist_VB as_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN scare-crow_JJ state_NN ,_,
without_IN men_NNS ,_, without_IN money_NN ,_, without_IN hope_NN and_CC without_IN courage_NN ._.

The_DT only_RB good_JJ the_DT Thirty_JJ Years_NNS War_NNP accomplished_VBD was_VBD a_DT negative_JJ one_CD ._. It_PRP
discouraged_VBN both_DT Catholics_NNS and_CC Protestants_NNS from_IN ever_RB trying_VBG it_PRP again_RB ._.
Henceforth_RB they_PRP left_VBD each_DT other_JJ in_IN peace_NN ._. This_DT however_RB did_VBD not_RB mean_VB
that_IN religious_JJ feeling_NN and_CC theological_JJ hatred_NN had_VBD been_VBN removed_VBN from_IN this_DT
earth_NN ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN ._. The_DT quarrels_NNS between_IN Catholic_NNP and_CC Protestant_NNP
came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT disputes_NNS between_IN the_DT different_JJ Protestant_NNP sects_NNS
continued_VBN as_IN bitterly_RB as_IN ever_RB before_IN ._. In_IN Holland_NNP a_DT difference_NN of_IN
opinion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT true_JJ nature_NN of_IN predestination_NN (_-LRB- a_DT very_RB obscure_JJ point_NN of_IN
theology_NN ,_, but_CC exceedingly_RB important_JJ the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN your_PRP$ great-grandfather_JJ )_-RRB-
caused_VBD a_DT quarrel_NN which_WDT ended_VBD with_IN the_DT decapitation_NN of_IN John_NNP of_IN
Oldenbarneveldt_NNP ,_, the_DT Dutch_NNP statesman_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN
the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT Republic_NNP during_IN the_DT first_JJ twenty_CD years_NNS of_IN its_PRP$
independence_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP was_VBD the_DT great_JJ organising_NN genius_NN of_IN her_PRP$ Indian_JJ
trading_NN company_NN ._. In_IN England_NNP ,_, the_DT feud_NN led_VBN to_TO civil_JJ war_NN ._.

But_CC before_IN I_PRP tell_VBP you_PRP of_IN this_DT outbreak_NN which_WDT led_VBD to_TO the_DT first_JJ execution_NN
by_IN process-of_JJ -_: law_NN of_IN a_DT European_JJ king_NN ,_, I_PRP ought_MD to_TO say_VB something_NN about_IN the_DT
previous_JJ history_NN of_IN England_NNP ._. In_IN this_DT book_NN I_PRP am_VBP trying_VBG to_TO give_VB you_PRP only_RB
those_DT events_NNS of_IN the_DT past_NN which_WDT can_MD throw_VB a_DT light_NN upon_IN the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN
the_DT present_JJ world_NN ._. If_IN I_PRP do_VBP not_RB mention_VB certain_JJ countries_NNS ,_, the_DT cause_NN is_VBZ
not_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN any_DT secret_JJ dislike_NN on_IN my_PRP$ part_NN ._. I_PRP wish_VBP that_IN I_PRP could_MD
tell_VB you_PRP what_WP happened_VBD to_TO Norway_NNP and_CC Switzerland_NNP and_CC Serbia_NNP and_CC China_NNP ._.
But_CC these_DT lands_NNS exercised_VBD no_DT great_JJ influence_NN upon_IN the_DT development_NN of_IN
Europe_NNP in_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ and_CC seventeenth_JJ centuries_NNS ._. I_PRP therefore_RB pass_VBP
them_PRP by_IN with_IN a_DT polite_JJ and_CC very_RB respectful_JJ bow_NN ._. England_NNP however_RB is_VBZ in_IN
a_DT different_JJ position_NN ._. What_WP the_DT people_NNS of_IN that_DT small_JJ island_NN have_VBP done_VBN
during_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD hundred_CD years_NNS has_VBZ shaped_VBN the_DT course_NN of_IN history_NN in_IN
every_DT corner_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. Without_IN a_DT proper_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT background_NN
of_IN English_JJ history_NN ,_, you_PRP cannot_MD understand_VB what_WP you_PRP read_VBP in_IN the_DT
newspapers_NNS ._. And_CC it_PRP is_VBZ therefore_RB necessary_JJ that_IN you_PRP know_VBP how_WRB England_NNP
happened_VBD to_TO develop_VB a_DT parliamentary_JJ form_NN of_IN government_NN while_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN
the_DT European_JJ continent_NN was_VBD still_RB ruled_VBN by_IN absolute_JJ monarchs_NN ._.




THE_DT ENGLISH_NNP REVOLUTION_NN

HOW_NNP THE_DT STRUGGLE_NNP BETWEEN_NNP THE_DT "_`` DIVINE_NNP RIGHT_NNP "_'' OF_IN KINGS_NNPS AND_CC THE_DT LESS_NNP DIVINE_NNP
BUT_NNP MORE_RB REASONABLE_JJ "_'' RIGHT_VB OF_IN PARLIAMENT_NNP "_'' ENDED_NNP DISASTROUSLY_NNP FOR_IN KING_VBG
CHARLES_NNP II_NNP


CAESAR_NN ,_, the_DT earliest_JJS explorer_NN of_IN north-western_JJ Europe_NNP ,_, had_VBD crossed_VBN
the_DT Channel_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 55_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. and_CC had_VBD conquered_VBN England_NNP ._. During_IN four_CD
centuries_NNS the_DT country_NN then_RB remained_VBD a_DT Roman_JJ province_NN ._. But_CC when_WRB the_DT
Barbarians_NNS began_VBD to_TO threaten_VB Rome_NNP ,_, the_DT garrisons_NNS were_VBD called_VBN back_RB from_IN
the_DT frontier_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD defend_VB the_DT home_NN country_NN and_CC Britannia_NNP was_VBD
left_VBN without_IN a_DT government_NN and_CC without_IN protection_NN ._.

As_RB soon_RB as_IN this_DT became_VBD known_VBN among_IN the_DT hungry_JJ Saxon_NNP tribes_NNS of_IN northern_JJ
Germany_NNP ,_, they_PRP sailed_VBD across_IN the_DT North_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC made_VBD themselves_PRP at_IN home_NN in_IN
the_DT prosperous_JJ island_NN ._. They_PRP founded_VBD a_DT number_NN of_IN independent_JJ Anglo-Saxon_NNP
kingdoms_NNS (_-LRB- so_RB called_VBN after_IN the_DT original_JJ Angles_NNPS or_CC English_NNP and_CC the_DT Saxon_NNP
invaders_NNS )_-RRB- but_CC these_DT small_JJ states_NNS were_VBD for_IN ever_RB quarrelling_VBG with_IN each_DT
other_JJ and_CC no_DT King_NNP was_VBD strong_JJ enough_RB to_TO establish_VB himself_PRP as_IN the_DT head_NN
of_IN a_DT united_VBN country_NN ._. For_IN more_JJR than_IN five_CD hundred_CD years_NNS ,_, Mercia_NNP and_CC
Northumbria_NNP and_CC Wessex_NNP and_CC Sussex_NNP and_CC Kent_NNP and_CC East_NNP Anglia_NNP ,_, or_CC whatever_WDT
their_PRP$ names_NNS ,_, were_VBD exposed_VBN to_TO attacks_NNS from_IN various_JJ Scandinavian_JJ pirates_NNS ._.
Finally_RB in_IN the_DT eleventh_JJ century_NN ,_, England_NNP ,_, together_RB with_IN Norway_NNP and_CC
northern_JJ Germany_NNP became_VBD part_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ Danish_NNP Empire_NNP of_IN Canute_NNP the_DT
Great_NNP and_CC the_DT last_JJ vestiges_NNS of_IN independence_NN disappeared_VBD ._.

The_DT Danes_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, were_VBD driven_VBN away_RB but_CC no_RB sooner_RB was_VBD
England_NNP free_JJ ,_, than_IN it_PRP was_VBD conquered_VBN for_IN the_DT fourth_JJ time_NN ._. The_DT new_JJ enemies_NNS
were_VBD the_DT descendants_NNS of_IN another_DT tribe_NN of_IN Norsemen_NNP who_WP early_RB in_IN the_DT
tenth_JJ century_NN had_VBN invaded_VBN France_NNP and_CC had_VBD founded_VBN the_DT Duchy_NNP of_IN Normandy_NNP ._.
William_NNP ,_, Duke_NNP of_IN Normandy_NNP ,_, who_WP for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN had_VBD looked_VBN across_IN the_DT
water_NN with_IN an_DT envious_JJ eye_NN ,_, crossed_VBD the_DT Channel_NNP in_IN October_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN
1066._PRP At_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN Hastings_NNP ,_, on_IN October_NNP the_DT fourteenth_JJ of_IN that_WDT
year_NN ,_, he_PRP destroyed_VBD the_DT weak_JJ forces_NNS of_IN Harold_NNP of_IN Wessex_NNP ,_, the_DT last_JJ of_IN
the_DT Anglo-Saxon_NNP Kings_NNP and_CC established_VBD himself_PRP as_IN King_NNP of_IN England_NNP ._. But_CC
neither_CC William_NNP nor_CC his_PRP$ successors_NNS of_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Anjou_NNP and_CC Plantagenet_NNP
regarded_VBN England_NNP as_IN their_PRP$ true_JJ home_NN ._. To_TO them_PRP the_DT island_NN was_VBD merely_RB
a_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ great_JJ inheritance_NN on_IN the_DT continent_NN —_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN colony_NN
inhabited_VBN by_IN rather_RB backward_JJ people_NNS upon_IN whom_WP they_PRP forced_VBD their_PRP$ own_JJ
language_NN and_CC civilisation_NN ._. Gradually_RB however_RB the_DT "_`` colony_NN "_'' of_IN England_NNP
gained_VBN upon_IN the_DT "_`` Mother_NN country_NN "_'' of_IN Normandy_NNP ._. At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT
Kings_NNP of_IN France_NNP were_VBD trying_VBG desperately_RB to_TO get_VB rid_JJ of_IN the_DT powerful_JJ
Norman-English_JJ neighbours_NNS who_WP were_VBD in_IN truth_NN no_DT more_JJR than_IN disobedient_NN
servants_NNS of_IN the_DT French_JJ crown_NN ._. After_IN a_DT century_NN of_IN war_NN fare_NN the_DT French_NNS
people_NNS ,_, under_IN the_DT leadership_NN of_IN a_DT young_JJ girl_NN by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Joan_NNP of_IN Arc_NNP ,_,
drove_VBD the_DT "_`` foreigners_NNS "_'' from_IN their_PRP$ soil_NN ._. Joan_NNP herself_PRP ,_, taken_VBN a_DT prisoner_NN
at_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN Compiegne_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1430_CD and_CC sold_VBN by_IN her_PRP Burgundian_.
captors_NNS to_TO the_DT English_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, was_VBD burned_VBN as_IN a_DT witch_NN ._. But_CC the_DT English_NNP
never_RB gained_VBD foothold_NN upon_IN the_DT continent_NN and_CC their_PRP$ Kings_NNP were_VBD at_IN last_JJ
able_JJ to_TO devote_VB all_DT their_PRP$ time_NN to_TO their_PRP$ British_JJ possessions_NNS ._. As_IN the_DT
feudal_JJ nobility_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN had_VBD been_VBN engaged_VBN in_IN one_CD of_IN those_DT strange_JJ
feuds_NNS which_WDT were_VBD as_IN common_JJ in_IN the_DT middle_JJ ages_NNS as_IN measles_NNS and_CC small-pox_JJ ,_,
and_CC as_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ landed_VBD proprietors_NNS had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN
during_IN these_DT so-called_JJ Wars_NNS of_IN the_DT Roses_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD quite_RB easy_JJ for_IN the_DT
Kings_NNP to_TO increase_VB their_PRP$ royal_JJ power_NN ._. And_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT fifteenth_JJ
century_NN ,_, England_NNP was_VBD a_DT strongly_RB centralised_JJ country_NN ,_, ruled_VBN by_IN Henry_NNP VII_NNP
of_IN the_DT House_NNP of_IN Tudor_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ famous_JJ Court_NNP of_IN Justice_NNP ,_, the_DT "_`` Star_NNP Chamber_NNP "_''
of_IN terrible_JJ memory_NN ,_, suppressed_VBN all_DT attempts_NNS on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT surviving_VBG
nobles_NNS to_TO regain_VB their_PRP$ old_JJ influence_NN upon_IN the_DT government_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN
with_IN the_DT utmost_JJ severity_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1509_CD Henry_NNP VII_NNP was_VBD succeeded_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ son_NN Henry_NNP VIII_NNP ,_, and_CC from_IN

which_WDT most_JJS people_NNS regarded_VBD as_IN illegal_JJ and_CC he_PRP managed_VBD his_PRP$ British_JJ kingdom_NN
as_IN if_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN his_PRP$ own_JJ country_NN estate_NN ._. He_PRP had_VBD capable_JJ assistants_NNS and_CC
we_PRP must_MD say_VB that_IN he_PRP had_VBD the_DT courage_NN of_IN his_PRP$ convictions_NNS ._.

Unfortunately_RB ,_, instead_RB of_IN assuring_VBG himself_PRP of_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN his_PRP$

for_IN ready_JJ cash_NN ,_, Charles_NNP was_VBD at_IN last_JJ obliged_JJ to_TO call_VB Parliament_NNP together_RB
once_RB more_RBR ._. It_PRP met_VBD in_IN April_NNP of_IN 1640_CD and_CC showed_VBD an_DT ugly_JJ temper_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD

sentence_NN ._. In_IN this_DT way_NN the_DT Cabinet_NNP got_VBD into_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN ruling_VBG England_NNP
and_CC Scotland_NNP (_-LRB- whose_WP$ Parliament_NNP had_VBD been_VBN joined_VBN to_TO that_DT of_IN England_NNP in_IN

his_PRP$ time_NN on_IN the_DT continent_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT reign_NN of_IN George_NNP I_PRP and_CC George_NNP II_NNP ,_, a_DT succession_NN of_IN great_JJ Whigs_NNPS
(_-LRB- of_IN whom_WP one_CD ,_, Sir_NNP Robert_NNP Walpole_NNP ,_, held_VBD office_NN for_IN twenty-one_JJ years_NNS )_-RRB-
formed_VBN the_DT Cabinet_NNP Council_NNP of_IN the_DT King_NNP ._. Their_PRP$ leader_NN was_VBD finally_RB

also_RB of_IN the_DT majority_NN party_NN in_IN power_NN in_IN Parliament_NNP ._. The_DT attempts_NNS of_IN
George_NNP III_NNP to_TO take_VB matters_NNS into_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ hands_NNS and_CC not_RB to_TO leave_VB the_DT
actual_JJ business_NN of_IN government_NN to_TO his_PRP$ Cabinet_NNP were_VBD so_RB disastrous_JJ that_IN
they_PRP were_VBD never_RB repeated_VBN ._. And_CC from_IN the_DT earliest_JJS years_NNS of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ
century_NN on_RB ,_, England_NNP enjoyed_VBD representative_JJ government_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT
responsible_JJ ministry_NN which_WDT conducted_VBD the_DT affairs_NNS of_IN the_DT land_NN ._.

To_TO be_VB quite_RB true_JJ ,_, this_DT government_NN did_VBD not_RB represent_VB all_DT classes_NNS of_IN
society_NN ._. Less_JJR than_IN one_CD man_NN in_IN a_DT dozen_NN had_VBD the_DT right_NN to_TO vote_VB ._. But_CC it_PRP was_VBD
the_DT foundation_NN for_IN the_DT modern_JJ representative_JJ form_NN of_IN government_NN ._. In_IN
a_DT quiet_JJ and_CC orderly_JJ fashion_NN it_PRP took_VBD the_DT power_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT King_NNP

representatives_NNS ._. It_PRP did_VBD not_RB bring_VB the_DT millenium_NN to_TO England_NNP ,_, but_CC it_PRP saved_VBN

THE_DT BALANCE_NN OF_IN POWER_NN

IN_IN FRANCE_NNP ON_IN THE_DT OTHER_NNP HAND_NNP THE_DT "_`` DIVINE_NNP RIGHT_VB OF_IN KINGS_NNP "_'' CONTINUED_VBN WITH_IN
GREATER_NNP POMP_NNP AND_CC SPLENDOUR_NNP THAN_NNP EVER_NNP BEFORE_NNP AND_CC THE_DT AMBITION_NN OF_IN THE_DT

POWER_NN "_''


As_IN a_DT contrast_NN to_TO the_DT previous_JJ chapter_NN ,_, let_VB me_PRP tell_VB you_PRP what_WP happened_VBD in_IN

this_DT ideal_NN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN France_NNP was_VBD concerned_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT rest_NN of_IN Europe_NNP would_MD
have_VBP been_VBN happier_JJR without_IN him_PRP ._.

The_DT country_NN over_IN which_WDT the_DT young_JJ king_NN was_VBD called_VBN to_TO rule_NN was_VBD the_DT most_JJS

was_VBD in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN one_CD single_JJ man_NN for_IN seventy-two_CD years_NNS ,_, almost_RB two_CD

The_DT great_JJ war_NN for_IN the_DT Spanish_JJ succession_NN ,_, begun_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1701,_.

That_DT was_VBD the_DT so-called_JJ "_`` balance_NN of_IN power_NN ."_NN It_PRP was_VBD not_RB a_DT written_VBN law_NN but_CC

THE_DT RISE_NN OF_IN RUSSIA_NNP

THE_DT STORY_NN OF_IN THE_DT MYSTERIOUS_JJ MOSCOVITE_NNP EMPIRE_NNP WHICH_WDT SUDDENLY_NNP BURST_NNP UPON_NNP
THE_DT GRAND_NNP POLITICAL_NNP STAGE_NN OF_IN EUROPE_NNS


IN_IN the_DT year_NN 1492,_VBD as_IN you_PRP know_VBP ,_, Columbus_NNP discovered_VBD America_NNP ._. Early_RB in_IN
the_DT year_NN ,_, a_DT Tyrolese_NNP by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Schnups_NNP ,_, travelling_VBG as_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT
scientific_JJ expedition_NN for_IN the_DT Archbishop_NNP of_IN Tyrol_NNP ,_, and_CC provided_VBD with_IN
the_DT best_JJS letters_NNS of_IN introduction_NN and_CC excellent_JJ credit_NN tried_VBD to_TO reach_VB
the_DT mythical_JJ town_NN of_IN Moscow_NNP ._. He_PRP did_VBD not_RB succeed_VB ._. When_WRB he_PRP reached_VBD the_DT
frontiers_NNS of_IN this_DT vast_JJ Moscovite_NNP state_NN which_WDT was_VBD vaguely_RB supposed_VBN to_TO
exist_VB in_IN the_DT extreme_JJ Eastern_NNP part_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD firmly_RB turned_VBN back_RB ._.
No_DT foreigners_NNS were_VBD wanted_VBN ._. And_CC Schnups_NNP went_VBD to_TO visit_VB the_DT heathen_NN Turk_NNP in_IN
Constantinople_NNP ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP might_MD have_VB something_NN to_TO report_VB to_TO his_PRP$
clerical_JJ master_NN when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD back_RB from_IN his_PRP$ explorations_NNS ._.

Sixty-one_CD years_NNS later_RB ,_, Richard_NNP Chancellor_NNP ,_, trying_VBG to_TO discover_VB the_DT
North-eastern_JJ passage_NN to_TO the_DT Indies_NNPS ,_, and_CC blown_VBN by_IN an_DT ill_JJ wind_NN into_IN
the_DT White_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, reached_VBD the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT Dwina_NNP and_CC found_VBD the_DT Moscovite_NNP
village_NN of_IN Kholmogory_NNP ,_, a_DT few_JJ hours_NNS from_IN the_DT spot_NN where_WRB in_IN 1584_CD the_DT town_NN
of_IN Archangel_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN ._. This_DT time_NN the_DT foreign_JJ visitors_NNS were_VBD requested_VBN
to_TO come_VB to_TO Moscow_NNP and_CC show_VB themselves_PRP to_TO the_DT Grand_NNP Duke_NNP ._. They_PRP went_VBD and_CC
returned_VBD to_TO England_NNP with_IN the_DT first_JJ commercial_JJ treaty_NN ever_RB concluded_VBN
between_IN Russia_NNP and_CC the_DT western_JJ world_NN ._. Other_JJ nations_NNS soon_RB followed_VBD and_CC
something_NN became_VBD known_VBN of_IN this_DT mysterious_JJ land_NN ._.

Geographically_NNP ,_, Russia_NNP is_VBZ a_DT vast_JJ plain_NN ._. The_DT Ural_NNP mountains_NNS are_VBP low_JJ
and_CC form_NN no_DT barrier_NN against_IN invaders_NNS ._. The_DT rivers_NNS are_VBP broad_JJ but_CC often_RB
shallow_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD an_DT ideal_JJ territory_NN for_IN nomads_NNS ._.

While_IN the_DT Roman_NNP Empire_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN ,_, grew_VBD in_IN power_NN and_CC disappeared_VBD again_RB ,_,
Slavic_NNP tribes_NNS ,_, who_WP had_VBD long_RB since_IN left_VBN their_PRP$ homes_NNS in_IN Central_NNP Asia_NNP ,_,
wandered_VBD aimlessly_RB through_IN the_DT forests_NNS and_CC plains_NNS of_IN the_DT region_NN between_IN
the_DT Dniester_NNP and_CC Dnieper_NNP rivers_NNS ._. The_DT Greeks_NNP had_VBD sometimes_RB met_VBN these_DT
Slavs_NNP and_CC a_DT few_JJ travellers_NNS of_IN the_DT third_JJ and_CC fourth_JJ centuries_NNS mention_VBP
them_PRP ._. Otherwise_RB they_PRP were_VBD as_IN little_RB known_VBN as_IN were_VBD the_DT Nevada_NNP Indians_NNPS in_IN
the_DT year_NN 1800._.

Unfortunately_RB for_IN the_DT peace_NN of_IN these_DT primitive_JJ peoples_NNS ,_, a_DT very_RB
convenient_JJ trade-route_NN ran_VBD through_IN their_PRP$ country_NN ._. This_DT was_VBD the_DT main_JJ road_NN
from_IN northern_JJ Europe_NNP to_TO Constantinople_NNP ._. It_PRP followed_VBD the_DT coast_NN of_IN the_DT
Baltic_NNP until_IN the_DT Neva_NNP was_VBD reached_VBN ._. Then_RB it_PRP crossed_VBD Lake_NNP Ladoga_NNP and_CC went_VBD
southward_RB along_IN the_DT Volkhov_NNP river_NN ._. Then_RB through_IN Lake_NNP Ilmen_NNP and_CC up_IN the_DT
small_JJ Lovat_NNP river_NN ._. Then_RB there_EX was_VBD a_DT short_JJ portage_NN until_IN the_DT Dnieper_NN was_VBD
reached_VBN ._. Then_RB down_IN the_DT Dnieper_NN into_IN the_DT Black_NNP Sea_NNP ._.

The_DT Norsemen_NNP knew_VBD of_IN this_DT road_NN at_IN a_DT very_RB early_JJ date_NN ._. In_IN the_DT ninth_JJ
century_NN they_PRP began_VBD to_TO settle_VB in_IN northern_JJ Russia_NNP ,_, just_RB as_IN other_JJ Norsemen_NNS
were_VBD laying_VBG the_DT foundation_NN for_IN independent_JJ states_NNS in_IN Germany_NNP and_CC France_NNP ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT year_NN 862,_IN three_CD Norsemen_NNP ,_, brothers_NNS ,_, crossed_VBD the_DT Baltic_NNP and_CC
founded_VBN three_CD small_JJ dynasties_NNS ._. Of_IN the_DT three_CD brothers_NNS ,_, only_RB one_CD ,_, Rurik_NNP ,_,
lived_VBD for_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN years_NNS ._. He_PRP took_VBD possession_NN of_IN the_DT territory_NN of_IN his_PRP$
brothers_NNS ,_, and_CC twenty_CD years_NNS after_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN this_DT first_JJ Norseman_NNP ,_, a_DT

RUSSIA_NNP vs_NN ._. SWEDEN_''

RUSSIA_NNP AND_CC SWEDEN_NNP FIGHT_NNP MANY_NNP WARS_NNPS TO_TO DECIDE_NNP WHO_WP SHALL_NNP BE_VB THE_DT LEADING_NN
POWER_NN OF_IN NORTH-EASTERN_NNP EUROPE_NNS


IN_IN the_DT year_NN 1698,_IN Tsar_NNP Peter_NNP set_VBD forth_RB upon_IN his_PRP$ first_JJ voyage_NN to_TO western_JJ
Europe_NNP ._. He_PRP travelled_VBD by_IN way_NN of_IN Berlin_NNP and_CC went_VBD to_TO Holland_NNP and_CC to_TO

in_IN the_DT duck_NN pond_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN '_POS s_PRP country_NN home_NN ._. This_DT passion_NN for_IN water_NN
remained_VBD with_IN him_PRP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._. In_IN a_DT practical_JJ way_NN it_PRP showed_VBD
itself_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ wish_NN to_TO give_VB his_PRP$ land-locked_JJ domains_NNS access_NN to_TO the_DT open_JJ
sea_NN ._.

While_IN the_DT unpopular_JJ and_CC harsh_JJ young_JJ ruler_NN was_VBD away_RB from_IN home_NN ,_, the_DT
friends_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ Russian_JJ ways_NNS in_IN Moscow_NNP set_VBD to_TO work_VB to_TO undo_VB all_DT
his_PRP$ reforms_NNS ._. A_DT sudden_JJ rebellion_NN among_IN his_PRP$ life-guards_NNS ,_, the_DT Streltsi_NNP

his_PRP$ death_NN ,_, Peter_NNP could_MD reform_VB in_IN peace_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB easy_JJ to_TO give_VB you_PRP a_DT list_NN of_IN his_PRP$ reforms_NNS in_IN chronological_JJ order_NN ._.
The_DT Tsar_NNP worked_VBD with_IN furious_JJ haste_NN ._. He_PRP followed_VBD no_DT system_NN ._. He_PRP issued_VBD
his_PRP$ decrees_NNS with_IN such_JJ rapidity_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO keep_VB count_NN ._.

shortest_JJS possible_JJ time_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP died_VBD he_PRP left_VBD behind_IN a_DT well-trained_JJ army_NN
of_IN 200,000_CD men_NNS and_CC a_DT navy_NN of_IN fifty_CD ships_NNS ._. The_DT old_JJ system_NN of_IN government_NN
had_VBD been_VBN abolished_VBN over_IN night_NN ._. The_DT Duma_NNP ,_, or_CC convention_NN of_IN Nobles_NNP ,_, had_VBD
been_VBN dismissed_VBN and_CC in_IN its_PRP$ stead_NN ,_, the_DT Tsar_NNP had_VBD surrounded_VBN himself_PRP with_IN an_DT
advisory_JJ board_NN of_IN state_NN officials_NNS ,_, called_VBD the_DT Senate_NNP ._.

Russia_NNP was_VBD divided_VBN into_IN eight_CD large_JJ "_`` governments_NNS "_'' or_CC provinces_NNS ._. Roads_NNS
were_VBD constructed_VBN ._. Towns_NNP were_VBD built_VBN ._. Industries_NNPS were_VBD created_VBN wherever_WRB it_PRP
pleased_VBN the_DT Tsar_NNP ,_, without_IN any_DT regard_NN for_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN raw_JJ material_NN ._.
Canals_NNS were_VBD dug_VBN and_CC mines_NNS were_VBD opened_VBN in_IN the_DT mountains_NNS of_IN the_DT east_NN ._. In_IN
this_DT land_NN of_IN illiterates_NNS ,_, schools_NNS were_VBD founded_VBN and_CC establishments_NNS
of_IN higher_JJR learning_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN Universities_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS and_CC
professional_JJ schools_NNS ._. Dutch_NNP naval_JJ engineers_NNS and_CC tradesmen_NNS and_CC artisans_NNS
from_IN all_DT over_IN the_DT world_NN were_VBD encouraged_VBN to_TO move_VB to_TO Russia_NNP ._. Printing_NNP
shops_NNS were_VBD established_VBN ,_, but_CC all_DT books_NNS must_MD be_VB first_RB read_VBN by_IN the_DT imperial_JJ
censors_NNS ._. The_DT duties_NNS of_IN each_DT class_NN of_IN society_NN were_VBD carefully_RB written_VBN
down_RB in_IN a_DT new_JJ law_NN and_CC the_DT entire_JJ system_NN of_IN civil_JJ and_CC criminal_JJ laws_NNS was_VBD
gathered_VBN into_IN a_DT series_NN of_IN printed_JJ volumes_NNS ._. The_DT old_JJ Russian_NNP costumes_NNS
were_VBD abolished_VBN by_IN Imperial_NNP decree_NN ,_, and_CC policemen_NNS ,_, armed_VBN with_IN scissors_NNS ,_,
watching_VBG all_PDT the_DT country_NN roads_NNS ,_, changed_VBD the_DT long-haired_JJ Russian_NNP mou-jiks_NNS
suddenly_RB into_IN a_DT pleasing_NN imitation_NN of_IN smooth-shaven_JJ west_NN ._. Europeans_NNPS ._.

In_IN religious_JJ matters_NNS ,_, the_DT Tsar_NNP tolerated_VBD no_DT division_NN of_IN power_NN ._. There_EX

This_DT was_VBD the_DT moment_NN for_IN which_WDT many_JJ of_IN the_DT northern_JJ states_NNS had_VBD waited_VBN ._.

THE_DT RISE_NN OF_IN PRUSSIA_NNP

THE_DT EXTRAORDINARY_NNP RISE_NN OF_IN A_DT LITTLE_JJ STATE_NNP IN_IN A_DT DREARY_NN PART_NN OF_IN NORTHERN_NNP
GERMANY_NNP ,_, CALLED_NNP PRUSSIA_NNP


THE_DT history_NN of_IN Prussia_NNP is_VBZ the_DT history_NN of_IN a_DT frontier_NN district_NN ._. In_IN
the_DT ninth_JJ century_NN ,_, Charlemagne_NNP had_VBD transferred_VBN the_DT old_JJ centre_NN of_IN
civilisation_NN from_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP to_TO the_DT wild_JJ regions_NNS of_IN northwestern_JJ
Europe_NNP ._. His_PRP$ Frankish_JJ soldiers_NNS had_VBD pushed_VBN the_DT frontier_NN of_IN Europe_NNP further_RBR
and_CC further_RBR towards_IN the_DT east_NN ._. They_PRP had_VBD conquered_VBN many_JJ lands_NNS from_IN the_DT
heathenish_NN Slavs_NNP and_CC Lithuanians_NNPS who_WP were_VBD living_VBG in_IN the_DT plain_NN between_IN
the_DT Baltic_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC the_DT Carpathian_NNP Mountains_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT Franks_NNS administered_VBN
those_DT outlying_JJ districts_NNS just_RB as_IN the_DT United_NNP States_NNP used_VBD to_TO administer_VB
her_PRP$ territories_NNS before_IN they_PRP achieved_VBD the_DT dignity_NN of_IN statehood_NN ._.

The_DT frontier_NN state_NN of_IN Brandenburg_NNP had_VBD been_VBN originally_RB founded_VBN by_IN
Charlemagne_NN to_TO defend_VB his_PRP$ eastern_JJ possessions_NNS against_IN raids_NNS of_IN the_DT wild_JJ
Saxon_NNP tribes_NNS ._. The_DT Wends_NNP ,_, a_DT Slavic_NNP tribe_NN which_WDT inhabited_VBN that_IN region_NN ,_,
were_VBD subjugated_VBN during_IN the_DT tenth_JJ century_NN and_CC their_PRP$ market-place_NN ,_, by_IN the_DT
name_NN of_IN Brennabor_NNP ,_, became_VBD the_DT centre_NN of_IN and_CC gave_VBD its_PRP$ name_NN to_TO the_DT new_JJ
province_NN of_IN Brandenburg_NNP ._.

During_IN the_DT eleventh_JJ ,_, twelfth_JJ ,_, thirteenth_JJ and_CC fourteenth_JJ centuries_NNS ,_,
a_DT succession_NN of_IN noble_JJ families_NNS exercised_VBD the_DT functions_NNS of_IN imperial_JJ
governor_NN in_IN this_DT frontier_NN state_NN ._. Finally_RB in_IN the_DT fifteenth_JJ century_NN ,_,
the_DT House_NNP of_IN Hohenzollern_NNP made_VBD its_PRP$ appear-ance_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN Electors_NNS of_IN
Brandenburg_NNP ,_, commenced_VBD to_TO change_VB a_DT sandy_JJ and_CC forlorn_JJ frontier_NN territory_NN
into_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS efficient_JJ empires_NNS of_IN the_DT modern_JJ world_NN ._.

These_DT Hohenzollerns_NNP ,_, who_WP have_VBP just_RB been_VBN removed_VBN from_IN the_DT historical_JJ

from_IN southern_JJ Germany_NNP ._. They_PRP were_VBD of_IN very_RB humble_JJ origin_NN ._. In_IN the_DT twelfth_NN
century_NN a_DT certain_JJ Frederick_NNP of_IN Hohenzollern_NNP had_VBD made_VBN a_DT lucky_JJ marriage_NN
and_CC had_VBD been_VBN appointed_VBN keeper_IN of_IN the_DT castle_NN of_IN Nuremberg_NNP ._. His_PRP$
descendants_NNS had_VBD used_VBN every_DT chance_NN and_CC every_DT opportunity_NN to_TO improve_VB their_PRP$
power_NN and_CC after_IN several_JJ centuries_NNS of_IN watchful_JJ grabbing_NN ,_, they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN
appointed_VBN to_TO the_DT dignity_NN of_IN Elector_NNP ,_, the_DT name_NN given_VBN to_TO those_DT sovereign_JJ
princes_NNS who_WP were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO elect_VB the_DT Emperors_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ German_JJ
Empire_NNP ._. During_IN the_DT Reformation_NN ,_, they_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT
Protestants_NNS and_CC the_DT early_JJ seventeenth_JJ century_NN found_VBD them_PRP among_IN the_DT most_RBS
powerful_JJ of_IN the_DT north_JJ German_JJ princes_NNS ._.

During_IN the_DT Thirty_JJ Years_NNS War_NNP ,_, both_DT Protestants_NNS and_CC Catholics_NNS had_VBD
plundered_VBD Brandenburg_NNP and_CC Prussia_NNP with_IN equal_JJ zeal_NN ._. But_CC under_IN Frederick_NNP
William_NNP ,_, the_DT Great_NNP Elector_NNP ,_, the_DT damage_NN was_VBD quickly_RB repaired_VBN and_CC by_IN a_DT
wise_JJ and_CC careful_JJ use_NN of_IN all_DT the_DT economic_JJ and_CC intellectual_JJ forces_NNS of_IN the_DT
country_NN ,_, a_DT state_NN was_VBD founded_VBN in_IN which_WDT there_EX was_VBD practically_RB no_DT waste_NN ._.

Modern_NNP Prussia_NNP ,_, a_DT state_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT individual_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wishes_NNS and_CC
aspirations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN entirely_RB absorbed_VBN by_IN the_DT interests_NNS of_IN the_DT

the_DT Great_JJ ._. Frederick_NNP William_NNP I_PRP was_VBD a_DT hard_JJ working_NN ,_, parsimonious_JJ Prussian_NNP
sergeant_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT great_JJ love_NN for_IN bar-room_NN stories_NNS and_CC strong_JJ Dutch_JJ

they_PRP were_VBD of_IN French_JJ origin_NN ,)_NN and_CC possessed_VBD of_IN but_CC one_CD idea_NN ._. That_DT idea_NN
was_VBD Duty_NNP ._. Severe_NNP with_IN himself_PRP ,_, he_PRP tolerated_VBD no_DT weakness_NN in_IN his_PRP$ subjects_NNS ,_,
whether_IN they_PRP be_VB generals_NNS or_CC common_JJ soldiers_NNS ._. The_DT relation_NN between_IN
himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ son_NN Frederick_NNP was_VBD never_RB cordial_JJ ,_, to_TO say_VB the_DT least_JJS ._. The_DT

him_PRP ._. Thereupon_NNP as_IN part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ punishment_NN ,_, the_DT young_JJ prince_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO

his_PRP$ future_JJ business_NN of_IN being_VBG a_DT king_NN ._. It_PRP proved_VBD a_DT blessing_NN in_IN disguise_NN ._.
When_WRB Frederick_NNP came_VBD to_TO the_DT throne_NN in_IN 1740,_CD he_PRP knew_VBD how_WRB his_PRP$ country_NN was_VBD
managed_VBN from_IN the_DT birth_NN certificate_NN of_IN a_DT pauper_NN '_'' s_PRP son_NN to_TO the_DT minutest_NN
detail_NN of_IN a_DT complicated_JJ annual_JJ Budget_NNP ._.

As_IN an_DT author_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN his_PRP$ book_NN called_VBD the_DT "_`` Anti-Macchiavelli_NNP ,"_.
Frederick_NNP had_VBD expressed_VBN his_PRP$ contempt_NN for_IN the_DT political_JJ creed_NN of_IN the_DT
ancient_JJ Florentine_JJ historian_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD advised_VBN his_PRP$ princely_NN pupils_NNS to_TO lie_VB
and_CC cheat_VB whenever_WRB it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN their_PRP$
country_NN ._. The_DT ideal_JJ ruler_NN in_IN Frederick_NNP '_POS s_PRP volume_NN was_VBD the_DT first_JJ servant_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ people_NNS ,_, the_DT enlightened_JJ despot_NN after_IN the_DT example_NN of_IN Louis_NNP XIV_NNP ._. In_IN
practice_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, Frederick_NNP ,_, while_IN working_VBG for_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS twenty_CD hours_NNS
a_DT day_NN ,_, tolerated_VBD no_DT one_NN to_TO be_VB near_JJ him_PRP as_IN a_DT counsellor_NN ._. His_PRP$ ministers_NNS
were_VBD superior_JJ clerks_NNS ._. Prussia_NN was_VBD his_PRP$ private_JJ possession_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB treated_VBN
according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ wishes_NNS ._. And_CC nothing_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO interfere_VB with_IN
the_DT interest_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT year_NN 1740_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP Charles_NNP VI_NNP ,_, of_IN Austria_NNP ,_, died_VBD ._. He_PRP had_VBD tried_VBN
to_TO make_VB the_DT position_NN of_IN his_PRP$ only_JJ daughter_NN ,_, Maria_NNP Theresa_NNP ,_, secure_VBP

of_IN parchment_NN ._. But_CC no_RB sooner_RB had_VBD the_DT old_JJ emperor_NN been_VBN deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT
ancestral_JJ crypt_NN of_IN the_DT Habsburg_NNP family_NN ,_, than_IN the_DT armies_NNS of_IN Frederick_NNP
were_VBD marching_VBG towards_IN the_DT Austrian_JJ frontier_NN to_TO occupy_VB that_DT part_NN of_IN
Silesia_NNP for_IN which_WDT (_-LRB- together_RB with_IN almost_RB everything_NN else_JJ in_IN central_NN
Europe_NNP )_-RRB- Prussia_NNP clamored_VBD ,_, on_IN account_NN of_IN some_DT ancient_JJ and_CC very_RB doubtful_JJ
rights_NNS of_IN claim_NN ._. In_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN wars_NNS ,_, Frederick_NNP conquered_VBD all_DT of_IN
Silesia_NNP ,_, and_CC although_IN he_PRP was_VBD often_RB very_RB near_JJ defeat_NN ,_, he_PRP maintained_VBD
himself_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ newly_RB acquired_VBN territories_NNS against_IN all_DT Austrian_JJ

Europe_NNP took_VBD due_JJ notice_NN of_IN this_DT sudden_JJ appearance_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB powerful_JJ new_JJ
state_NN ._. In_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, the_DT Germans_NNPS were_VBD a_DT people_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN
ruined_VBN by_IN the_DT great_JJ religious_JJ wars_NNS and_CC who_WP were_VBD not_RB held_VBN in_IN high_JJ esteem_NN
by_IN any_DT one_CD ._. Frederick_NNP ,_, by_IN an_DT effort_NN as_IN sudden_JJ and_CC quite_RB as_RB terrific_JJ as_IN
that_IN of_IN Peter_NNP of_IN Russia_NNP ,_, changed_VBD this_DT attitude_NN of_IN contempt_NN into_IN one_CD of_IN
fear_NN ._. The_DT internal_JJ affairs_NNS of_IN Prussia_NNP were_VBD arranged_VBN so_RB skillfully_RB that_IN
the_DT subjects_NNS had_VBD less_JJR reason_NN for_IN complaint_NN than_IN elsewhere_RB ._. The_DT treasury_NN
showed_VBD an_DT annual_JJ surplus_NN instead_RB of_IN a_DT deficit_NN ._. Torture_NNP was_VBD abolished_VBN ._.
The_DT judiciary_NN system_NN was_VBD improved_VBN ._. Good_JJ roads_NNS and_CC good_JJ schools_NNS and_CC good_JJ
universities_NNS ,_, together_RB with_IN a_DT scrupulously_RB honest_JJ administration_NN ,_, made_VBN
the_DT people_NNS feel_VBP that_IN whatever_WDT services_NNS were_VBD demanded_VBN of_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP (_-LRB- to_TO
speak_VB the_DT vernacular_JJ )_-RRB- got_VBD their_PRP$ money_NN '_'' s_PRP worth_JJ ._.

After_IN having_VBG been_VBN for_IN several_JJ centuries_NNS the_DT battle_NN field_NN of_IN the_DT French_JJ
and_CC the_DT Austrians_NNPS and_CC the_DT Swedes_NNP and_CC the_DT Danes_NNPS and_CC the_DT Poles_NNPS ,_, Germany_NNP ,_,
encouraged_VBN by_IN the_DT example_NN of_IN Prussia_NNP ,_, began_VBD to_TO regain_VB self-confidence_NN ._.
And_CC this_DT was_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT little_JJ old_JJ man_NN ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ hook-nose_NN and_CC his_PRP$
