"_`` Anti-Macchiavelli_NNP ."_NNP In_IN the_DT year_NN 1786_IN the_DT end_NN came_VBD ._. His_PRP$ friends_NNS were_VBD
all_DT gone_VBN ._. Children_NNP he_PRP had_VBD never_RB had_VBN ._. He_PRP died_VBD alone_RB ,_, tended_VBN by_IN a_DT single_JJ
servant_NN and_CC his_PRP$ faithful_JJ dogs_NNS ,_, whom_WP he_PRP loved_VBD better_JJR than_IN human_JJ beings_NNS
because_RB ,_, as_IN he_PRP said_VBD ,_, they_PRP were_VBD never_RB ungrateful_JJ and_CC remained_VBD true_JJ to_TO
their_PRP$ friends_NNS ._.




THE_DT MERCANTILE_NNP SYSTEM_.

HOW_NNP THE_DT NEWLY_NNP FOUNDED_NNP NATIONAL_NNP OR_NNP DYNASTIC_NNP STATES_NNPS OF_IN EUROPE_NNP TRIED_NNP TO_TO
MAKE_VB THEMSELVES_DT RICH_NNP AND_CC WHAT_WDT WAS_VBD MEANT_NNP BY_NNP THE_DT MERCANTILE_NNP SYSTEM_.


WE_NNP have_VBP seen_VBN how_WRB ,_, during_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ and_CC the_DT seventeenth_JJ centuries_NNS ,_,
the_DT states_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ modern_JJ world_NN began_VBD to_TO take_VB shape_NN ._. Their_PRP$ origins_NNS
were_VBD different_JJ in_IN almost_RB every_DT case_NN ._. Some_DT had_VBD been_VBN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT
deliberate_JJ effort_NN of_IN a_DT single_JJ king_NN ._. Others_NNS had_VBD happened_VBN by_IN chance_NN ._. Still_RB
others_NNS had_VBD been_VBN the_DT result_NN of_IN favourable_JJ natural_JJ geographic_JJ boundaries_NNS ._.
But_CC once_RB they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN founded_VBN ,_, they_PRP had_VBD all_DT of_IN them_PRP tried_VBD to_TO strengthen_VB
their_PRP$ internal_JJ administration_NN and_CC to_TO exert_VB the_DT greatest_JJS possible_JJ
influence_NN upon_IN foreign_JJ affairs_NNS ._. All_PDT this_DT of_IN course_NN had_VBD cost_VBN a_DT great_JJ deal_NN
of_IN money_NN ._. The_DT mediaeval_JJ state_NN with_IN its_PRP$ lack_NN of_IN centralised_JJ power_NN did_VBD not_RB
depend_VB upon_IN a_DT rich_JJ treasury_NN ._. The_DT king_NN got_VBD his_PRP$ revenues_NNS from_IN the_DT crown_NN
domains_NNS and_CC his_PRP$ civil_JJ service_NN paid_VBD for_IN itself_PRP ._. The_DT modern_JJ centralised_NN
state_NN was_VBD a_DT more_RBR complicated_JJ affair_NN ._. The_DT old_JJ knights_NNS disappeared_VBD and_CC
hired_VBN government_NN officials_NNS or_CC bureaucrats_NNS took_VBD their_PRP$ place_NN ._. Army_NNP ,_, navy_NN ,_,
and_CC internal_JJ administration_NN demanded_VBD millions_NNS ._. The_DT question_NN then_RB became_VBD
where_WRB was_VBD this_DT money_NN to_TO be_VB found_VBN ?_.

Gold_NN and_CC silver_NN had_VBD been_VBN a_DT rare_JJ commodity_NN in_IN the_DT middle_JJ ages_NNS ._. The_DT
average_JJ man_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP told_VBN you_PRP ,_, never_RB saw_VBD a_DT gold_NN piece_NN as_IN long_JJ as_IN
he_PRP lived_VBD ._. Only_RB the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT large_JJ cities_NNS were_VBD familiar_JJ with_IN
silver_JJ coin_NN ._. The_DT discovery_NN of_IN America_NNP and_CC the_DT exploitation_NN of_IN the_DT
Peruvian_JJ mines_NNS changed_VBD all_RB this_DT ._. The_DT centre_NN of_IN trade_NN was_VBD transferred_VBN
from_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP to_TO the_DT Atlantic_NNP seaboard_NN ._. The_DT old_JJ "_'' commercial_JJ
cities_NNS "_'' of_IN Italy_NNP lost_VBD their_PRP$ financial_JJ importance_NN ._. New_NNP "_'' commercial_JJ
nations_NNS "_`` took_VBD their_PRP$ place_NN and_CC gold_NN and_CC silver_NN were_VBD no_RB longer_RB a_DT
curiosity_NN ._.

Through_IN Spain_NNP and_CC Portugal_NNP and_CC Holland_NNP and_CC England_NNP ,_, precious_JJ metals_NNS
began_VBD to_TO find_VB their_PRP$ way_NN to_TO Europe_NNP The_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN had_VBD its_PRP$ own_JJ
writers_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN political_JJ economy_NN and_CC they_PRP evolved_VBD a_DT theory_NN of_IN
national_JJ wealth_NN which_WDT seemed_VBD to_TO them_PRP entirely_RB sound_JJ and_CC of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS
possible_JJ benefit_NN to_TO their_PRP$ respective_JJ countries_NNS ._. They_PRP reasoned_VBD that_IN both_DT
gold_NN and_CC silver_NN were_VBD actual_JJ wealth_NN ._. Therefore_CC they_PRP believed_VBD that_IN the_DT
country_NN with_IN the_DT largest_JJS supply_NN of_IN actual_JJ cash_NN in_IN the_DT vaults_NNS of_IN its_PRP$
treasury_NN and_CC its_PRP$ banks_NNS was_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT richest_JJS country_NN ._. And_CC
since_IN money_NN meant_VBD armies_NNS ,_, it_PRP followed_VBD that_IN the_DT richest_JJS country_NN was_VBD also_RB
the_DT most_RBS powerful_JJ and_CC could_MD rule_VB the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN ._.

We_PRP call_VBP this_DT system_NN the_DT "_`` mercantile_JJ system_NN ,"_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD accepted_VBN with_IN
the_DT same_JJ unquestioning_JJ faith_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT early_JJ Christians_NNS believed_VBN
in_IN Miracles_NNS and_CC many_JJ of_IN the_DT present-day_JJ American_JJ business_NN men_NNS believe_VBP in_IN
the_DT Tariff_NN ._. In_IN practice_NN ,_, the_DT Mercantile_NNP system_NN worked_VBD out_RP as_IN follows_VBZ :_:
To_TO get_VB the_DT largest_JJS surplus_NN of_IN precious_JJ metals_NNS a_DT country_NN must_MD have_VB a_DT
favourable_JJ balance_NN of_IN export_NN trade_NN ._. If_IN you_PRP can_MD export_VB more_RBR to_TO your_PRP$
neighbour_NN than_IN he_PRP exports_VBZ to_TO your_PRP$ own_JJ country_NN ,_, he_PRP will_MD owe_VB you_PRP money_NN
and_CC will_MD be_VB obliged_VBN to_TO send_VB you_PRP some_DT of_IN his_PRP$ gold_NN ._. Hence_RB you_PRP gain_NN and_CC he_PRP
loses_VBZ ._. As_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN this_DT creed_NN ,_, the_DT economic_JJ program_NN of_IN almost_RB every_DT
seventeenth_JJ century_NN state_NN was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_:

1._PRP Try_VB to_TO get_VB possession_NN of_IN as_RB many_JJ precious_JJ metals_NNS as_IN you_PRP can_MD ._.

2._RBR Encourage_JJ foreign_JJ trade_NN in_IN preference_NN to_TO domestic_JJ trade_NN ._.

3._. Encourage_NNP those_DT industries_NNS which_WDT change_VBP raw_JJ materials_NNS into_IN exportable_JJ
finished_VBN products_NNS ._.

4._CD Encourage_NN a_DT large_JJ population_NN ,_, for_IN you_PRP will_MD need_VB workmen_NNS for_IN your_PRP$
factories_NNS and_CC an_DT agricultural_JJ community_NN does_VBZ not_RB raise_VB enough_RB workmen_NNS ._.

5._CD Let_VBD the_DT State_NNP watch_VBP this_DT process_NN and_CC interfere_VB whenever_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ
necessary_JJ to_TO do_VB so_RB ._.


Instead_RB of_IN regarding_VBG International_NNP Trade_NNP as_IN something_NN akin_JJ to_TO a_DT force_NN of_IN
nature_NN which_WDT would_MD always_RB obey_VB certain_JJ natural_JJ laws_NNS regardless_RB of_IN man_NN '_'' s_PRP
interference_NN ,_, the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ and_CC seventeenth_JJ centuries_NNS
tried_VBD to_TO regulate_VB their_PRP$ commerce_NN by_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN official_JJ decrees_NNS and_CC
royal_JJ laws_NNS and_CC financial_JJ help_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT government_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN Charles_NNP V_NNP adopted_VBD this_DT Mercantile_NNP System_NNP
(_-LRB- which_WDT was_VBD then_RB something_NN entirely_RB new_JJ )_-RRB- and_CC introduced_VBD it_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ many_JJ
possessions_NNS ._. Elizabeth_NNP of_IN England_NNP flattered_VBD him_PRP by_IN her_PRP$ imitation_NN ._. The_DT
Bourbons_NNS ,_, especially_RB King_NNP Louis_NNP XIV_NNP ,_, were_VBD fanatical_JJ adherents_NNS of_IN this_DT
doctrine_NN and_CC Colbert_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ great_JJ minister_NN of_IN finance_NN ,_, became_VBD the_DT prophet_NN
of_IN Mercantilism_NNP to_TO whom_WP all_DT Europe_NNP looked_VBD for_IN guidance_NN ._.

The_DT entire_JJ foreign_JJ policy_NN of_IN Cromwell_NNP was_VBD a_DT practical_JJ application_NN of_IN
the_DT Mercantile_NNP System_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD invariably_RB directed_VBN against_IN the_DT rich_JJ rival_NN
Republic_NNP of_IN Holland_NNP ._. For_IN the_DT Dutch_JJ shippers_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT common-carriers_NNS of_IN
the_DT merchandise_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, had_VBD certain_JJ leanings_NNS towards_IN free-trade_NN and_CC
therefore_RB had_VBD to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN at_IN all_DT cost_NN ._.

It_PRP will_MD be_VB easily_RB understood_VBN how_WRB such_JJ a_DT system_NN must_MD affect_VB the_DT colonies_NNS ._.
A_DT colony_NN under_IN the_DT Mercantile_NNP System_NNP became_VBD merely_RB a_DT reservoir_NN of_IN gold_NN
and_CC silver_NN and_CC spices_NNS ,_, which_WDT was_VBD to_TO be_VB tapped_VBN for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN the_DT
home_NN country_NN ._. The_DT Asiatic_NNPS ,_, American_NNP and_CC African_JJ supply_NN of_IN precious_JJ
metals_NNS and_CC the_DT raw_JJ materials_NNS of_IN these_DT tropical_JJ countries_NNS became_VBD a_DT
monopoly_NN of_IN the_DT state_NN which_WDT happened_VBD to_TO own_VB that_DT particular_JJ colony_NN ._.
No_DT outsider_NN was_VBD ever_RB allowed_VBN within_IN the_DT precincts_NNS and_CC no_DT native_NN was_VBD
permitted_VBN to_TO trade_VB with_IN a_DT merchant_NN whose_WP$ ship_NN flew_VBD a_DT foreign_JJ flag_NN ._.

Undoubtedly_RB the_DT Mercantile_NNP System_NNP encouraged_VBD the_DT development_NN of_IN
young_JJ industries_NNS in_IN certain_JJ countries_NNS where_WRB there_EX never_RB had_VBD been_VBN any_DT
manufacturing_VBG before_IN ._. It_PRP built_VBD roads_NNS and_CC dug_VBD canals_NNS and_CC made_VBD for_IN better_RBR
means_NNS of_IN transportation_NN ._. It_PRP demanded_VBD greater_JJR skill_NN among_IN the_DT workmen_NNS and_CC
gave_VBD the_DT merchant_NN a_DT better_JJR social_JJ position_NN ,_, while_IN it_PRP weakened_VBD the_DT power_NN
of_IN the_DT landed_VBN aristocracy_NN ._.

On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, it_PRP caused_VBD very_RB great_JJ misery_NN ._. It_PRP made_VBD the_DT natives_NNS in_IN
the_DT colonies_NNS the_DT victims_NNS of_IN a_DT most_RBS shameless_JJ exploitation_NN ._. It_PRP exposed_VBN
the_DT citizens_NNS of_IN the_DT home_NN country_NN to_TO an_DT even_RB more_RBR terrible_JJ fate_NN ._. It_PRP
helped_VBN in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN to_TO turn_VB every_DT land_NN into_IN an_DT armed_JJ camp_NN and_CC
divided_VBN the_DT world_NN into_IN little_JJ bits_NNS of_IN territory_NN ,_, each_DT working_VBG for_IN its_PRP$
own_JJ direct_JJ benefit_NN ,_, while_IN striving_VBG at_IN all_DT times_NNS to_TO destroy_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN
its_PRP$ neighbours_NNS and_CC get_VB hold_NN of_IN their_PRP$ treasures_NNS ._. It_PRP laid_VBD so_RB much_JJ stress_NN
upon_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN owning_VBG wealth_NN that_IN "_`` being_VBG rich_JJ "_`` came_VBD to_TO be_VB
regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT sole_JJ virtue_NN of_IN the_DT average_JJ citizen_NN ._. Economic_NNP systems_NNS
come_VB and_CC go_VB like_IN the_DT fashions_NNS in_IN surgery_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT clothes_NNS of_IN women_NNS ,_,
and_CC during_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN the_DT Mercantile_NNP System_NNP was_VBD discarded_VBN in_IN
favor_NN of_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN free_JJ and_CC open_JJ competition_NN ._. At_IN least_JJS ,_, so_IN I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN
told_VBN ._.




THE_DT AMERICAN_NNP REVOLUTION_NN

AT_WDT THE_DT END_NNP OF_IN THE_DT EIGHTEENTH_NN CENTURY_NN EUROPE_NNP HEARD_NNP STRANGE_NNP REPORTS_NNS OF_IN
SOMETHING_NNP WHICH_WDT HAD_NNP HAPPENED_NNP IN_IN THE_DT WILDERNESS_NNP ;_: OF_IN THE_DT NORTH_NN AMERICAN_NNP
CONTINENT_NN ._. THE_DT DESCENDANTS_NNS OF_IN THE_DT MEN_NNS WHO_WP HAD_NNP PUNISHED_NNP KING_NNP CHARLES_NNP FOR_IN
HIS_PRP$ INSISTENCE_NNP UPON_NNP HIS_NNP "_'' DIVINE_NNP RIGHTS_NNP "_'' ADDED_VBD A_DT NEW_NNP CHAPTER_NNP TO_TO THE_DT OLD_NN
STORY_NN OF_IN THE_DT STRUGGLE_NN FOR_IN SELF-GOVERNMENT_NNP


FOR_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN convenience_NN ,_, we_PRP ought_MD to_TO go_VB back_RB a_DT few_JJ centuries_NNS and_CC
repeat_VB the_DT early_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ struggle_NN for_IN colonial_JJ possessions_NNS ._.

As_RB soon_RB as_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN European_JJ nations_NNS had_VBD been_VBN created_VBN upon_IN the_DT new_JJ
basis_NN of_IN national_JJ or_CC dynastic_JJ interests_NNS ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, during_IN and_CC
immediately_RB after_IN the_DT Thirty_CD Years_NNS War_NNP ,_, their_PRP$ rulers_NNS ,_, backed_VBD up_RP by_IN the_DT
capital_NN of_IN their_PRP$ merchants_NNS and_CC the_DT ships_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ trading_NN companies_NNS ,_,
continued_VBD the_DT fight_NN for_IN more_JJR territory_NN in_IN Asia_NNP ,_, Africa_NNP and_CC America_NNP ._.

The_DT Spaniards_NNP and_CC the_DT Portuguese_NNP had_VBD been_VBN exploring_VBG the_DT Indian_NNP Sea_NNP
and_CC the_DT Pacific_NNP Ocean_NNP for_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT century_NN ere_NNP Holland_NNP and_CC England_NNP
appeared_VBD upon_IN the_DT stage_NN ._. This_DT proved_VBD an_DT advantage_NN to_TO the_DT latter_NN ._. The_DT
first_RB rough_JJ work_NN had_VBD already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._. What_WP is_VBZ more_JJR ,_, the_DT earliest_JJS
navigators_NNS had_VBD so_RB often_RB made_VBN themselves_PRP unpopular_JJ with_IN the_DT Asiatic_JJ and_CC
American_NNP and_CC African_NNP natives_NNS that_IN both_DT the_DT English_NNP and_CC the_DT Dutch_NNP were_VBD
welcomed_VBN as_IN friends_NNS and_CC deliverers_NNS ._. We_PRP cannot_MD claim_VB any_DT superior_JJ virtues_NNS
for_IN either_DT of_IN these_DT two_CD races_NNS ._. But_CC they_PRP were_VBD merchants_NNS before_IN everything_NN
else_RB ._. They_PRP never_RB allowed_VBD religious_JJ considerations_NNS to_TO interfere_VB with_IN
their_PRP$ practical_JJ common_JJ sense_NN ._. During_IN their_PRP$ first_JJ relations_NNS with_IN weaker_JJR
races_NNS ,_, all_DT European_JJ nations_NNS have_VBP behaved_VBN with_IN shocking_JJ brutality_NN ._. The_DT
English_NNP and_CC the_DT Dutch_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, knew_VBD better_RBR where_WRB to_TO draw_VB the_DT dine_NN ._.
Provided_VBN they_PRP got_VBD their_PRP$ spices_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ gold_NN and_CC silver_NN and_CC their_PRP$
taxes_NNS ,_, they_PRP were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO let_VB the_DT native_JJ live_JJ as_IN it_PRP best_RB pleased_VBD him_PRP ._.

It_PRP was_VBD not_RB very_RB difficult_JJ for_IN them_PRP therefore_RB to_TO establish_VB themselves_PRP
in_IN the_DT richest_JJS parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ._. But_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN this_DT had_VBD been_VBN
accomplished_VBN ,_, they_PRP began_VBD to_TO fight_VB each_DT other_JJ for_IN still_RB further_RBR
possessions_NNS ._. Strangely_RB enough_RB ,_, the_DT colonial_JJ wars_NNS were_VBD never_RB settled_VBN in_IN
the_DT colonies_NNS themselves_PRP ._. They_PRP were_VBD decided_VBN three_CD thousand_CD miles_NNS away_RB
by_IN the_DT navies_NNS of_IN the_DT contending_NN countries_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS
interesting_JJ principles_NNS of_IN ancient_JJ and_CC modern_JJ warfare_NN (_-LRB- one_CD of_IN the_DT few_JJ
reliable_JJ laws_NNS of_IN history_NN )_-RRB- that_WDT "_'' the_DT nation_NN which_WDT commands_VBZ the_DT sea_NN is_VBZ
also_RB the_DT nation_NN which_WDT commands_VBZ the_DT land_NN ."_NN So_RB far_RB this_DT law_NN has_VBZ never_RB
failed_VBN to_TO work_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT modern_JJ airplane_NN may_MD have_VB changed_VBN it_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT
eighteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, there_EX were_VBD no_DT flying_VBG machines_NNS and_CC it_PRP was_VBD
the_DT British_JJ navy_NN which_WDT gained_VBD for_IN England_NNP her_PRP vast_JJ American_JJ and_CC Indian_JJ
and_CC African_JJ colonies_NNS ._.

The_DT series_NN of_IN naval_JJ wars_NNS between_IN England_NNP and_CC Holland_NNP in_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ
century_NN does_VBZ not_RB interest_VB us_PRP here_RB ._. It_PRP ended_VBD as_IN all_DT such_JJ encounters_NNS
between_IN hopelessly_RB ill-matched_JJ powers_NNS will_MD end_VB ._. But_CC the_DT warfare_NN between_IN
England_NNP and_CC France_NNP (_-LRB- her_PRP$ other_JJ rival_NN )_-RRB- is_VBZ of_IN greater_JJR importance_NN to_TO us_PRP ,_, for_IN
while_IN the_DT superior_JJ British_JJ fleet_NN in_IN the_DT end_NN defeated_VBN the_DT French_JJ navy_NN ,_,
a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN the_DT preliminary_JJ fighting_NN was_VBD done_VBN on_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ American_JJ
continent_NN ._. In_IN this_DT vast_JJ country_NN ,_, both_DT France_NNP and_CC England_NNP claimed_VBD
everything_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN discovered_VBN and_CC a_DT lot_NN more_RBR which_WDT the_DT eye_NN of_IN no_NN
white_JJ man_NN had_VBD ever_RB seen_VBN ._. In_IN 1497_CD Cabot_NNP had_VBD landed_VBN in_IN the_DT northern_JJ part_NN
of_IN America_NNP and_CC twenty-seven_CD years_NNS later_RB ,_, Giovanni_NNP Verrazano_NNP had_VBD visited_VBN
these_DT coasts_NNS ._. Cabot_NNP had_VBD flown_VBN the_DT English_JJ flag_NN ._. Verrazano_NNP had_VBD sailed_VBN
under_IN the_DT French_JJ flag_NN ._. Hence_RB both_DT England_NNP and_CC France_NNP proclaimed_VBD
themselves_PRP the_DT owners_NNS of_IN the_DT entire_JJ continent_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ century_NN ,_, some_DT ten_CD small_JJ English_NNP colonies_NNS had_VBD been_VBN
founded_VBN between_IN Maine_NNP and_CC the_DT Carolinas_NNPS ._. They_PRP were_VBD usually_RB a_DT haven_NN
of_IN refuge_NN for_IN some_DT particular_JJ sect_NN of_IN English_NNP dissenters_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT
Puritans_NNS ,_, who_WP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1620_CD went_VBD to_TO New_NNP England_NNP ,_, or_CC the_DT Quakers_NNS ,_, who_WP
settled_VBN in_IN Pennsylvania_NNP in_IN 1681._DT They_PRP were_VBD small_JJ frontier_NN communities_NNS ,_,
nestling_NN close_RB to_TO the_DT shores_NNS of_IN the_DT ocean_NN ,_, where_WRB people_NNS had_VBD gathered_VBN to_TO
make_VB a_DT new_JJ home_NN and_CC begin_VB life_NN among_IN happier_JJR surroundings_NNS ,_, far_RB away_RB from_IN
royal_JJ supervision_NN and_CC interference_NN ._.

The_DT French_JJ colonies_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, always_RB remained_VBD a_DT possession_NN of_IN
the_DT crown_NN ._. No_DT Huguenots_NNPS or_CC Protestants_NNPS were_VBD allowed_VBN in_IN these_DT colonies_NNS
for_IN fear_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD contaminate_VB the_DT Indians_NNPS with_IN their_PRP$ dangerous_JJ
Protestant_NNP doctrines_NNS and_CC would_MD perhaps_RB interfere_VB with_IN the_DT missionary_NN
work_NN of_IN the_DT Jesuit_NN fathers_NNS ._. The_DT English_NNP colonies_NNS ,_, therefore_RB ,_, had_VBD been_VBN
founded_VBN upon_IN a_DT much_JJ healthier_JJR basis_NN than_IN their_PRP$ French_JJ neighbours_NNS and_CC
rivals_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD an_DT expression_NN of_IN the_DT commercial_JJ energy_NN of_IN the_DT English_NNP
middle_JJ classes_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT French_JJ settlements_NNS were_VBD inhabited_VBN by_IN people_NNS
who_WP had_VBD crossed_VBN the_DT ocean_NN as_IN servants_NNS of_IN the_DT king_NN and_CC who_WP expected_VBD to_TO
return_NN to_TO Paris_NNP at_IN the_DT first_JJ possible_JJ chance_NN ._.

Politically_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT position_NN of_IN the_DT English_NNP colonies_NNS was_VBD far_RB from_IN
satisfactory_JJ ._. The_DT French_NNPS had_VBD discovered_VBN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT Saint_NNP Lawrence_NNP
in_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN ._. From_IN the_DT region_NN of_IN the_DT Great_NNP Lakes_NNP they_PRP had_VBD
worked_VBD their_PRP$ way_NN southward_RB ,_, had_VBD descended_VBN the_DT Mississippi_NNP and_CC had_VBD built_VBN
several_JJ fortifications_NNS along_IN the_DT Gulf_NNP of_IN Mexico_NNP ._. After_IN a_DT century_NN
of_IN exploration_NN ,_, a_DT line_NN of_IN sixty_CD French_JJ forts_NNS cut_VBD off_RP the_DT English_NNP
settlements_NNS along_IN the_DT Atlantic_NNP seaboard_NN from_IN the_DT interior_NN ._.

The_DT English_NNP land_NN grants_NNS ,_, made_VBN to_TO the_DT different_JJ colonial_NN companies_NNS had_VBD
given_VBN them_PRP "_`` all_DT land_NN from_IN sea_NN to_TO sea_VB ."_JJ This_DT sounded_VBD well_RB on_IN paper_NN ,_,
but_CC in_IN practice_NN ,_, British_JJ territory_NN ended_VBN where_WRB the_DT line_NN of_IN French_JJ
fortifications_NNS began_VBD ._. To_TO break_VB through_IN this_DT barrier_NN was_VBD possible_JJ but_CC it_PRP
took_VBD both_DT men_NNS and_CC money_NN and_CC caused_VBD a_DT series_NN of_IN horrible_JJ border_NN wars_NNS in_IN
which_WDT both_DT sides_NNS murdered_VBN their_PRP$ white_JJ neighbours_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN the_DT
Indian_JJ tribes_NNS ._.

As_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT Stuarts_NNP had_VBD ruled_VBN England_NNP there_EX had_VBD been_VBN no_DT danger_NN of_IN
war_NN with_IN France_NNP ._. The_DT Stuarts_NNPS needed_VBD the_DT Bourbons_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ attempt_NN to_TO
establish_VB an_DT autocratic_JJ form_NN of_IN government_NN and_CC to_TO break_VB the_DT power_NN of_IN
Parliament_NNP ._. But_CC in_IN 1689_CD the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT Stuarts_NNP had_VBD disappeared_VBN from_IN
British_JJ soil_NN and_CC Dutch_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ enemy_NN of_IN Louis_NNP XIV_NNP succeeded_VBN
him_PRP ._. From_IN that_DT time_NN on_IN ,_, until_IN the_DT Treaty_NNP of_IN Paris_NNP of_IN 1763,_CD France_NNP and_CC
England_NNP fought_VBD for_IN the_DT possession_NN of_IN India_NNP and_CC North_NNP America_NNP ._.

During_IN these_DT wars_NNS ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD before_RB ,_, the_DT English_NNP navies_NNS invariably_RB
beat_VB the_DT French_NNP ._. Cut_VB off_RB from_IN her_PRP$ colonies_NNS ,_, France_NNP lost_VBD most_JJS of_IN her_PRP$
possessions_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB peace_NN was_VBD declared_VBN ,_, the_DT entire_JJ North_JJ American_JJ
continent_NN had_VBD fallen_VBN into_IN British_JJ hands_NNS and_CC the_DT great_JJ work_NN of_IN
exploration_NN of_IN Cartier_NNP ,_, Champlain_NNP ,_, La_NNP Salle_NNP ,_, Marquette_NNP and_CC a_DT score_NN of_IN
others_NNS was_VBD lost_VBN to_TO France_NNP ._.

Only_RB a_DT very_RB small_JJ part_NN of_IN this_DT vast_JJ domain_NN was_VBD inhabited_VBN ._. From_IN
Massachusetts_NNP in_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT Pilgrims_NNP (_-LRB- a_DT sect_NN of_IN Puritans_NNS who_WP
were_VBD very_RB intolerant_JJ and_CC who_WP therefore_RB had_VBD found_VBN no_DT happiness_NN either_RB in_IN
Anglican_NNP England_NNP or_CC Calvinist_JJ Holland_NNP )_-RRB- had_VBD landed_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1620,_CD to_TO
the_DT Carolinas_NNPS and_CC Virginia_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT tobacco-raising_NN provinces_NNS which_WDT had_VBD
been_VBN founded_VBN entirely_RB for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN profit_NN ),_NN stretched_VBD a_DT thin_JJ line_NN of_IN
sparsely_RB populated_JJ territory_NN ._. But_CC the_DT men_NNS who_WP lived_VBD in_IN this_DT new_JJ land_NN of_IN
fresh_JJ air_NN and_CC high_JJ skies_NNS were_VBD very_RB different_JJ from_IN their_PRP$ brethren_NNS of_IN
the_DT mother_NN country_NN ._. In_IN the_DT wilderness_NN they_PRP had_VBD learned_VBN independence_NN and_CC
self-reliance_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD the_DT sons_NNS of_IN hardy_JJ and_CC energetic_JJ ancestors_NNS ._. Lazy_NNP
and_CC timourous_JJ people_NNS did_VBD not_RB cross_VB the_DT ocean_NN in_IN those_DT days_NNS ._. The_DT American_NNP
colonists_NNS hated_VBD the_DT restraint_NN and_CC the_DT lack_NN of_IN breathing_NN space_NN which_WDT had_VBD
made_VBN their_PRP$ lives_NNS in_IN the_DT old_JJ country_NN so_RB very_RB unhappy_JJ ._. They_PRP meant_VBD to_TO be_VB
their_PRP$ own_JJ masters_NNS ._. This_DT the_DT ruling_NN classes_NNS of_IN England_NNP did_VBD not_RB seem_VB to_TO
understand_VB ._. The_DT government_NN annoyed_VBD the_DT colonists_NNS and_CC the_DT colonists_NNS ,_, who_WP
hated_VBN to_TO be_VB bothered_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ,_, began_VBD to_TO annoy_VB the_DT British_JJ government_NN ._.

Bad_JJ feeling_NN caused_VBD more_JJR bad_JJ feeling_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ to_TO repeat_VB here_RB
in_IN detail_NN what_WP actually_RB happened_VBD and_CC what_WP might_MD have_VB been_VBN avoided_VBN if_IN the_DT
British_JJ king_NN had_VBD been_VBN more_RBR intelligent_JJ than_IN George_NNP III_NNP or_CC less_JJR given_VBN to_TO
drowsiness_NN and_CC indifference_NN than_IN his_PRP$ minister_NN ,_, Lord_NNP North_NNP ._. The_DT British_NNPS
colonists_NNS ,_, when_WRB they_PRP understood_VBD that_IN peaceful_JJ arguments_NNS would_MD not_RB settle_VB
the_DT difficulties_NNS ,_, took_VBD to_TO arms_NNS ._. From_IN being_VBG loyal_JJ subjects_NNS ,_, they_PRP turned_VBD
rebels_NNS ,_, who_WP exposed_VBD themselves_PRP to_TO the_DT punishment_NN of_IN death_NN when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD
captured_VBN by_IN the_DT German_JJ soldiers_NNS ,_, whom_WP George_NNP hired_VBD to_TO do_VB his_PRP$ fighting_NN
after_IN the_DT pleasant_JJ custom_NN of_IN that_DT day_NN ,_, when_WRB Teutonic_NNP princes_NNS sold_VBD whole_JJ
regiments_NNS to_TO the_DT highest_JJS bidder_NN ._.

The_DT war_NN between_IN England_NNP and_CC her_PRP$ American_JJ colonies_NNS lasted_VBD seven_CD years_NNS ._.
During_IN most_JJS of_IN that_DT time_NN ,_, the_DT final_JJ success_NN of_IN the_DT rebels_NNS seemed_VBD very_RB
doubtful_JJ ._. A_DT great_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT cities_NNS ,_, had_VBD
remained_VBD loyal_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ king_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD in_IN favour_NN of_IN a_DT compromise_NN ,_,
and_CC would_MD have_VB been_VBN willing_JJ to_TO sue_VB for_IN peace_NN ._. But_CC the_DT great_JJ figure_NN of_IN
Washington_NNP stood_VBD guard_NN over_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT colonists_NNS ._.

Ably_RB assisted_VBN by_IN a_DT handful_NN of_IN brave_JJ men_NNS ,_, he_PRP used_VBD his_PRP$ steadfast_NN but_CC badly_RB
equipped_JJ armies_NNS to_TO weaken_VB the_DT forces_NNS of_IN the_DT king_NN ._. Time_NN and_CC again_RB when_WRB
defeat_NN seemed_VBD unavoidable_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ strategy_NN turned_VBD the_DT tide_NN of_IN battle_NN ._. Often_RB
his_PRP$ men_NNS were_VBD ill-fed_JJ ._. During_IN the_DT winter_NN they_PRP lacked_VBD shoes_NNS and_CC coats_NNS
and_CC were_VBD forced_VBN to_TO live_VB in_IN unhealthy_JJ dug-outs_NNS ._. But_CC their_PRP$ trust_NN in_IN their_PRP$
great_JJ leader_NN was_VBD absolute_JJ and_CC they_PRP stuck_VBD it_PRP out_RP until_IN the_DT final_JJ hour_NN of_IN
victory_NN ._.

But_CC more_RBR interesting_JJ than_IN the_DT campaigns_NNS of_IN Washington_NNP or_CC the_DT diplomatic_JJ
triumphs_NNS of_IN Benjamin_NNP Franklin_NNP who_WP was_VBD in_IN Europe_NNP getting_VBG money_NN from_IN the_DT
French_JJ government_NN and_CC the_DT Amsterdam_NNP bankers_NNS ,_, was_VBD an_DT event_NN which_WDT occurred_VBD
early_RB in_IN the_DT revolution_NN ._. The_DT representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT different_JJ colonies_NNS
had_VBD gathered_VBN in_IN Philadelphia_NNP to_TO discuss_VB matters_NNS of_IN common_JJ importance_NN ._. It_PRP
was_VBD the_DT first_JJ year_NN of_IN the_DT Revolution_NNP ._. Most_JJS of_IN the_DT big_JJ towns_NNS of_IN the_DT
sea_NN coast_NN were_VBD still_RB in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT British_NNP ._. Reinforcements_NNS
from_IN England_NNP were_VBD arriving_VBG by_IN the_DT ship_NN load_NN ._. Only_RB men_NNS who_WP were_VBD deeply_RB
convinced_VBN of_IN the_DT righteousness_NN of_IN their_PRP$ cause_NN would_MD have_VB found_VBN the_DT
courage_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT momentous_JJ decision_NN of_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN June_NNP and_CC July_NNP of_IN
the_DT year_NN 1776._.

In_IN June_NNP ,_, Richard_NNP Henry_NNP Lee_NNP of_IN Virginia_NNP proposed_VBD a_DT motion_NN to_TO the_DT
Continental_NNP Congress_NNP that_IN "_`` these_DT united_VBN colonies_NNS are_VBP ,_, and_CC of_IN right_NN ought_MD
to_TO be_VB ,_, free_JJ and_CC independent_JJ states_NNS ,_, that_IN they_PRP are_VBP absolved_VBN from_IN all_PDT
allegiance_NN to_TO the_DT British_JJ crown_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN all_DT political_JJ connection_NN
between_IN them_PRP and_CC the_DT state_NN of_IN Great_NNP Britain_NNP is_VBZ and_CC ought_MD to_TO be_VB ,_, totally_RB
dissolved_VBN ."_NNS

The_DT motion_NN was_VBD seconded_VBN by_IN John_NNP Adams_NNP of_IN Massachusetts_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD carried_VBN
on_IN July_NNP the_DT second_JJ and_CC on_IN July_NNP fourth_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN an_DT official_NN
Declaration_NNP of_IN Independence_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN Thomas_NNP Jefferson_NNP ,_, a_DT
serious_JJ and_CC exceedingly_RB capable_JJ student_NN of_IN both_DT politics_NNS and_CC government_NN
and_CC destined_VBN to_TO be_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS famous_JJ of_IN out_IN American_JJ presidents_NNS ._.

When_WRB news_NN of_IN this_DT event_NN reached_VBD Europe_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN the_DT final_JJ
victory_NN of_IN the_DT colonists_NNS and_CC the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT famous_JJ Constitution_NNP of_IN
the_DT year_NN 1787_CD (_-LRB- the_DT first_JJ of_IN all_DT written_JJ constitutions_NNS )_-RRB- it_PRP caused_VBD great_JJ
interest_NN ._. The_DT dynastic_JJ system_NN of_IN the_DT highly_RB centralised_JJ states_NNS which_WDT had_VBD
been_VBN developed_VBN after_IN the_DT great_JJ religious_JJ wars_NNS of_IN the_DT seventeenth_JJ century_NN
had_VBD reached_VBN the_DT height_NN of_IN its_PRP$ power_NN ._. Everywhere_EX the_DT palace_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN
had_VBD grown_VBN to_TO enormous_JJ proportions_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT cities_NNS of_IN the_DT royal_JJ realm_NN
were_VBD being_VBG surrounded_VBN by_IN rapidly_RB growing_VBG acres_NNS of_IN slums_NNS ._. The_DT inhabitants_NNS
of_IN those_DT slums_NNS were_VBD showing_VBG signs_NNS of_IN restlessness_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD quite_RB
helpless_JJ ._. But_CC the_DT higher_JJR classes_NNS ,_, the_DT nobles_NNS and_CC the_DT professional_JJ men_NNS ,_,
they_PRP too_RB were_VBD beginning_VBG to_TO have_VB certain_JJ doubts_NNS about_IN the_DT economic_JJ and_CC
political_JJ conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT they_PRP lived_VBD ._. The_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT American_NNP
colonists_NNS showed_VBD them_PRP that_IN many_JJ things_NNS were_VBD possible_JJ which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN held_VBN
impossible_JJ only_RB a_DT short_JJ time_NN before_RB ._.

According_VBG to_TO the_DT poet_NN ,_, the_DT shot_NN which_WDT opened_VBD the_DT battle_NN of_IN Lexington_NNP was_VBD
"_`` heard_VBD around_IN the_DT world_NN ."_NN That_DT was_VBD a_DT bit_NN of_IN an_DT exaggeration_NN ._. The_DT Chinese_NNPS
and_CC the_DT Japanese_JJ and_CC the_DT Russians_NNPS (_-LRB- not_RB to_TO speak_VB of_IN the_DT Australians_NNPS ,_, who_WP
had_VBD just_RB been_VBN re-discovered_VBN by_IN Captain_NNP Cook_NNP ,_, whom_WP they_PRP killed_VBD for_IN his_PRP$
trouble_NN ,)_, never_RB heard_VBN of_IN it_PRP at_IN all_DT ._. But_CC it_PRP carried_VBD across_IN the_DT Atlantic_NNP
Ocean_NNP ._. It_PRP landed_VBD in_IN the_DT powder_NN house_NN of_IN European_JJ discontent_NN and_CC in_IN
France_NNP it_PRP caused_VBD an_DT explosion_NN which_WDT rocked_VBD the_DT entire_JJ continent_NN from_IN
Petrograd_NNP to_TO Madrid_NNP and_CC buried_VBD the_DT representatives_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ statecraft_NN
and_CC the_DT old_JJ diplomacy_NN under_IN several_JJ tons_NNS of_IN democratic_JJ bricks_NNS ._.




THE_DT FRENCH_NNP REVOLUTION_NN

THE_DT GREAT_NNP FRENCH_NNP REVOLUTION_NNP PROCLAIMS_NNP THE_DT PRINCIPLES_NNP OF_IN LIBERTY_NNP ,_,
FRATERNITY_NN AND_CC EQUALITY_NN UNTO_IN ALL_NNP THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN THE_DT EARTH_NN


BEFORE_VB we_PRP talk_VB about_IN a_DT revolution_NN it_PRP is_VBZ just_RB as_RB well_RB that_IN we_PRP explain_VBP
just_RB what_WP this_DT word_NN means_VBZ ._. In_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN a_DT great_JJ Russian_JJ writer_NN (_-LRB- and_CC
Russians_NNPS ought_MD to_TO know_VB what_WP they_PRP are_VBP talking_VBG about_IN in_IN this_DT field_NN )_-RRB- a_DT
revolution_NN is_VBZ "_`` a_DT swift_JJ overthrow_JJ ,_, in_IN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ,_, of_IN institutions_NNS
which_WDT have_VBP taken_VBN centuries_NNS to_TO root_NN in_IN the_DT soil_NN ,_, and_CC seem_VBP so_RB fixed_VBN and_CC
immovable_JJ that_IN even_RB the_DT most_JJS ardent_JJ reformers_NNS hardly_RB dare_VBP to_TO attack_VB them_PRP
in_IN their_PRP$ writings_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT fall_NN ,_, the_DT crumbling_VBG away_RB in_IN a_DT brief_NN
period_NN ,_, of_IN all_DT that_IN up_IN to_TO that_DT time_NN has_VBZ composed_VBN the_DT essence_NN of_IN social_JJ ,_,
religious_JJ ,_, political_JJ and_CC economic_JJ life_NN in_IN a_DT nation_NN ."_.

Such_JJ a_DT revolution_NN took_VBD place_NN in_IN France_NNP in_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN when_WRB
the_DT old_JJ civilisation_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN had_VBD grown_VBN stale_JJ ._. The_DT king_NN in_IN the_DT
days_NNS of_IN Louis_NNP XIV_NNP had_VBD become_VBN EVERYTHING_NNP and_CC was_VBD the_DT state_NN ._. The_DT Nobility_NNP ,_,
formerly_RB the_DT civil_JJ servant_NN of_IN the_DT federal_JJ state_NN ,_, found_VBD itself_PRP without_IN
any_DT duties_NNS and_CC became_VBD a_DT social_JJ ornament_NN of_IN the_DT royal_JJ court_NN ._.

This_DT French_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, cost_VBD incredible_JJ
sums_NNS of_IN money_NN ._. This_DT money_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB produced_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN taxes_NNS ._.
Unfortunately_RB the_DT kings_NNS of_IN France_NNP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN strong_JJ enough_RB to_TO force_VB
the_DT nobility_NN and_CC the_DT clergy_NN to_TO pay_VB their_PRP$ share_NN of_IN these_DT taxes_NNS ._. Hence_RB
the_DT taxes_NNS were_VBD paid_VBN entirely_RB by_IN the_DT agricultural_JJ population_NN ._. But_CC the_DT
peasants_NNS living_VBG in_IN dreary_JJ hovels_NNS ,_, no_RB longer_RB in_IN intimate_JJ contact_NN with_IN
their_PRP$ former_JJ landlords_NNS ,_, but_CC victims_NNS of_IN cruel_JJ and_CC incompetent_JJ land_NN
agents_NNS ,_, were_VBD going_VBG from_IN bad_JJ to_TO worse_JJR ._. Why_WRB should_MD they_PRP work_VB and_CC exert_VB
themselves_PRP ?_. Increased_VBN returns_NNS upon_IN their_PRP$ land_NN merely_RB meant_VBD more_JJR taxes_NNS
and_CC nothing_NN for_IN themselves_PRP and_CC therefore_RB they_PRP neglected_VBD their_PRP$ fields_NNS as_IN
much_RB as_IN they_PRP dared_VBD ._.

Hence_RB we_PRP have_VBP a_DT king_NN who_WP wanders_VBZ in_IN empty_JJ splendour_NN through_IN the_DT vast_JJ
halls_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ palaces_NNS ,_, habitually_RB followed_VBN by_IN hungry_JJ office_NN seekers_NNS ,_, all_DT
of_IN whom_WP live_VBP upon_IN the_DT revenue_NN obtained_VBN from_IN peasants_NNS who_WP are_VBP no_RB better_RBR
than_IN the_DT beasts_NNS of_IN the_DT fields_NNS ._. It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT pleasant_JJ picture_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP
is_VBZ not_RB exaggerated_JJ ._. There_EX was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, another_DT side_NN to_TO the_DT so-called_JJ
"_`` Ancien_NNP Regime_NNP "_'' which_WDT we_PRP must_MD keep_VB in_IN mind_NN ._.

A_DT wealthy_JJ middle_NN class_NN ,_, closely_RB connected_VBN with_IN the_DT nobility_NN (_-LRB- by_IN the_DT
usual_JJ process_NN of_IN the_DT rich_JJ banker_NN '_'' s_PRP daughter_NN marrying_VBG the_DT poor_JJ baron_NN '_'' s_PRP
son_NN )_-RRB- and_CC a_DT court_NN composed_VBN of_IN all_PDT the_DT most_RBS entertaining_JJ people_NNS of_IN
France_NNP ,_, had_VBD brought_VBN the_DT polite_JJ art_NN of_IN graceful_JJ living_NN to_TO its_PRP$ highest_JJS
development_NN ._. As_IN the_DT best_JJS brains_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO
occupy_VB themselves_PRP with_IN questions_NNS of_IN political_JJ economics_NNS ,_, they_PRP spent_VBD
their_PRP$ idle_JJ hours_NNS upon_IN the_DT discussion_NN of_IN abstract_JJ ideas_NNS ._.

As_IN fashions_NNS in_IN modes_NNS of_IN thought_NN and_CC personal_JJ behaviour_NN are_VBP quite_RB as_RB
likely_JJ to_TO run_VB to_TO extremes_NNS as_IN fashion_NN in_IN dress_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD natural_JJ that_IN the_DT
most_RBS artificial_JJ society_NN of_IN that_DT day_NN should_MD take_VB a_DT tremendous_JJ interest_NN
in_IN what_WP they_PRP considered_VBD "_`` the_DT simple_JJ life_NN ."_JJ The_DT king_NN and_CC the_DT queen_NN ,_, the_DT
absolute_JJ and_CC unquestioned_JJ proprietors_NNS of_IN this_DT country_NN galled_VBD France_NNP ,_,
together_RB with_IN all_DT its_PRP$ colonies_NNS and_CC dependencies_NNS ,_, went_VBD to_TO live_VB in_IN funny_JJ
little_JJ country_NN houses_VBZ all_DT dressed_VBN up_RP as_IN milk-maids_NNS and_CC stable-boys_NNS and_CC
played_VBD at_IN being_VBG shepherds_NNS in_IN a_DT happy_JJ vale_NN of_IN ancient_JJ Hellas_NNP ._. Around_''
them_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ courtiers_NNS danced_VBD attendance_NN ,_, their_PRP$ court-musicians_NNS composed_VBN
lovely_JJ minuets_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ court_NN barbers_NNS devised_VBN more_RBR and_CC more_RBR elaborate_JJ and_CC
costly_JJ headgear_NN ,_, until_IN from_IN sheer_JJ boredom_NN and_CC lack_NN of_IN real_JJ jobs_NNS ,_, this_DT
whole_JJ artificial_JJ world_NN of_IN Versailles_NNP (_-LRB- the_DT great_JJ show_NN place_NN which_WDT Louis_NNP
XIV_NNP had_VBD built_VBN far_RB away_RB from_IN his_PRP$ noisy_JJ and_CC restless_JJ city_NN )_-RRB- talked_VBN of_IN
nothing_NN but_CC those_DT subjects_NNS which_WDT were_VBD furthest_RB removed_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ
lives_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ starving_VBG will_MD talk_VB of_IN nothing_NN except_IN food_NN ._.

When_WRB Voltaire_NNP ,_, the_DT courageous_JJ old_JJ philosopher_NN ,_, playwright_NN ,_, historian_NN and_CC
novelist_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT great_JJ enemy_NN of_IN all_DT religious_JJ and_CC political_JJ tyranny_NN ,_,
began_VBD to_TO throw_VB his_PRP$ bombs_NNS of_IN criticism_NN at_IN everything_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT
Established_NNP Order_NNP of_IN Things_NNS ,_, the_DT whole_JJ French_JJ world_NN applauded_VBD him_PRP and_CC
his_PRP$ theatrical_JJ pieces_NNS played_VBD to_TO standing_VBG room_NN only_RB ._. When_WRB Jean_NNP
Jacques_NNP Rousseau_NNP waxed_VBD sentimental_JJ about_IN primitive_JJ man_NN and_CC gave_VBD his_PRP$
contemporaries_NNS delightful_JJ descriptions_NNS of_IN the_DT happiness_NN of_IN the_DT original_JJ
inhabitants_NNS of_IN this_DT planet_NN ,_, (_-LRB- about_IN whom_WP he_PRP knew_VBD as_RB little_JJ as_IN he_PRP
did_VBD about_IN the_DT children_NNS ,_, upon_IN whose_WP$ education_NN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT recognised_VBN
authority_NN ,)_PRP all_DT France_NNP read_VBD his_PRP$ "_`` Social_NNP Contract_NNP "_'' and_CC this_DT society_NN in_IN
which_WDT the_DT king_NN and_CC the_DT state_NN were_VBD one_CD ,_, wept_VBD bitter_JJ tears_NNS when_WRB they_PRP
heard_VBN Rousseau_NNP '_'' s_VBZ appeal_NN for_IN a_DT return_NN to_TO the_DT blessed_VBN days_NNS when_WRB the_DT real_JJ
sovereignty_NN had_VBD lain_RB in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS and_CC when_WRB the_DT king_NN had_VBD
been_VBN merely_RB the_DT servant_NN of_IN his_PRP$ people_NNS ._.

When_WRB Montesquieu_NNP published_VBD his_PRP$ "_`` Persian_JJ Letters_NNS "_'' in_IN which_WDT two_CD
distinguished_VBN Persian_JJ travellers_NNS turn_VBP the_DT whole_JJ existing_VBG society_NN of_IN
France_NNP topsy-turvy_, and_CC poke_VBD fun_NN at_IN everything_NN from_IN the_DT king_NN down_RB to_TO
the_DT lowest_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ six_CD hundred_CD pastry_NN cooks_NNS ,_, the_DT book_NN immediately_RB went_VBD
through_IN four_CD editions_NNS and_CC assured_VBD the_DT writer_NN thousands_NNS of_IN readers_NNS for_IN
his_PRP$ famous_JJ discussion_NN of_IN the_DT "_`` Spirit_NNP of_IN the_DT Laws_NNP "_'' in_IN which_WDT the_DT noble_JJ
Baron_NNP compared_VBD the_DT excellent_JJ English_NNP system_NN with_IN the_DT backward_JJ system_NN of_IN
France_NNP and_CC advocated_VBN instead_RB of_IN an_DT absolute_JJ monarchy_NN the_DT establishment_NN
of_IN a_DT state_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT Executive_NNP ,_, the_DT Legislative_JJ and_CC the_DT Judicial_NNP
powers_NNS should_MD be_VB in_IN separate_JJ hands_NNS and_CC should_MD work_VB independently_RB of_IN each_DT
other_JJ ._. When_NNP Lebreton_NNP ,_, the_DT Parisian_NNP book-seller_NN ,_, announced_VBD that_IN Messieurs_NNS
Diderot_NNP ,_, d_CC '_POS Alembert_NNP ,_, Turgot_NNP and_CC a_DT score_NN of_IN other_JJ distinguished_JJ writers_NNS
were_VBD going_VBG to_TO publish_VB an_DT Encyclopaedia_NNP which_WDT was_VBD to_TO contain_VB "_`` all_PDT the_DT new_JJ
ideas_NNS and_CC the_DT new_JJ science_NN and_CC the_DT new_JJ knowledge_NN ,"_IN the_DT response_NN from_IN
the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN was_VBD most_RBS satisfactory_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB after_IN twenty-two_CD
years_NNS the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT twenty-eight_JJ volumes_NNS had_VBD been_VBN finished_VBN ,_, the_DT
somewhat_RB belated_JJ interference_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN could_MD not_RB repress_VB the_DT
enthusiasm_NN with_IN which_WDT French_JJ society_NN received_VBD this_DT most_RBS important_JJ but_CC
very_RB dangerous_JJ contribution_NN to_TO the_DT discussions_NNS of_IN the_DT day_NN ._.

Here_RB ,_, let_VB me_PRP give_VB you_PRP a_DT little_JJ warning_NN ._. When_WRB you_PRP read_VBD a_DT novel_NN about_IN
the_DT French_JJ revolution_NN or_CC see_VB a_DT play_NN or_CC a_DT movie_NN ,_, you_PRP will_MD easily_RB get_VB the_DT
impression_NN that_IN the_DT Revolution_NNP was_VBD the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT rabble_NN from_IN the_DT
Paris_NNP slums_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD nothing_NN of_IN the_DT kind_NN ._. The_DT mob_NN appears_VBZ often_RB upon_IN the_DT
revolutionary_JJ stage_NN ,_, but_CC invariably_RB at_IN the_DT instigation_NN and_CC under_IN the_DT
leadership_NN of_IN those_DT middle-class_JJ professional_JJ men_NNS who_WP used_VBD the_DT hungry_JJ
multitude_NN as_IN an_DT efficient_JJ ally_NN in_IN their_PRP$ warfare_NN upon_IN the_DT king_NN and_CC
his_PRP$ court_NN ._. But_CC the_DT fundamental_JJ ideas_NNS which_WDT caused_VBD the_DT revolution_NN were_VBD
invented_VBN by_IN a_DT few_JJ brilliant_JJ minds_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD at_IN first_RB introduced_VBN
into_IN the_DT charming_JJ drawing-rooms_NNS of_IN the_DT "_`` Ancien_NNP Regime_NNP "_'' to_TO provide_VB
amiable_JJ diversion_NN for_IN the_DT much-bored_JJ ladies_NNS and_CC gentlemen_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
Majesty_NNP '_POS s_PRP court_NN ._. These_DT pleasant_JJ but_CC careless_JJ people_NNS played_VBD with_IN the_DT
dangerous_JJ fireworks_NNS of_IN social_JJ criticism_NN until_IN the_DT sparks_NNS fell_VBD through_IN
the_DT cracks_NNS of_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD old_JJ and_CC rotten_JJ just_RB like_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN
the_DT building_NN ._. Those_DT sparks_NNPS unfortunately_RB landed_VBD in_IN the_DT basement_NN where_WRB
age-old_JJ rubbish_NN lay_VBD in_IN great_JJ confusion_NN ._. Then_RB there_EX was_VBD a_DT cry_NN of_IN fire_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN who_WP was_VBD interested_JJ in_IN everything_NN except_IN the_DT
management_NN of_IN his_PRP$ property_NN ,_, did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO put_VB the_DT small_JJ blaze_NN
out_RB ._. The_DT flame_NN spread_VBD rapidly_RB and_CC the_DT entire_JJ edifice_NN was_VBD consumed_VBN by_IN the_DT
conflagration_NN ,_, which_WDT we_PRP call_VBP the_DT Great_JJ French_NNP Revolution_NNP ._.

For_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN convenience_NN ,_, we_PRP can_MD divide_VB the_DT French_NNP Revolution_NNP into_IN
two_CD parts_NNS ._. From_IN 1789_CD to_TO 1791_CD there_EX was_VBD a_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR orderly_JJ attempt_NN to_TO
introduce_VB a_DT constitutional_JJ monarchy_NN ._. This_DT failed_VBD ,_, partly_RB through_IN lack_NN
of_IN good_JJ faith_NN and_CC stupidity_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT monarch_NN himself_PRP ,_, partly_RB
through_IN circumstances_NNS over_IN which_WDT nobody_NN had_VBD any_DT control_NN ._.

and_CC was_VBD now_RB used_VBN as_IN the_DT city_NN lock-up_NN for_IN pickpockets_NNS and_CC second-story_JJ

as_IN usual_JJ did_VBD nothing_NN ._. He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN hunting_VBG on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN the_DT fall_NN of_IN the_DT
Bastille_NNP and_CC he_PRP had_VBD shot_VBN several_JJ deer_NNS and_CC felt_VBD very_RB much_JJ pleased_JJ ._.

The_DT National_NNP Assembly_NNP now_RB set_VBD to_TO work_VB and_CC on_IN the_DT 4_CD th_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, with_IN
the_DT noise_NN of_IN the_DT Parisian_NNP multitude_NN in_IN their_PRP$ ears_NNS ,_, they_PRP abolished_VBD all_PDT
privileges_NNS ._. This_DT was_VBD followed_VBN on_IN the_DT 27_CD th_NN of_IN August_NNP by_IN the_DT "_'' Declaration_NNP
of_IN the_DT Rights_NNP of_IN Man_NNP ,"_, the_DT famous_JJ preamble_NN to_TO the_DT first_JJ French_JJ
constitution_NN ._. So_RB far_RB so_RB good_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT court_NN had_VBD apparently_RB not_RB yet_RB
learned_VBN its_PRP$ lesson_NN ._. There_EX was_VBD a_DT wide-spread_JJ suspicion_NN that_IN the_DT king_NN was_VBD
again_RB trying_VBG to_TO interfere_VB with_IN these_DT reforms_NNS and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT 5_CD th_NN
of_IN October_NNP ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT second_JJ riot_NN in_IN Paris_NNP ._. It_PRP spread_VBD to_TO Versailles_NNP
and_CC the_DT people_NNS were_VBD not_RB pacified_VBN until_IN they_PRP had_VBD brought_VBN the_DT king_NN back_RB to_TO
his_PRP$ palace_NN in_IN Paris_NNP ._. They_PRP did_VBD not_RB trust_VB him_PRP in_IN Versailles_NNP ._. They_PRP liked_VBD to_TO
have_VB him_PRP where_WRB they_PRP could_MD watch_VB him_PRP and_CC control_VB his_PRP$ correspondence_NN with_IN
his_PRP$ relatives_NNS in_IN Vienna_NNP and_CC Madrid_NNP and_CC the_DT other_JJ courts_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT Assembly_NNP meanwhile_RB ,_, Mirabeau_NNP ,_, a_DT nobleman_NN who_WP had_VBD become_VBN leader_NN of_IN
the_DT Third_NNP Estate_NNP ,_, was_VBD beginning_VBG to_TO put_VB order_NN into_IN chaos_NN ._. But_CC before_IN he_PRP
could_MD save_VB the_DT position_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN he_PRP died_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT 2_CD nd_NN of_IN April_NNP of_IN the_DT
year_NN 1791._VBD The_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP now_RB began_VBD to_TO fear_VB for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ life_NN ,_, tried_VBD to_TO
escape_NN on_IN the_DT 21_CD st_NN of_IN June_NNP ._. He_PRP was_VBD recognised_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ picture_NN on_IN
a_DT coin_NN ,_, was_VBD stopped_VBN near_IN the_DT village_NN of_IN Varennes_NNP by_IN members_NNS of_IN the_DT
National_NNP Guard_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD brought_VBN back_RP to_TO Paris_NNP ._.

In_IN September_NNP of_IN 1791,_CD the_DT first_JJ constitution_NN of_IN France_NNP was_VBD accepted_VBN ,_, and_CC
the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT National_NNP Assembly_NNP went_VBD home_NN ._. On_IN the_DT first_JJ of_IN October_NNP
of_IN 1791,_CD the_DT legislative_JJ assembly_NN came_VBD together_RB to_TO continue_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN
the_DT National_NNP Assembly_NNP ._. In_IN this_DT new_JJ gathering_NN of_IN popular_JJ representatives_NNS

which_WDT they_PRP held_VBD their_PRP$ political_JJ meetings_NNS ._. These_DT young_JJ men_NNS (_-LRB- most_RBS of_IN them_PRP

send_VB an_DT army_NN to_TO invade_VB France_NNP and_CC deliver_VB the_DT king_NN ._.

Then_RB a_DT terrible_JJ panic_NN of_IN fear_NN swept_VBN throughout_IN the_DT land_NN of_IN France_NNP ._. All_PDT
the_DT pent-up_JJ hatred_NN of_IN years_NNS of_IN hunger_NN and_CC suffering_NN came_VBD to_TO a_DT horrible_NN

crowd_NN was_VBD retiring_VBG ._. The_DT people_NNS ,_, drunk_JJ with_IN blood_NN and_CC noise_NN and_CC cheap_NN

taken_VBN as_IN a_DT prisoner_NN to_TO the_DT old_JJ castle_NN of_IN the_DT Temple_NNP ._.

In_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN September_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1792,_IN the_DT crowd_NN broke_VBD
into_IN the_DT jails_NNS and_CC murdered_VBN all_DT the_DT prisoners_NNS ._. The_DT government_NN did_VBD not_RB
interfere_VB ._. The_DT Jacobins_NNP ,_, headed_VBN by_IN Danton_NNP ,_, knew_VBD that_IN this_DT crisis_NN meant_VBN

the_DT most_JJS brutal_JJ audacity_NN could_MD save_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT Legislative_NNP Assembly_NNP was_VBD

extreme_JJ revolutionists_NNS ._. The_DT king_NN was_VBD formally_RB accused_VBN of_IN high_JJ treason_NN

Then_RB the_DT Jacobins_NNP turned_VBD against_IN the_DT more_RBR moderate_JJ element_NN in_IN the_DT

In_IN October_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1793_IN the_DT Constitution_NNP was_VBD suspended_VBN by_IN the_DT
Jacobins_NNP "_`` until_IN peace_NN should_MD have_VB been_VBN declared_VBN ."_IN All_DT power_NN was_VBD placed_VBN

with_IN it_PRP the_DT "_`` Terror_NNP "_'' which_WDT for_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT year_NN killed_VBN good_JJ and_CC bad_JJ and_CC
indifferent_JJ people_NNS at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN seventy_CD or_CC eighty_CD a_DT day_NN ._.

The_DT autocratic_JJ rule_NN of_IN the_DT King_NNP had_VBD been_VBN destroyed_VBN ._. It_PRP was_VBD succeeded_VBN
by_IN the_DT tyranny_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ people_NNS who_WP had_VBD such_JJ a_DT passionate_JJ love_NN for_IN

disagreed_VBD with_IN them_PRP ._. France_NNP was_VBD turned_VBN into_IN a_DT slaughter_NN house_NN ._. Everybody_NN
suspected_VBN everybody_NN else_RB ._. No_DT one_NN felt_VBD safe_JJ ._. Out_IN of_IN sheer_JJ fear_NN ,_, a_DT
few_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ Convention_NN ,_, who_WP knew_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD the_DT next_JJ
candidates_NNS for_IN the_DT scaffold_NN ,_, finally_RB turned_VBD against_IN Robespierre_NNP ,_, who_WP
had_VBD already_RB decapitated_VBN most_JJS of_IN his_PRP$ former_JJ colleagues_NNS ._. Robespierre_NNP ,_,
"_`` the_DT only_RB true_JJ and_CC pure_JJ Democrat_NNP ,"_, tried_VBD to_TO kill_VB himself_PRP but_CC failed_VBD His_PRP$
shattered_VBN jaw_NN was_VBD hastily_RB bandaged_VBN and_CC he_PRP was_VBD dragged_VBN to_TO the_DT guillotine_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT 27_CD th_NN of_IN July_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT year_NN 1794_CD (_-LRB- the_DT 9_CD th_IN Thermidor_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN

Terror_NNP came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT Paris_NNP danced_VBD with_IN joy_NN ._.

The_DT dangerous_JJ position_NN of_IN France_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, made_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT

experiments_NNS ,_, the_DT like_JJ of_IN which_WDT the_DT world_NN had_VBD never_RB seen_VBN before_IN ._.




NAPOLEON_NNP

NAPOLEON_NNP


NAPOLEON_NNP was_VBD born_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1769,_IN the_DT third_JJ son_NN of_IN Carlo_NNP Maria_NNP
Buonaparte_NNP ,_, an_DT honest_JJ notary_JJ public_NN of_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Ajaccio_NNP in_IN the_DT island_NN
of_IN Corsica_NNP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ good_JJ wife_NN ,_, Letizia_NNP Ramolino_NNP ._. He_PRP therefore_RB was_VBD not_RB
a_DT Frenchman_NNP ,_, but_CC an_DT Italian_NNP whose_WP$ native_JJ island_NN (_-LRB- an_DT old_JJ Greek_NNP ,_,
Carthaginian_NNP and_CC Roman_NNP colony_NN in_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP Sea_NNP )_-RRB- had_VBD for_IN years_NNS
been_VBN struggling_VBG to_TO regain_VB its_PRP$ independence_NN ,_, first_RB of_IN all_DT from_IN the_DT
Genoese_NNP ,_, and_CC after_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN from_IN the_DT French_NNP ,_,
who_WP had_VBD kindly_RB offered_VBN to_TO help_VB the_DT Corsicans_NNPS in_IN their_PRP$ struggle_NN for_IN
freedom_NN and_CC had_VBD then_RB occupied_VBN the_DT island_NN for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ benefit_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT first_JJ twenty_CD years_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, young_JJ Napoleon_NNP was_VBD a_DT
professional_JJ Corsican_NNP patriot_NN —_IN a_DT Corsican_NNP Sinn_NNP Feiner_NNP ,_, who_WP hoped_VBD to_TO
deliver_VB his_PRP$ beloved_JJ country_NN from_IN the_DT yoke_NN of_IN the_DT bitterly_RB hated_VBN French_NNP
enemy_NN ._. But_CC the_DT French_JJ revolution_NN had_VBD unexpectedly_RB recognised_VBN the_DT
claims_NNS of_IN the_DT Corsicans_NNP and_CC gradually_RB Napoleon_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD received_VBN a_DT good_JJ
training_NN at_IN the_DT military_JJ school_NN of_IN Brienne_NNP ,_, drifted_VBD into_IN the_DT service_NN of_IN
his_PRP$ adopted_VBN country_NN ._. Although_IN he_PRP never_RB learned_VBD to_TO spell_VB French_JJ correctly_RB
or_CC to_TO speak_VB it_PRP without_IN a_DT broad_JJ Italian_JJ accent_NN ,_, he_PRP became_VBD a_DT Frenchman_NNP ._.
In_IN due_JJ time_NN he_PRP came_VBD to_TO stand_VB as_IN the_DT highest_JJS expression_NN of_IN all_DT French_JJ
virtues_NNS ._. At_IN present_JJ he_PRP is_VBZ regarded_VBN as_IN the_DT symbol_NN of_IN the_DT Gallic_NNP genius_NN ._.

Napoleon_NN was_VBD what_WP is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT fast_JJ worker_NN ._. His_PRP$ career_NN does_VBZ not_RB cover_VB
more_RBR than_IN twenty_CD years_NNS ._. In_IN that_DT short_JJ span_NN of_IN time_NN he_PRP fought_VBD more_JJR wars_NNS
and_CC gained_VBD more_JJR victories_NNS and_CC marched_VBD more_JJR miles_NNS and_CC conquered_VBD more_RBR
square_NN kilometers_NNS and_CC killed_VBD more_JJR people_NNS and_CC brought_VBD about_IN more_JJR reforms_NNS
and_CC generally_RB upset_VBN Europe_NNP to_TO a_DT greater_JJR extent_NN than_IN anybody_NN (_-LRB- including_VBG
Alexander_NNP the_DT Great_NNP and_CC Jenghis_NNP Khan_NNP )_-RRB- had_VBD ever_RB managed_VBN to_TO do_VB ._.

He_PRP was_VBD a_DT little_JJ fellow_NN and_CC during_IN the_DT first_JJ years_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN his_PRP$ health_NN
was_VBD not_RB very_RB good_JJ ._. He_PRP never_RB impressed_VBD anybody_NN by_IN his_PRP$ good_JJ looks_NNS and_CC he_PRP
remained_VBD to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ days_NNS very_RB clumsy_JJ whenever_WRB he_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN
to_TO appear_VB at_IN a_DT social_JJ function_NN ._. He_PRP did_VBD not_RB enjoy_VB a_DT single_JJ advantage_NN of_IN
breeding_VBG or_CC birth_NN or_CC riches_NNS ._. For_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ youth_NN he_PRP was_VBD
desperately_RB poor_JJ and_CC often_RB he_PRP had_VBD to_TO go_VB without_IN a_DT meal_NN or_CC was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO
make_VB a_DT few_JJ extra_JJ pennies_NNS in_IN curious_JJ ways_NNS ._.

He_PRP gave_VBD little_JJ promise_NN as_IN a_DT literary_JJ genius_NN ._. When_WRB he_PRP competed_VBD for_IN a_DT
prize_NN offered_VBN by_IN the_DT Academy_NNP of_IN Lyons_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ essay_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB next_JJ to_TO
the_DT last_JJ and_CC he_PRP was_VBD number_NN 15_CD out_IN of_IN 16_CD candidates_NNS ._. But_CC he_PRP overcame_VBD all_PDT
these_DT difficulties_NNS through_IN his_PRP$ absolute_JJ and_CC unshakable_JJ belief_NN in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ
destiny_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ glorious_JJ future_NN ._. Ambition_NN was_VBD the_DT main-spring_NN
of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._. The_DT thought_NN of_IN self_NN ,_, the_DT worship_NN of_IN that_DT capital_NN letter_NN "_`` N_NNP "_''
with_IN which_WDT he_PRP signed_VBD all_DT his_PRP$ letters_NNS ,_, and_CC which_WDT recurred_VBD forever_RB in_IN the_DT
ornaments_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ hastily_RB constructed_VBN palaces_NNS ,_, the_DT absolute_JJ will_NN to_TO make_VB
the_DT name_NN Napoleon_NN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ thing_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN next_JJ to_TO the_DT name_NN
of_IN God_NNP ,_, these_DT desires_NNS carried_VBD Napoleon_NNP to_TO a_DT pinnacle_NN of_IN fame_NN which_WDT no_UH
other_JJ man_NN has_VBZ ever_RB reached_VBN ._.

When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD a_DT half-pay_JJ lieutenant_NN ,_, young_JJ Bonaparte_NNP was_VBD very_RB fond_VB of_IN the_DT
"_`` Lives_NNS of_IN Famous_NNP Men_NNP "_'' which_WDT Plutarch_NNP ,_, the_DT Roman_NNP historian_NN ,_, had_VBD written_VBN ._.
But_CC he_PRP never_RB tried_VBD to_TO live_VB up_RP to_TO the_DT high_JJ standard_NN of_IN character_NN set_VBN by_IN
these_DT heroes_NNS of_IN the_DT older_JJR days_NNS ._. Napoleon_NN seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN devoid_JJ of_IN
all_PDT those_DT considerate_JJ and_CC thoughtful_JJ sentiments_NNS which_WDT make_VBP men_NNS different_JJ
from_IN the_DT animals_NNS ._. It_PRP will_MD be_VB very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO decide_VB with_IN any_DT degree_NN of_IN
accuracy_NN whether_IN he_PRP ever_RB loved_VBD anyone_NN besides_IN himself_PRP ._. He_PRP kept_VBD a_DT civil_JJ
tongue_NN to_TO his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, but_CC Letizia_NNP had_VBD the_DT air_NN and_CC manners_NNS of_IN a_DT great_JJ
lady_NN and_CC after_IN the_DT fashion_NN of_IN Italian_JJ mothers_NNS ,_, she_PRP knew_VBD how_WRB to_TO rule_VB her_PRP$
brood_NN of_IN children_NNS and_CC command_VB their_PRP$ respect_NN ._. For_IN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS he_PRP was_VBD fond_JJ
of_IN Josephine_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ pretty_JJ Creole_NNP wife_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD the_DT daughter_NN of_IN a_DT French_JJ
officer_NN of_IN Martinique_NNP and_CC the_DT widow_NN of_IN the_DT Vicomte_NNP de_NNP Beauharnais_NNP ,_,
who_WP had_VBD been_VBN executed_VBN by_IN Robespierre_NNP when_WRB he_PRP lost_VBD a_DT battle_NN against_IN the_DT
Prussians_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT Emperor_NNP divorced_VBD her_PRP when_WRB she_PRP failed_VBD to_TO give_VB him_PRP a_DT
son_NN and_CC heir_NN and_CC married_VBD the_DT daughter_NN of_IN the_DT Austrian_NNP Emperor_NNP ,_, because_IN
it_PRP seemed_VBD good_JJ policy_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT siege_NN of_IN Toulon_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP gained_VBD great_JJ fame_NN as_IN commander_NN of_IN
a_DT battery_NN ,_, Napoleon_NNP studied_VBD Macchiavelli_NNP with_IN industrious_JJ care_NN ._. He_PRP
followed_VBD the_DT advice_NN of_IN the_DT Florentine_NNP statesman_NN and_CC never_RB kept_VBD his_PRP$ word_NN
when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ advantage_NN to_TO break_VB it_PRP ._. The_DT word_NN "_`` gratitude_NN "_'' did_VBD not_RB
occur_VB in_IN his_PRP$ personal_JJ dictionary_NN ._. Neither_DT ,_, to_TO be_VB quite_RB fair_JJ ,_, did_VBD he_PRP
expect_VB it_PRP from_IN others_NNS ._. He_PRP was_VBD totally_RB indifferent_JJ to_TO human_JJ suffering_NN ._. He_PRP
executed_VBN prisoners_NNS of_IN war_NN (_-LRB- in_IN Egypt_NNP in_IN 1798)_DT who_WP had_VBD been_VBN promised_VBN their_PRP$
lives_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP quietly_RB allowed_VBD his_PRP$ wounded_VBN in_IN Syria_NNP to_TO be_VB chloroformed_VBN
when_WRB he_PRP found_VBD it_PRP impossible_JJ to_TO transport_VB them_PRP to_TO his_PRP$ ships_NNS ._. He_PRP
ordered_VBD the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Enghien_NNP to_TO be_VB condemned_VBN to_TO death_NN by_IN a_DT prejudiced_VBN
court-martial_JJ and_CC to_TO be_VB shot_VBN contrary_JJ to_TO all_DT law_NN on_IN the_DT sole_JJ ground_NN that_WDT
the_DT "_`` Bourbons_NNP needed_VBD a_DT warning_NN ."_IN He_PRP decreed_VBD that_IN those_DT German_JJ officers_NNS

self_NN ._. He_PRP felt_VBD sick_JJ ._. He_PRP got_VBD tired_VBN easily_RB ._. He_PRP slept_VBD when_WRB he_PRP ought_MD to_TO have_VB
been_VBN up_IN directing_VBG the_DT attack_NN of_IN his_PRP$ advance-guard_NN ._. Besides_IN ,_, he_PRP missed_VBD

Early_RB in_IN June_NNP his_PRP$ armies_NNS entered_VBD Belgium_NNP ._. On_IN the_DT 16_CD th_NN of_IN that_DT month_NN he_PRP

THE_DT HOLY_NNP ALLIANCE_NNP

AS_IN SOON_NNP AS_IN NAPOLEON_NNP HAD_NNP BEEN_NNP SENT_NNP TO_TO ST_NNP ._. HELENA_NNP THE_DT RULERS_NNS WHO_WP SO_NNP OFTEN_NNS

was_VBD over_IN ._. They_PRP were_VBD very_RB eloquent_JJ upon_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT terrible_JJ

Another_DT German_JJ potentate_NN ,_, not_RB to_TO be_VB outdone_VBN in_IN this_DT noble_JJ hatred_NN for_IN the_DT

the_DT whole_NN of_IN Europe_NNP into_IN an_DT armed_JJ camp_NN and_CC killed_VBD almost_RB an_DT entire_JJ

you_PRP used_VBD to_TO do_VB ._. Tell_VB us_PRP what_WP we_PRP owe_VBP you_PRP for_IN taxes_NNS and_CC leave_VB us_PRP alone_RB ._. We_PRP
are_VBP busy_JJ repairing_VBG the_DT damage_NN of_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN liberty_NN ."_.

Europe_NNP had_VBD peace_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD the_DT peace_NN of_IN the_DT cemetery_NN ._.

The_DT three_CD most_RBS important_JJ men_NNS at_IN Vienna_NNP were_VBD the_DT Emperor_NNP Alexander_NNP of_IN

grab_NN because_IN it_PRP was_VBD against_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ interest_NN that_IN either_DT Prussia_NNP or_CC

that_IN the_DT French_JJ people_NNS were_VBD not_RB made_VBN to_TO suffer_VB for_IN the_DT ten_CD years_NNS

the_DT matter_NN ._. Napoleon_NN had_VBD forced_VBN them_PRP to_TO act_VB at_IN his_PRP$ bidding_NN ._. But_CC Napoleon_NNP
was_VBD gone_VBN and_CC Louis_NNP XVIII_NNP was_VBD on_IN the_DT throne_NN ._. "_'' Give_VB him_PRP a_DT chance_NN ,"_NN
Talleyrand_NNP pleaded_VBD ._. And_CC the_DT Allies_NNP ,_, glad_JJ to_TO see_VB a_DT legitimate_JJ king_NN

Bourbons_NNS were_VBD given_VBN their_PRP$ chance_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT they_PRP made_VBD such_JJ use_NN that_IN they_PRP
were_VBD driven_VBN out_RP after_IN fifteen_CD years_NNS ._.

The_DT second_JJ man_NN of_IN the_DT triumvirate_NN of_IN Vienna_NNP was_VBD Metternich_NNP ,_, the_DT Austrian_JJ
prime_JJ minister_NN ,_, the_DT leader_NN of_IN the_DT foreign_JJ policy_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN
Habsburg_NNP ._. Wenzel_NNP Lothar_NNP ,_, Prince_NNP of_IN Metternich-Winneburg_NNP ,_, was_VBD exactly_RB
what_WP the_DT name_NN suggests_VBZ ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT Grand_NNP Seigneur_NNP ,_, a_DT very_RB handsome_JJ
gentleman_NN with_IN very_RB fine_JJ manners_NNS ,_, immensely_RB rich_JJ ,_, and_CC very_RB able_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT
product_NN of_IN a_DT society_NN which_WDT lived_VBD a_DT thousand_CD miles_NNS away_RB from_IN the_DT sweating_NN
multitudes_NNS who_WP worked_VBD and_CC slaved_VBD in_IN the_DT cities_NNS and_CC on_IN the_DT farms_NNS ._. As_IN a_DT

when_WRB the_DT French_NNP Revolution_NNP broke_VBD out_RP ._. Strassburg_NNP ,_, the_DT city_NN which_WDT gave_VBD

Metternich_NNP remembered_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ pleasant_JJ social_JJ life_NN had_VBD been_VBN sadly_RB

Fatherland_NNP ._.

The_DT whole_JJ thing_NN had_VBD filled_VBN the_DT young_JJ Austrian_NNP with_IN disgust_NN ._. It_PRP was_VBD

I_PRP do_VBP not_RB want_VB you_PRP to_TO think_VB of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP as_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN paper_NN

The_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP was_VBD the_DT joint_JJ labour_NN of_IN an_DT unfortunate_JJ man_NN who_WP had_VBD

of_IN a_DT new_JJ and_CC strange_JJ creed_NN ._. I_PRP am_VBP not_RB giving_VBG away_RB any_DT secrets_NNS when_WRB I_PRP tell_VBP
you_PRP these_DT details_NNS ._. Such_JJ sober_JJ minded_JJ people_NNS as_IN Castlereagh_NNP ,_, Metternich_NNP
and_CC Talleyrand_NNP fully_RB understood_VBD the_DT limited_JJ abilities_NNS of_IN the_DT sentimental_JJ

police_NN and_CC the_DT thing_NN was_VBD done_VBN ._.

Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP as_IN utter_JJ rubbish_NN and_CC not_RB worth_JJ the_DT paper_NN upon_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD
written_VBN ,_, they_PRP listened_VBD patiently_RB to_TO the_DT Tsar_NN when_WRB he_PRP read_VBD them_PRP the_DT first_JJ

basis_NN of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Scriptures_NNP ._. For_IN this_DT is_VBZ what_WP the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP tried_VBD
to_TO do_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT signers_NNS of_IN the_DT document_NN solemnly_RB declared_VBD that_IN they_PRP would_MD
"_`` in_IN the_DT administration_NN of_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ states_NNS and_CC in_IN their_PRP$ political_JJ

Christian_NNP Charity_NNP and_CC Peace_NNP ,_, which_WDT far_RB from_IN being_VBG applicable_JJ only_RB to_TO
private_JJ concerns_NNS must_MD have_VB an_DT immediate_JJ influence_NN on_IN the_DT councils_NNS of_IN
princes_NNS ,_, and_CC must_MD guide_VB all_DT their_PRP$ steps_NNS as_IN being_VBG the_DT only_JJ means_NNS of_IN
consolidating_VBG human_JJ institutions_NNS and_CC remedying_VBG their_PRP$ imperfections_NNS ."_.
They_PRP then_RB proceeded_VBD to_TO promise_VB each_DT other_JJ that_IN they_PRP would_MD remain_VB united_VBN
"_`` by_IN the_DT bonds_NNS of_IN a_DT true_JJ and_CC indissoluble_JJ fraternity_NN ,_, and_CC considering_VBG
each_DT other_JJ as_IN fellow-countrymen_NNS ,_, they_PRP would_MD on_IN all_DT occasions_NNS and_CC in_IN all_PDT
places_NNS lend_VBP each_DT other_JJ aid_NN and_CC assistance_NN ."_NNS And_CC more_JJR words_NNS to_TO the_DT same_JJ
effect_NN ._.

Eventually_RB the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP was_VBD signed_VBN by_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP of_IN Austria_NNP ,_,
who_WP did_VBD not_RB understand_VB a_DT word_NN of_IN it_PRP ._. It_PRP was_VBD signed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bourbons_NNS who_WP
needed_VBN the_DT friendship_NN of_IN Napoleon_NNP '_POS s_PRP old_JJ enemies_NNS ._. It_PRP was_VBD signed_VBN by_IN
the_DT King_NNP of_IN Prussia_NNP ,_, who_WP hoped_VBD to_TO gain_VB Alexander_NNP for_IN his_PRP$ plans_NNS for_IN a_DT
"_`` greater_JJR Prussia_NNP ,"_JJ and_CC by_IN all_DT the_DT little_JJ nations_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP who_WP were_VBD at_IN
the_DT mercy_NN of_IN Russia_NNP ._. England_NNP never_RB signed_VBD ,_, because_IN Castlereagh_NNP thought_NN

interference_NN in_IN his_PRP$ business_NN by_IN a_DT Greek-Orthodox_JJ and_CC a_DT Protestant_NNP ._. And_CC
the_DT Sultan_NNP did_VBD not_RB sign_NN because_IN he_PRP never_RB heard_VBD of_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT general_JJ mass_NN of_IN the_DT European_JJ people_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, soon_RB were_VBD forced_VBN to_TO
take_VB notice_NN ._. Behind_IN the_DT hollow_JJ phrases_NNS of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP stood_VBD the_DT
armies_NNS of_IN the_DT Quintuple_NNP Alliance_NNP which_WDT Metternich_NNP had_VBD created_VBN among_IN the_DT
great_JJ powers_NNS ._. These_DT armies_NNS meant_VBD business_NN ._. They_PRP let_VBD it_PRP be_VB known_VBN that_IN the_DT
peace_NN of_IN Europe_NNP must_MD not_RB be_VB disturbed_VBN by_IN the_DT so-called_JJ liberals_NNS who_WP were_VBD

revolutionary_JJ days_NNS ._. The_DT enthusiasm_NN for_IN the_DT great_JJ wars_NNS of_IN liberation_NN of_IN

been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN a_DT sincere_JJ belief_NN in_IN the_DT coming_VBG of_IN a_DT happier_JJR day_NN ._. The_DT
soldiers_NNS who_WP had_VBD borne_VBN the_DT brunt_NN of_IN the_DT battle_NN wanted_VBD peace_NN and_CC they_PRP
said_VBD so_RB ._.

But_CC they_PRP did_VBD not_RB want_VB the_DT sort_NN of_IN peace_NN which_WDT the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP and_CC the_DT
Council_NNP of_IN the_DT European_JJ powers_NNS had_VBD now_RB bestowed_VBN upon_IN them_PRP ._. They_PRP cried_VBD
that_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN betrayed_VBN ._. But_CC they_PRP were_VBD careful_JJ lest_IN they_PRP be_VB heard_VBN
by_IN a_DT secret-police_NN spy_NN ._. The_DT reaction_NN was_VBD victorious_JJ ._. It_PRP was_VBD a_DT reaction_NN
caused_VBN by_IN men_NNS who_WP sincerely_RB believed_VBD that_IN their_PRP$ methods_NNS were_VBD necessary_JJ
for_IN the_DT good_JJ of_IN humanity_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP was_VBD just_RB as_IN hard_JJ to_TO bear_VB as_IN if_IN their_PRP$
intentions_NNS had_VBD been_VBN less_JJR kind_NN ._. And_CC it_PRP caused_VBD a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN unnecessary_JJ
suffering_NN and_CC greatly_RB retarded_VBN the_DT orderly_JJ progress_NN of_IN political_JJ
development_NN ._.




THE_DT GREAT_NNP REACTION_NN

THEY_NNP TRIED_NNP TO_TO ASSURE_NNP THE_DT WORLD_NN AN_DT ERA_NN OF_IN UNDISTURBED_JJ PEACE_NN BY_.
SUPPRESSING_VBG ALL_NNP NEW_NNP IDEAS_NNP ._. THEY_NNP MADE_NNP THE_DT POLICE-SPY_NNP THE_NNP HIGHEST_NN
FUNCTIONARY_NNP IN_IN THE_DT STATE_NNP AND_CC SOON_NNP THE_DT PRISONS_NNP OF_IN ALL_NNP COUNTRIES_NNS WERE_.
FILLED_VBN WITH_IN THOSE_DT WHO_WP CLAIMED_VBD THAT_NN PEOPLE_NN HAVE_NNP THE_NNP RIGHT_NNP TO_TO GOVERN_NNP
THEMSELVES_DT AS_NNP THEY_NNP SEE_NNP FIT_NNP


To_TO undo_VB the_DT damage_NN done_VBN by_IN the_DT great_JJ Napoleonic_NNP flood_NN was_VBD almost_RB
impossible_JJ ._. Age-old_JJ fences_NNS had_VBD been_VBN washed_VBN away_RB ._. The_DT palaces_NNS of_IN two_CD
score_NN dynasties_NNS had_VBD been_VBN damaged_VBN to_TO such_JJ an_DT extent_NN that_IN they_PRP had_VBD to_TO
be_VB condemned_VBN as_IN uninhabitable_JJ ._. Other_JJ royal_JJ residences_NNS had_VBD been_VBN greatly_RB
enlarged_VBN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN less_RBR fortunate_JJ neighbours_NNS ._. Strange_JJ odds_NNS and_CC
ends_NNS of_IN revolutionary_JJ doctrine_NN had_VBD been_VBN left_VBN behind_IN by_IN the_DT receding_VBG
waters_NNS and_CC could_MD not_RB be_VB dislodged_VBN without_IN danger_NN to_TO the_DT entire_NN
community_NN ._. But_CC the_DT political_JJ engineers_NNS of_IN the_DT Congress_NNP did_VBD the_DT best_JJS they_PRP
could_MD and_CC this_DT is_VBZ what_WP they_PRP accomplished_VBD ._.

France_NNP had_VBD disturbed_VBN the_DT peace_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN for_IN so_RB many_JJ years_NNS that_IN
people_NNS had_VBD come_VBN to_TO fear_VB that_DT country_NN almost_RB instinctively_RB ._. The_DT Bourbons_NNP ,_,
through_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN Talleyrand_NNP ,_, had_VBD promised_VBN to_TO be_VB good_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT
Hundred_NNP Days_NNS had_VBD taught_VBN Europe_NNP what_WP to_TO expect_VB should_MD Napoleon_NNP manage_VB
to_TO escape_VB for_IN a_DT second_JJ time_NN ._. The_DT Dutch_NNP Republic_NNP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, was_VBD changed_VBN
into_IN a_DT Kingdom_NNP ,_, and_CC Belgium_NNP (_-LRB- which_WDT had_VBD not_RB joined_VBN the_DT Dutch_JJ struggle_NN for_IN
independence_NN in_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ century_NN and_CC since_IN then_RB had_VBD been_VBN part_NN of_IN
the_DT Habsburg_NNP domains_VBZ ,_, firs_JJ t_NN under_IN Spanish_JJ rule_NN and_CC thereafter_RB under_IN
Austrian_JJ rule_NN )_-RRB- was_VBD made_VBN part_NN of_IN this_DT new_JJ kingdom_NN of_IN the_DT Netherlands_NNP ._.
Nobody_NN wanted_VBD this_DT union_NN either_CC in_IN the_DT Protestant_JJ North_NNP or_CC in_IN the_DT
Catholic_NNP South_NNP ,_, but_CC no_DT questions_NNS were_VBD asked_VBN ._. It_PRP seemed_VBD good_JJ for_IN the_DT
peace_NN of_IN Europe_NNP and_CC that_DT was_VBD the_DT main_JJ consideration_NN ._.

Poland_NNP had_VBD hoped_VBN for_IN great_JJ things_NNS because_IN a_DT Pole_NNP ,_, Prince_NNP Adam_NNP
Czartoryski_NNP ,_, was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS intimate_JJ friends_NNS of_IN Tsar_NNP Alexander_NNP
and_CC had_VBD been_VBN his_PRP$ constant_JJ advisor_NN during_IN the_DT war_NN and_CC at_IN the_DT Congress_NNP
of_IN Vienna_NNP ._. But_CC Poland_NNP was_VBD made_VBN a_DT semi-independent_JJ part_NN of_IN Russia_NNP with_IN
Alexander_NNP as_IN her_PRP$ king_NN ._. This_DT solution_NN pleased_VBD no_DT one_NN and_CC caused_VBD much_RB
bitter_JJ feeling_NN and_CC three_CD revolutions_NNS ._.

Denmark_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD remained_VBN a_DT faithful_JJ ally_NN of_IN Napoleon_NN until_IN the_DT end_NN ,_,
was_VBD severely_RB punished_VBN ._. Seven_CD years_NNS before_RB ,_, an_DT English_NNP fleet_NN had_VBD sailed_VBN
down_IN the_DT Kattegat_NNP and_CC without_IN a_DT declaration_NN of_IN war_NN or_CC any_DT warning_NN had_VBN
bombarded_VBN Copenhagen_NNP and_CC had_VBD taken_VBN away_RB the_DT Danish_NNP fleet_NN ,_, lest_IN it_PRP be_VB of_IN
value_NN to_TO Napoleon_NNP ._. The_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP went_VBD one_CD step_NN further_RBR ._. It_PRP took_VBD
Norway_NNP (_-LRB- which_WDT since_IN the_DT union_NN of_IN Calmar_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1397_CD had_VBD been_VBN united_VBN

a_DT reward_NN for_IN his_PRP$ betrayal_NN of_IN Napoleon_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD set_VBN him_PRP up_RP in_IN the_DT king_NN
business_NN ._. This_DT Swedish_NNP king_NN ,_, curiously_RB enough_RB ,_, was_VBD a_DT former_JJ French_JJ
general_JJ by_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN Bernadotte_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD come_VBN to_TO Sweden_NNP as_IN one_CD of_IN
Napolean_NNP '_POS s_PRP {_IN sic_JJ }_NN adjutants_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD been_VBN invited_VBN to_TO the_DT throne_NN of_IN
that_DT good_JJ country_NN when_WRB the_DT last_JJ of_IN the_DT rulers_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN
Hollstein-Gottorp_NNP had_VBD died_VBN without_IN leaving_VBG either_DT son_NN or_CC daughter_NN ._. From_IN

never_RB learned_VBD )_-RRB- width_IN great_JJ ability_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT clever_JJ man_NN and_CC enjoyed_VBD the_DT

Norway_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT most_RBS peaceful_JJ and_CC orderly_JJ manner_NN ,_, set_VBN up_RP as_IN an_DT independent_JJ
kingdom_NN and_CC the_DT Swedes_NNP bade_IN her_PRP$ "_`` good_JJ speed_NN "_'' and_CC very_RB wisely_RB let_VB her_PRP go_VB
her_PRP$ own_JJ way_NN ._.

The_DT Italians_NNPS ,_, who_WP since_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN the_DT Renaissance_NNP had_VBD been_VBN at_IN the_DT

The_DT poor_JJ Spaniards_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD started_VBN the_DT great_JJ nationalistic_JJ revolt_NN

throne_NN ,_, leaving_VBG one_CD of_IN its_PRP$ members_NNS behind_IN in_IN Rio_NNP de_NNP Janeiro_NNP as_IN Emperor_NNP
of_IN Brazil_NNP ,_, the_DT only_JJ American_NNP Empire_NNP which_WDT lasted_VBD for_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT few_JJ
years_NNS ,_, and_CC which_WDT came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN in_IN 1889_CD when_WRB the_DT country_NN became_VBD a_DT

In_IN the_DT east_JJ ,_, nothing_NN was_VBD done_VBN to_TO improve_VB the_DT terrible_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN both_DT
the_DT Slavs_NNP and_CC the_DT Greeks_NNS who_WP were_VBD still_RB subjects_NNS of_IN the_DT Sultan_NNP ._. In_IN

Karageorgevich_NNP dynasty_NN )_-RRB- had_VBD started_VBN a_DT revolt_NN against_IN the_DT Turks_NNPS ,_, but_CC he_PRP
had_VBD been_VBN defeated_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS and_CC had_VBD been_VBN murdered_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN his_PRP$
supposed_VBN friends_NNS ,_, the_DT rival_JJ Servian_NNP leader_NN ,_, called_VBD Milosh_NNP Obrenovich_NNP ,_,
(_-LRB- who_WP became_VBD the_DT founder_NN of_IN the_DT Obrenovich_JJ dynasty_NN )_-RRB- and_CC the_DT Turks_NNPS had_VBD
continued_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT undisputed_JJ masters_NNS of_IN the_DT Balkans_NNP ._.

The_DT Greeks_NNP ,_, who_WP since_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN their_PRP$ independence_NN ,_, two_CD thousand_CD years_NNS
before_IN ,_, had_VBD been_VBN subjects_NNS of_IN the_DT Macedonians_NNPS ,_, the_DT Romans_NNS ,_, the_DT Venetians_NNPS
and_CC the_DT Turks_NNPS ,_, had_VBD hoped_VBN that_IN their_PRP$ countryman_NN ,_, Capo_NNP d_CC '_POS Istria_NNP ,_, a_DT native_JJ
of_IN Corfu_NNP and_CC together_RB with_IN Czartoryski_NNP ,_, the_DT most_RBS intimate_JJ personal_NN
