keeping_VBG all_DT "_`` legitimate_JJ "_'' monarchs_NNS ,_, Christian_NNP ,_, Moslem_NNP and_CC otherwise_RB ,_, upon_IN
their_PRP$ respective_JJ thrones_NNS ._. Therefore_CC nothing_NN was_VBD done_VBN ._.

The_DT last_JJ ,_, but_CC perhaps_RB the_DT greatest_JJS blunder_NN of_IN the_DT Congress_NNP was_VBD the_DT
treatment_NN of_IN Germany_NNP ._. The_DT Reformation_NNP and_CC the_DT Thirty_JJ Years_NNS War_NNP had_VBD not_RB
only_RB destroyed_VBD the_DT prosperity_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, but_CC had_VBD turned_VBN it_PRP into_IN a_DT
hopeless_JJ political_JJ rubbish_NN heap_NN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT couple_NN of_IN kingdoms_NNS ,_,
a_DT few_JJ grand-duchies_NNS ,_, a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN duchies_NNS and_CC hundreds_NNS of_IN
margravates_NNS ,_, principalities_NNS ,_, baronies_NNS ,_, electorates_NNS ,_, free_JJ cities_NNS and_CC free_JJ
villages_NNS ,_, ruled_VBN by_IN the_DT strangest_JJS assortment_NN of_IN potentates_NNS that_WDT was_VBD ever_RB
seen_VBN off_IN the_DT comic_JJ opera_NN stage_NN ._. Frederick_NNP the_DT Great_NNP had_VBD changed_VBN this_DT
when_WRB he_PRP created_VBD a_DT strong_JJ Prussia_NNP ,_, but_CC this_DT state_NN had_VBD not_RB survived_VBN him_PRP by_IN
many_JJ years_NNS ._.

Napoleon_NNP had_VBD blue-penciled_VBN the_DT demand_NN for_IN independence_NN of_IN most_JJS of_IN these_DT
little_JJ countries_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB fifty-two_CD out_IN of_IN a_DT total_NN of_IN more_JJR than_IN three_CD
hundred_CD had_VBD survived_VBN the_DT year_NN 1806._VBD During_IN the_DT years_NNS of_IN the_DT great_JJ
struggle_NN for_IN independence_NN ,_, many_JJ a_DT young_JJ soldier_NN had_VBD dreamed_VBN of_IN a_DT new_JJ
Fatherland_NNP that_IN should_MD be_VB strong_JJ and_CC united_VBN ._. But_CC there_EX can_MD be_VB no_DT union_NN
without_IN a_DT strong_JJ leadership_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP was_VBD to_TO be_VB this_DT leader_NN ?_.

There_EX were_VBD five_CD kingdoms_NNS in_IN the_DT German_JJ speaking_VBG lands_NNS ._. The_DT rulers_NNS of_IN
two_CD of_IN these_DT ,_, Austria_NNP and_CC Prussia_NNP ,_, were_VBD kings_NNS by_IN the_DT Grace_NNP of_IN God_NNP ._. The_DT
rulers_NNS of_IN three_CD others_NNS ,_, Bavaria_NNP ,_, Saxony_NNP and_CC Wurtemberg_NNP ,_, were_VBD kings_NNS by_IN
the_DT Grace_NNP of_IN Napoleon_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT faithful_JJ henchmen_NNS of_IN the_DT
Emperor_NNP ,_, their_PRP$ patriotic_JJ credit_NN with_IN the_DT other_JJ Germans_NNPS was_VBD therefore_RB not_RB
very_RB good_JJ ._.

The_DT Congress_NNP had_VBD established_VBN a_DT new_JJ German_JJ Confederation_NNP ,_, a_DT league_NN of_IN
thirty-eight_JJ sovereign_JJ states_NNS ,_, under_IN the_DT chairmanship_NN of_IN the_DT King_NNP of_IN
Austria_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD now_RB known_VBN as_IN the_DT Emperor_NNP of_IN Austria_NNP ._. It_PRP was_VBD the_DT sort_NN of_IN
make-shift_NN arrangement_NN which_WDT satisfied_VBD no_DT one_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ that_IN a_DT German_JJ
Diet_NNP ,_, which_WDT met_VBD in_IN the_DT old_JJ coronation_NN city_NN of_IN Frankfort_NNP ,_, had_VBD been_VBN
created_VBN to_TO discuss_VB matters_NNS of_IN "_`` common_JJ policy_NN and_CC importance_NN ."_JJ But_CC in_IN
this_DT Diet_NNP ,_, thirty-eight_JJ delegates_NNS represented_VBD thirty-eight_JJ different_JJ
interests_NNS and_CC as_IN no_DT decision_NN could_MD be_VB taken_VBN without_IN a_DT unanimous_JJ vote_NN
(_-LRB- a_DT parliamentary_JJ rule_NN which_WDT had_VBD in_IN previous_JJ centuries_NNS ruined_VBN the_DT mighty_JJ
kingdom_NN of_IN Poland_NNP ),_, the_DT famous_JJ German_NNP Confederation_NNP became_VBD very_RB soon_RB
the_DT laughing_VBG stock_NN of_IN Europe_NNP and_CC the_DT politics_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ Empire_NNP began_VBD to_TO
resemble_VB those_DT of_IN our_PRP$ Central_NNP American_NNP neighbours_NNS in_IN the_DT forties_NNS and_CC the_DT
fifties_NNS of_IN the_DT last_JJ century_NN ._.

It_PRP was_VBD terribly_RB humiliating_JJ to_TO the_DT people_NNS who_WP had_VBD sacrificed_VBN everything_NN
for_IN a_DT national_JJ ideal_NN ._. But_CC the_DT Congress_NNP was_VBD not_RB interested_VBN in_IN the_DT private_JJ
feelings_NNS of_IN "_`` subjects_NNS ,"_, and_CC the_DT debate_NN was_VBD closed_VBN ._.

Did_VBD anybody_NN object_VB ?_. Most_RBS assuredly_RB ._. As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT first_JJ feeling_NN of_IN
hatred_NN against_IN Napoleon_NNP had_VBD quieted_VBN down_RB —_RB as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT enthusiasm_NN
of_IN the_DT great_JJ war_NN had_VBD subsided_VBN —_RB as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT people_NNS came_VBD to_TO a_DT full_JJ
realisation_NN of_IN the_DT crime_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN committed_VBN in_IN the_DT name_NN of_IN "_'' peace_NN
and_CC stability_NN "_`` they_PRP began_VBD to_TO murmur_VB ._. They_PRP even_RB made_VBD threats_NNS of_IN open_JJ
revolt_NN ._. But_CC what_WP could_MD they_PRP do_VB ?_. They_PRP were_VBD powerless_JJ ._. They_PRP were_VBD at_IN the_DT
mercy_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS pitiless_JJ and_CC efficient_JJ police_NN system_NN the_DT world_NN had_VBD
ever_RB seen_VBN ._.

The_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP honestly_RB and_CC sincerely_RB believed_VBN
that_IN "_`` the_DT Revolutionary_NNP Principle_NNP had_VBD led_VBN to_TO the_DT criminal_JJ usurpation_NN
of_IN the_DT throne_NN by_IN the_DT former_JJ emperor_NN Napoleon_NNP ."_VBD They_PRP felt_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD
called_VBN upon_IN to_TO eradicate_VB the_DT adherents_NNS of_IN the_DT so-called_JJ "_`` French_JJ ideas_NNS "_''
just_RB as_IN Philip_NNP II_NNP had_VBD only_RB followed_VBN the_DT voice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ conscience_NN when_WRB he_PRP
burned_VBN Protestants_NNS or_CC hanged_VBN Moors_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT sixteenth_JJ
century_NN a_DT man_NN who_WP did_VBD not_RB believe_VB in_IN the_DT divine_JJ right_NN of_IN the_DT Pope_NNP to_TO
rule_VB his_PRP$ subjects_NNS as_IN he_PRP saw_VBD fit_NN was_VBD a_DT "_`` heretic_JJ "_'' and_CC it_PRP was_VBD the_DT duty_NN
of_IN all_DT loyal_JJ citizens_NNS to_TO kill_VB him_PRP ._. In_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ
century_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT continent_NN of_IN Europe_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN who_WP did_VBD not_RB believe_VB in_IN the_DT
divine_JJ right_NN of_IN his_PRP$ king_NN to_TO rule_VB him_PRP as_IN he_PRP or_CC his_PRP$ Prime_NNP Minister_NNP saw_NN
fit_NN ,_, was_VBD a_DT "_`` heretic_JJ ,"_NN and_CC it_PRP was_VBD the_DT duty_NN of_IN all_DT loyal_JJ citizens_NNS to_TO
denounce_VBP him_PRP to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS policeman_NN and_CC see_VB that_IN he_PRP got_VBD punished_VBN ._.

But_CC the_DT rulers_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN 1815_CD had_VBD learned_VBN efficiency_NN in_IN the_DT school_NN of_IN
Napoleon_NN and_CC they_PRP performed_VBD their_PRP$ task_NN much_RB better_JJR than_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN done_VBN
in_IN the_DT year_NN 1517._VBD The_DT period_NN between_IN the_DT year_NN 1815_CD and_CC the_DT year_NN 1860_CD was_VBD
the_DT great_JJ era_NN of_IN the_DT political_JJ spy_NN ._. Spies_NNPS were_VBD everywhere_RB ._. They_PRP lived_VBD in_IN
palaces_NNS and_CC they_PRP were_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT lowest_JJS gin-shops_NNS ._. They_PRP peeped_.
through_IN the_DT key-holes_NNS of_IN the_DT ministerial_JJ cabinet_NN and_CC they_PRP listened_VBD to_TO
the_DT conversations_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP were_VBD taking_VBG the_DT air_NN on_IN the_DT benches_NNS
of_IN the_DT Municipal_JJ Park_NNP ._. They_PRP guarded_VBN the_DT frontier_NN so_IN that_IN no_DT one_NN might_MD
leave_VB without_IN a_DT duly_RB viseed_JJ passport_NN and_CC they_PRP inspected_VBD all_DT packages_NNS ,_,

things_NNS ._. They_PRP followed_VBD the_DT little_JJ boys_NNS and_CC girls_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ way_NN to_TO church_NN
lest_IN they_PRP play_VBP hookey_NN ._.

In_IN many_JJ of_IN these_DT tasks_NNS they_PRP were_VBD assisted_VBN by_IN the_DT clergy_NN ._. The_DT church_NN had_VBD
suffered_VBN greatly_RB during_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN the_DT revolution_NN ._. The_DT church_NN property_NN
had_VBD been_VBN confiscated_VBN ._. Several_JJ priests_NNS had_VBD been_VBN killed_VBN and_CC the_DT generation_NN
that_WDT had_VBD learned_VBN its_PRP$ cathechism_NN from_IN Voltaire_NNP and_CC Rousseau_NNP and_CC the_DT

of_IN the_DT year_NN 1793._. The_DT priests_NNS had_VBD followed_VBN the_DT "_`` emigres_NNS "_'' into_IN their_PRP$ long_JJ

to_TO work_VB with_IN a_DT vengeance_NN ._.

Even_RB the_DT Jesuits_NNPS came_VBD back_RB in_IN 1814_CD and_CC resumed_VBD their_PRP$ former_JJ labours_NNS of_IN
educating_VBG the_DT young_JJ ._. Their_PRP$ order_NN had_VBD been_VBN a_DT little_RB too_RB successful_JJ in_IN its_PRP$

which_WDT was_VBD for_IN ever_RB interfering_VBG with_IN the_DT civil_JJ authorities_NNS ._. During_IN
the_DT reign_NN of_IN the_DT Marquis_NNP de_NNP Pombal_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ reforming_VBG minister_NN of_IN

But_CC in_IN the_DT Protestant_JJ countries_NNS like_IN Prussia_NNP ,_, things_NNS were_VBD not_RB a_DT whit_NN

were_VBD read_VBN ._. They_PRP were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO report_VB to_TO the_DT police_NN at_IN regular_JJ

was_VBD let_VB loose_JJ in_IN all_DT his_PRP$ fury_NN upon_IN the_DT younger_JJR generation_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT party_NN
of_IN students_NNS celebrated_VBN the_DT tercentenary_NN of_IN the_DT Reformation_NN with_IN noisy_JJ
but_CC harmless_JJ festivities_NNS on_IN the_DT old_JJ Wartburg_NNP ,_, the_DT Prussian_NNP bureaucrats_NNS
had_VBD visions_NNS of_IN an_DT imminent_JJ revolution_NN ._. When_WRB a_DT theological_JJ student_NN ,_,
more_RBR honest_JJ than_IN intelligent_JJ ,_, killed_VBN a_DT Russian_NNP government_NN spy_NN who_WP
was_VBD operating_VBG in_IN Germany_NNP ,_, the_DT universities_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN under_IN
police-supervision_NN and_CC professors_NNS were_VBD jailed_VBN or_CC dismissed_VBN without_IN any_DT
form_NN of_IN trial_NN ._.

Russia_NNP ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, was_VBD even_RB more_RBR absurd_JJ in_IN these_DT anti-revolutionary_JJ
activities_NNS ._. Alexander_NNP had_VBD recovered_VBN from_IN his_PRP$ attack_NN of_IN piety_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD

upon_IN the_DT west_NN and_CC became_VBD a_DT truly_RB Russian_JJ ruler_NN whose_WP$ interests_NNS lay_VBD in_IN

to_TO accomplish_VB ._. And_CC while_IN he_PRP sat_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ study_NN ,_, his_PRP$ ministers_NNS turned_VBD the_DT
whole_NN of_IN Russia_NNP into_IN a_DT land_NN of_IN military_JJ barracks_NNS ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB a_DT pretty_JJ picture_NN ._. Perhaps_RB I_PRP might_MD have_VB shortened_VBN this_DT

result_NN was_VBD the_DT usual_JJ one_CD ._.




NATIONAL_NNP INDEPENDENCE_NNP

THE_DT LOVE_NN OF_IN NATIONAL_NNP INDEPENDENCE_NNP ,_, HOWEVER_NNP WAS_NNP TOO_NNP STRONG_NNP TO_TO BE_VB
DESTROYED_IN IN_IN THIS_NNP WAY_NNP ._. THE_DT SOUTH_NNP AMERICANS_NNP WERE_NNP THE_DT FIRST_NNP TO_TO REBEL_NNP
AGAINST_NNP THE_DT REACTIONARY_NN MEASURES_NNP OF_IN THE_DT CONGRESS_NNS OF_IN VIENNA_NNP ,_, GREECE_NNP AND_CC
BELGIUM_NNP AND_CC SPAIN_NNP AND_CC A_DT LARGE_NN NUMBER_NN OF_IN OTHER_NNP COUNTRIES_NNS OF_IN THE_DT EUROPEAN_NNS
CONTINENT_NNP FOLLOWED_NNP SUIT_NNP AND_CC THE_DT NINETEENTH_NNP CENTURY_NNP WAS_VBD FILLED_VBN WITH_IN THE_DT
RUMOUR_NN OF_IN MANY_NNP WARS_NNPS OF_IN INDEPENDENCE_NNP


IT_PRP will_MD serve_VB no_DT good_JJ purpose_NN to_TO say_VB "_`` if_IN only_RB the_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP had_VBD
done_VBN such_JJ and_CC such_JJ a_DT thing_NN instead_RB of_IN taking_VBG such_JJ and_CC such_PDT a_DT course_NN ,_, the_DT
history_NN of_IN Europe_NNP in_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN different_JJ ."_.
The_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP was_VBD a_DT gathering_NN of_IN men_NNS who_WP had_VBD just_RB passed_VBN
through_IN a_DT great_JJ revolution_NN and_CC through_IN twenty_CD years_NNS of_IN terrible_JJ and_CC
almost_RB continuous_JJ warfare_NN ._. They_PRP came_VBD together_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN giving_VBG
Europe_NNP that_IN "_`` peace_NN and_CC stability_NN "_'' which_WDT they_PRP thought_VBD that_IN the_DT people_NNS
needed_VBN and_CC wanted_VBN ._. They_PRP were_VBD what_WP we_PRP call_VBP reactionaries_NNS ._. They_PRP sincerely_RB
believed_VBN in_IN the_DT inability_NN of_IN the_DT mass_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS to_TO rule_VB themselves_PRP ._.
They_PRP re-arranged_VBD the_DT map_NN of_IN Europe_NNP in_IN such_PDT a_DT way_NN as_IN seemed_VBD to_TO promise_VB
the_DT greatest_JJS possibility_NN of_IN a_DT lasting_VBG success_NN ._. They_PRP failed_VBD ,_, but_CC not_RB
through_IN any_DT premeditated_JJ wickedness_NN on_IN their_PRP$ part_NN ._. They_PRP were_VBD ,_, for_IN the_DT
greater_JJR part_NN ,_, men_NNS of_IN the_DT old_JJ school_NN who_WP remembered_VBD the_DT happier_JJR days_NNS of_IN
their_PRP$ quiet_JJ youth_NN and_CC ardently_RB wished_VBD a_DT return_NN of_IN that_DT blessed_JJ period_NN ._.
They_PRP failed_VBD to_TO recognise_VB the_DT strong_JJ hold_NN which_WDT many_JJ of_IN the_DT revolutionary_NN
principles_NNS had_VBD gained_VBN upon_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT European_JJ continent_NN ._. That_WDT
was_VBD a_DT misfortune_NN but_CC hardly_RB a_DT sin_NN ._. But_CC one_CD of_IN the_DT things_NNS which_WDT the_DT
French_NNP Revolution_NNP had_VBD taught_VBN not_RB only_RB Europe_NNP but_CC America_NNP as_RB well_RB ,_, was_VBD
the_DT right_NN of_IN people_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ "_`` nationality_NN ."_.

Napoleon_NNP ,_, who_WP respected_VBD nothing_NN and_CC nobody_NN ,_, was_VBD utterly_RB ruthless_JJ in_IN
his_PRP$ dealing_VBG with_IN national_JJ and_CC patriotic_JJ aspirations_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT early_JJ
revolutionary_JJ generals_NNS had_VBD proclaimed_VBN the_DT new_JJ doctrine_NN that_WDT "_'' nationality_NN
was_VBD not_RB a_DT matter_NN of_IN political_JJ frontiers_NNS or_CC round_JJ skulls_NNS and_CC broad_JJ noses_NNS ,_,
but_CC a_DT matter_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN and_CC soul_NN ."_NNS While_IN they_PRP were_VBD teaching_VBG the_DT French_JJ
children_NNS the_DT greatness_NN of_IN the_DT French_JJ nation_NN ,_, they_PRP encouraged_VBD Spaniards_NNS
and_CC Hollanders_NNP and_CC Italians_NNPS to_TO do_VB the_DT same_JJ thing_NN ._. Soon_RB these_DT people_NNS ,_, who_WP
all_DT shared_VBD Rousseau_NNP '_POS s_PRP belief_NN in_IN the_DT superior_JJ virtues_NNS of_IN Original_NNP Man_NNP ,_,
began_VBD to_TO dig_VB into_IN their_PRP$ past_NN and_CC found_VBD ,_, buried_VBN beneath_IN the_DT ruins_NNS of_IN
the_DT feudal_JJ system_NN ,_, the_DT bones_NNS of_IN the_DT mighty_JJ races_NNS of_IN which_WDT they_PRP supposed_VBD
themselves_PRP the_DT feeble_JJ descendants_NNS ._.

The_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT nineteenth_JJ century_NN was_VBD the_DT era_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ
historical_JJ discoveries_NNS ._. Everywhere_NN historians_NNS were_VBD busy_JJ publishing_VBG
mediaeval_JJ charters_NNS and_CC early_JJ mediaeval_JJ chronicles_NNS and_CC in_IN every_DT country_NN
the_DT result_NN was_VBD a_DT new_JJ pride_NN in_IN the_DT old_JJ fatherland_NN ._. A_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN this_DT
sentiment_NN was_VBD based_VBN upon_IN the_DT wrong_JJ interpretation_NN of_IN historical_JJ
facts_NNS ._. But_CC in_IN practical_JJ politics_NNS ,_, it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB matter_VB what_WP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, but_CC
everything_NN depends_VBZ upon_IN what_WP the_DT people_NNS believe_VBP to_TO be_VB true_JJ ._. And_CC in_IN most_RBS
countries_NNS both_CC the_DT kings_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ subjects_NNS firmly_RB believed_VBN in_IN the_DT glory_NN
and_CC fame_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ancestors_NNS ._.

The_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP was_VBD not_RB inclined_VBN to_TO be_VB sentimental_JJ ._. Their_PRP$
Excellencies_NNS divided_VBD the_DT map_NN of_IN Europe_NNP according_VBG to_TO the_DT best_JJS interests_NNS
of_IN half_NN a_DT dozen_NN dynasties_NNS and_CC put_VBD "_`` national_JJ aspirations_NNS "_'' upon_IN the_DT Index_NNP ,_,
or_CC list_NN of_IN forbidden_VBN books_NNS ,_, together_RB with_IN all_DT other_JJ dangerous_JJ "_'' French_NNPS
doctrines_NNS ."_CC

But_CC history_NN is_VBZ no_DT respecter_NN of_IN Congresses_NNS ._. For_IN some_DT reason_NN or_CC other_JJ (_-LRB- it_PRP
may_MD be_VB an_DT historical_JJ law_NN ,_, which_WDT thus_RB far_RB has_VBZ escaped_VBN the_DT attention_NN
of_IN the_DT scholars_NNS )_-RRB- "_`` nations_NNS "_`` seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT orderly_JJ
development_NN of_IN human_JJ society_NN and_CC the_DT attempt_NN to_TO stem_VB this_DT tide_NN was_VBD
quite_RB as_RB unsuccessful_JJ as_IN the_DT Metternichian_NNP effort_NN to_TO prevent_VB people_NNS from_IN
thinking_NN ._.

Curiously_RB enough_RB the_DT first_JJ trouble_NN began_VBD in_IN a_DT very_RB distant_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT
world_NN ,_, in_IN South_NNP America_NNP ._. The_DT Spanish_NNP colonies_NNS of_IN that_DT continent_NN had_VBD been_VBN
enjoying_VBG a_DT period_NN of_IN relative_JJ independence_NN during_IN the_DT many_JJ years_NNS of_IN the_DT
great_JJ Napoleonic_NNP wars_NNS ._. They_PRP had_VBD even_RB remained_VBN faithful_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ king_NN
when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN prisoner_NN by_IN the_DT French_JJ Emperor_NNP and_CC they_PRP had_VBD refused_VBN to_TO
recognise_NN Joseph_NNP Bonaparte_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD in_IN the_DT year_NN 1808_CD been_VBN made_VBN King_NNP of_IN
Spain_NNP by_IN order_NN of_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN ._.

Indeed_RB ,_, the_DT only_JJ part_NN of_IN America_NNP to_TO get_VB very_RB much_RB upset_VBN by_IN the_DT
Revolution_NNP was_VBD the_DT island_NN of_IN Haiti_NNP ,_, the_DT Espagnola_NNP of_IN Columbus_NNP '_POS first_JJ
trip_NN ._. Here_RB in_IN the_DT year_NN 1791_IN the_DT French_NNP Convention_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT sudden_JJ outburst_NN
of_IN love_NN and_CC human_JJ brotherhood_NN ,_, had_VBD bestowed_VBN upon_IN their_PRP$ black_JJ brethren_NNS
all_PDT the_DT privileges_NNS hitherto_VBD enjoyed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ white_JJ masters_NNS ._. Just_RB as_IN
suddenly_RB they_PRP had_VBD repented_VBN of_IN this_DT step_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT attempt_NN to_TO undo_VB the_DT
original_JJ promise_NN led_VBD to_TO many_JJ years_NNS of_IN terrible_JJ warfare_NN between_IN General_NNP
Leclerc_NNP ,_, the_DT brother-in_NN -_: law_NN of_IN Napoleon_NNP ,_, and_CC Toussaint_NNP l_NN '_POS Ouverture_NNP ,_, the_DT
negro_NN chieftain_NN ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN 1801,_IN Toussaint_NNP was_VBD asked_VBN to_TO visit_VB Leclerc_NNP
and_CC discuss_VB terms_NNS of_IN peace_NN ._. He_PRP received_VBD the_DT solemn_JJ promise_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD
not_RB be_VB molested_VBN ._. He_PRP trusted_VBD his_PRP$ white_JJ adversaries_NNS ,_, was_VBD put_VBN on_IN board_NN a_DT
ship_NN and_CC shortly_RB afterwards_RB died_VBD in_IN a_DT French_JJ prison_NN ._. But_CC the_DT negroes_NNS
gained_VBD their_PRP$ independence_NN all_DT the_DT same_JJ and_CC founded_VBD a_DT Republic_NNP ._.
Incidentally_RB they_PRP were_VBD of_IN great_JJ help_NN to_TO the_DT first_JJ great_JJ South_NNP American_NNP
patriot_NN in_IN his_PRP$ efforts_NNS to_TO deliver_VB his_PRP$ native_JJ country_NN from_IN the_DT Spanish_NNP
yoke_NN ._.

Simon_NNP Bolivar_NNP ,_, a_DT native_JJ of_IN Caracas_NNP in_IN Venezuela_NNP ,_, born_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1783,_.
had_VBD been_VBN educated_VBN in_IN Spain_NNP ,_, had_VBD visited_VBN Paris_NNP where_WRB he_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN the_DT
Revolutionary_JJ government_NN at_IN work_NN ,_, had_VBD lived_VBN for_IN a_DT while_NN in_IN the_DT United_NNP
States_NNS and_CC had_VBD returned_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ native_JJ land_NN where_WRB the_DT widespread_JJ
discontent_NN against_IN Spain_NNP ,_, the_DT mother_NN country_NN ,_, was_VBD beginning_VBG to_TO take_VB a_DT
definite_JJ form_NN ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN 1811,_IN Venezuela_NNP declared_VBD its_PRP$ independence_NN and_CC
Bolivar_NNP became_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT revolutionary_JJ generals_NNS ._. Within_IN two_CD months_NNS ,_, the_DT
rebels_NNS were_VBD defeated_VBN and_CC Bolivar_NNP fled_VBD ._.

For_IN the_DT next_JJ five_CD years_NNS he_PRP was_VBD the_DT leader_NN of_IN an_DT apparently_RB lost_VBN cause_NN ._.
He_PRP sacrificed_VBD all_PDT his_PRP$ wealth_NN and_CC he_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO begin_VB
his_PRP$ final_JJ and_CC successful_JJ expedition_NN without_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT President_NNP
of_IN Haiti_NNP ._. Thereafter_EX the_DT revolt_NN spread_VBD all_DT over_IN South_NNP America_NNP and_CC soon_RB
it_PRP appeared_VBD that_IN Spain_NNP was_VBD not_RB able_JJ to_TO suppress_VB the_DT rebellion_NN unaided_VBD ._.
She_PRP asked_VBD for_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP ._.

This_DT step_NN greatly_RB worried_VBN England_NNP ._. The_DT British_JJ shippers_NNS had_VBD succeeded_VBN
the_DT Dutch_NNP as_IN the_DT Common_NNP Carriers_NNP of_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC they_PRP expected_VBD to_TO reap_VB
heavy_JJ profits_NNS from_IN a_DT declaration_NN of_IN independence_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN all_PDT
South_NNP America_NNP ._. They_PRP had_VBD hopes_NNS that_IN the_DT United_NNP States_NNP of_IN America_NNP would_MD
interfere_VB but_CC the_DT Senate_NNP had_VBD no_DT such_JJ plans_NNS and_CC in_IN the_DT House_NNP ,_, too_RB ,_, there_EX
were_VBD many_JJ voices_NNS which_WDT declared_VBD that_IN Spain_NNP ought_MD to_TO be_VB given_VBN a_DT free_JJ
hand_NN ._.

Just_RB then_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT change_NN of_IN ministers_NNS in_IN England_NNP ._. The_DT Whigs_NNPS went_VBD
out_RB and_CC the_DT Tories_NNPS came_VBD in_IN ._. George_NNP Canning_NNP became_VBD secretary_NN of_IN State_NNP ._. He_PRP
dropped_VBD a_DT hint_NN that_IN England_NNP would_MD gladly_RB back_RB up_IN the_DT American_JJ government_NN
with_IN all_PDT the_DT might_NN of_IN her_PRP$ fleet_NN ,_, if_IN said_VBD government_NN would_MD declare_VB
its_PRP$ disapproval_NN of_IN the_DT plans_NNS of_IN the_DT Holy_NNP Alliance_NNP in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT
rebellious_JJ colonies_NNS of_IN the_DT southern_JJ continent_NN ._. President_NNP Monroe_NNP

Once_RB more_RBR it_PRP was_VBD England_NNP which_WDT upset_JJ his_PRP$ plans_NNS ._. The_DT greatest_JJS glory_NN of_IN

which_WDT he_PRP believes_VBZ to_TO be_VB wrong_JJ ,_, he_PRP gets_VBZ up_RB and_CC says_VBZ so_RB and_CC the_DT government_NN

It_PRP would_MD be_VB absurd_JJ were_VBD I_PRP to_TO try_VB ,_, in_IN this_DT short_JJ volume_NN ,_, to_TO give_VB you_PRP a_DT

In_IN France_NNP the_DT Bourbons_NNP had_VBD established_VBN an_DT almost_RB unbearable_JJ rule_NN

Louis_NNP had_VBD belonged_VBN to_TO that_DT famous_JJ Bourbon_NN family_NN which_WDT ,_, although_IN it_PRP
never_RB learned_VBD anything_NN ,_, never_RB forgot_VBD anything_NN ._. The_DT recollection_NN of_IN

such_PDT a_DT way_NN that_IN he_PRP disgusted_JJ even_RB that_IN trusted_VBD friend_NN of_IN law_NN and_CC order_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP tried_VBD to_TO suppress_VB the_DT newspapers_NNS which_WDT dared_VBD to_TO criticise_VB his_PRP$

his_PRP$ days_NNS were_VBD numbered_VBN ._.

On_IN the_DT night_NN of_IN the_DT 27_CD th_NN of_IN July_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1830,_IN a_DT revolution_NN took_VBD

years_NNS "_`` came_VBD to_TO an_DT end_NN and_CC the_DT Bourbons_NNS were_VBD at_IN last_JJ removed_VBN from_IN the_DT
throne_NN of_IN France_NNP ._. They_PRP were_VBD too_RB hopelessly_RB incompetent_JJ ._. France_NNP then_RB
might_MD have_VB returned_VBN to_TO a_DT Republican_JJ form_NN of_IN government_NN ,_, but_CC such_PDT a_DT step_NN
would_MD not_RB have_VB been_VBN tolerated_VBN by_IN Metternich_NNP ._.

The_DT situation_NN was_VBD dangerous_JJ enough_RB ._. The_DT spark_NN of_IN rebellion_NN had_VBD leaped_VBN
beyond_IN the_DT French_JJ frontier_NN and_CC had_VBD set_VBN fire_NN to_TO another_DT powder_NN house_NN
filled_VBN with_IN national_JJ grievances_NNS ._. The_DT new_JJ kingdom_NN of_IN the_DT Netherlands_NNPS
had_VBD not_RB been_VBN a_DT success_NN ._. The_DT Belgian_JJ and_CC the_DT Dutch_JJ people_NNS had_VBD nothing_NN in_IN

too_RB much_RB lacking_VBG in_IN tact_NN and_CC pliability_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT peace_NN among_IN his_PRP$

church_NN ."_NN On_IN the_DT 25_CD th_NN of_IN August_NNP there_EX was_VBD a_DT popular_JJ outbreak_NN against_IN the_DT

themselves_PRP independent_JJ and_CC elected_VBN Leopold_NNP of_IN Coburg_NNP ,_, the_DT uncle_NN of_IN Queen_NNP
Victoria_NNP of_IN England_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT throne_NN ._. That_DT was_VBD an_DT excellent_JJ solution_NN
of_IN the_DT difficulty_NN ._. The_DT two_CD countries_NNS ,_, which_WDT never_RB ought_MD to_TO have_VB been_VBN
united_VBN ,_, parted_VBD their_PRP$ ways_NNS and_CC thereafter_RB lived_VBD in_IN peace_NN and_CC harmony_NN and_CC
behaved_VBD like_IN decent_JJ neighbours_NNS ._.

News_NNP in_IN those_DT days_NNS when_WRB there_EX were_VBD only_RB a_DT few_JJ short_JJ railroads_NNS ,_,
travelled_VBN slowly_RB ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT success_NN of_IN the_DT French_NNP and_CC the_DT Belgian_JJ
revolutionists_NNS became_VBD known_VBN in_IN Poland_NNP there_EX was_VBD an_DT immediate_JJ clash_NN
between_IN the_DT Poles_NNPS and_CC their_PRP$ Russian_JJ rulers_NNS which_WDT led_VBD to_TO a_DT year_NN of_IN
terrible_JJ warfare_NN and_CC ended_VBD with_IN a_DT complete_JJ victory_NN for_IN the_DT Russians_NNPS who_WP
"_`` established_VBN order_NN along_IN the_DT banks_NNS of_IN the_DT Vistula_NNP "_'' in_IN the_DT well-known_JJ

"_`` by_IN the_DT Grace_NNP of_IN God_NNP and_CC the_DT Will_NNP of_IN the_DT People_NNS ."_.

small_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN steadily_RB decreasing_VBG ._. For_IN ,_, once_RB delivered_VBN from_IN the_DT
cares_NNS of_IN state_NN ,_, the_DT Pope_NNP was_VBD able_JJ to_TO devote_VB all_DT his_PRP$ time_NN to_TO questions_NNS
of_IN a_DT spiritual_JJ nature_NN ._. Standing_VBG high_JJ above_IN the_DT petty_JJ quarrels_NNS of_IN the_DT

appreciation_NN of_IN modern_JJ economic_JJ problems_NNS than_IN most_JJS Protestant_JJ sects_NNS ._.

In_IN this_DT way_NN ,_, the_DT attempt_NN of_IN the_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP to_TO settle_VB the_DT Italian_JJ
question_NN by_IN making_VBG the_DT peninsula_NN an_DT Austrian_JJ province_NN was_VBD at_IN last_JJ

The_DT German_JJ problem_NN however_RB remained_VBD as_IN yet_RB unsolved_JJ ._. It_PRP proved_VBD the_DT most_RBS

THE_DT AGE_NN OF_IN THE_DT ENGINE_NNS

BUT_NNP WHILE_NNP THE_DT PEOPLE_NN OF_IN EUROPE_NNP WERE_NNP FIGHTING_NNP FOR_IN THEIR_NNP NATIONAL_NNP
INDEPENDENCE_NNP ,_, THE_DT WORLD_NN IN_IN WHICH_WDT THEY_NNP LIVED_NNP HAD_NNP BEEN_NNP ENTIRELY_NNP CHANGED_NNP
BY_NNP A_DT SERIES_NNP OF_IN INVENTIONS_NNP ,_, WHICH_WDT HAD_NNP MADE_NNP THE_DT CLUMSY_NN OLD_NN STEAM_NNP ENGINE_NNP OF_IN
THE_DT 18_CD TH_IN CENTURY_NNP THE_DT MOST_JJS FAITHFUL_JJ AND_CC EFFICIENT_JJ SLAVE_NN OF_IN MAN_NNP


THE_DT greatest_JJS benefactor_NN of_IN the_DT human_NN race_NN died_VBD more_JJR than_IN half_PDT a_DT million_CD
years_NNS ago_RB ._. He_PRP was_VBD a_DT hairy_JJ creature_NN with_IN a_DT low_JJ brow_NN and_CC sunken_JJ eyes_NNS ,_, a_DT
heavy_JJ jaw_NN and_CC strong_JJ tiger-like_JJ teeth_NNS ._. He_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB looked_VBN well_RB in_IN
a_DT gathering_NN of_IN modern_JJ scientists_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP would_MD have_VB honoured_VBN him_PRP as_IN
their_PRP$ master_NN ._. For_IN he_PRP had_VBD used_VBN a_DT stone_NN to_TO break_VB a_DT nut_NN and_CC a_DT stick_NN to_TO lift_VB
up_IN a_DT heavy_JJ boulder_NN ._. He_PRP was_VBD the_DT inventor_NN of_IN the_DT hammer_NN and_CC the_DT lever_NN ,_, our_PRP$
first_JJ tools_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP did_VBD more_RBR than_IN any_DT human_JJ being_NN who_WP came_VBD after_IN him_PRP
to_TO give_VB man_NN his_PRP$ enormous_JJ advantage_NN over_IN the_DT other_JJ animals_NNS with_IN whom_WP he_PRP
shares_NNS this_DT planet_NN ._.

Ever_RB since_IN ,_, man_NN has_VBZ tried_VBN to_TO make_VB his_PRP$ life_NN easier_RB by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN a_DT
greater_JJR number_NN of_IN tools_NNS ._. The_DT first_JJ wheel_NN (_-LRB- a_DT round_NN disc_NN made_VBN out_IN of_IN an_DT
old_JJ tree_NN )_-RRB- created_VBN as_IN much_JJ stir_NN in_IN the_DT communities_NNS of_IN 100,000_CD B_NNP ._. C_NNP ._. as_IN the_DT
flying_VBG machine_NN did_VBD only_RB a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ago_RB ._.

In_IN Washington_NNP ,_, the_DT story_NN is_VBZ told_VBN of_IN a_DT director_NN of_IN the_DT Patent_NNP Office_NN
who_WP in_IN the_DT early_JJ thirties_NNS of_IN the_DT last_JJ century_NN suggested_VBD that_IN the_DT Patent_NN
Office_NNP be_VB abolished_VBN ,_, because_IN "_`` everything_NN that_IN possibly_RB could_MD be_VB invented_VBN
had_VBD been_VBN invented_VBN ."_IN A_DT similar_JJ feeling_NN must_MD have_VB spread_VBN through_IN the_DT
prehistoric_JJ world_NN when_WRB the_DT first_JJ sail_NN was_VBD hoisted_VBN on_IN a_DT raft_NN and_CC the_DT
people_NNS were_VBD able_JJ to_TO move_VB from_IN place_NN to_TO place_VB without_IN rowing_NN or_CC punting_VBG
or_CC pulling_VBG from_IN the_DT shore_NN ._.

Indeed_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT most_RBS interesting_JJ chapters_NNS of_IN history_NN is_VBZ the_DT effort_NN of_IN
man_NN to_TO let_VB some_DT one_CD else_JJ or_CC something_NN else_RB do_VB his_PRP$ work_NN for_IN him_PRP ,_, while_IN he_PRP
enjoyed_VBD his_PRP$ leisure_NN ,_, sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT sun_NN or_CC painting_NN pictures_NNS on_IN rocks_NNS ,_,
or_CC training_VBG young_JJ wolves_NNS and_CC little_JJ tigers_NNS to_TO behave_VB like_JJ peaceful_JJ
domestic_JJ animals_NNS ._.

Of_IN course_NN in_IN the_DT very_JJ olden_JJ days_NNS ;_: it_PRP was_VBD always_RB possible_JJ to_TO enslave_VB a_DT
weaker_JJR neighbour_NN and_CC force_VB him_PRP to_TO do_VB the_DT unpleasant_JJ tasks_NNS of_IN life_NN ._. One_CD
of_IN the_DT reasons_NNS why_WRB the_DT Greeks_NNPS and_CC Romans_NNPS ,_, who_WP were_VBD quite_RB as_RB intelligent_JJ
as_IN we_PRP are_VBP ,_, failed_VBN to_TO devise_VB more_RBR interesting_JJ machinery_NN ,_, was_VBD to_TO be_VB
found_VBN in_IN the_DT wide-spread_JJ existence_NN of_IN slavery_NN ._. Why_WRB should_MD a_DT great_JJ
mathematician_NN waste_VB his_PRP$ time_NN upon_IN wires_NNS and_CC pulleys_NNS and_CC cogs_NNS and_CC fill_NN
the_DT air_NN with_IN noise_NN and_CC smoke_NN when_WRB he_PRP could_MD go_VB to_TO the_DT marketplace_NN and_CC buy_VBP
all_PDT the_DT slaves_NNS he_PRP needed_VBD at_IN a_DT very_RB small_JJ expense_NN ?_.

And_CC during_IN the_DT middle-ages_NNS ,_, although_IN slavery_NN had_VBD been_VBN abolished_VBN and_CC
only_RB a_DT mild_JJ form_NN of_IN serfdom_NN survived_VBN ,_, the_DT guilds_NNS discouraged_VBD the_DT idea_NN of_IN
using_VBG machinery_NN because_IN they_PRP thought_VBD this_DT would_MD throw_VB a_DT large_JJ number_NN
of_IN their_PRP$ brethren_NNS out_IN of_IN work_NN ._. Besides_IN ,_, the_DT Middle-Ages_NNP were_VBD not_RB at_IN all_DT
interested_JJ in_IN producing_VBG large_JJ quantities_NNS of_IN goods_NNS ._. Their_PRP$ tailors_NNS and_CC
butchers_NNS and_CC carpenters_NNS worked_VBD for_IN the_DT immediate_JJ needs_NNS of_IN the_DT small_JJ
community_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP lived_VBD and_CC had_VBD no_DT desire_NN to_TO compete_VB with_IN their_PRP$
neighbours_NNS ,_, or_CC to_TO produce_VB more_JJR than_IN was_VBD strictly_RB necessary_JJ ._.

During_IN the_DT Renaissance_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT Church_NNP against_IN
scientific_JJ investigations_NNS could_MD no_RB longer_RB be_VB enforced_VBN as_RB rigidly_RB as_IN
before_RB ,_, a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN men_NNS began_VBD to_TO devote_VB their_PRP$ lives_NNS to_TO mathematics_NNS
and_CC astronomy_NN and_CC physics_NN and_CC chemistry_NN ._. Two_CD years_NNS before_IN the_DT beginning_VBG

Billies_NNS ."_CC

and_CC behaviour_NN of_IN Magnets_NNPS ._. During_IN the_DT Thirty_JJ Years_NNS War_NNP Otto_NNP von_NNP

a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN scientists_NNS devoted_VBN themselves_PRP to_TO the_DT study_NN of_IN

universal_JJ genius_NN of_IN America_NNP next_JJ to_TO Benjamin_NNP Thomson_NNP (_-LRB- who_WP after_IN his_PRP$

subject_JJ ._. He_PRP discovered_VBD that_IN lightning_NN and_CC the_DT electric_JJ spark_NN were_VBD

studies_NNS until_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ busy_JJ and_CC useful_JJ life_NN ._. Then_RB came_VBD Volta_NNP with_IN
his_PRP$ famous_JJ "_`` electric_JJ pile_NN "_'' and_CC Galvani_NNP and_CC Day_NNP and_CC the_DT Danish_JJ professor_NN
Hans_NNP Christian_NNP Oersted_NNP and_CC Ampere_NNP and_CC Arago_NNP and_CC Faraday_NNP ,_, all_DT of_IN them_PRP
diligent_JJ searchers_NNS after_IN the_DT true_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT electric_JJ forces_NNS ._.

They_PRP freely_RB gave_VBD their_PRP$ discoveries_NNS to_TO the_DT world_NN and_CC Samuel_NNP Morse_NNP (_-LRB- who_WP
like_IN Fulton_NNP began_VBD his_PRP$ career_NN as_IN an_DT artist_NN )_-RRB- thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP could_MD use_VB
this_DT new_JJ electric_JJ current_JJ to_TO transmit_VB messages_NNS from_IN one_CD city_NN to_TO another_DT ._.

invented_VBN ._. People_NNS laughed_VBD at_IN him_PRP ._. Morse_NNP therefore_RB was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO finance_VB
his_PRP$ own_JJ experiments_NNS and_CC soon_RB he_PRP had_VBD spent_VBN all_DT his_PRP$ money_NN and_CC then_RB he_PRP was_VBD
very_RB poor_JJ and_CC people_NNS laughed_VBD even_RB louder_JJR ._. He_PRP then_RB asked_VBD Congress_NNP to_TO help_VB
him_PRP and_CC a_DT special_JJ Committee_NNP on_IN Commerce_NNP promised_VBD him_PRP their_PRP$ support_NN ._. But_CC
the_DT members_NNS of_IN Congress_NNP were_VBD not_RB at_IN all_DT interested_JJ and_CC Morse_NNP had_VBD to_TO wait_VB
twelve_CD years_NNS before_IN he_PRP was_VBD given_VBN a_DT small_JJ congressional_JJ appropriation_NN ._. He_PRP
then_RB built_VBD a_DT "_`` telegraph_NN "_'' between_IN Baltimore_NNP and_CC Washington_NNP ._. In_IN the_DT year_NN
1887_CD he_PRP had_VBD shown_VBN his_PRP$ first_JJ successful_JJ "_`` telegraph_NN "_'' in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT lecture_NN
halls_NNS of_IN New_NNP York_NNP University_NNP ._. Finally_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT 24_CD th_NN of_IN May_NNP of_IN the_DT
year_NN 1844_IN the_DT first_JJ long-distance_JJ message_NN was_VBD sent_VBN from_IN Washington_NNP to_TO
Baltimore_NNP and_CC to-day_NN the_DT whole_JJ world_NN is_VBZ covered_VBN with_IN telegraph_NN wires_NNS
and_CC we_PRP can_MD send_VB news_NN from_IN Europe_NNP to_TO Asia_NNP in_IN a_DT few_JJ seconds_NNS ._. Twenty-three_CD
years_NNS later_RB Alexander_NNP Graham_NNP Bell_NNP used_VBD the_DT electric_JJ current_NN for_IN his_PRP$
telephone_NN ._. And_CC half_PDT a_DT century_NN afterwards_RB Marconi_NNP improved_VBD upon_IN these_DT
ideas_NNS by_IN inventing_VBG a_DT system_NN of_IN sending_VBG messages_NNS which_WDT did_VBD away_RB entirely_RB
with_IN the_DT old-fashioned_JJ wires_NNS ._.

While_IN Morse_NNP ,_, the_DT New_NNP Englander_NNP ,_, was_VBD working_VBG on_IN his_PRP$ "_`` telegraph_NN ,"_NN Michael_NNP
Faraday_NNP ,_, the_DT Yorkshire-man_NNP ,_, had_VBD constructed_VBN the_DT first_JJ "_`` dynamo_NN ."_'' This_DT
tiny_JJ little_JJ machine_NN was_VBD completed_VBN in_IN the_DT year_NN 1881_CD when_WRB Europe_NNP was_VBD
still_RB trembling_VBG as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ July_NNP revolutions_NNS which_WDT had_VBD so_RB
severely_RB upset_JJ the_DT plans_NNS of_IN the_DT Congress_NNP of_IN Vienna_NNP ._. The_DT first_JJ dynamo_NN
grew_VBD and_CC grew_VBD and_CC grew_VBD and_CC to-day_JJ it_PRP provides_VBZ us_PRP with_IN heat_NN and_CC with_IN
light_NN (_-LRB- you_PRP know_VBP the_DT little_JJ incandescent_JJ bulbs_NNS which_WDT Edison_NNP ,_, building_VBG
upon_IN French_NNP and_CC English_JJ experiments_NNS of_IN the_DT forties_CD and_CC fifties_CD ,_, first_RB
made_VBN in_IN 1878)_CD and_CC with_IN power_NN for_IN all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN machines_NNS ._. If_IN I_PRP am_VBP not_RB
mistaken_VBN the_DT electric-engine_NN will_MD soon_RB entirely_RB drive_VB out_RP the_DT "_'' heat_NN
engine_NN "_`` just_RB as_IN in_IN the_DT olden_JJ days_NNS the_DT more_RBR highly-organised_JJ prehistoric_NN
animals_NNS drove_VBD out_RP their_PRP$ less_JJR efficient_JJ neighbours_NNS ._.

Personally_RB (_-LRB- but_CC I_PRP know_VBP nothing_NN about_IN machinery_NN )_-RRB- this_DT will_MD make_VB me_PRP very_RB
happy_JJ ._. For_IN the_DT electric_JJ engine_NN which_WDT can_MD be_VB run_VBN by_IN waterpower_NN is_VBZ a_DT clean_JJ
and_CC companionable_JJ servant_NN of_IN mankind_NN but_CC the_DT "_`` heat-engine_NN ,"_, the_DT marvel_NN
of_IN the_DT eighteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT noisy_JJ and_CC dirty_JJ creature_NN for_IN ever_RB
filling_VBG the_DT world_NN with_IN ridiculous_JJ smoke-stacks_NNS and_CC with_IN dust_NN and_CC soot_NN
and_CC asking_VBG that_IN it_PRP be_VB fed_VBN with_IN coal_NN which_WDT has_VBZ to_TO be_VB dug_VBN out_IN of_IN mines_NNS at_IN
great_JJ inconvenience_NN and_CC risk_NN to_TO thousands_NNS of_IN people_NNS ._.

And_CC if_IN I_PRP were_VBD a_DT novelist_NN and_CC not_RB a_DT historian_NN ,_, who_WP must_MD stick_VB to_TO facts_NNS
and_CC may_MD not_RB use_VB his_PRP$ imagination_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD describe_VB the_DT happy_JJ day_NN when_WRB the_DT
last_JJ steam_NN locomotive_NN shall_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO the_DT Museum_NNP of_IN Natural_NNP History_NNP to_TO
be_VB placed_VBN next_JJ to_TO the_DT skeleton_NN of_IN the_DT Dynosaur_NNP and_CC the_DT Pteredactyl_NNP and_CC
the_DT other_JJ extinct_JJ creatures_NNS of_IN a_DT by-gone_JJ age_NN ._.




THE_DT SOCIAL_NNP REVOLUTION_NN

BUT_NNP THE_DT NEW_NNP ENGINES_NNP WERE_NNP VERY_NNP EXPENSIVE_VBP AND_CC ONLY_JJ PEOPLE_NN OF_IN WEALTH_NNP COULD_NN
AFFORD_NNP THEM_NNP ._. THE_DT OLD_NNP CARPENTER_NNP OR_NNP SHOEMAKER_NNP WHO_WP HAD_NNP BEEN_NNP HIS_NNP OWN_NNP MASTER_NNP
IN_IN HIS_PRP$ LITTLE_NNP WORKSHOP_NNP WAS_NNP OBLIGED_NNP TO_TO HIRE_NNP HIMSELF_NNP OUT_NNP TO_TO THE_DT OWNERS_NNS OF_IN
THE_DT BIG_NNP MECHANICAL_NNP TOOLS_NNP ,_, AND_CC WHILE_JJ HE_NN MADE_NNP MORE_NNP MONEY_NNP THAN_NNP BEFORE_NNP ,_, HE_NN
LOST_NNP HIS_NNP FORMER_NNP INDEPENDENCE_NNP AND_CC HE_PRP DID_VBD NOT_NNP LIKE_NNP THAT_NN


IN_IN the_DT olden_JJ days_NNS the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN had_VBD been_VBN done_VBN by_IN independent_JJ
workmen_NNS who_WP sat_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ little_JJ workshops_NNS in_IN the_DT front_NN of_IN their_PRP$
houses_NNS ,_, who_WP owned_VBD their_PRP$ tools_NNS ,_, who_WP boxed_VBD the_DT ears_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ
apprentices_NNS and_CC who_WP ,_, within_IN the_DT limits_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ guilds_NNS ,_,
conducted_VBN their_PRP$ business_NN as_IN it_PRP pleased_VBD them_PRP ._. They_PRP lived_VBD simple_JJ lives_NNS ,_,
and_CC were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO work_VB very_RB long_JJ hours_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD their_PRP$ own_JJ
masters_NNS ._. If_IN they_PRP got_VBD up_RB and_CC saw_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT fine_JJ day_NN to_TO go_VB fishing_NN ,_,
they_PRP went_VBD fishing_NN and_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT one_NN to_TO say_VB "_`` no_DT ."_NN

But_CC the_DT introduction_NN of_IN machinery_NN changed_VBD this_DT ._. A_DT machine_NN is_VBZ really_RB
nothing_NN but_CC a_DT greatly_RB enlarged_JJ tool_NN ._. A_DT railroad_NN train_NN which_WDT carries_VBZ you_PRP
at_IN the_DT speed_NN of_IN a_DT mile_NN a_DT minute_NN is_VBZ in_IN reality_NN a_DT pair_NN of_IN very_RB fast_RB
legs_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT steam_NN hammer_NN which_WDT flattens_VBZ heavy_JJ plates_NNS of_IN iron_NN is_VBZ just_RB a_DT
terrible_JJ big_JJ fist_NN ,_, made_VBN of_IN steel_NN ._.

But_CC whereas_IN we_PRP can_MD all_PDT afford_VB a_DT pair_NN of_IN good_JJ legs_NNS and_CC a_DT good_JJ strong_JJ
fist_NN ,_, a_DT railroad_NN train_NN and_CC a_DT steam_NN hammer_NN and_CC a_DT cotton_NN factory_NN are_VBP very_RB
expensive_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN machinery_NN and_CC they_PRP are_VBP not_RB owned_VBN by_IN a_DT single_JJ man_NN ,_,
but_CC usually_RB by_IN a_DT company_NN of_IN people_NNS who_WP all_PDT contribute_VBP a_DT certain_JJ sum_NN and_CC
then_RB divide_VB the_DT profits_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ railroad_NN or_CC cotton_NN mill_NN according_VBG to_TO
the_DT amount_NN of_IN money_NN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP invested_VBN ._.

Therefore_RB ,_, when_WRB machines_NNS had_VBD been_VBN improved_VBN until_IN they_PRP were_VBD really_RB
practicable_JJ and_CC profitable_JJ ,_, the_DT builders_NNS of_IN those_DT large_JJ tools_NNS ,_, the_DT
machine_NN manufacturers_NNS ,_, began_VBD to_TO look_VB for_IN customers_NNS who_WP could_MD afford_VB to_TO
pay_NN for_IN them_PRP in_IN cash_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT early_JJ middle_JJ ages_NNS ,_, when_WRB land_NN had_VBD been_VBN almost_RB the_DT only_JJ form_NN of_IN
wealth_NN ,_, the_DT nobility_NN were_VBD the_DT only_JJ people_NNS who_WP were_VBD considered_VBN wealthy_JJ ._.
But_CC as_IN I_PRP have_VBP told_VBN you_PRP in_IN a_DT previous_JJ chapter_NN ,_, the_DT gold_NN and_CC silver_NN which_WDT
they_PRP possessed_VBD was_VBD quite_RB insignificant_JJ and_CC they_PRP used_VBD the_DT old_JJ system_NN
of_IN barter_NN ,_, exchanging_VBG cows_NNS for_IN horses_NNS and_CC eggs_NNS for_IN honey_NN ._. During_IN the_DT
crusades_NNS ,_, the_DT burghers_NNS of_IN the_DT cities_NNS had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO gather_VB riches_NNS
from_IN the_DT reviving_VBG trade_NN between_IN the_DT east_JJ and_CC the_DT west_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN
serious_JJ rivals_NNS of_IN the_DT lords_NNS and_CC the_DT knights_NNS ._.

The_DT French_JJ revolution_NN had_VBD entirely_RB destroyed_VBN the_DT wealth_NN of_IN the_DT nobility_NN
and_CC had_VBD enormously_RB increased_VBN that_IN of_IN the_DT middle_JJ class_NN or_CC "_`` bourgeoisie_NN ."_.
The_DT years_NNS of_IN unrest_NN which_WDT followed_VBD the_DT Great_NNP Revolution_NNP had_VBD offered_VBN
many_JJ middle-class_NN people_NNS a_DT chance_NN to_TO get_VB more_JJR than_IN their_PRP$ share_NN of_IN this_DT
world_NN '_POS s_PRP goods_NNS ._. The_DT estates_NNS of_IN the_DT church_NN had_VBD been_VBN confiscated_VBN by_IN
the_DT French_NNP Convention_NNP and_CC had_VBD been_VBN sold_VBN at_IN auction_NN ._. There_EX had_VBD been_VBN
a_DT terrific_JJ amount_NN of_IN graft_NN ._. Land_NN speculators_NNS had_VBD stolen_VBN thousands_NNS of_IN
square_JJ miles_NNS of_IN valuable_JJ land_NN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT Napoleonic_NNP wars_NNS ,_, they_PRP had_VBD
used_VBN their_PRP$ capital_NN to_TO "_`` profiteer_VB "_'' in_IN grain_NN and_CC gun-powder_NN ,_, and_CC now_RB they_PRP
possessed_VBN more_JJR wealth_NN than_IN they_PRP needed_VBD for_IN the_DT actual_JJ expenses_NNS of_IN their_PRP$
households_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP could_MD afford_VB to_TO build_VB themselves_PRP factories_NNS and_CC to_TO
hire_VB men_NNS and_CC women_NNS to_TO work_VB the_DT machines_NNS ._.

This_DT caused_VBD a_DT very_RB abrupt_JJ change_NN in_IN the_DT lives_NNS of_IN hundreds_NNS of_IN thousands_NNS
of_IN people_NNS ._. Within_IN a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ,_, many_JJ cities_NNS doubled_VBD the_DT number_NN of_IN their_PRP$
inhabitants_NNS and_CC the_DT old_JJ civic_JJ centre_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN the_DT real_JJ "_`` home_NN "_'' of_IN
the_DT citizens_NNS was_VBD surrounded_VBN with_IN ugly_JJ and_CC cheaply_RB built_VBN suburbs_NNS where_WRB
the_DT workmen_NNS slept_VBD after_IN their_PRP$ eleven_CD or_CC twelve_CD hours_NNS ,_, or_CC thirteen_CD hours_NNS ,_,
spent_VBN in_IN the_DT factories_NNS and_CC from_IN where_WRB they_PRP returned_VBD to_TO the_DT factory_NN as_IN
soon_RB as_IN the_DT whistle_NN blew_VBD ._.

Far_RB and_CC wide_RB through_IN the_DT countryside_NN there_EX was_VBD talk_NN of_IN the_DT fabulous_JJ sums_NNS
of_IN money_NN that_WDT could_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN the_DT towns_NNS ._. The_DT peasant_NN boy_NN ,_, accustomed_VBN
to_TO a_DT life_NN in_IN the_DT open_JJ ,_, went_VBD to_TO the_DT city_NN ._. He_PRP rapidly_RB lost_VBD his_PRP$ old_JJ health_NN
amidst_IN the_DT smoke_NN and_CC dust_NN and_CC dirt_NN of_IN those_DT early_JJ and_CC badly_RB ventilated_VBN
workshops_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT end_NN ,_, very_RB often_RB ,_, was_VBD death_NN in_IN the_DT poor-house_JJ or_CC in_IN
the_DT hospital_NN ._.

Of_IN course_NN the_DT change_NN from_IN the_DT farm_NN to_TO the_DT factory_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN so_RB
many_JJ people_NNS was_VBD not_RB accomplished_VBN without_IN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN opposition_NN ._.
Since_IN one_CD engine_NN could_MD do_VB as_RB much_JJ work_NN as_IN a_DT hundred_CD men_NNS ,_, the_DT ninety-nine_CD
others_NNS who_WP were_VBD thrown_VBN out_IN of_IN employment_NN did_VBD not_RB like_IN it_PRP ._. Frequently_RB
they_PRP attacked_VBD the_DT factory-buildings_NNS and_CC set_VBN fire_NN to_TO the_DT machines_NNS ,_, but_CC
Insurance_NNP Companies_NNS had_VBD been_VBN organised_VBN as_RB early_RB as_IN the_DT 17_CD th_JJ century_NN and_CC
as_IN a_DT rule_NN the_DT owners_NNS were_VBD well_RB protected_VBN against_IN loss_NN ._.

Soon_RB ,_, newer_JJR and_CC better_JJR machines_NNS were_VBD installed_VBN ,_, the_DT factory_NN was_VBD
surrounded_VBN with_IN a_DT high_JJ wall_NN and_CC then_RB there_EX was_VBD an_DT end_NN to_TO the_DT rioting_NN ._.
The_DT ancient_JJ guilds_NNS could_MD not_RB possibly_RB survive_VB in_IN this_DT new_JJ world_NN of_IN
steam_NN and_CC iron_NN ._. They_PRP went_VBD out_IN of_IN existence_NN and_CC then_RB the_DT workmen_NNS tried_VBN
to_TO organise_VB regular_JJ labour_NN unions_NNS ._. But_CC the_DT factory-owners_NNS ,_, who_WP through_IN
their_PRP$ wealth_NN could_MD exercise_VB great_JJ influence_NN upon_IN the_DT politicians_NNS of_IN the_DT
different_JJ countries_NNS ,_, went_VBD to_TO the_DT Legislature_NNP and_CC had_VBD laws_NNS passed_VBN which_WDT
forbade_IN the_DT forming_VBG of_IN such_JJ trade_NN unions_NNS because_IN they_PRP interfered_VBD with_IN
the_DT "_`` liberty_NN of_IN action_NN "_'' of_IN the_DT working_VBG man_NN ._.

Please_VB do_VBP not_RB think_VB that_IN the_DT good_JJ members_NNS of_IN Parliament_NNP who_WP passed_VBD these_DT
laws_NNS were_VBD wicked_JJ tyrants_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD the_DT true_JJ sons_NNS of_IN the_DT revolutionary_NN
period_NN when_WRB everybody_NN talked_VBD of_IN "_`` liberty_NN "_'' and_CC when_WRB people_NNS often_RB killed_VBN
their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS because_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB quite_RB as_RB liberty-loving_JJ as_IN they_PRP
ought_MD to_TO have_VB been_VBN ._. Since_IN "_`` liberty_NN "_'' was_VBD the_DT foremost_JJ virtue_NN of_IN man_NN ,_, it_PRP
was_VBD not_RB right_JJ that_IN labour-unions_NNS should_MD dictate_VB to_TO their_PRP$ members_NNS the_DT
hours_NNS during_IN which_WDT they_PRP could_MD work_VB and_CC the_DT wages_NNS which_WDT they_PRP must_MD demand_VB ._.
The_DT workman_NN must_MD at_IN all_DT times_NNS ,_, be_VB "_`` free_JJ to_TO sell_VB his_PRP$ services_NNS in_IN the_DT open_JJ
market_NN ,"_NN and_CC the_DT employer_NN must_MD be_VB equally_RB "_'' free_JJ "_'' to_TO conduct_VB his_PRP$ business_NN
as_IN he_PRP saw_VBD fit_NN ._. The_DT days_NNS of_IN the_DT Mercantile_NNP System_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT state_NN had_VBD
regulated_VBN the_DT industrial_JJ life_NN of_IN the_DT entire_JJ community_NN ,_, were_VBD coming_VBG to_TO
an_DT end_NN ._. The_DT new_JJ idea_NN of_IN "_`` freedom_NN "_'' insisted_VBD that_IN the_DT state_NN stand_NN entirely_RB
aside_RB and_CC let_VB commerce_NN take_VB its_PRP$ course_NN ._.

The_DT last_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT 18_CD th_JJ century_NN had_VBD not_RB merely_RB been_VBN a_DT time_NN of_IN
intellectual_JJ and_CC political_JJ doubt_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT old_JJ economic_JJ ideas_NNS ,_, too_RB ,_, had_VBD
been_VBN replaced_VBN by_IN new_JJ ones_NNS which_WDT better_RB suited_VBN the_DT need_NN of_IN the_DT hour_NN ._.
Several_JJ years_NNS before_IN the_DT French_JJ revolution_NN ,_, Turgot_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN one_CD
of_IN the_DT unsuccessful_JJ ministers_NNS of_IN finance_NN of_IN Louis_NNP XVI_NNP ,_, had_VBD preached_VBN the_DT
novel_JJ doctrine_NN of_IN "_`` economic_JJ liberty_NN ."_NNS Turgot_IN lived_VBN in_IN a_DT country_NN which_WDT
had_VBD suffered_VBN from_IN too_RB much_JJ red-tape_NN ,_, too_RB many_JJ regulations_NNS ,_, too_RB many_JJ
officials_NNS trying_VBG to_TO enforce_VB too_RB many_JJ laws_NNS ._. "_'' Remove_VB this_DT official_NN
supervision_NN ,"_, he_PRP wrote_VBD ,_, "_`` let_VB the_DT people_NNS do_VBP as_IN they_PRP please_VBP ,_, and_CC
everything_NN will_MD be_VB all_DT right_JJ ."_NN Soon_RB his_PRP$ famous_JJ advice_NN of_IN "_'' laissez_FW
faire_NN "_`` became_VBD the_DT battle-cry_NN around_IN which_WDT the_DT economists_NNS of_IN that_DT period_NN
rallied_VBD ._.

At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN in_IN England_NNP ,_, Adam_NNP Smith_NNP was_VBD working_VBG on_IN his_PRP$ mighty_JJ
volumes_NNS on_IN the_DT "_`` Wealth_NNP of_IN Nations_NNPS ,"_, which_WDT made_VBD another_DT plea_NN for_IN
"_`` liberty_NN "_'' and_CC the_DT "_`` natural_JJ rights_NNS of_IN trade_NN ."_IN Thirty_CD years_NNS later_RB ,_, after_IN
the_DT fall_NN of_IN Napoleon_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT reactionary_JJ powers_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP had_VBD gained_VBN
their_PRP$ victory_NN at_IN Vienna_NNP ,_, that_WDT same_JJ freedom_NN which_WDT was_VBD denied_VBN to_TO the_DT
people_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ political_JJ relations_NNS was_VBD forced_VBN upon_IN them_PRP in_IN their_PRP$
industrial_JJ life_NN ._.

The_DT general_JJ use_NN of_IN machinery_NN ,_, as_IN I_PRP have_VBP said_VBD at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN this_DT
chapter_NN ,_, proved_VBD to_TO be_VB of_IN great_JJ advantage_NN to_TO the_DT state_NN ._. Wealth_NN increased_VBN
rapidly_RB ._. The_DT machine_NN made_VBD it_PRP possible_JJ for_IN a_DT single_JJ country_NN ,_, like_IN
England_NNP ,_, to_TO carry_VB all_DT the_DT burdens_NNS of_IN the_DT great_JJ Napoleonic_NNP wars_NNS ._. The_DT
capitalists_NNS (_-LRB- the_DT people_NNS who_WP provided_VBD the_DT money_NN with_IN which_WDT machines_NNS were_VBD
bought_VBN )_-RRB- reaped_VBD enormous_JJ profits_NNS ._. They_PRP became_VBD ambitious_JJ and_CC began_VBD to_TO
take_VB an_DT interest_NN in_IN politics_NNS ._. They_PRP tried_VBD to_TO compete_VB with_IN the_DT landed_VBN
aristocracy_NN which_WDT still_RB exercised_VBN great_JJ influence_NN upon_IN the_DT government_NN of_IN
most_RBS European_JJ countries_NNS ._.

In_IN England_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT members_NNS of_IN Parliament_NNP were_VBD still_RB elected_VBN according_VBG
to_TO a_DT Royal_NNP Decree_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1265,_CD and_CC where_WRB a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN recently_RB
created_VBN industrial_JJ centres_NNS were_VBD without_IN representation_NN ,_, they_PRP brought_VBD
about_IN the_DT passing_NN of_IN the_DT Reform_NNP Bill_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1882,_IN which_WDT changed_VBD the_DT
electoral_JJ system_NN and_CC gave_VBD the_DT class_NN of_IN the_DT factory-owners_NNS more_JJR influence_NN
upon_IN the_DT legislative_JJ body_NN ._. This_DT however_RB caused_VBN great_JJ discontent_NN among_IN
the_DT millions_NNS of_IN factory_NN workers_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD left_VBN without_IN any_DT voice_NN in_IN the_DT
government_NN ._. They_PRP too_RB began_VBD an_DT agitation_NN for_IN the_DT right_NN to_TO vote_VB ._. They_PRP put_VBP
their_PRP$ demands_NNS down_IN in_IN a_DT document_NN which_WDT came_VBD to_TO be_VB known_VBN as_IN the_DT "_`` People_NNS '_'' s_PRP
Charter_NNP ."_JJ The_DT debates_NNS about_IN this_DT charter_NN grew_VBD more_RBR and_CC more_RBR violent_JJ ._.
They_PRP had_VBD not_RB yet_RB come_VBN to_TO an_DT end_NN when_WRB the_DT revolutions_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN 1848_CD
broke_VBD out_RP ._. Frightened_VBN by_IN the_DT threat_NN of_IN a_DT new_JJ outbreak_NN or_CC Jacobinism_NNP and_CC
violence_NN ,_, the_DT English_JJ government_NN placed_VBD the_DT Duke_NNP of_IN Wellington_NNP ,_, who_WP
was_VBD now_RB in_IN his_PRP$ eightieth_JJ year_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT army_NN ,_, and_CC called_VBD for_IN
Volunteers_NNS ._. London_NNP was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN siege_NN and_CC preparations_NNS were_VBD
made_VBN to_TO suppress_VB the_DT coming_VBG revolution_NN ._.

But_CC the_DT Chartist_NNP movement_NN killed_VBD itself_PRP through_IN bad_JJ leadership_NN and_CC no_NN
acts_NNS of_IN violence_NN took_VBD place_NN ._. The_DT new_JJ class_NN of_IN wealthy_JJ factory_NN owners_NNS ,_,
(_-LRB- I_PRP dislike_VBP the_DT word_NN "_`` bourgeoisie_NN "_'' which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN used_VBN to_TO death_NN by_IN the_DT
apostles_NNS of_IN a_DT new_JJ social_JJ order_NN ,)_RB slowly_RB increased_VBD its_PRP$ hold_NN upon_IN the_DT
government_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN industrial_JJ life_NN in_IN the_DT large_JJ cities_NNS
continued_VBD to_TO transform_VB vast_JJ acres_NNS of_IN pasture_NN and_CC wheat-land_NN into_IN dreary_NN
slums_NNS ,_, which_WDT guard_VBP the_DT approach_NN of_IN every_DT modern_JJ European_JJ town_NN ._.




EMANCIPATION_NN

THE_DT GENERAL_NNP INTRODUCTION_NN OF_IN MACHINERY_NNP DID_NNP NOT_NNP BRING_NNP ABOUT_NNP THE_DT ERA_NN OF_IN
HAPPINESS_NNP AND_CC PROSPERITY_NN WHICH_WDT HAD_NNP BEEN_NNP PREDICTED_NNP BY_NNP THE_DT GENERATION_NN
WHICH_WDT SAW_NNP THE_DT STAGE_NNP COACH_NNP REPLACED_NNP BY_NNP THE_DT RAILROAD_NN ._. SEVERAL_NNP REMEDIES_NNS
WERE_NNP SUGGESTED_NNP BUT_NNP NONE_VB OF_IN THESE_DT QUITE_JJ SOLVED_NNP THE_NNP PROBLEM_NN


IN_IN the_DT year_NN 1831,_VBD just_RB before_IN the_DT passing_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ Reform_NNP Bill_NNP
Jeremy_NNP Bentham_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ English_JJ student_NN of_IN legislative_JJ methods_NNS and_CC the_DT
most_RBS practical_JJ political_JJ reformer_NN of_IN that_DT day_NN ,_, wrote_VBD to_TO a_DT friend_NN :_: "_`` The_DT
way_NN to_TO be_VB comfortable_JJ is_VBZ to_TO make_VB others_NNS comfortable_JJ ._. The_DT way_NN to_TO make_VB
others_NNS comfortable_JJ is_VBZ to_TO appear_VB to_TO love_VB them_PRP ._. The_DT way_NN to_TO appear_VB to_TO love_VB
them_PRP is_VBZ to_TO love_VB them_PRP in_IN reality_NN ."_IN Jeremy_NNP was_VBD an_DT honest_JJ man_NN ._. He_PRP said_VBD what_WP
he_PRP believed_VBD to_TO be_VB true_JJ ._. His_PRP$ opinions_NNS were_VBD shared_VBN by_IN thousands_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
countrymen_NNS ._. They_PRP felt_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT happiness_NN of_IN their_PRP$ less_RBR

The_DT ideal_NN of_IN "_`` economic_JJ freedom_NN "_'' (_-LRB- the_DT "_`` laissez_FW faire_FW "_'' of_IN Turgot_NNP )_-RRB- had_VBD

On_IN the_DT sixth_JJ of_IN November_NNP of_IN the_DT year_NN 1860,_IN Abraham_NNP Lincoln_NNP ,_, an_DT Illinois_NNP

with_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN rivalry_NN which_WDT so_RB often_RB sacrificed_JJ human_JJ happiness_NN to_TO

This_DT idea_NN —_IN this_DT vague_JJ hope_NN for_IN a_DT better_JJR day_NN —_, was_VBD not_RB restricted_VBN to_TO a_DT

The_DT practical_JJ socialists_NNS like_IN Robert_NNP Owen_NNP and_CC Louis_NNP Blanc_NNP and_CC Francois_NNP

his_PRP$ liberal_JJ views_NNS made_VBD him_PRP very_RB unpopular_JJ with_IN the_DT police_NN authorities_NNS of_IN

he_PRP lived_VBD a_DT poor_JJ and_CC shabby_JJ life_NN as_IN the_DT correspondent_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP
Tribune_NNP ._.

No_DT one_NN ,_, thus_RB far_RB ,_, had_VBD paid_VBN much_JJ attention_NN to_TO his_PRP$ books_NNS on_IN economic_JJ
subjects_NNS ._. But_CC in_IN the_DT year_NN 1864_IN he_PRP organised_VBD the_DT first_JJ international_JJ
association_NN of_IN working_VBG men_NNS and_CC three_CD years_NNS later_RB in_IN 1867,_CD he_PRP published_VBN
the_DT first_JJ volume_NN of_IN his_PRP$ well-known_JJ treatise_NN called_VBD "_`` Capital_NNP ."_NNP Marx_NNP
believed_VBN that_IN all_DT history_NN was_VBD a_DT long_JJ struggle_NN between_IN those_DT who_WP
"_`` have_VB "_'' and_CC those_DT who_WP "_`` don_VBP '_'' t_NN have_VBP ."_RB The_DT introduction_NN and_CC general_JJ use_NN of_IN
machinery_NN had_VBD created_VBN a_DT new_JJ class_NN in_IN society_NN ,_, that_IN of_IN the_DT capitalists_NNS
who_WP used_VBD their_PRP$ surplus_JJ wealth_NN to_TO buy_VB the_DT tools_NNS which_WDT were_VBD then_RB used_VBN
by_IN the_DT labourers_NNS to_TO produce_VB still_RB more_JJR wealth_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD again_RB used_VBN
to_TO build_VB more_JJR factories_NNS and_CC so_RB on_IN ,_, until_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN time_NN ._. Meanwhile_RB ,_,
according_VBG to_TO Marx_NNP ,_, the_DT third_JJ estate_NN (_-LRB- the_DT bourgeoisie_NN )_-RRB- was_VBD growing_VBG richer_JJR
and_CC richer_JJR and_CC the_DT fourth_JJ estate_NN (_-LRB- the_DT proletariat_NN )_-RRB- was_VBD growing_VBG poorer_JJR
and_CC poorer_JJR ,_, and_CC he_PRP predicted_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT end_NN ,_, one_CD man_NN would_MD possess_VB
all_PDT the_DT wealth_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN while_IN the_DT others_NNS would_MD be_VB his_PRP$ employees_NNS and_CC
dependent_JJ upon_IN his_PRP$ good_JJ will_NN ._.

To_TO prevent_VB such_JJ a_DT state_NN of_IN affairs_NNS ,_, Marx_NNP advised_VBD working_VBG men_NNS of_IN all_PDT
countries_NNS to_TO unite_VB and_CC to_TO fight_VB for_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN political_JJ and_CC economic_JJ
measures_NNS which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD enumerated_VBN in_IN a_DT Manifesto_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1848,_IN the_DT
year_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ great_JJ European_JJ revolution_NN ._.

These_DT views_NNS of_IN course_NN were_VBD very_RB unpopular_JJ with_IN the_DT governments_NNS of_IN
Europe_NNP ,_, many_JJ countries_NNS ,_, especially_RB Prussia_NNP ,_, passed_VBD severe_JJ laws_NNS against_IN
the_DT Socialists_NNPS and_CC policemen_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO break_VB up_RP the_DT Socialist_NN
meetings_NNS and_CC to_TO arrest_VB the_DT speakers_NNS ._. But_CC that_DT sort_NN of_IN persecution_NN never_RB
does_VBZ any_DT good_JJ ._. Martyrs_NNP are_VBP the_DT best_JJS possible_JJ advertisements_NNS for_IN an_DT
unpopular_JJ cause_NN ._. In_IN Europe_NNP the_DT number_NN of_IN socialists_NNS steadily_RB increased_VBN
and_CC it_PRP was_VBD soon_RB clear_JJ that_IN the_DT Socialists_NNPS did_VBD not_RB contemplate_VB a_DT violent_JJ
revolution_NN but_CC were_VBD using_VBG their_PRP$ increasing_VBG power_NN in_IN the_DT different_JJ
Parliaments_NNS to_TO promote_VB the_DT interests_NNS of_IN the_DT labouring_NN classes_NNS ._.
Socialists_NNS were_VBD even_RB called_VBN upon_IN to_TO act_VB as_IN Cabinet_NNP Ministers_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP
co-operated_JJ with_IN progressive_JJ Catholics_NNS and_CC Protestants_NNS to_TO undo_VB the_DT
damage_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN caused_VBN by_IN the_DT Industrial_NNP Revolution_NNP and_CC to_TO bring_VB
about_IN a_DT fairer_JJR division_NN of_IN the_DT many_JJ benefits_NNS which_WDT had_VBD followed_VBN the_DT
introduction_NN of_IN machinery_NN and_CC the_DT increased_JJ production_NN of_IN wealth_NN ._.




THE_DT AGE_NN OF_IN SCIENCE_NNP

BUT_NNP THE_DT WORLD_NN HAD_NN UNDERGONE_NNP ANOTHER_NNP CHANGE_NNP WHICH_WDT WAS_VBD OF_IN GREATER_NNP
IMPORTANCE_NNP THAN_NNP EITHER_NNP THE_DT POLITICAL_NNP OR_JJ THE_DT INDUSTRIAL_NNP REVOLUTIONS_NNP ._.
AFTER_NNP GENERATIONS_NNP OF_IN OPPRESSION_NNP AND_CC PERSECUTION_NN ,_, THE_DT SCIENTIST_NNP HAD_NNP AT_WDT
LAST_NNP GAINED_NNP LIBERTY_NNP OF_IN ACTION_NNP AND_CC HE_PRP WAS_VBD NOW_RB TRYING_VBG TO_TO DISCOVER_NNP THE_NNP
FUNDAMENTAL_NNP LAWS_NNP WHICH_WDT GOVERN_NNP THE_DT UNIVERSE_NN


THE_DT Egyptians_NNS ,_, the_DT Babylonians_NNS ,_, the_DT Chaldeans_NNP ,_, the_DT Greeks_NNP and_CC the_DT
Romans_NNS ,_, had_VBD all_DT contributed_VBN something_NN to_TO the_DT first_JJ vague_JJ notions_NNS of_IN
science_NN and_CC scientific_JJ investigation_NN ._. But_CC the_DT great_JJ migrations_NNS of_IN the_DT
fourth_JJ century_NN had_VBD destroyed_VBN the_DT classical_JJ world_NN of_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP ,_,
and_CC the_DT Christian_NNP Church_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD more_JJR interested_JJ in_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN
the_DT soul_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN ,_, had_VBD regarded_VBN science_NN as_IN a_DT
manifestation_NN of_IN that_DT human_JJ arrogance_NN which_WDT wanted_VBD to_TO pry_VB into_IN divine_JJ
affairs_NNS which_WDT belonged_VBD to_TO the_DT realm_NN of_IN Almighty_NNP God_NNP ,_, and_CC which_WDT therefore_RB
was_VBD closely_RB related_VBN to_TO the_DT seven_CD deadly_JJ sins_NNS ._.

The_DT Renaissance_NNP to_TO a_DT certain_JJ but_CC limited_JJ extent_NN had_VBD broken_VBN through_IN
this_DT wall_NN of_IN Mediaeval_NNP prejudices_NNS ._. The_DT Reformation_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, which_WDT had_VBD
overtaken_IN the_DT Renaissance_NNP in_IN the_DT early_JJ 16_CD th_JJ century_NN ,_, had_VBD been_VBN hostile_JJ to_TO
the_DT ideals_NNS of_IN the_DT "_`` new_JJ civilisation_NN ,"_NN and_CC once_RB more_RBR the_DT men_NNS of_IN science_NN
were_VBD threatened_VBN with_IN severe_JJ punishment_NN ,_, should_MD they_PRP try_VB to_TO pass_VB beyond_IN
the_DT narrow_JJ limits_NNS of_IN knowledge_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN laid_VBN down_RP in_IN Holy_NNP Writ_NNP ._.

Our_PRP$ world_NN is_VBZ filled_VBN with_IN the_DT statues_NNS of_IN great_JJ generals_NNS ,_, atop_IN of_IN prancing_VBG
horses_NNS ,_, leading_VBG their_PRP$ cheering_NN soldiers_NNS to_TO glorious_JJ victory_NN ._. Here_RB and_CC
there_RB ,_, a_DT modest_JJ slab_NN of_IN marble_NN announces_VBZ that_IN a_DT man_NN of_IN science_NN has_VBZ found_VBN
his_PRP$ final_JJ resting_VBG place_NN ._. A_DT thousand_CD years_NNS from_IN now_RB we_PRP shall_MD probably_RB
do_VB these_DT things_NNS differently_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT children_NNS of_IN that_DT happy_JJ generation_NN
shall_MD know_VB of_IN the_DT splendid_JJ courage_NN and_CC the_DT almost_RB inconceivable_JJ devotion_NN
to_TO duty_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS who_WP were_VBD the_DT pioneers_NNS of_IN that_DT abstract_JJ knowledge_NN ,_,
which_WDT alone_RB has_VBZ made_VBN our_PRP$ modern_JJ world_NN a_DT practical_JJ possibility_NN ._.

Many_JJ of_IN these_DT scientific_JJ pioneers_NNS suffered_VBN poverty_NN and_CC contempt_NN and_CC

print_NN their_PRP$ names_NNS on_IN the_DT title-pages_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ books_NNS and_CC they_PRP dared_VBD not_RB

were_VBD exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT bitter_JJ enmity_NN of_IN the_DT Church_NNP ,_, both_DT Protestant_NNP
and_CC Catholic_NNP ,_, and_CC were_VBD the_DT subjects_NNS of_IN endless_JJ sermons_NNS ,_, inciting_VBG the_DT
parishioners_NNS to_TO violence_NN against_IN the_DT "_`` heretics_NNS ."_.

Here_RB and_CC there_RB they_PRP found_VBD an_DT asylum_NN ._. In_IN Holland_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT spirit_NN
of_IN tolerance_NN was_VBD strongest_JJS ,_, the_DT authorities_NNS ,_, while_IN regarding_VBG these_DT

In_IN another_DT chapter_NN I_PRP have_VBP told_VBN you_PRP how_WRB Roger_NNP Bacon_NNP ,_, the_DT great_JJ genius_NN of_IN
the_DT thirteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, was_VBD prevented_VBN for_IN years_NNS from_IN writing_VBG a_DT single_JJ

And_CC five_CD hundred_CD years_NNS later_RB ,_, the_DT contributors_NNS to_TO the_DT great_JJ philosophic_JJ
"_`` Encyclopaedia_NNP "_'' were_VBD under_IN the_DT constant_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT French_JJ

All_PDT this_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ a_DT mere_JJ detail_NN ._. The_DT work_NN that_WDT has_VBZ to_TO be_VB done_VBN

of_IN the_DT universe_NN ,_, did_VBD not_RB publish_VB his_PRP$ work_NN until_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ._.

the_DT English_NNP mathematician_NN when_WRB he_PRP dis-covered_VBD the_DT existence_NN of_IN that_WDT
interesting_JJ habit_NN of_IN falling_VBG objects_NNS which_WDT came_VBD to_TO be_VB known_VBN as_IN the_DT Law_NN
of_IN Gravitation_NNP ._.

That_DT ,_, for_IN the_DT moment_NN at_IN least_JJS ,_, exhausted_VBD the_DT interest_NN in_IN the_DT Heavens_NNP ,_,
and_CC man_NN began_VBD to_TO study_VB the_DT earth_NN ._. The_DT invention_NN of_IN a_DT workable_NN

Leeuwenhoek_NNP during_IN the_DT last_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT 17_CD th_JJ century_NN ,_, gave_VBD man_NN a_DT chance_NN
to_TO study_VB the_DT "_`` microscopic_JJ "_'' creatures_NNS who_WP are_VBP responsible_JJ for_IN so_RB many_JJ of_IN
his_PRP$ ailments_NNS ._. It_PRP laid_VBD the_DT foundations_NNS of_IN the_DT science_NN of_IN "_`` bacteriology_NN "_''

At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT Marquis_NNP de_NNP Laplace_NNP was_VBD working_VBG on_IN a_DT new_JJ theory_NN of_IN

Within_IN a_DT single_JJ generation_NN (_-LRB- between_IN 1810_CD and_CC 1840)_CD more_JJR progress_NN was_VBD

The_DT dignified_JJ world_NN of_IN the_DT well-to_NN -_: do_VBP middle_JJ class_NN ,_, which_WDT dominated_VBD the_DT

be_VB distrusted_VBN until_IN very_RB recently_RB ._. Then_RB ,_, at_IN last_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ services_NNS were_VBD

Indeed_RB it_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN to_TO pass_VB that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT ills_NNS of_IN this_DT world_NN ,_, which_WDT
our_PRP$ ancestors_NNS regarded_VBN as_IN inevitable_JJ "_`` acts_NNS of_IN God_NNP ,"_, have_VBP been_VBN exposed_VBN
as_IN manifestations_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ own_JJ ignorance_NN and_CC neglect_NN ._. Every_DT child_NN nowadays_RB
knows_VBZ that_IN he_PRP can_MD keep_VB from_IN getting_VBG typhoid_JJ fever_NN by_IN a_DT little_JJ care_NN in_IN
the_DT choice_NN of_IN his_PRP$ drinking_NN water_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP took_VBD years_NNS and_CC years_NNS of_IN hard_JJ
work_NN before_IN the_DT doctors_NNS could_MD convince_VB the_DT people_NNS of_IN this_DT fact_NN ._. Few_JJ of_IN
us_PRP now_RB fear_VBP the_DT dentist_NN chair_NN ._. A_DT study_NN of_IN the_DT microbes_NNS that_WDT live_VBP in_IN our_PRP$
mouth_NN has_VBZ made_VBN it_PRP possible_JJ to_TO keep_VB our_PRP$ teeth_NNS from_IN decay_NN ._. Must_'' perchance_NN
a_DT tooth_NN be_VB pulled_VBN ,_, then_RB we_PRP take_VBP a_DT sniff_NN of_IN gas_NN ,_, and_CC go_VB our_PRP$ way_NN
rejoicing_VBG ._. When_WRB the_DT newspapers_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN 1846_CD brought_VBD the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT
"_`` painless_JJ operation_NN "_'' which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN in_IN America_NNP with_IN the_DT help_NN
of_IN ether_NN ,_, the_DT good_JJ people_NNS of_IN Europe_NNP shook_VBD their_PRP$ heads_NNS ._. To_TO them_PRP it_PRP seemed_VBD
against_IN the_DT will_NN of_IN God_NNP that_IN man_NN should_MD escape_VB the_DT pain_NN which_WDT was_VBD the_DT

taking_VBG ether_JJ and_CC chloroform_NN for_IN operations_NNS became_VBD general_JJ ._.

But_CC the_DT battle_NN of_IN progress_NN had_VBD been_VBN won_VBN ._. The_DT breach_NN in_IN the_DT old_JJ walls_NNS
of_IN prejudice_NN was_VBD growing_VBG larger_JJR and_CC larger_JJR ,_, and_CC as_IN time_NN went_VBD by_IN ,_, the_DT
ancient_JJ stones_NNS of_IN ignorance_NN came_VBD crumbling_VBG down_RB ._. The_DT eager_JJ crusaders_NNS

themselves_PRP facing_VBG a_DT new_JJ obstacle_NN ._. Out_IN of_IN the_DT ruins_NNS of_IN a_DT long-gone_JJ past_NN ,_,
another_DT citadel_NN of_IN reaction_NN had_VBD been_VBN erected_VBN ,_, and_CC millions_NNS of_IN men_NNS had_VBD to_TO
give_VB their_PRP$ lives_NNS before_IN this_DT last_JJ bulwark_NN was_VBD destroyed_VBN ._.




ART_NN

A_DT CHAPTER_NN OF_IN ART_NNP


WHEN_WRB a_DT baby_NN is_VBZ perfectly_RB healthy_JJ and_CC has_VBZ had_VBN enough_RB to_TO eat_VB and_CC has_VBZ slept_VBN
all_DT it_PRP wants_VBZ ,_, then_RB it_PRP hums_VBZ a_DT little_JJ tune_NN to_TO show_VB how_WRB happy_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ ._. To_TO
grown-ups_NNS this_DT humming_NN means_VBZ nothing_NN ._. It_PRP sounds_VBZ like_IN "_`` goo-zum_JJ ,_, goo-zum_JJ ,_,
goo-o_JJ -_: o-o_SYM -_: o_IN ,"_NN but_CC to_TO the_DT baby_NN it_PRP is_VBZ perfect_JJ music_NN ._. It_PRP is_VBZ his_PRP$ first_JJ
contribution_NN to_TO art_NN ._.

As_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP (_-LRB- or_CC she_PRP )_-RRB- gets_VBZ a_DT little_RB older_JJR and_CC is_VBZ able_JJ to_TO sit_VB up_RP ,_, the_DT
period_NN of_IN mud-pie_NN making_VBG begins_VBZ ._. These_DT mud-pies_NNS do_VBP not_RB interest_VB the_DT
outside_JJ world_NN ._. There_EX are_VBP too_RB many_JJ million_CD babies_NNS ,_, making_VBG too_RB many_JJ
million_CD mud-pies_NNS at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._. But_CC to_TO the_DT small_JJ infant_NN they_PRP
represent_VB another_DT expedition_NN into_IN the_DT pleasant_JJ realm_NN of_IN art_NN ._. The_DT baby_NN is_VBZ
now_RB a_DT sculptor_NN ._.

At_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT hands_NNS begin_VB to_TO obey_VB the_DT brain_NN ,_,
the_DT child_NN becomes_VBZ a_DT painter_NN ._. His_PRP$ fond_JJ mother_NN gives_VBZ him_PRP a_DT box_NN of_IN coloured_JJ
chalks_NNS and_CC every_DT loose_JJ bit_NN of_IN paper_NN is_VBZ rapidly_RB covered_VBN with_IN strange_JJ
pothooks_NNS and_CC scrawls_NNS which_WDT represent_VBP houses_NNS and_CC horses_NNS and_CC terrible_JJ
naval_JJ battles_NNS ._.

Soon_RB however_RB this_DT happiness_NN of_IN just_RB "_`` making_VBG things_NNS "_`` comes_VBZ to_TO an_DT end_NN ._.
School_NNP begins_VBZ and_CC the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN is_VBZ filled_VBN up_RP with_IN work_NN ._.
The_DT business_NN of_IN living_VBG ,_, or_CC rather_RB the_DT business_NN of_IN "_`` making_VBG a_DT living_NN ,"_NN
becomes_VBZ the_DT most_RBS important_JJ event_NN in_IN the_DT life_NN of_IN every_DT boy_NN and_CC girl_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ little_JJ time_NN left_VBD for_IN "_`` art_NN "_'' between_IN learning_VBG the_DT tables_NNS of_IN
multiplication_NN and_CC the_DT past_JJ participles_NNS of_IN the_DT irregular_JJ French_JJ verbs_NNS ._.
And_CC unless_IN the_DT desire_NN for_IN making_VBG certain_JJ things_NNS for_IN the_DT mere_JJ pleasure_NN of_IN
creating_VBG them_PRP without_IN any_DT hope_NN of_IN a_DT practical_JJ return_NN be_VB very_RB strong_JJ ,_, the_DT
child_NN grows_VBZ into_IN manhood_NN and_CC forgets_NNS that_IN the_DT first_JJ five_CD years_NNS of_IN his_PRP$
life_NN were_VBD mainly_RB devoted_VBN to_TO art_NN ._.

sitting_VBG down_RP upon_IN a_DT child_NN '_POS s_VBZ chair_NN will_MD force_VB it_PRP to_TO collapse_VB ._. To_TO overcome_VB

This_DT new_JJ method_NN of_IN construction_NN allowed_VBD the_DT introduction_NN of_IN enormous_JJ
windows_NNS ._. In_IN the_DT twelfth_JJ century_NN ,_, glass_NN was_VBD still_RB an_DT expensive_JJ curiosity_NN ,_,

haltingly_RB return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ noble_JJ art_NN ._. Portals_NNPS and_CC pillars_NNS and_CC buttresses_NNS

best_JJS ._. Poor_NNP man_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ greatly_RB handicapped_VBN by_IN lack_NN of_IN a_DT suitable_JJ medium_NN ._.

And_CC thereby_RB hangs_VBZ a_DT story_NN ._.

The_DT Romans_NNS of_IN the_DT early_JJ Christian_JJ period_NN had_VBD covered_VBN the_DT floors_NNS and_CC
the_DT walls_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ temples_NNS and_CC houses_NNS with_IN mosaics_NNS ;_: pictures_NNS made_VBN of_IN
coloured_JJ bits_NNS of_IN glass_NN ._. But_CC this_DT art_NN had_VBD been_VBN exceedingly_RB difficult_JJ ._.
It_PRP gave_VBD the_DT painter_NN no_DT chance_NN to_TO express_VB all_DT he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO say_VB ,_, as_IN all_PDT
children_NNS know_VBP who_WP have_VBP ever_RB tried_VBN to_TO make_VB figures_NNS out_IN of_IN coloured_JJ blocks_NNS
of_IN wood_NN ._. The_DT art_NN of_IN mosaic_JJ painting_NN therefore_RB died_VBD out_RP during_IN the_DT late_JJ

Of_IN course_NN ,_, the_DT mediaeval_JJ painter_NN could_MD mix_VB his_PRP$ colours_NNS with_IN the_DT water_NN
of_IN the_DT wet_JJ plaster_NN which_WDT was_VBD put_VBN upon_IN the_DT walls_NNS of_IN the_DT churches_NNS ._. This_DT
method_NN of_IN painting_NN upon_IN "_`` fresh_JJ plaster_NN "_'' (_-LRB- which_WDT was_VBD generally_RB called_VBN
"_`` fresco_NN "_'' or_CC "_`` fresh_JJ "_'' painting_NN )_-RRB- was_VBD very_RB popular_JJ for_IN many_JJ centuries_NNS ._.
To-day_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ as_RB rare_JJ as_IN the_DT art_NN of_IN painting_VBG miniatures_NNS in_IN manuscripts_NNS
and_CC among_IN the_DT hundreds_NNS of_IN artists_NNS of_IN our_PRP$ modern_JJ cities_NNS there_RB is_VBZ perhaps_RB
one_NN who_WP can_MD handle_VB this_DT medium_NN successfully_RB ._. But_CC during_IN the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS
there_EX was_VBD no_DT other_JJ way_NN and_CC the_DT artists_NNS were_VBD "_`` fresco_JJ "_'' workers_NNS for_IN lack_NN
of_IN something_NN better_JJR ._. The_DT method_NN however_RB had_VBD certain_JJ great_JJ disadvantages_NNS ._.
Very_RB often_RB the_DT plaster_NN came_VBD off_RP the_DT walls_NNS after_IN only_RB a_DT few_JJ years_NNS ,_, or_CC
dampness_NN spoiled_VBD the_DT pictures_NNS ,_, just_RB as_IN dampness_NN will_MD spoil_VB the_DT pattern_NN
of_IN our_PRP$ wall_NN paper_NN ._. People_NNPS tried_VBD every_DT imaginable_JJ expedient_NN to_TO get_VB away_RB
from_IN this_DT plaster_NN background_NN ._. They_PRP tried_VBD to_TO mix_VB their_PRP$ colours_NNS with_IN wine_NN
and_CC vinegar_NN and_CC with_IN honey_NN and_CC with_IN the_DT sticky_JJ white_JJ of_IN egg_NN ,_, but_CC none_NN
of_IN these_DT methods_NNS were_VBD satisfactory_JJ ._. For_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT thousand_CD years_NNS these_DT
experiments_NNS continued_VBD ._. In_IN painting_VBG pictures_NNS upon_IN the_DT parchment_NN leaves_NNS of_IN
manuscripts_NNS the_DT mediaeval_JJ artists_NNS were_VBD very_RB successful_JJ ._. But_CC when_WRB it_PRP came_VBD
to_TO covering_VBG large_JJ spaces_NNS of_IN wood_NN or_CC stone_NN with_IN paint_NN which_WDT would_MD stick_VB ,_,
they_PRP did_VBD not_RB succeed_VB very_RB well_RB ._.

At_IN last_JJ ,_, during_IN the_DT first_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT fifteenth_JJ century_NN ,_, the_DT problem_NN
was_VBD solved_VBN in_IN the_DT southern_JJ Netherlands_NNP by_IN Jan_NNP and_CC Hubert_NNP van_NNP Eyck_NNP ._. The_DT
famous_JJ Flemish_JJ brothers_NNS mixed_VBN their_PRP$ paint_NN with_IN specially_RB prepared_VBN oils_NNS
and_CC this_DT allowed_VBD them_PRP to_TO use_VB wood_NN and_CC canvas_NN or_CC stone_NN or_CC anything_NN else_RB
as_IN a_DT background_NN for_IN their_PRP$ pictures_NNS ._.

But_CC by_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT religious_JJ ardour_NN of_IN the_DT early_JJ Middle_NNP Ages_NNP was_VBD a_DT
thing_NN of_IN the_DT past_NN ._. The_DT rich_JJ burghers_NNS of_IN the_DT cities_NNS were_VBD succeeding_VBG the_DT
bishops_NNS as_IN patrons_NNS of_IN the_DT arts_NNS ._. And_CC as_IN art_NN invariably_RB follows_VBZ the_DT full_JJ
dinner-pail_NN ,_, the_DT artists_NNS now_RB began_VBD to_TO work_VB for_IN these_DT worldly_JJ employers_NNS
and_CC painted_VBD pictures_NNS for_IN kings_NNS ,_, for_IN grand-dukes_NNS and_CC for_IN rich_JJ bankers_NNS ._.
Within_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT new_JJ method_NN of_IN painting_VBG with_IN oil_NN spread_NN

Beethoven_NNP lived_VBD through_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ French_NNP Revolution_NNP ._.

the_DT steam_NN engine_NN had_VBD come_VBN and_CC was_VBD filling_VBG the_DT world_NN with_IN a_DT sound_NN that_WDT
had_VBD nothing_NN in_IN common_JJ with_IN the_DT dreams_NNS of_IN the_DT Third_NNP Symphony_NNP ._.

Indeed_RB ,_, the_DT new_JJ order_NN of_IN steam_NN and_CC iron_NN and_CC coal_NN and_CC large_JJ factories_NNS had_VBD

and_CC had_VBD too_RB little_JJ education_NN to_TO bother_VB about_IN etchings_NNS and_CC sonatas_NNS and_CC

and_CC who_WP were_VBD of_IN no_DT practical_JJ use_NN to_TO the_DT community_NN in_IN which_WDT they_PRP lived_VBD ._.

until_IN they_PRP too_RB had_VBD lost_VBN all_DT taste_NN for_IN the_DT melody_NN of_IN the_DT flute_NN or_CC fiddle_NN
of_IN their_PRP$ peasant_NN ancestry_NN ._. The_DT arts_NNS became_VBD the_DT step-children_NNS of_IN the_DT
new_JJ industrial_JJ era_NN ._. Art_NN and_CC Life_NN became_VBD entirely_RB separated_VBN ._. Whatever_WDT
paintings_NNS had_VBD been_VBN left_VBN ,_, were_VBD dying_VBG a_DT slow_JJ death_NN in_IN the_DT museums_NNS ._. And_CC
music_NN became_VBD a_DT monopoly_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ "_`` virtuosi_FW "_'' who_WP took_VBD the_DT music_NN away_RB from_IN
the_DT home_NN and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP to_TO the_DT concert-hall_NN ._.

But_CC steadily_RB ,_, although_IN slowly_RB ,_, the_DT arts_NNS are_VBP coming_VBG back_RB into_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
People_NNS begin_VBP to_TO understand_VB that_DT Rembrandt_NNP and_CC Beethoven_NNP and_CC Rodin_NNP are_VBP
the_DT true_JJ prophets_NNS and_CC leaders_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ race_NN and_CC that_IN a_DT world_NN without_IN art_NN
and_CC happiness_NN resembles_VBZ a_DT nursery_NN without_IN laughter_NN ._.




COLONIAL_NNP EXPANSION_NNPS AND_CC WAR_NNPS

A_DT CHAPTER_NNP WHICH_WDT OUGHT_NNP TO_TO GIVE_VB YOU_PRP A_DT GREAT_JJ DEAL_NNP OF_IN POLITICAL_NNP INFORMATION_NN
ABOUT_NNP THE_DT LAST_NNP FIFTY_NNP YEARS_NNP ,_, BUT_NNP WHICH_WDT REALLY_NNP CONTAINS_NNP SEVERAL_NNP
EXPLANATIONS_NNPS AND_CC A_DT FEW_NNP APOLOGIES_NNPS


IF_IN I_PRP had_VBD known_VBN how_WRB difficult_JJ it_PRP was_VBD to_TO write_VB a_DT History_NN of_IN the_DT World_NNP ,_, I_PRP
should_MD never_RB have_VB undertaken_VBN the_DT task_NN ._. Of_IN course_NN ,_, any_DT one_CD possessed_VBN
of_IN enough_JJ industry_NN to_TO lose_VB himself_PRP for_IN half_PDT a_DT dozen_NN years_NNS in_IN the_DT musty_NN

After_IN this_DT short_JJ but_CC necessary_JJ excursion_NN ,_, we_PRP return_VBP to_TO the_DT history_NN of_IN
the_DT last_JJ fifty_CD years_NNS ._. Many_JJ things_NNS happened_VBD during_IN this_DT period_NN but_CC very_RB

The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT greater_JJR powers_NNS ceased_VBD to_TO be_VB mere_JJ political_JJ agencies_NNS

The_DT shrewd_JJ king_NN of_IN Belgium_NNP ,_, by_IN name_NN Leopold_NNP ,_, used_VBD the_DT discoveries_NNS of_IN
Henry_NNP Stanley_NNP to_TO found_VB the_DT Congo_NNP Free_NNP State_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1885._VBD Originally_RB
this_DT gigantic_JJ tropical_NN empire_NN was_VBD an_DT "_`` absolute_JJ monarchy_NN ."_IN But_CC after_IN many_JJ
years_NNS of_IN scandalous_JJ mismanagement_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD annexed_VBN by_IN the_DT Belgian_JJ people_NNS
who_WP made_VBD it_PRP a_DT colony_NN (_-LRB- in_IN the_DT year_NN 1908)_CD and_CC abolished_VBD the_DT terrible_JJ
abuses_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN tolerated_VBN by_IN this_DT very_RB unscrupulous_JJ Majesty_NNP ,_, who_WP
cared_VBD nothing_NN for_IN the_DT fate_NN of_IN the_DT natives_NNS as_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP got_VBD his_PRP$ ivory_NN
and_CC rubber_NN ._.

As_IN for_IN the_DT United_NNP States_NNPS ,_, they_PRP had_VBD so_RB much_JJ land_NN that_IN they_PRP desired_VBD no_RB
further_JJ territory_NN ._. But_CC the_DT terrible_JJ misrule_NN of_IN Cuba_NNP ,_, one_CD of_IN the_DT last_JJ of_IN
the_DT Spanish_JJ possessions_NNS in_IN the_DT western_JJ hemisphere_NN ,_, practically_RB forced_VBN
the_DT Washington_NNP government_NN to_TO take_VB action_NN ._. After_IN a_DT short_JJ and_CC rather_RB
uneventful_JJ war_NN ,_, the_DT Spaniards_NNS were_VBD driven_VBN out_IN of_IN Cuba_NNP and_CC Puerto_NNP Rico_NNP
and_CC the_DT Philippines_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD latter_NN became_VBD colonies_NNS of_IN the_DT United_NNP
States_NNS ._.

This_DT economic_JJ development_NN of_IN the_DT world_NN was_VBD perfectly_RB natural_JJ ._. The_DT
increasing_VBG number_NN of_IN factories_NNS in_IN England_NNP and_CC France_NNP and_CC Germany_NNP needed_VBN
an_DT ever_RB increasing_VBG amount_NN of_IN raw_JJ materials_NNS and_CC the_DT equally_RB increasing_VBG

Everywhere_RB the_DT cry_NN was_VBD for_IN more_JJR and_CC for_IN richer_JJR markets_NNS ,_, for_IN more_RBR
easily_RB accessible_JJ coal_NN mines_NNS and_CC iron_NN mines_NNS and_CC rubber_NN plantations_NNS and_CC
oil-wells_NNS ,_, for_IN greater_JJR supplies_NNS of_IN wheat_NN and_CC grain_NN ._.

The_DT purely_RB political_JJ events_NNS of_IN the_DT European_JJ continent_NN dwindled_VBD to_TO mere_JJ

to_TO prevent_VB this_DT ._.

After_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN particularly_RB atrocious_JJ massacres_NNS in_IN Bulgaria_NNP in_IN the_DT
