A_DT NEW_NNP WORLD_NN

THE_DT GREAT_JJ WAR_NN WHICH_WDT WAS_VBD REALLY_NNP THE_DT STRUGGLE_NNP FOR_IN A_DT NEW_NNP AND_CC BETTER_NN WORLD_NN


THE_DT Marquis_NNP de_FW Condorcet_NNP was_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT noblest_JJS characters_NNS among_IN the_DT
small_JJ group_NN of_IN honest_JJ enthusiasts_NNS who_WP were_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT outbreak_NN
of_IN the_DT great_JJ French_NNP Revolution_NNP ._. He_PRP had_VBD devoted_VBN his_PRP$ life_NN to_TO the_DT cause_NN
of_IN the_DT poor_JJ and_CC the_DT unfortunate_JJ ._. He_PRP had_VBD been_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT assistants_NNS of_IN
d_CC '_POS Alembert_NNP and_CC Diderot_NNP when_WRB they_PRP wrote_VBD their_PRP$ famous_JJ Encyclopedie_NNP ._. During_IN
the_DT first_JJ years_NNS of_IN the_DT Revolution_NNP he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN the_DT leader_NN of_IN the_DT Moderate_NNP
wing_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NN ._.

His_PRP$ tolerance_NN ,_, his_PRP$ kindliness_NN ,_, his_PRP$ stout_JJ common_JJ sense_NN ,_, had_VBD made_VBN him_PRP an_DT
object_NN of_IN suspicion_NN when_WRB the_DT treason_NN of_IN the_DT king_NN and_CC the_DT court_NN
clique_NN had_VBD given_VBN the_DT extreme_JJ radicals_NNS their_PRP$ chance_NN to_TO get_VB hold_NN of_IN the_DT
government_NN and_CC kill_VB their_PRP$ opponents_NNS ._. Condorcet_NNP was_VBD declared_VBN "_`` hors_FW de_FW
loi_NN ,"_, or_CC outlawed_VBN ,_, an_DT outcast_NN who_WP was_VBD henceforth_RB at_IN the_DT mercy_NN of_IN every_DT
true_JJ patriot_NN ._. His_PRP$ friends_NNS offered_VBD to_TO hide_VB him_PRP at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ peril_NN ._.
Condorcet_NNP refused_VBD to_TO accept_VB their_PRP$ sacrifice_NN ._. He_PRP escaped_VBD and_CC tried_VBD to_TO
reach_VB his_PRP$ home_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP might_MD be_VB safe_JJ ._. After_IN three_CD nights_NNS in_IN the_DT
open_JJ ,_, torn_JJ and_CC bleeding_NN ,_, he_PRP entered_VBD an_DT inn_NN and_CC asked_VBD for_IN some_DT food_NN ._. The_DT
suspicious_JJ yokels_NNS searched_VBD him_PRP and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ pockets_NNS they_PRP found_VBD a_DT copy_NN of_IN
Horace_NNP ,_, the_DT Latin_NNP poet_NN ._. This_DT showed_VBD that_IN their_PRP$ prisoner_NN was_VBD a_DT man_NN of_IN
gentle_JJ breeding_NN and_CC had_VBD no_DT business_NN upon_IN the_DT highroads_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB
every_DT educated_VBN person_NN was_VBD regarded_VBN as_IN an_DT enemy_NN of_IN the_DT Revolutionary_NNP
state_NN ._. They_PRP took_VBD Condorcet_NNP and_CC they_PRP bound_VBD him_PRP and_CC they_PRP gagged_VBD him_PRP and_CC
they_PRP threw_VBD him_PRP into_IN the_DT village_NN lock-up_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT morning_NN when_WRB the_DT
soldiers_NNS came_VBD to_TO drag_VB him_PRP back_RB to_TO Paris_NNP and_CC cut_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN off_RP ,_, behold_NN !_. he_PRP
was_VBD dead_JJ ._.

This_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD given_VBN all_DT and_CC had_VBD received_VBN nothing_NN had_VBD good_JJ reason_NN to_TO
despair_NN of_IN the_DT human_JJ race_NN ._. But_CC he_PRP has_VBZ written_VBN a_DT few_JJ sentences_NNS which_WDT ring_NN
as_IN true_JJ to-day_NN as_IN they_PRP did_VBD one_CD hundred_CD and_CC thirty_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._. I_PRP repeat_VBP
them_PRP here_RB for_IN your_PRP$ benefit_NN ._.

"_`` Nature_NN has_VBZ set_VBN no_DT limits_NNS to_TO our_PRP$ hopes_NNS ,"_IN he_PRP wrote_VBD ,_, "_'' and_CC the_DT picture_NN of_IN
the_DT human_JJ race_NN ,_, now_RB freed_VBN from_IN its_PRP$ chains_NNS and_CC marching_NN with_IN a_DT firm_NN tread_NN
on_IN the_DT road_NN of_IN truth_NN and_CC virtue_NN and_CC happiness_NN ,_, offers_VBZ to_TO the_DT philosopher_NN
a_DT spectacle_NN which_WDT consoles_VBZ him_PRP for_IN the_DT errors_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT crimes_NNS and_CC the_DT
injustices_NNS which_WDT still_RB pollute_VB and_CC afflict_VB this_DT earth_NN ."_.

The_DT world_NN has_VBZ just_RB passed_VBN through_IN an_DT agony_NN of_IN pain_NN compared_VBN to_TO which_WDT the_DT
French_NNP Revolution_NNP was_VBD a_DT mere_JJ incident_NN ._. The_DT shock_NN has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB great_JJ that_IN
it_PRP has_VBZ killed_VBN the_DT last_JJ spark_NN of_IN hope_NN in_IN the_DT breasts_NNS of_IN millions_NNS of_IN
men_NNS ._. They_PRP were_VBD chanting_VBG a_DT hymn_NN of_IN progress_NN ,_, and_CC four_CD years_NNS of_IN slaughter_NN
followed_VBD their_PRP$ prayers_NNS for_IN peace_NN ._. "_`` Is_VBZ it_PRP worth_JJ while_IN ,"_NNS so_RB they_PRP ask_VBP ,_,
"_`` to_TO work_NN and_CC slave_NN for_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN creatures_NNS who_WP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB passed_VBN
beyond_IN the_DT stage_NN of_IN the_DT earliest_JJS cave_NN men_NNS ?"_.

There_EX is_VBZ but_CC one_CD answer_NN ._.

That_DT answer_NN is_VBZ "_`` Yes_UH !"_.

The_DT World_NNP War_NNP was_VBD a_DT terrible_JJ calamity_NN ._. But_CC it_PRP did_VBD not_RB mean_VB the_DT end_NN of_IN
things_NNS ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN it_PRP brought_VBD about_IN the_DT coming_VBG of_IN a_DT new_JJ day_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO write_VB a_DT history_NN of_IN Greece_NNP and_CC Rome_NNP or_CC the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ._.
The_DT actors_NNS who_WP played_VBD their_PRP$ parts_NNS upon_IN that_DT long-forgotten_JJ stage_NN are_VBP
all_DT dead_JJ ._. We_PRP can_MD criticize_VB them_PRP with_IN a_DT cool_JJ head_NN ._. The_DT audience_NN that_WDT
applauded_VBD their_PRP$ efforts_NNS has_VBZ dispersed_VBN ._. Our_PRP$ remarks_NNS cannot_MD possibly_RB hurt_VB
their_PRP$ feelings_NNS ._.

But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO give_VB a_DT true_JJ account_NN of_IN contemporary_JJ events_NNS ._.
The_DT problems_NNS that_WDT fill_VBP the_DT minds_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS with_IN whom_WP we_PRP pass_VBP through_IN
life_NN ,_, are_VBP our_PRP$ own_JJ problems_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP hurt_VBP us_PRP too_RB much_RB or_CC they_PRP please_VBP us_PRP
too_RB well_RB to_TO be_VB described_VBN with_IN that_DT fairness_NN which_WDT is_VBZ necessary_JJ when_WRB we_PRP
are_VBP writing_VBG history_NN and_CC not_RB blowing_VBG the_DT trumpet_NN of_IN propaganda_NN ._. All_PDT the_DT
same_JJ I_PRP shall_MD endeavour_VB to_TO tell_VB you_PRP why_WRB I_PRP agree_VBP with_IN poor_JJ Condorcet_NNP when_WRB
he_PRP expressed_VBD his_PRP$ firm_NN faith_NN in_IN a_DT better_JJR future_NN ._.

Often_RB before_RB have_VBP I_PRP warned_VBD you_PRP against_IN the_DT false_JJ impression_NN which_WDT is_VBZ
created_VBN by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN our_PRP$ so-called_JJ historical_JJ epochs_NNS which_WDT divide_VBP the_DT
story_NN of_IN man_NN into_IN four_CD parts_NNS ,_, the_DT ancient_JJ world_NN ,_, the_DT Middle_NNP Ages_NNPS ,_, the_DT
Renaissance_NNP and_CC the_DT Reformation_NN ,_, and_CC Modern_NNP Time_NNP ._. The_DT last_JJ of_IN these_DT
terms_NNS is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ ._. The_DT word_NN "_`` modern_JJ "_'' implies_VBZ that_IN we_PRP ,_, the_DT
people_NNS of_IN the_DT twentieth_JJ century_NN ,_, are_VBP at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN human_JJ achievement_NN ._.
Fifty_CD years_NNS ago_IN the_DT liberals_NNS of_IN England_NNP who_WP followed_VBD the_DT leadership_NN of_IN
Gladstone_NNP felt_VBD that_IN the_DT problem_NN of_IN a_DT truly_RB representative_JJ and_CC democratic_JJ
form_NN of_IN government_NN had_VBD been_VBN solved_VBN forever_RB by_IN the_DT second_JJ great_JJ Reform_NN
Bill_NNP ,_, which_WDT gave_VBD workmen_NNS an_DT equal_JJ share_NN in_IN the_DT government_NN with_IN their_PRP$
employers_NNS ._. When_WRB Disraeli_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ conservative_JJ friends_NNS talked_VBD of_IN a_DT
dangerous_JJ "_`` leap_VB in_IN the_DT dark_JJ "_`` they_PRP answered_VBD "_`` No_DT ."_NN They_PRP felt_VBD certain_JJ of_IN
their_PRP$ cause_NN and_CC trusted_VBD that_IN henceforth_RB all_DT classes_NNS of_IN society_NN would_MD
co-operate_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT government_NN of_IN their_PRP$ common_JJ country_NN a_DT success_NN ._.
Since_IN then_RB many_JJ things_NNS have_VBP happened_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT few_JJ liberals_NNS who_WP are_VBP still_RB
alive_JJ begin_VBP to_TO understand_VB that_IN they_PRP were_VBD mistaken_VBN ._.

There_EX is_VBZ no_DT definite_JJ answer_NN to_TO any_DT historical_JJ problem_NN ._.

Every_DT generation_NN must_MD fight_VB the_DT good_JJ fight_NN anew_NNS or_CC perish_JJ as_IN those_DT
sluggish_JJ animals_NNS of_IN the_DT prehistoric_JJ world_NN have_VBP perished_VBN ._.

If_IN you_PRP once_RB get_VBP hold_NN of_IN this_DT great_JJ truth_NN you_PRP will_MD get_VB a_DT new_JJ and_CC much_JJ
broader_JJR view_NN of_IN life_NN ._. Then_RB ,_, go_VB one_CD step_NN further_RB and_CC try_VB to_TO imagine_VB
yourself_PRP in_IN the_DT position_NN of_IN your_PRP$ own_JJ great-great_JJ -_: grandchildren_NNS who_WP will_MD
take_VB your_PRP$ place_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN 10,000._. They_PRP too_RB will_MD learn_VB history_NN ._. But_CC
what_WP will_MD they_PRP think_VB of_IN those_DT short_JJ four_CD thousand_CD years_NNS during_IN which_WDT we_PRP
have_VBP kept_VBN a_DT written_VBN record_NN of_IN our_PRP$ actions_NNS and_CC of_IN our_PRP$ thoughts_NNS ?_. They_PRP will_MD
think_VB of_IN Napoleon_NNP as_IN a_DT contemporary_NN of_IN Tiglath_NNP Pileser_NNP ,_, the_DT Assyrian_NNP
conqueror_NN ._. Perhaps_RB they_PRP will_MD confuse_VB him_PRP with_IN Jenghiz_NNP Khan_NNP or_CC Alexander_NNP
the_DT Macedonian_NNP ._. The_DT great_JJ war_NN which_WDT has_VBZ just_RB come_VBN to_TO an_DT end_NN will_MD
appear_VB in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN that_DT long_JJ commercial_JJ conflict_NN which_WDT settled_VBD the_DT
supremacy_NN of_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP when_WRB Rome_NNP and_CC Carthage_NNP fought_VBD during_IN one_CD
hundred_CD and_CC twenty-eight_JJ years_NNS for_IN the_DT mastery_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ._. The_DT Balkan_NNP
troubles_NNS of_IN the_DT 19_CD th_NN century_NN (_-LRB- the_DT struggle_NN for_IN freedom_NN of_IN Serbia_NNP and_CC
Greece_NNP and_CC Bulgaria_NNP and_CC Montenegro_NNP )_-RRB- to_TO them_PRP will_MD seem_VB a_DT continuation_NN of_IN
the_DT disordered_JJ conditions_NNS caused_VBN by_IN the_DT Great_NNP Migrations_NNPS ._. They_PRP will_MD look_VB
at_IN pictures_NNS of_IN the_DT Rheims_NNP cathedral_NN which_WDT only_RB yesterday_NN was_VBD destroyed_VBN
by_IN German_JJ guns_NNS as_IN we_PRP look_VBP upon_IN a_DT photograph_NN of_IN the_DT Acropolis_NNP ruined_VBN
two_CD hundred_CD and_CC fifty_CD years_NNS ago_RB during_IN a_DT war_NN between_IN the_DT Turks_NNPS and_CC the_DT
Venetians_NNPS ._. They_PRP will_MD regard_VB the_DT fear_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ still_RB common_JJ
among_IN many_JJ people_NNS ,_, as_IN a_DT childish_JJ superstition_NN which_WDT was_VBD perhaps_RB natural_JJ
in_IN a_DT race_NN of_IN men_NNS who_WP had_VBD burned_VBN witches_NNS as_RB late_RB as_IN the_DT year_NN 1692._. Even_RB
our_PRP$ hospitals_NNS and_CC our_PRP$ laboratories_NNS and_CC our_PRP$ operating_NN rooms_NNS of_IN which_WDT we_PRP
are_VBP so_RB proud_JJ will_MD look_VB like_IN slightly_RB improved_VBN workshops_NNS of_IN alchemists_NNS
and_CC mediaeval_JJ surgeons_NNS ._.

And_CC the_DT reason_NN for_IN all_DT this_DT is_VBZ simple_JJ ._. We_PRP modern_JJ men_NNS and_CC women_NNS are_VBP not_RB
"_`` modern_JJ "_'' at_IN all_DT ._. On_IN the_DT contrary_NN we_PRP still_RB belong_VBP to_TO the_DT last_JJ generations_NNS
of_IN the_DT cave-dwellers_NNS ._. The_DT foundation_NN for_IN a_DT new_JJ era_NN was_VBD laid_VBN but_CC
yesterday_NN ._. The_DT human_JJ race_NN was_VBD given_VBN its_PRP$ first_JJ chance_NN to_TO become_VB
truly_RB civilised_VBD when_WRB it_PRP took_VBD courage_NN to_TO question_VB all_DT things_NNS and_CC made_VBN
"_`` knowledge_NN and_CC understanding_NN "_'' the_DT foundation_NN upon_IN which_WDT to_TO create_VB a_DT more_RBR
reasonable_JJ and_CC sensible_JJ society_NN of_IN human_JJ beings_NNS ._. The_DT Great_NNP War_NNP was_VBD the_DT
"_`` growing-pain_JJ "_'' of_IN this_DT new_JJ world_NN ._.

For_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN to_TO come_VB people_NNS will_MD write_VB mighty_JJ books_NNS to_TO prove_VB that_IN
this_DT or_CC that_WDT or_CC the_DT other_JJ person_NN brought_VBN about_IN the_DT war_NN ._. The_DT Socialists_NNPS
will_MD publish_VB volumes_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP will_MD accuse_VB the_DT "_`` capitalists_NNS "_'' of_IN
